Because of her major in history, she knows a lot about the direction of history, and she knows that Qi Changning is a famous demon queen from history. Since her villainy has already been determined by history, Jiang Shu intends to embrace her opponent and be a peaceful licking dog so she can live a good life, but as they come into increasingly close contact she discovers the truth hidden in the history books. It seems that this demon queen is not the way that she thought she'd be.....

title: A Dyad of Revenge
alt_titles: Shuang Mian Qian Jin Fu Chou Ji
description: Of the dyad of sisters, one lives a life like a rich piece of black gold—– born with status yet perceived unpleasantly in the eyes of others. The other sister is an illegitimate daughter, who leads a rough life. The fate of these two sisters is tied together by the struggle between the great families. Behind the scenes, a pair of sinister hand pushes the two sisters into the gate of death. Unexpectedly, they were reborn again! Together, they open the road to carve a path towards a dyad of revenge.

title: A Post-Apocalyptic Journey
description: The story of post-apocalyptic wasteland filled with depravity. Follow the journey of a smuggler, a ruthless and bloodthirsty man, who is widely regarded as a monster due to his demonic blood as he ventures and smuggles goods in order to survive a world where only the fittest survive.

title: The Basketball Girl
description: The unknown interior designer, Hans Duan (22 years old), was involved in a criminal dispute as he designed the house for one of the members in that group. Unfortunately, he was persecuted as a murderer due to the case and sentenced to death. In the prison, he met a scientist from the government (Code name No.73) who asked him to take part in a human experiment. But the experiment failed and Hans died. His body was buried in a dump in the city. However, the experimental medicine left in his body leads to gene mutation. Hans is revived and changed into a female. What will happen on him (her)?

title: Love Dependency Disease
description:
Love dependency disease: I have a special body condition which will naturally attract some type of people to me, people commonly known as ——”yandere”.  
  
About my story, let me first come down from the surgeon’s table before speaking.  
  
“I won’t let you run away”  
“You’re mine”  
“I won’t let you be handed over to anyone else!”  
“Even if we die, we must still be together in the afterlife, remember that~”  
  
The girls’ words, they still echo around my ears.

title: Cute Princess Strikes: The Panda from Heaven Wants Hugs
alt_titles: Meng Fei Lai Xi: Tian Jiang Xiongmao Qiu Bao Bao
An Adorable Panda Falls From the Sky: The Endearing Princess Attacks!
description: Thanks to a botched job by the King of Hell, Su Ranran was mistakenly killed shortly after her university graduation. To make it up to her, she was promised a new life as Miss Perfect… but became a fatty panda instead!? And to become human again, she needs to revive the heartbeat of a cold-faced prince regent!?

title: I'm Just a Side Character in a Dating Simulation
alt_titles: Turns Out, I'm a Tool-Man Character in a Romance
description: On that day, a girl wearing strawberry underwear fell from the sky. “This place is actually set in a GAL Game world!” And not only was I, who was raised in a prosperous family and was outstanding in everything not the main character, but I was also instead this world’s villainous and antagonistic Eldest Young Master?! I had decided. I shall forge an alliance with the strawberry girl, and together we shall wage war upon the main character for the one true love! I don’t care for his main character’s aura or his Yasashii Strategy. I shall open up a grand path to becoming the main character! I refuse to be a side character in a dating sim!"

title: I Work Nine to Five in the Immortal Cultivation World
alt_titles: I Work 9 to 5 in the Immortal Cultivation World
Wo Zai Xiuxian Shijie Chao Jiu Wan Wu
Wǒ Zài Xiūxiān Shìjiè Cháo Jiǔ Wǎn Wǔ
description: Hua Qingyuan, died suddenly due to being overly exhausted from working the ‘996’ schedule. However, he found himself transported to a fantasy world and became a disciple of the Qingyun Sword Sect. Determined not to repeat the mistakes of his past life, he resolved to work only 8 hours a day and not to spend even a half a minute practicing cultivation. He became an anomaly in the entire Qingyun Sword Sect, lazily lying under a tree while others practiced day and night. He enjoyed his life after work, while others worked tirelessly on their swordsmanship. Nevertheless, his almost abnormal talent in swordsmanship made him a formidable presence. In the face of requests from his master, fellow disciples, and the sect leader, as well as sudden attacks from the demonic sect and challenges from other young talents, he remained resolute: do not bother me until it’s time to work!

title: Eden Game
description: Developed by “God’s Domain Technologies”, virtual reality has taken the world by storm. The virtual world “Eden’s Paradise” is described as a mysterious and flawless universe, and has become the place that every gamer dreams of. Those, in reality, feel disappointment towards the real world, or want to escape from it, or are possessed by greed, or have dreams, or simply feel boredom - people with all these reasons challenge the trials to enter Eden’s Paradise one after the other.

title: Love Potion Brewing
description: In order to learn about human society, a witch transfers to a high school and begins living independently. In class, she meets a boy who can see through her invisibility magic. Their relationship quickly deepens. Can the little witch find the friendship that she’s looking for? Will love blossom?

title: I, the Female Robot
description:
Since she was young, Qi Qi has been burdened with an incurable disease that will cause her death before the age of 20. Despite this, she uses her genius intellect to develop robotics in order to defy her fate. However, she is inevitably unable to create a robotic body for herself before her time is up. As her vision darkens, she is not satisfied… Only to awaken again?  


---

title: The Story of Hua Yan
description:
The almighty crowned prince insists on marrying this young “Overgrown Apricot” lady from the tainted Hua family. When the news broke out in the capital, many hearts were broken but what?! This wicked woman doesn’t even want to be the crowned princess because she wants to drink and run away with another man?!  
  
Lady Hua: I am a tough woman. I’m definitely not suited for you!   
Crowned Prince: Then I’ll make sure that in this world, you can only pick me.

title: Gentleman Devil
description:
Follow the Devil King as he embark on his journey to become a gentleman!  
  
[Working Raws](https://www.ohmanhua.com/12031/)

title: Strongest Cultivation System
description: Han Hao is your regular working college student. He grinds odd jobs to pay rent, average grades, and wishes to be someone in life. Han Hao got his highschool crush to date him after months of sheer perseverance and is now trying to please his girlfriend… but he one day finds out he’s getting cucked and gets beaten to the ground on top of it. Cursing his luck, he stumbles upon the “Cultivation System”, a game-like feature where he can finally get the strength to do something about his life! Follow Han Hao’s adventures as he develops further as a cultivator!

title: Urban Best Medic
description: The immortal doctor Lu Ning, will reveal the truth and cure the non-curable disease, but the next step is his fiance, the ice cold female president, beautiful and pretty like flowers, and to win her heart. In the future, he have to face counterattack, danger in this big world.

title: I Stayed at Home for a Century, When I Emerged I Was Invincible
alt_titles: I've Been Home for a Hundred Years and I'm Invincible When I Go Out
Wo Zhai Liao Bainian Chumen Yi Wudi
Invincible After a Hundred Years of Seclusion
description:
He clearly transmigrated into the body of the young master of a powerful aristocratic family in the fantasy world, but was sent out of his ancestral home and made to live in a remote courtyard!? But Chu Xuan doesn’t care at all, because he has a system that will help him get stronger! As long as he stay at home long enough, he can become strong! Ding~ Stayed at home for a day, reward- Indestructible Body Technique… Ding~ Stayed at home for a year, reward- Yuxu Celestial Scripture and 100 years of cultivation… Ding~ Stayed at home for ten years,… Since no one wants me to go out, I, Chu Xuan, I’m going to stay at home!

Note: There is no Chapter 102 in the raws.

title: The Divine Urban Physician
alt_titles: The Best Medical God in the City
description:
Five years ago, the Ye family was destroyed, and the trash Ye Chen disappeared mysteriously. Now, and the trash Ye Chen is back! He came back with a cultivating body that penetrated the heavens and the earth and cried, "Ghosts and gods!" 

This time, Ye Chen wants to make the sky fall in awe! Let the Earth tremble! To be in control of everything, to the top of the sky!

title: Goddess Personal Coach
description: As a personal trainer, what Li Xiu has to do is to help his members get rid of imperfections! Female star with low back pain? Come, let me give you two private lessons, and help you luminate with youth and vitality! The female president has a stomach ache? Come take my private lessons, I guarantee that you'll break free of this pain's clutches! There are no imperfect women in this world; if there are, it's because they haven't met me.

title: I Dominate a Magical Continent with an Industrial Revolution
alt_titles: Forging an Industrial Empire in a Magical World
description:
This is a **Medieval Fantasy World** brimming with magic and adventure, where various races and cultures coexist. 

The protagonist, a young lord, inherits his family’s lands and wealth, but must overcome many challenges. With the aid of his system, he introduces an industrial revolution to this magical continent and ultimately rises to dominate it!

title: Campus Valkyrie
description: Unlock the seals that have been sleeping for thousands of years, the hurricane that destroys heaven and earth is approaching, and the people who stir up heaven and earth have quietly awakened! The screenwriter of "the ghostly doctor" has opened a new work, please collect more!

title: My Plug-in Spirit  Ring
description: Urban waste material fell into a strange dream, accidentally obtained a mysterious ring, opened the strongest plug-in, and tragic life began to turn around! The cold female president, cute fiancee, and sexy female spy posted one by one! But just when I was about to reach the peak of my life, I found that there were more than one ring in my dream! ? For the mysterious seal, the other holders had to be killed …

title: “Trembling” as I Escape from You
description: Ai Xu, a designer of trendy toys, suffers from extreme social anxiety and despises socializing and teamwork. Once she became an adult, she did her best to find a job where 90% of the time, she only has to be accountable to herself. However, there is one drawback to being a designer for original IP: She still has to attend and speak at a weekly team meeting. Thankfully, she could simply play a presentation without saying much. Today, however, she was paired with the beautiful and dazzling extrovert Zhiyi from marketing to work as partners on a project.

title: Global Examination
description: This is a test that puts your life at stake. Pass the test and survive. When the two-faced examiner Qin Jiu meets the cold examinee You Huo, the two amnesiacs are put head to head in a fight by the inhumane system. However, they form a tactic agreement. The system collapses after a series of warnings and the erased memories gradually become clearer. It turns out that at the end of this smoke-filled world, you are still the first person I met. The world is brilliant and grand. Welcome home.

title: Serpents' Descendants
description:
Since ancient times, all around the world, there have been myths related to snakes… If they are but an invention of human imagination, how can they be central to all religions? A story parting from an ancient snake-like temple… could actually be true? A girl with a mystical bloodline is about to be awakened and the search of mysterious totem will bring an inevitable change to all…   
“I will break free from this curse and change my destiny.”

title: Welcome to the Nightmare Game
description: Qi Leren unfortunately got a black screen when he cleared the first BE ending in "Nightmare Game". On the way on the bus to repair the computer, the bus collided with a sudden truck, and the injured passengers were taken to the hospital. When he woke up, Qi Leren found out that he was lying in the empty infusion hall, and there was no one to be seen in the huge hospital…

title: I Became the Villain of the Otome Game
alt_titles: Hòugōng Jiù Jiāogěi Fǎnpài Nǚ Pèi
Hougong Jiu Jiaogei Fanpai Nv Pei
Hougong Jiu Jiao Gei Fanpai Nv Pei
The Harem Has Already Been Handed Over to the Villainous Supporting Girl
Give the Harem to the Villainess
description: Lin Ci transmigrated into the otome mobile game she created and became the villainess. The only way she can go back to the real world is avoiding the harem ending and letting the heroine, Rutas, end up with one love interest. Otherwise, Lin Ci would be killed according to the plot. To survive, Lin Ci must win over the men from the heroine one by one!

title: Zui Wu Dao
description: In a world of martial arts, a young boy namned Wu was unable to practice martial arts due to his special body, will he accept his fate and live his life bullied and looked down by others or will he rise and become a master?

title: Soundless Cosmos
description: A cold and distant grim reaper and a rational young lady whose fates are entwined by life and death. Through his silent protection, will they be able to overcome the hardships that obstruct their songs of love?

title: The Savior's 30-Day Unstoppable Streak
alt_titles: Qiāndào 30 Tiān Yī Quán Bào Xīng
Qiandao 30 Tian Yi Quan Bao Xing
Signed 30 Days and I Can Destroy a Star With One Punch
After Signing in for 30 Days, I Can Annihilate Stars
description:
The invasion of deities from the other dimension.

10,000 "liberators" have been chosen to enter a hidden world, where the bloodthirsty battles against demonic beasts are streamed live for the whole world to see.

Chu Mo: 
 -What the fuck?! 
 -I'm useless on the side of these powerful people! 
 -It's a crime to put a normal person to fight a demonic beast!

"Active registration system."

Registration Reward - Day 1: The power of a 1000 year old demonic beast.
Registration Reward - Day 2: The legendary God of War experience in combat.

....
....

W-what? Will I become like Saitama with the 30th day reward?!


---

**Links:**
- [Alternative raw (Kuaikan)](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/13115)
- [Alternative raw (AC QQ)](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/651492)
- Alt. Official English: [Webcomic](https://www.webcomicsapp.com/comic/Log-In-with-Max-Level/6246b2ba8c252b689451020a)

title: Don't Mess With Me, Miss
alt_titles: Xiao Jie Jie Qiān Wàn Bié Re Wo
description: Due to the betrayal of his close friend and girlfriend, college student Wang Ming sunk into the lowest point in his life. During the time he was at his lowest, he had many conflicts out of anger and a will to strike back with the campus belle who he was co-renting with. However, it was also at this time when he was accidentally drawn into a series of conspiracies and contacted the hidden witchcraft society behind modern society. After the evolving Gǔ insect 'Gold Silkworm Gǔ' treated him as its host, he became unceasingly stronger and each and every formidable enemy also continued to emerge from the depths….

title: Killing Ghosts
description: In this era, demons and monsters roam the streets at night. Humans and familiars work as partners who kill those monsters. Civil servant Fan Xiaotie and the strongest demon girl Linyu of the secret department “Supernatural Affairs Armed Response Team” must face endless crisis.

title: Strongest Leveling
description:
Nothing is impossible with the system in my hands! I want the most beautiful woman! I want to be the most powerful person! I want to have the noblest of statuses! I aim to conquer everything under the sky!  


---

title: Your Distance
description: My boyfriend, that was 287km away is now 3km away? Professor Bo Chang Yi used to be good at understanding others but is now no longer humane. The happiness in Ting Shuang’s heart vanished in an instant, leaving only fear, if you think about it, it seems that there will be disaster in the near future.

title: Xian Chan Nu
description: Liu Shiqing, the lady in charge of the escort who loves to play, encounters a cicada to save her when she is out of danger and falls in love at first sight. A story of revenge and loyalty is about to unfold around humans and demons, masters and servants.

title: Above Ten Thousand People
description: Tens of thousands of big shots grovel at his feet, yet he says, “I’m really just an ordinary mortal, though…”

title: The Rebirth of Noble: Revenge
alt_titles: Rebirth of the Rich and Wealthy
description: Her father was missing when she was 3 years old; her hand tendon was cut when she was 15; her mother died in a planned car accident when she was 16; she was framed by her relatives when she was 19; she was burnt alive by her newlywed husband and friend when she was 22. Perhaps the god pities her and makes her reborn to the age of 15. She kept a low profile in the previous life but ended up with being betrayed miserably; this time she will not show any weakness and make those who harmed her pay with their lives!

title: Wolf Butler and His Cat Master
The Queen of Killers
alt_titles: Don’t Mess With the Killer Princess
description: She was the most arrogant hitwoman of the 21st century, and was unintentionally killed by her senior, and transmigrated to bingzhou continent. when she opened her eyes, she crawled out of the pond, and threw the woman who hurt her into the pond for a bath. she also met a cold and arrogant beautiful man, as she looked at his disdaining expression… she will forever remember what this cold and arrogant guy said, "when this consort bears this king's child, this king will shall snatch everything under the heavens of this Mingyou nation!"

title: Ni Xi Ba Mo Wang!
description: Leaving behind his throne, his wealth, and his women. The Demon King now disguises himself and start raising heroes in his pen?! He even formed a party to level up "newbies"! Isn't this suppose to be the war between Good and Evil?! Caesar mockingly answers: "Rules? I create the rules!"

title: Almost Friends
alt_titles: The rabbit that refuses to be friends with the fox
description: One is a rabbit girl with a congenital defect, and the other is a fox girl that’s super popular but has a lonely heart. Despite their differences, they are each other’s precious ‘The Other Me in This World’. When they meet, a story of mutual healing and mutual growth begins…

title: Outlaws
description: Two high school students, Lee Sang-Hyun and Bae Ji-Hyun, live their lives as normal high school students, while secretly hiding their true identities: Mages of Law. But on one eventful day, Bae Ji-Hyun reveals her true identity of being a Law Mage in an attempt to rescue Lee Sang-Hyun from a deadly attack from the Corruptors, but to her surprise, Lee Sang-Hyun has a secret to show of his own! Join Lee Sang-Hyun and Bae Ji-Hyun, as they make numerous sacrifices and attempts in order to fight and exterminate the Corruptors that are plaguing the world in which they live in.

title: It's Hard for Evil Lords to Raise Haughty Concubines
alt_titles: It's Hard for Evil Princes to Raise Little Princesses
It's Hard for Evil to Raise Concubines
Xie Jun Nan Yang Xiao Mo Fei
description: The pitiful failure was reborn, awakening the talents within her… but she pretends to be weak, while hiding her true strength?! The notorious reputation of the so-called failure began to spread far and wide, her name attracting countless challengers. Naturally, in the end… she'll conquer all who stand in her way! When meeting the evil demon lord, she even dares to call him a pervert?! If these two can join forces, just what kind of bewildering change can they bring upon the world?

title: Xuan Ji Ci
description:
This is surely a story you've never thought of! The cartoon’s main character is called Yuan Xin. She’s an otaku who likes to immerse herself in a fantasy world. She, who likes to look at hot guys–after embarrassing herself in front of them in the school yard, decides to retaliate. Unexpectedly, during the crucial moment, an accident happened, and she crossed over to the game world!  
  
This comic has converted to strip comic!

title: Super Keyboard Man
description:
A super keyboard, comeback life of a technology nerd.
Money! Girls! I want it all!
Because I have a magical keyboard!!
I am the Super Keyboard Man!!!

title: Hotel Temptation
description: In her past life, Liu Zihan was a cowardly girl who was bullied. After her father's death, she was deceived by relatives and deprived of all her property. After her rebirth, she became the queen of mercenaries and turned into a female soldier from a weak woman. But in an accident, she traversed back to that weak and helpless time, but at the moment she already has good skills and knows the true side of everyone. So she decided to take revenge!

title: Fuchou Airen
description: Yan Shuangshuang watched her former lover die before her eyes. An angel appeared, giving her a chance to live again. However, after her rebirth, everything went wrong.

title: Fox Spirit Matchmaker
description: In Eastern History, humans and spirits exist in this world. Fox spirits have long acted as matchmakers, holding a prestigious position among spirits. In this story, the lives of a fox spirit and a man who have both rejected the idea of true love become intertwined, and their exciting adventure begins.

title: You Look Better Crying
alt_titles: Ni Ku Qi Lai Zhen Hao Kan
You Look So Beautiful When You Cry
description: Crybaby Xiao Yu together with the expressionless bad girl Xiao Xiao. Two different personalities seeking comfort in each other.

title: Poor Father and Daughter
description:
It's about a poor family of two: father and rebellious daughter.  
In order to make money the single father does a lot of odd jobs and at the school the daughter is incompatible with her classmates.

title: Powerful Juvenile King
alt_titles: Lin Yang and the Miracle Ring
description: My name is Lin Yang, a college student from a poor family. Accidentally, I got a ring. It changes my body into something with unique physical attractions for girls. However, that is not the only thing it brings to me…

title: Won't There Be a Problem If The Hero Is Such a Horrible Person?
alt_titles: Can the Brave be So Mean?
description: This is a miserable world ruled by the Demon King. However, the God of Creation gave the enslaved humanity a sliver of hope. A Holy Saint will be born every hundred years. The one who has the Holy Maiden's first kiss will become the Hero and lead humanity to topple the Demon King. During the Hero Trial that happens once every a hundred years, a strong but unruly man appeared. Disrespecting the trial and not lending a hand to the helpless villagers when the village was attacked by monsters! He keeps talking about getting the Holy Maiden and saving the world but is this kind of person the Hero humanity has been waiting for!?

title: Sweet Plunder
description: A poor girl entered an elite academy, and accidentally became the target for the rich people's "love hunt". The academy's elegant men become animals like a wolf, lion, bear, and snake in the anonymous chatroom, while treating the girl's heart as a game of gamble… The girl that suddenly discovers the dark truth of the game decides to bare her teeth and break the hearts of these people that attempted to play her, while also trying to uncover the game's mastermind… The revenge of the prey starts now!

title: Guide to a Male God Chasing His Wife
alt_titles: Nan Shen Zhui Qi Zhi Nan
description:
The Modern-day Chapter of "The Distinguished Cute Master (Meng Shi Zai Shang)"! The miserable little white lotus was rescued by the male god. The male god cares for the little white lotus and raises her into a black hearted lotus who'll beat down any enemies!   
Lotus: "You're planning on doing something to me, aren't you? Are you looking at my body?!" (Huggingblankettightly.jpg)  
Male God: "Fool, I have been searching for you for a long time. Now, I just want to spoil you."

title: I Awoke as a God After Auto Battling For a Million Years
alt_titles: After Millions of Years, I Woke Up to Be a God!
Idle Player Returns as a God
Wangyou: Gua Ji Bai Wan Nian, Wo Xing Lai Cheng Shen
Wǎngyóu: Guà Jī Bǎi Wàn Nián, Wǒ Xǐng Lái Chéng Shén
description: An otherworldly invasion begins as countless monsters pour through rifts, engulfing human cities and plunging humanity into a doomsday crisis! From this point, humanity enters an era of universal job transfers, with nations vying to train powerful professionals and compete for top rankings in the otherworldly conquest! When the number one ruler of the Dragon Kingdom, who has slumbered for millions of years, awakens with millions of years' worth of idle resources, the bosses of the otherworld tremble. Top-tier professionals from countries around the globe kneel in awe...

title: If I Kissed You
description:
Soft cute gentle teacher x fake gentle and actually cold student. Age gap.  
Ms. Luo's self-awareness and acceptance process.  
Author Weibo: <https://weibo.com/u/2140322502?from=myfollow_all&is_all=1&sudaref=weibo.com>

title: Great Doctor Ling Ran
alt_titles: The Making Of A Miraculous Doctor
description:
Ling Ran, whose goal is to become the world's greatest doctor, suddenly obtained the golden finger system! And this is a system with a high degree of medical expertise! With the help of the system, what medical height can the intern Ling Ran reach?  
This manhua adapted the Webnovel called " great doctor ling ran"  
  
[Official English Novel](https://www.webnovel.com/book/great-doctor-ling-ran_11912235406605505)

title: Summon The Demon, For I Am The Abyss
alt_titles: Summon The Demon, For I Am The Abyss
Devil Summoner, I Am the Abyss Lord
Zhaohuan Emo, Wo Ji Shi Shenyuan
description: Lin Tianhao, who has transmigrated to another world, attends the Job Change Ceremony and ends up taking on a “sewer-tier” job — Summoner. Just as everyone is mocking him, believing his future is doomed, he suddenly awakens a system and gains the skill [Demonic Sacrifice]! Who says the Summoner class is trash? I have the strongest SSS-rank talent!

title: My Contracted Wife is Cold to Me
description: Shi Xia Ben is the envy of the president 's wife, but did not expect that behind the scenes is a contract marriage. The three-year deadline is approaching, but the president of Ao Jiao has proposed "let's really do a fake show". What if my husband does not act according to the contract?

title: The Regent King Is Too Ferocious
alt_titles: Rebirth Of The Tyrant’s Pet: Regent Prince Is Too Fierce
description: I died of a young age in my previous life, but unknowingly I went back in time to the past where dynasties still existed. However, this was not even a blessing. The me from that life died, killed by her own husband, the emperor. And now, I am reborn into a little girl, who is the sister of the emperor?!

title: Martial Evolution: Start by Awakening the King of Monsters
description: A youth named Yi He is reborn into the world of powerful Martial arts and awakens the King of Monsters with the strongest bloodline!

title: Romance of the Stars
description: When Lu Yinbing won the Golden Jade award for her performance in “Breaking Snow,” the popular young actress Xia Yitong was defeated. She collapsed on the spot, sobbing uncontrollably in front of the cameras. The two fanbases instantly started a war on Weibo. The movie queen’s fans accused the other of paying the media, while the young actress' fans defended her from every accusation. No one knew that Queen Lu and the young actress had been…

title: My Boyfriend Got Me Falling in Love
alt_titles: This Boy Got Me Falling Hard
My Boyfriend Got Me Fell in Love
description: The entertainment world's big shot Feng Yue pairs up with up-and-coming actor Xiang Shu Jian; will they have a sleazy love story? No, this is between a beautiful boss and a new, hot internet celebrity! Please give me a love like this!

title: Blood and Steel
description: The story begins with an eradication of Qingcheng by a group of martial art fanatic from Wudong, whose master and disciples only has one belief: to become the strongest. In order to maintain supremacy, it takes over all the other martial arts group and kill those refuse to yield themselves to it. Yan Heng, a young swordsman in Qingcheng, was saved by 'Wudang Hunter' Jing Lie, who also lost his fellows because of Wudong. Being the only remnant of their groups, the two allied and start their journey of revenge.

title: Nine Sun God King
description:
The fallen emperor Qin Yun, the inheritance of Jiuyang, awakened the world of martial arts, learned the skills of the world. Since then, he has been on the Xiuwu Avenue. A variety of martial arts strong, in order to seek his refining, willing to serve as his younger brother.   
  
  
Pr:||O imperador caído Qin Yun, a herança de Jiuyang, despertou o mundo das artes marciais, aprendeu as habilidades do mundo. Desde então, ele está na avenida Xiuwu. Uma variedade de fortes artes marciais, a fim de buscar seu refinamento, disposto a servir como seu irmão mais novo.||

title: I, the Urban Legend Creator!
description: The protagonist Yuan Zhenji crossed into the parallel world of Jiang Shi, and found that this world was full of various horrors and that ordinary humans were as fragile as paper before them. He used a book called the "Urban Legend Records" to create urban legends that affect reality, punish criminals, house horrors, absorb their abilities, and "use magic to defeat magic," becoming a watchdog who fights against horrors. With his allies, he'll counter the impending horror that seeks to extinguish the world.

title: Infinite Devouring: From Zero to Hero
description: Yang Chen, who keeps failing his performance assessments in an immortal cultivation academy, accidentally discovers that he has the Ancient Dragon Soul. In a world where such souls are rare, he quickly becomes an almighty Heaven Master and is ready to venture into the unknown world with his newfound talent.

title: Sweet Bite
description:
The noble prince falls in love with a humble commoner! A confinement of possession begins, like the game of cat and mouse… But you can't stop love, a soft bite, is my property.

---

Official English: [WebComics](http://www.webcomicsapp.com/comic/5f2bd8e88c252b2eb429683a), [MangaToon](https://mangatoon.mobi/en/detail/599375), [Pocket Comics](https://www.comico.io/pocket-comics)  
Official: [Japanese](https://www.comico.jp/articleList.nhn?titleNo=29866), [Vietnamese](https://www.comico.vn/title/124)

title: Of Machines and Beasts
alt_titles: Peach And The Book of The Last Days
description: In the future world, civilization has crumbled due to an experiment gone awry, most of the world has descended into tribes and factions, the people have also been divided into two types: Cyborgs, a combination of the human body and mechanical parts, the other type are Beast Spirits, a combination of human and animal DNA. Hei Tong Shi is a cyborg, who wanders between cyborgs and Beast Spirits, he fights to uncover the mysteries of the world and for himself.

title: Otaku's Offspring
description:
Ever wondered about the daily lives of good-looking kids whose parents are Otaku?  
  
Yangwei, a kind and tall boy, is oblivious to the Otaku culture. On the other hand, Xiaoqi, the girl who sits next to him at school, grew up knowing it all due to her parents' influence. With Yangwei's and Xiaoqi's parent(s) being geeks, the two see each other in common and discover what's latent to them.

title: Battle Frenzy
description: In the silent and lonely darkness, two moons shown in the sky of a world with limitless possibilities. a mysterious, weird, delighted clown, several federal unions of cities formed three powerful empires, where interracial unrest and disturbance of monsters are a norm, this, is the time when heroes are made. Humans struggle to regain the control of planet earth while armed with the highest level of ambition. At this time of importance, second year high schooler Senior, Student Wang, he uses the Fate Roulette to upheave the world, watch out people, here comes the Senior!

title: Starting as the Black Dragon Boss, I Am Invincible
alt_titles: Kaiju Jianren Heilong boss, Wo Wudile
description: Useless Professional Binds with the Strongest Part-Time System, Transforms into a Black Dragon BOSS Crushing Everything!

title: Sorcerer Maiden
description: An accidental encounter during his childhood left the newly coronated emperor unable to forget the sorcerer he met, A’Luo. When they meet again, can the youthful emperor capture A’Luo’s heart? A beautiful fantasy romance is unrolling.

title: Wanting to Touch You
description: Xing Zi hates guys, because whenever she bumps into them she hiccups! However one day she bumped into a guy with a bad reputation, but she didn't even hiccup?!

title: Ruler of Infinite Realms
description: Ye Cheng, an ancient god, travels from the present, modern era to the past and becomes the owner of Effervescent Red Courtyard in Nanzhou. On his journey to Beidi, he promises the Snow Shadow tribe priestess his help, but...

title: Azur Lane - Start Building! (Doujinshi)
description:
A fan made manga by Xiujia\_yihuizi based on the mobile game Azur Lane that is about anthropomorphised WWII ships.  
A comedic slice of life manga about shipgirls.  
  
You can support Xiujia\_yihuizi on:  
Weibo: <https://www.weibo.com/u/3746428153?is_hot=1>  
Pixiv: <https://www.pixiv.net/member.php?id=19469841>

title: Destined Pair? I Disagree!
description: She was the queen of a nation and loved by God, but she turned down god's love and gave freedom to the people. On the day of her speech, she got betrayed and assassinated, and then was cursed after her reincarnation and must find true love before her birthday. Will she be able to find true love before it's too late?

title: The No.1 Chef in Martial Art World
alt_titles: The First Chef in Martial Art World
description: Liu Xian, the world's number one Chinese chef, has traveled to the martial arts world by accident. There is no concept of cooking in this world, and everyone eats pills for food. Liu Xian, who is a master of culinary skills, is about to flex his muscles. However, what awaits him is the imprisoned play of gluttonous beautiful girls one after another! The blessing of Qi people? No, because this chef has gynophobia!

title: Bloodline
description: Yeren, who dreams of being a vampire hunter, is unwittingly caught in the crossfire between a vampire girl and the Holy lands. As a temporary blood servant, he doesn't know what to do when the hatred and strife between them have been ongoing for thousands of years… This is a story about Lilo·Ai, the last vampire.

title: Lord Xueying
description: In the Tranquil Sun province of the empire, there exists an unremarkable lordship known as Xue Ying Territory! This is the home of the Dong Bo clan, the clan of our hero Xue Ying! His father, a commoner turned noble; his mother, a noble who abandoned her clan for love, and his brother, an innocent toddler. But peace cannot last forever, Xue Ying’s peaceful life is shattered, and the only way to reclaim it is through power!

title: I Scared the Divine Lord as I Handed Over the Ancient Immortal Pill
alt_titles: Kaiju Shang Jiao Taigu Xian Yao, Wo Xia Huai Sheng Zhu
description: Bai Yifan has an ancient ring that allows him to travel freely between the Earth and the fantasy world, and he has discovered that "plants and animals" on the Earth will evolve into treasures when they are taken to the fantasy world. An apple evolves into an immortal fruit, an egg will hatch into a phoenix or an earth dog has the bloodline of a dragon. One could even use tobacco to manipulate the enemy to their advantage.

title: Dominating the Immortal Cultivation Realm
alt_titles: A Mouthful of My Loli Master's Milk Makes Me Unparalleled
A Mouthful of My Beautiful Master's Milk Is Unequalled in the Whole World
A Mouthful of My Loli Master's Milk Is Unequalled in the Whole World
Luó Lì Shīfu Nǎi Wǒ Yīkǒu Tiānxià Wúdí
Loli Shifu Nai Wo Yi Kou Tian Xia Wu Di
description: Traveling through another world with a system, I thought I could be unparalleled, but I didn't know that if I wanted to upgrade this damn system, I would need to be beaten up constantly. Just when I was about to go crazy under the beatings of countless people, a loli appeared and domineeringly said that she wanted to accept me as a disciple. Hmph, facing the temptation of the loli, I agreed. Haha, after all, she will grow up one day. It's just I didn't know that she would grow up so fast...

title: She Is a Beauty
description: A heroic sturdy female general, woke up as a weak woman. The emperor however wanted this to happen, but also he wanted her to be on the battlefield, defending the homeland. However, she is no longer strong, how can she be able to fight?

title: Eternal Love
description: When Wen Yifan returned to her hometown for work, she met the rumoured “First-Class Handsome Guy” in a bar, but he turned out to be Sang Yan, whom she hurt and rejected in high school! In a twist of fate, the two people who could never get along kept bumping into each other. They even rented the same unit by chance and became housemates! Unspoken feelings refusing to see the light of day, strong emotions stirring beneath it all… Let’s see how Sang Yan, the “Peak Ideal Boyfriend” interprets and expresses deep affections and sweet love!

title: Qiao'er Is Naughty
description:
Nan Qiao'er, the ever-popular, top-searched celebrity of the Celestial Realm… transformed into a cheeky little imp during a live stream of her ascension in front of thousands! And she's even picked up by the scary Demon Lord… to serve as a meat shield!? Thank goodness mini-Qiao'er still retains her angelic looks. Now all she has to do to latch firmly onto the Demon Lord, and make puppy-dog eyes to plead for her life…

**AXED due to artist tracing/plagiarism**

title: Greatest Sword Immortal
description: Fang Haotian is a young boy who is deeply in love with a girl called Ningyu, but her parents are opposed to their relationship. Ningyu is arranged for marriage to another man. Can he become strong enough to take back his beloved Ningyu from this man?

title: I Am the Strongest Lord in Another World
description:
Richard, a transmigrator, became a pioneering aristocrat in another world. At the time, the natives were invading the country from the front and a noble with ill intentions was plotting behind the scenes. Richard only had a few things to rely on and one of them was called... The Lord System.

Creating frontiers to build castles, finding dwarves to buy equipment and much more! Bearmen, minotaurs, goblins... all kinds of enemies were invading one after another! The road to becoming the mightiest lord begins!

title: The Missing Gate
description: College student Zhao Zhe and classmate Liu Qingyan participated in the concert of the idol group MMC48, but they accidentally discovered the true identity of the new idol and landed into trouble. When Zhao Zhe almost lost his life, a mysterious girl named Chen Mo suddenly appeared to save him. For revenge, Zhao Zhe followed Chen Mo and joined the mysterious forces that supported her. Follow Zhao Zhe as he embarks on a new journey and travels around the world in order to compete and defeat his foes.

title: Tang Hill Burial
alt_titles: Tang Hill Burial: Journey to the West Irresponsible Anything Goes Edition
description:
Journey to the West, but with female Wukong and muscular yet klutzy monk.  
  
A lot of chapters have already been translated in <https://danbooru.donmai.us/pools/9976> and just needs someone to edit/typeset.

title: There Are Always Teachers Who Want To Ask Out Parents
alt_titles: Zong You Laoshi Yao Qing Jiazhang
description:
That night, Qi Yan flirted with a mature woman at the bar and took her to bed, not knowing that she was the mother of a student in her class. And then at a parents' meeting, their eyes met.

"Teacher Qi, what a coincidence." 

But the closer she got, the more attracted she felt. Upon learning that she was single, Qi Yan began a determined but gentle pursuit. The path to pursuing is long and imprecise. When will her heart be touched?

title: The All-devouring Whale
description: It all started with a whale, whose cultivation was all about swallowing things. This was a fantasy world crowded with spiritual monsters. Fan Lingxiao, the chief of Sky Vagabond, grew a little catfish into an all-devouring whale and beame a world-famous spirit master. However, the whale somehow failed in a combat, and turned into a cruel zombie whale which swallowed Fan Lingxiao. When he woke up, everything had change…

title: My Magician Senior
alt_titles: A Mage, but Also a Scientist
description: This is a world where science and magic coexist. Here, some people pursue powerful magic, while others learn eternal truths. The protagonist, Blair, a mathematician who came from a different world, with left-handed magic and right-handed science, opens the door to a new world! Academic Dean? Supreme Witch? Senior Killer Brother? As an adult, I want it all!

title: Post-apocalyptic Dispatch Company
alt_titles: Chéngwéi Wǒ de Yuángōng Ba! Zhèlǐ Shì Lǎobǎn Yǐwài Quán Yuán Sàngshī de Mòshì Pàiqiǎn Gōngsī!
description: A failed entrepreneurship! A ten million debt! A betrayal! A girlfriend that ran away! He even landed in a pile of trash/rubbish/garbage when he tried to jump off a building! The unlucky Cao Xiaomeng woke up to find himself surrounded by zombies everywhere! The system activates upon the moment of death! Become a post-apocalyptic entrepreneur! The post-apocalyptic dispatch company that hires cute zombie secretaries and mutant beast employees to serve you!

title: Scoring the Sacred Body of the Ancients from the Get-go
alt_titles: Start by signing in and obtaining the Ancient Divine Body
description:
Jun Xiaoyao was transported to a mystical world and became the divine child of a Clan of the Ancients. He came to possess an invincible background, unparalleled talents and even a check-in system, enabling him to acquire an Accomplished Sacred Body of the Ancients at the very beginning of his new life.

He acquired the Divine Elephant Overpowering Force, a six-star reward, checking in at the Old Tablet of Taiyue.

He acquired the Bones of Supremacy, a seven-star reward, checking in at his Ten Years Old Banquet.

He acquired the Cauldron of Maternal Qi of All Beings, an eight-star reward, checking in at the Bronze Mystical Hall.

He acquired the Grand Method of Freedom Melding, a ten-star reward, checking in at the Borderless Ocean.

He sat on the clouds countless years later, with his sword pointing at the heavens, saying, “I alone shall rule over the heavens and the earth. I shall become the pinnacle at the very end of the mystic path!”

title: L.O.R.D: Legend of Ravaging Dynasties
description: The Odin Mainland is separated into four countries, in each, lives a group of soul masters protecting their countries with their soul powers. The seven most powerful of them are known as Noble Lords. The story begins in the water origin, the Aslan Empire. Qi Ling has been a busboy in an inn ever since he was young and subconsciously tamed a legendary soul beast, Ice Fang in a battle between soul masters. Yin Chen came on the orders of the Silver Priests to take in him as his disciple. With his help, Qi Ling heads to the Grave of the Souls to seek his soul weapon. As he couldn’t sit still like how his lord instructed him, he enters the Grave of the Souls with Tianshu Youhua and Guishen Lianquan. After his risky adventure in the Grave of the Souls, he was scolded by his lord. At the very same time, another conspiracy that has long been in the works within the Aslan Empire is gradually revealing itself.

title: Zhi Zun Shen Mo
description: From the top of martial art world to the trash after being in the top of martial art world in a young age he died Because of alcohol then he reincarnated into a body that can’t even practice martial arts but with his knowledge he will never give up

title: Rhapsody of Mulan
description: Betrayed by his own blood brother….what can be more surprising? Being reborn into the body of his little sister! A story of revenge and rebirth.

title: The Secret Buried Within
description: Xia XiaoShu used to be a rebellious girl who was once involved in violence incidents at school. After she transferred to a different school, she tried to change her image to "Good Girl" in desire of having a normal school life. However, she was once again targeted by her previous "rival". If she did not fight back, her secrets will be exposed. If she does not fight back, her friends will be harmed… Having to choose between "Good Girl" and "Bad Girl", what will she do?

title: Divine Spirit Martial Emperor
description:
The young man Lin Yan awakened the waste spirit and was ridiculed by everyone, but he did not know that the spirit was called the life and death coffin, and he turned around the heavens and earth. He also included a beautiful young girl master Qian Qianxue with unlimited ability. Ultimately the position of God Emperor Wu.  
  
  
Le jeune Lin Yan avait éveillé un très faible esprit martial et était ridiculisé par tout le monde, mais il ne savait pas que son esprit martial était en fait appelé le cercueil de la vie et de la mort. Il a voyagé entre le ciel et la terre et avait également comme maître une très belle jeune fille, Gong Qianxue possédant des capacités illimitées. Il gagna ensuite la position d'empereur divin Wu.

title: Special Agent Dragon Soul
description:
He is a Super Special Agent, and is also the Judge of the Dark World, and still has a terrifying reputation as the Mercenary King. Confidently he is returning to a place in the past, the proud agent is now about to step where his enemy has stepped in the past. There is also another Dragon Soul Super Special Agent at this place.  
  


---

title: Paranoid Love
description:
Yu Mang Mang, a senior student who is graduating soon still doesn't have a boyfriend. That is because she's surrounded by rumors ever since she was in high school and it caused her to have no friend at all when she entered the university.  
  
Yet on the day of her intern interview, she meets the campus king, Lin You. The scary part is… that Campus King is going to live in her house?! Under the same roof, he starts to show his "devil" side…  
  


---

title: Breaking Through the Clouds
description:
Three years ago, the operation leader Jiang Ting made an error in judgment, a chain explosion occurred at the scene, and there were heavy casualties in the unit. Three years later, he, supposed to have died in duty, returned to the world, doing everything he could to bring forth the bloody, bizarre truth. Heroic souls resting in death, the ones behind it all closely approaching, sentiments built fighting side by side in blood and fire…  
"I used all of my luck in this life, to exchange for you. Thank you for bringing me back to this world, Yan Xie."

title: Sweethearts in the Spotlight
alt_titles: The Top Couple Is a Bit Sweet
description: A-listers Song Yan and Wen Li, celebrated as showbiz's golden couple, share a secret: their marriage is a pact of friendship, not romance! To appease doubtful fans, Wen Li signs up for a couple reality show, dragging Song Yan along for the ride! Yet, as the cameras roll, they discover their connection is deeper than mere contract terms. Surprisingly, Wen Li finds Song Yan's newfound charm and flirtation skills captivating. Were the seeds of genuine affection planted long before the spotlight?

title: Picking Up Beast Girls In The End Times
description: The protagonist wakes up after 200 years of hibernation and finds that human beings have been destroyed. All humanoid animal girls live on the wasteland. In order to survive, the protagonist must use his scientific and cultural knowledge as a human being and collect capable beast girls. Pursue the threat of barbaric races and establish an apocalyptic ideal state. Fortunately, the birthplace is a high-tech research institute-and he is the savior appointed by scientists.

title: Brainless Witch
description: The immortal witch cannot stop her tears after losing what was precious to her once again, while trying to find a way to stop her tears the witch accidentally provokes the prince of hell. This is the start of a chaotic daily life!

title: Delivering in Apocalyptic World
alt_titles: Delivering Food in the End Times
description: When zombies appeared, Ye Fang obtained a super delivery system. Monsters? Zombies? Who dares to snatch my delivery items, you will need to ask my frying pan if it allows it to happen!

title: I Became the Target of the Harem in Another World
alt_titles: Wo Jing Chengle Yì Shijie Hougong De Caiji Duixiang
Wǒ Jìng Chéngle Yì Shìjiè Hòugōng De Cǎijí Duìxiàng
description: The dimensional wall is broken. Secret books, magical equipment, and spiritual beasts have descended, and the world has entered an era of hegemony. I want to hide, but a girl from another world comes to my door to collect my...

title: The Seal of the Mountains and Seas
alt_titles: Becoming The God of Mountains and Seas
description: Ye Chenben is the exalted young master of the Ye family, but because of a conspiracy, both his parents were killed, and his twin sisters were imprisoned; On the verge of his death, the blood of benevolence awakened the ancient god beast in his dantian and breaks the seal of the Mountains and Seas. Ye Chenben's very existence defies the heavens, making his trek to the peak all the more enjoyable.

title: I Ship My Rival x Me
alt_titles: I Ship My Adversary X Me
description: My rival, Gu Yiliang, a B-lister rookie, has the face of an idol and can act well, while I, Wei Yanzi, a C-lister rookie, has the face of an idol but with mediocre acting skills. One day, I accidentally discovered a magical world, where no matter we sit, stand, move, or stay, our love is more precious than gold. The name of this world that is brimming with kindness is none other than Niangzi!

title: Turned Into a Grass in the Fantasy World
alt_titles: 在玄幻世界变成了一棵草？
description: Our Main Character was transported into a Fantasy Game World but in the same time, he was also turned into a grass

title: Mermaid's Egg
description: After a plane crash, the young master of a rich family found himself on a deserted island, then, he accidentally resurrected a merman! This merman is not just any other ordinary wild merman, he’s the high priest of the deserted Island tribe! The arrogant young master is not only trapped on this desert island, but also forcibly experiencing the “transformation ruse” and is forced to hatch an egg?! "Is this young master going to lose his face?!" This primitive tribe is so scary, I can only rely on the merman brother to save my life…

title: Already Invincible at the Beginning
description:
Ding, the host has opened the invincible field! As long as the host is invincible in the field…!” As a nerd, Chen Changan travels through the fantasy world, facing countless monsters and ghosts from the outside world, Chen Changan decided not to leave his invincible field before becoming immortal. When he is bored, he occasionally raises a few cute and sweet apprentices, and accidentally cultivated them to become leaders in the spiritual world, which turned the world upside down.

Alternative Raws:
[Bilibili Manhua](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc30700)
[KuaiKan Manhua](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/12768/)

title: The Perfect Idol's Guide to Falling in Love
alt_titles: The Perfect Idol's Handbook of Falling in Love
Wán měi Ài Dòu Lún xiàn Shǒu cè
description: The girl group, MYSTERY, which has remained unpopular even after three years together, suddenly announces their separation on their third anniversary. The first team, known for its hot and sexy style, is led by the original captain, Windy. However, the new captain, Wangshu, with her sweet and lively image, has been appointed unexpectedly. Wangshu appears to be obedient and sensible, always clinging to Windy, but it seems she harbors special feelings for this "jiejie"...

title: Bullied By The Classpet
alt_titles: Bullied By The Straight A student
description: A story about A Classpet and her girlfriend that talks a lot.

title: The Start of a Stunning and Feisty Master: A System with Ten Pounds of Rebellion
alt_titles: Kaiju Juese Qiao Shifu: Xitong Shi Jin Fan Gu
Beginning With a Stunning Master: The System Is 10-Catty Reverse Bones
Kai Ju Jue Se Qiao Shifu: Xitong Shi Jin Fan Gu
Becoming the Perfect Son-in-Law: A System with a Rebellious Streak
description: Comedy + Transmigration System. My name is Xia Chi. I originally thought that the four female masters would act as my bodyguards on the path to becoming a god, but little did I know, each of them has their own ulterior motives. They actually want me to be their little cotton-padded jacket!?

title: The Brilliant Miss Olive
description: Olive, a young girl who is not satisfied with being a marriage tool, runs away from home overnight. On the way out, she accidentally saved Snow, a man who calls himself a nobleman in distress. Olive, who lost her belongings because of her helpfulness towards others, decides to seize Snow's house for her own business plan. With her own efforts, she was able to build up her jewelry stand business.

title: Genshin Impact by Xiujia Yihuizi (@slow740)
description: A short comic about Genshin Impact by Xiujia Yihuizi (@slow740).

title: I Want to Hear You Say You Like Me
alt_titles: I Want to Hear Your Confession
description: Xu Yuan unwittingly discovers that his best friend has fallen in love with him and is now running away from that realization…

title: Lanxi Zhen
alt_titles: Legend of Luo Xiaohei: Lanxi Town
Luo Xiaohei Zhan Ji: Lanxi Zhen
description: Lanxi Zhen tells the story of Laojun, Xuanli, and Qingning during the war. It shows a different world of demons and gods.

title: Reborn as a Demon Cultivator, Starting off by Finding a Zombie Planet
alt_titles: Reborn as a Demon Cultivator, Starting off by Finding a Zombie Planet
description: Chu Xuan transmigrated into a world of cultivation and became a demon cultivator of Wuji Sect. So-called demonic cultivation involves the plundering of the essences of the heaven, earth, and all things. Only by slaughtering thousands of people can one become the Great Demon Lord. However, such killing is not tolerated by the heavenly order, and the Wuji Sect was hunted down and destroyed by the righteous sects. Resigned to his fate, Chu Xuan accidentally found the Blood Mirror, which allowed him to travel to a post-apocalyptic planet full of zombies! He suddenly realizes that this place is the perfect environment for demon cultivation!

title: Born to Be Rich
description: In this era of martial arts, those who don't awaken their martial arts are known as primitive humans. Xiao Wudao is an arrogant and disrespectful child. His father is a rich man while his adopted brother is a martial artist. One day, his brother turned on the family and killed everyone. Suddenly, Xiao Wudao found himself awoken one year before that faithful day. Now, he will protect his family and won't redo the mistakes in his past life.

title: Meow! Please Help, Manager!
alt_titles: His Highness The Prince is a Cat
description:
On the outside, King Cat Café looks like a normal cat cafe. But unknown to most, it's actually a special cafe cast with a spell, carrying out the wishes of cats.  
  
Ordinary university student Yeon Bora stumbles upon the King Cat Café as it's on the verge of closing down, becoming its manager. She begins to listen to the troubles of the cats, helping them fulfill their wishes.  
  
Translation from chinese raws:   
Clearly just an ordinary student, Lu Zhi Zhi unexpectedly signed a temporary contract to become the Cat Cafe's manager in the heat of the moment without forethought?! Saving cafes on the brink of closing down are her specialty, but also helping kitties fulfill their wishes, isn't this too out of the ordinary?! Even though all the cats in the cafe can turn into first-class handsome guys, she…she still needs a moment to consider it carefully! But can these cats really become cafe staff? The coffee they brew tastes like rag water, the biscuits they bake are hard enough to kill, no wonder there hasn't been any guests the whole day, when will they achieve their goal of establishing a successful buisness?  
  


---

  
[Official Korean Translation](https://page.kakao.com/home/%EC%95%BC%EC%98%B9!-%EB%8F%84%EC%99%80%EC%A3%BC%EC%84%B8%EC%9A%94-%EC%A0%90%EC%9E%A5%EB%8B%98!%5B%EB%8F%85%EC%A0%90%5D/54458711)

title: Lord of Destiny Wheel
alt_titles: The Lord of the Wheel of Destiny
Lord of the Wheel of Fortune! When Changes Come to the World
Minglun zhi Zhu! Dang Yibian Jianglin Renjian
description: A planet called Ghost Star suddenly appeared, causing the earth's animals and plants to evolve into monsters that can destroy humans. At the time of human extinction, people accidentally discovered a way to log into the ghost star, and found that they could gain power against monsters on the ghost star. So in order to survive, human beings started the era of exploring ghost stars...

title: I Am the Shadow Reverend
description:
Traveling through a parallel world, the game merges with the real world, where ferocious beasts are rampant, alien races are raging, and there are a large number of dungeons and secret realms in the wild.
Humans can awaken into various professions and work hard to kill monsters and upgrade.
On the day of his profession awakening, Lin Luo awakened the priest profession, which is the most popular but has no damage ability.
Just when he was struggling, he discovered that his skills had mutated!
The blood recovery technique mutates into the bleeding technique?
Blessing mutates into curse?
But I am really a healing priest!

title: I'm Not The Cult Leader
description: Who am I? Where am I? What am I doing? Wait, wait! Great Alliance Leader! Stop it already!! I really…… am not the Cult Leader! The entirety of the Jianghu thought that the Cult Leader of the Demonic Cult was a woman—who would've thought that the Cult Leader could even secretly start a harem?!

title: Wolf x Rabbit
description:
Shape-shifting wolf and rabbit couple  
  
  
  
[Creator's weibo](https://weibo.com/u/2673967277)

title: Fox and Deer
description: An NSFW spinoff of That Time I was Blackmailed by the Class's Green Tea Bitch.

title: BugCat-Capoo
description:
Like a cat, like a bug, this cute and scary story of Capoo will heal your heart, and eat all your meat. A heartwarming comedy of its daily life begins!  
  
First place in 2015 LINE Webtoon original comic competition, short comic category, Taiwan region.  
  
[For more short stories](http://home.gamer.com.tw/creation.php?owner=c11403)  
  
This comic features little to no text, which means it can be read in any language available.  


---

title: The Evil Ring
description: 18 years ago, a prophecy emerged that a boy with a black ring, deemed inferior, would rewrite the survival rules of the world of the gifted. The only remaining descendant of the “Divine-Tier” status, Shannon, wears a black ring and lives as an inferior being in the filthy exile zone. However, his peaceful life is shattered when his identity is exposed, and the top-tier forces, seeing him as a threat, send out an assassination squad to kill Shannon. Five gifted individuals, who have existed since childhood to protect Shannon, are summoned at the same time. They rush to the exile zone to protect the last descendant of the “Divine-Tier” status, and a battle among the “rings” is about to ignite!

title: Imperial God Emperor
description: The teenager Ye Qingyu once saw his parents killed by his enemies. Before his parents died, his parents promised that he could not leave their parents' graves for four years and had to practice hard. The time of four years had passed, Ye Qingyu relied on his talent and four years of cultivation. He admitted into White Deer College, slap those who once looked down on themselves, finds the enemy to get revenge for is parents!

title: Yuan Long
description: Special forces operative Wang Sheng transmigrated into the world of Yuanhun (Origin Spirits). There, he was possessed by a useless spirit —a carp—, becoming an infamous trash in the world of Origin Spirits! In this world filled with experts, Wang Sheng used the knowledges he acquires to surmount all difficulties, even finding a way to evolve his useless spirit carp! From a sparrow to a Phoenix, from a carp to a Dragon! In this sinister and vicious world full of disputes, he will make his own path towards towards success! *Legends says that a carp who leaps over the the Dragon’s gate will become a dragon itself. Through effort and courage, even an insignificant carp can defy its own fate and become a legend.

title: Peerless Doctor in the City
alt_titles: Zui Qiang Shen Yi Hun Dushi
Peerless Miracle Doctor’s Adventures in the City
description: The genius of medicine and Taoism, Yang Yunfan, He is the only disciple of ancient medical immortal and a super soldier with a mysterious identity. He obeyed his master's orders to go down the mountain to fulfill the marriage contract he had set up since he was young, but he was arranged to be a trainee in a community hospital by his beautiful wife.

title: The Story About You x Me
alt_titles: The Story About You and Me
description:
The school’s famous troublemaker - Gu Ze! Originally only on 30-day class duty, student union vice president Ye Ruchuan ‘changed it a little’, making it 300 days… Two people fighting a battle of wits for whether to be on class duty or not! As the shocked bad guys go their separate ways, Gu Ze and Ye Ruchuan gradually start to get to know each other in the middle of a hateful godlike manipulation, and slowly cultivate an understanding of each other…. delinquent vs. vice president! The daily life of a 17-year-old trying his best to skip class duty!  
  
Artist's weibo: [@旺财的菊](https://weibo.com/u/6345177248)

title: Godly Mobile Game
description: It is said that an inexpensive name makes an easier life, but the inexpensive name and life of Wang Xiao Er, because his leg were crippled, was looked down on by friends and relatives. By complete accident, he picked up a mobile phone with a magical game inside, which allowed Wang Xiao Er to change his fate. What, the things in this game can become real? Wang Xiao Er, with a face full of smiles, said, “Aiyo, hey, then don’t blame me for being greedy. Jiang Shan, beauties, I want them all!”

title: Her Highness Is Mighty
alt_titles: I Am Not A Bad Fox
description: The 34th generation fox queen of Qing Qiu, Su Xue Shen, trained hard to become a deity. Who knew at the last stage of her training, she would be attacked by a familiar demon who’s unwilling to reason. Almost died trying to escape, she happens to tumbles into the arms of a weak, sick prince with a heavenly dragon aura. To use his power to recover, she agrees to be his bride. A weak abandoned prince and an absent-minded princess.

title: Lin Fei Chronicles
description: Soul Wearer Lin Fei got lucky and acquired a Yun Yuan stone and Sun Gold scriptures. Lin Fei steps into the battlefield of the spirits and demons and slays tens of thousands. He gradually obtains the Ancient Spirit King's inheritance and achieves the status of the Supreme Martial Deity.

title: Feng Qiu Huang
description:
Chuyu woke up to find herself in the body of a murdered princess almost half a millennium ago. She soon finds out that whoever wanted her dead was in her mansion. Knowing the history, she also realizes that the owner of her body will soon perish in a historical rebellion.  
  
Now she must defend herself in the depth of a forbidden city while preventing what is to come in her historical timeline.  
  
A palace epic filled with tactical battles and a hint of affection.

title: Mushroom Hero
alt_titles: The journey of a Mushroom to be overpowered in another world
description:
Wazi, a pro-gamer but an average college student, is invited on a date by his fellow gamer. However, he is hit by a truck on his way.
I decided to change my life from today onwards… Is this how it will end…? No, I want to live the life of my dreams…

Where am I…? What is this place?
Welcome to Brave Mainland!
Am I turned into a Mushroom? How am I supposed to kill the demon king?!

The story of a coward mushroom on his adventures to become an overpowered warrior.

title: Fenglin Tianxia - Wangfei Shisansui
description:
The strongest female assassin from a special assassination force met her death one day on a mission. To her surprise, she woke up in the body of a 13 year old girl, Mu Rong Liu Yue. Through Liu Yue's past memories, she found out that she was bullied due to the huge birthmark on her face, even though she came from a renowned family.  
  
LLS: The hiatus that the author took has been almost a year already… 100% its done. Sorry guys

title: Perfect Girlfriend Online
description: The year is 2035 and Xu Youyuan, currently suffering from a mid-life crisis, finally decides to lay down her pride and experience what it's like to be in love—in the name of creating a dating game. However, Shi Yue unexpectedly comes in her way of plans! Being on the receiving end of her devotion both in real life and the virtual world may prove to be too much for Youyuan to handle...

title: Invincible After Shocking My Empress Wife
alt_titles: Kāijú Zhènjīng Nǚdì Lǎopó, Wǒ Wúdí le
description: Ning Tian came to the Tianxuan World as a good-for-nothing but he somehow managed to get into the Empress’s bedroom and the extremely beautiful Empress Luo planned to marry him tonight?! Shocked! System activated! He can earn rewards by shocking others?! The beginning shocked the Empress and that was the first step for him to achieve his goal of shocking the whole world! Ning Tian looked at the countless prodigies and said, “No way… I was only cultivating casually and you guys are shocked by that already?

title: His Majesty Doesn't Want to Be Too Bossy
description: Like a mascot, this "Emperor" is a woman disguised as a man. The black-hearted Prince Regent has been "taking good care" of her since she was a child. Countless treacherous officials are blocking her way to taking over the throne upon her coming of age. However, if you can't beat that person, then there's always the option of bringing him home to marry!

title: The Sword of Dawn
description: The main character died in a plane crash accident, he was transported to a strange spatial installation orbiting a strange alien world with a physical body, for over a hundred thousand years he observed the emergence and evolution of life and the formation and fall of civilizations until he woke up in a coffin, the story follows Gawain, the Grand Duke and a founder of the Kingdom of Ansu.

title: Above All Gods
description:
Gu Tianlang, the King of the Xiaoxiao, the capital of the new fairy god, was besieged by everyone, jealous of heaven, besieged in Chiyan Ridge, tried by heaven, deprived of the fairy magic foundation, the throne of life and death, but the ancient Sirius used a Mysterious ancient jade, reborn five hundred years later! The enemies of the last life, the revenge of this life, the shame of the last life, the snow of this life! I am Gu Tianlang, and I speak for myself…  


---

title: From Six to Sovereignty: The Girl Who Ruled
alt_titles: Becoming the Queen at the Age of Six
Becoming Queen at the Age of Six
description: Tracy was only 16 when she was sentenced to death. Unloved and unwanted, she died as a forgotten side character in someone else's story. But fate gives her a chance to write her own story as the protagonist this time by sending her back into her six-year-old body. This time, Tracy knows every betrayal coming her way and refuses to be a mere stepping stone again. If survival means becoming the villain, she'll gladly embrace the darkness. Now, let the real story begin.

title: Reversed Love Route
description:
An accidental marriage proposal on the first meeting?! This is the beginning of a comedic and absurd love story!  
  
[Artist's Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/agacooomic/)

title: I Just Want to Mooch off Your Luck
alt_titles: Wǒ Jiù Xiǎng Cèng Nǐ De Qì Yùn
I Just Want to Freeload on Your Luck
description: After being reborn, Zhao Mingxi had no choice but to mooch off of Fu group's young master's luck to avoid death by terminal illness. Although his ears would turn so red as if they're bleeding whenever he sees her, he still keeps up an act of prideful indifference: "Can you stop being so clingy?"  The next day, Zhao Mingxi really did leave to mooch off of someone else's luck. The small dog bowed his head down, and grumbled: "I'll let you cling to me, alright? Happy now?"

title: San Yan Xiao Tian Lu
description:
The heavenly general Yang Jian, also known as god Erlang Shen, was ordered to descend to the mortal realm for the task of get rid of demons and evil spirits.  
After he woke up in the mortal realm, he noticed that Taishang Laojun who was in charge of his transfer absused his power and reincarnated Yang Jian as a woman.  
 Yang Jian is not used to this new body and to make things more worse it seems that he can't use his full power. now he must learn to adapt to modern society and take care of a hidden danger that is going to put the whole world into chaos.

title: Arknights: Rhodes Island's Records of Originium - Blacksteel
description: The story of Operator Franka, Liskarm, Vanilla, and Jessica before and after they came to Rhodes Island.

title: Death Field
description: If you take the midnight train by mistake, take a look around you, is it the same world you are familiar with? If not, hold your breath and face your fears…

title: A Record of a Mortal’s Journey to Immortality
alt_titles: A Record of a Mortal’s Journey to Immortality
description:
The village boy Han Li was born poor. To subsidize household expenses, he joins the Seven Mysteries Sect. Because of his spiritual roots, he was accepted as a disciple by the mysterious Doctor Mo and started to practice Eternal Spring Arts under his mentorship. Although his qualifications are mediocre, Han Li embarked on the dangerous road of immortal cultivation with his unyielding will and a mysterious vial picked up by accident.


---

**Links:**
- [English Novel](https://www.wuxiaworld.com/novel/rmji)

title: Assassin in Another World
alt_titles: My Path to Killing Gods in Another World
I Walk On A Road To Slay Enemies In My Way In Other World
My Way Of Killing Gods In Another World
description:
The genius top student played games in an attempt to flirt with girls, but was struck by lightning on a rainy day and transported into the world of the game?! To survive here, he could only rely on himself. Surrounded by monsters and gods, full of dangers, can he still return to his own world and continue chasing girls?!

---
- [Original Manhua <Tencent Comics>](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/650653)
- [Original Manhua <Bilibili Comics>](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc29992)
- [Original Manhua <Kuaikan Manhuas>](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/11031/)

title: The Hunter
alt_titles: Wang You Zhi Zui Qiang Lie Ren
description: Forty year old disabled veteran, Ye Zhanglin, under the guidance of an eight year old child, came in contact with a gun fighting game call “Gun King”. In order to get the grand prize, through multiple days and nights of training, they both reached the top of the National Stranger King Competition. Yet at last moment, he suddenly died due to an abrupt cerebral infarction… “I… didn’t die?! My legs came back?!” With the change of time and space and the interface of fate, how long can he still walk down the path of esports?!

title: Emperor LingTian
description: Ling Jian Chen, the master of the God-Emperor, is reborn as a mortal, and he has started an unbeatable life that defeat everyone against him! Genius? Even the God-Emperor is my student. Talking about genius and masters? Even the God-Emperor serves me with respect in order to receive my words of guidance, are you as unbeatable as me? Beauties? Have you ever heard of the most beautiful goddess in the Divine Realm? She has tried everything to stay with me… Everyone in heaven, listen to my orders, I'm the one and the only in all the eight realms in heaven.

title: A Transmigrated Warden's Battle for Redemption
alt_titles: Kānshǒu Mónǚmen De Diǎn Yù Zhǎng
The Warden That Watches Over the Witches
description:
The Rose Prison in Baiyin City is recognized as the strictest and strongest women's prison in the entire continent. 

It gathers the most dangerous and vicious female criminals on the continent, and I——Aiden is the warden in charge of managing this prison. 

But the original "Aiden" is a strong man who is proficient in spears, swords, and even black magic!

I'm just an ordinary person who transmigrated to him, and I don't even know the fighting skills mentioned above...

title: Flying Over a Thousand Mountains to Love You
description: Amongst the swans of England's Swan Lake, I am different. I am a black swan, and the last one able to transform into human form. One time as I peeked my head out from the lake, a ring was thrown in front of me. Becuase of this ring, I met a trans! Once I found out his true identity, I became his disciple, and somehow also his 100th girlfriend!

title: Reincarnated to Be the Wicked Maid at the Main Lead's Side
alt_titles: Reborn as the evil maid next to the protagonist
Zhuǎnshēng chéngwéi zhǔjiǎo shēnbiān de xié'è shìnǚ
description: The once well-known online game "Magic Continent of Light" is now ready to be discontinued for a dying year. Hardcore fan otaku Wei Chuan decided to accompany the game to the last second, but he did not expect that the villain in the original game would drag him into the game!

title: Soul Land - The Legendary Tangs' Hero
alt_titles: Soul Land - Legend of Tangs' Hero
description: With their God Realm sealed off, only Tang San possesses enough mental strength to communicate with the outside. Just as they were about to lose the battle, they discovered another God Realm far away from their Douluo Realm. The tables turned in the blink of an eye! Who will come out victorious from the Battle of the Gods? As protagonist halos collide, which one will claim a better win over the other? This is a battle that belongs to Tang Sect.

title: Link Click
description: Sitting in a corner of the city is a seemingly normal shop called 'Time Photo Studio'. The shop owners, Cheng Xiaoshi and Lu Guang, can dive back in time through photos. One day, an uprising star in the Chinese opera world — Lin Kai — visited the studio and tasked Cheng Xiaoshi and Lu Guang to find a cassette tape from 10 years ago. They only have one photo, and one chance...

title: Prince Bastard's Parenting Book
alt_titles: Wo Cai Bu Jia Fan Pai Huang Zi
I Won't Marry the Villainous Prince
I Won't Marry the Enemy Prince
description: The "God of Annihilation", Yan Xi, defeated the enemy country but brought back one of the country's princesses. The doll-like 5-year-old Tao Xiaowei disturbs all the chickens and dogs in the palace, while the cold-blooded prince gets his first experience at raising a child. A few years after defeating the enemy country and returning home, the pair sets off destroying other adversaries and slashing love rivals, with the two only holding each other in their eyes.

title: Hundred Demon Spectrum
description: Content Introduction of Hundred Demon Spectrum: The Ghost doctor sees evil and good as a mystery/riddle. She is the savior of all monsters as well as the nightmare of all monsters. The doctor works outside of this world, in a place where monsters exist, called Peach Capital. And as she tours around, she takes her little monk to go through the world while searching for the "hundred demon spectrum".

title: Level Up
description: This is a game traveling story of a man and his perfect best friend. Will this be a relationship of subjugation or will they turn into complete adversaries? When your best friend becomes your opponent, and the line between the real and virtual worlds becomes blur, how should we face the truth then?

title: I am the Strongest Boss
description: The end of the world is coming, and human beings have awakened their superpowers and fought against the monsters in the towers. However, there is a strongest BOSS sitting at the highest point of the tower - Demon King Jiu Ming. He is an insurmountable barrier for humans. One after another, the brave men always thought that they were the protagonists in the story, but the halo of the protagonists never came to them. When the protagonists lose their protagonist aura, they no longer are the protagonists.

title: Wangyou: Yinwei Tai Lang, Wo Chengle Quan Fu Gongdi!
alt_titles: Wǎngyóu: Yīnwèi Tài Làng, Wǒ Chéngle Quán Fú Gōngdí!
I Became the Game's Biggest Villain
I Was Too Crazy, I Became the Villain of the Entire Server!
description: This is an extremely difficult game. If you don’t have enough abilities, you won’t be able to escape!

title: Tiger and Sharp Claws
description: From birth, Wang Hu is a human raised by the beast race, even though the others in the beast village never truly accepted him, Wang Hu still cares about the safety of his home. When the Black King extraterrestrial returns, something has awoken, forcing Wang Fu to step onto the journey to find his true self.

title: The Game That I Came From
description:
With the rise of a popular RPG called Tianyong Game, its max-level players called "awakeners" have come to dominate the real world in terms of wealth and power. 

Despite Ling Ce's natural talent for the game, it's nearly impossible for him to catch up to these players because he started playing the game a year after its release. But as luck would have it, a glitch in the game's teleportation system takes him back three years into the past with his memories intact.

Now, Ling Ce is determined to utilize his knowledge and experiences to become an awakener and turn his life around. No amount of carnivorous plant monsters or insanity level dungeons will stop the determined hero from reaching the peak!


---

**Links:**
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/88411)
- [Official Korean Translation](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58409509)

title: Carrying the Goddess Along
description: Chen Guang, a bankrupt child of a nouveau riche family, has been drawn into quite the splendid life.
