His best friend, the prettiest girl in school, an immortal celebrity, a despotic and attractive policewoman, a sexy coach, the rebellious daughter of a rich family, a shy female neighbor, and a childhood sweetheart. One by one, these beautiful women ruthlessly broke into Chen Guang's fate. All of this just because he so happened to pick up a fiberglass cup.

title: My Three Thousand Years To The Sky
description:
At the age of seventeen, Bai already reached level ten of the Qi Refining stage, just about to breakthrough. What a genius!

Three thousand years later, Bai has already reached level 66,666 of Qi Refining… yet… there’s still no sign of breaking through at all. From Grandmaster to “Grand-Monster”, he can still be a bad*ss even when stuck on the newbie stage for three thousand years!

---
- [Alt Raw Bilibili](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc27306)

title: Who Said I Want to Be a Witch?
alt_titles: I Refuse to Be a Witch
Truly Refuse to Be a Witch
description:
After transmigrating as the ultimate villainess of an otome game, Andelle took the fact pretty well. As long as she took care of her reputation and stayed out of all the events that could awaken her witch powers, she won't become a stepping stone for the main character. But as it turned out… her ideas were well-planned, but reality was a different matter.  
  
Andelle: I just want to quietly live my own life. As long as I stay out of the way, I won't end up dead. But the stupid system only wants to see me suffer, forcing me to admit inferiority!

title: 99 Degrees Fahrenheit
description:
99 degrees Fahrenheit is the temperature of the heart.  
  
Ling Ling, a psychiatry student, seems to be a straight-laced goody-two-shoes at first, but she's actually a biker girl with a rebellious streak. For her internship, she happens to be placed with Jiu Wu, one of the best in the field of psychology, and they're forced to work together after a disaster of a first meeting. What kind of sparks will fly between the rebellious girl and the cold and cunning man?

title: Rebirth of the Urban Immortal Emperor
alt_titles: City Immortal Emperor: Dragon King Temple

title: The Prince and His Mischievous One
description:
Lanka Norman, the youngest Emperor ever to reign, was betrayed by Jan Gray. With the grace of God, Lanka was returned to the time when he was six years old. To avoid the same disasters recurring in this new life, little Lanka is determined to stay away from that terrible guy this time- all to survive! “But wait… Isn't the kid being bullied over there, Jan Gray? Damn, he came over! Is it too late to escape?!”  
  
-SPANISH-  
Después de la sucesión de Lanka, fue traicionado por Jian Grey, su amigo de la infancia, convirtiéndose en el emperador más efímero del imperio. Afortunadamente, Dios le hizo volver a cuando él tenía seis años. ¡El pequeño Lanka, quien comienza de nuevo su vida, esta vez está decidido a mantenerse alejado de ese tipo terrible y mantenerse vivo! …¿Eh? ¿El niño que está siendo intimidado no es Jian Grey? ¡Oh Dios, me está viendo! ¡¿Es demasiado tarde para correr?!

title: The Law of the Yama
description: Zuo Hui is an introverted high school student from a poor family. One day, while secretly working a part time job, he is caught by his mother. After the two have a heated dispute, Zuo Hui angrily turns away and leaves. Distracted by thoughts of guilt and regret, he loses footing and falls down a rain-flooded sewer hole. When Zuo Hui awakes, he finds himself in a sealed room surrounded by a group of diverse strangers and with a rope around his neck. The more he struggles to take off the rope, the tighter it becomes. Where is this? Who are you people? And what exactly is that self-proclaimed "Yama"?

title: After Transmigrating into a Book, I Snatched the Role of the Supporting Male Character
Southern Bird and Northern Bird
alt_titles: Nanfang De Niao He Beifang De Niao
description: The story of a southern sparrow who befriends a northern duck.

title: Black Abyss at Dawn
description: A door to a world of monsters emerged out of thin air, those who possess superpowers now bear the responsibility of fighting them. Bai Yu, known as the "strongest", died during his mission. After his rebirth, a mysterious system appears in front of him. Follow his journey back to the top and to save humanity!

title: Song of the Long Night
description:
The lingering love of her past life has turned into a demon that will hate her until death.   
  
The Qingcheng of this life is certain that the past life that killed her was stained in blood… A tale of the strings of love and hate connecting three people, one that has spanned over two lives and two deaths. Love and hate are so hard to understand…  
  
"If I had the choice, I would never have met you again."

title: The Sacred Ruins
description: In the post-civilization era, earth anomalies occurred frequently, and strange fruits appeared in famous mountains and rivers. Chu Feng, a college student, stumbled into the bronze Kunlun Mountains during a broken love trip, awakened the Supreme King's bloodline unexpectedly as the earth revived, and opened the way to dominate the practice!

title: Magic Domain Mercenary
description: A half-demon boy who survived from the uninhabited domain, a beautiful girl who vows to protect the human world, in order to protect the their common home, They are involved in the world battle of the Magic Domain Mercenaries…

title: Black-backed albatross
description: Jiang Shishi, a zombie who lives quietly in the human world, was forced to live with the strange examiner, Christine, a beautiful vampire girl in the cold year, and Shishi discovered that she still had a human cub, Lori. What a strange family.

title: My Seven Sisters are Unparalleled
alt_titles: Wo Qi Ge Jiejie Jueshi Wushuang
description: At the age of eighteen, Luo Feng was kicked out of the mountain by his Crazy old Master, He had no choice but to turn to his Seven Senior Sisters who had already graduated from the school, each of these Seven Senior Sisters were endowed with supreme skills, with awe inspiring talent, and had achieved great success in various fields, and they only loved their Junior Brother Luo Feng. Luo Feng has always considered himself to be very weak and needed to hold on to his senior sisters legs, but what he himself didn't know was that he was carrying the formidable Emperor Clan bloodline and the watery Qi Clan bloodline, which could be considered as the heavenly peak of potential.

title: I Made a Harem in the Underworld
alt_titles: I Opened a Harem in the Underworld
I Opened a Harem in Hell
description: Zhang Xiao entered a game called “King of Hell”, but after his death, he came back to life in another body. From then on, he counterattacked and reached the peak of his life. Can he overturn the conspiracy of the whole hell on his own and conquer all the girls here!

title: Lovable and Dark Wife
description: After painstaking planning, she has successfully hunted her prey, and fell on top of the most dangerous man, Yan Bei Tang. For vengeance, she put herself up. Fitting for his appetite, he couldn’t control his desires. The first year: He appeared at all the locations she was at, Jun Si Meng, why don’t you continue falling on me? The second year: He came besides her, Jun Si Meng, when do you plan on marrying me? The third year: He knelt in front of her, Jun Si Meng, I’ll help you get rid of the scums if you marry me!

title: The Bourgeoisie Hero
alt_titles: Zhege Yongzhe Shi Jinqian Zhishang Zhuyi Zhe
description: As the board of directors were assembled, the sage Emma summoned him to the Lande continent as “The Hero Of Justice.” But after becoming the hero, Gao Yi had no plans to battle endlessly, deliver Justice, save others, and strengthen himself like the sort of hero Emma had hoped for. He instead opted for the unconventional path of making money! All in an uncivilized dog-eat-dog continent of monarchy and obligarchy…

title: Law of The Devil
description:
Duwei is born into this new world from Earth without a sound, he does not cry, he simply stares at the people around him. As he grows he does not speak and curses this new world he was forced into.   
  
His Father a Great General is sure there must be something he has an aptitude for, however he is simply trash. Disregarded by his family as the Retarded heir.   
  
This is the story of his journey to discover the truths of this world and use the knowledge of his past life to remove his title of retard, even if he has to become a devil.

title: How to Properly Care for Your Pet Wife
alt_titles: The Correct Way to Catch Pet Waifus
description:
What?! A game's pets are becoming human and moving into my house one by one?!   
  
17 year old introverted high school student, Zhu Ling, finds no interest in the real world. Until one day, a nude girl appeared before him when he was completing his pet collection in a mobile game! Said girl even proclaimed to be one of the pets in the game and demanded to move in with Zhu Ling and help him collect items!   
  
One by one, each pet in his collection turned into pet girls and gathered in his house.   
  
Hey! You're all really getting in the way of my gaming time!

title: Myriad Realms Gatekeeper
description:
When the planet perishes and the gods fall, the collapse of the magical realm leaves humanity without any protectors. Now, "Anomalies" and "Catastrophes" begin to invade the human realm . As the Dark Age descends, a soul from Blue Star (Earth) is unexpectedly transported into this dying realm.

---

**Original Manhua**:
- [Acqq](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/656128)

**Official Translations:**     
- [English](https://www.webnovel.com/comic/myriad-realms-gatekeeper_31705778300125301)
- [Japanese](https://jp.piccoma.com/web/product/182941)

title: Metropolitan Reverence
description: Fang Hong is a student of a daoist. One day, he came down from the mountain to find his fiancee

title: I Am Gao Fu Shuai
description: As a loser protagonist, he has a shocking name of "Gao Fu Shuai" (translates literally to "Tall Rich Handsome"), despite facing employment issues one encounter after the other. Suddenly, he experiences a series of incredible events. As the gears of destiny quietly turn, he challenges the apex of power and continues towards the peak of life.

title: White Wheel of Fortune
description: Thousands of years ago, the white witch, Hillis, who had a marriage contract with the king of the White country, suddenly disappeared. After a millennium of searching, Hillis' reincarnation, the human girl Xia Li, appears in front of the king in a romantic dream. Forced to embark on a journey to find 22 tarot cards to save King Solent and his country, the two quickly realize there are some hidden conspirators that would do anything to stop them.

title: Good Disciple, Have Pity on Your Master!
alt_titles: Good Disciple, Please Spare Your Master!
description: He came from the Great Desolate, carrying the destiny of the human race, he has countless disciples, a total of twelve emperors for the human race! Ying ying ying, raised so many male children, now want a female disciple to rub the master's back!

title: The Last Cultivator
description: 5000 years ago, the demon god led the army to battle the cultivators. After years of battle, the demon god destroyed all the sects of the cultivation world. The entire world changed completely because of this battle. Magicians, Knights, and Healers started to appear. This world completely became a world of magic. 5000 years later, a bolt of heavenly lightning suddenly awakened a cultivator sleeping in Xuan Yuan wood. He is now the last cultivator in the world.

title: Urban Strengthening System
description: The main character rose from the level of trash to become the top of his class through cooking, demonstrating the fearsome power of gourmet food. As he goes about his daily life, his explosive growth is the norm!

title: My Apocalyptic Miss
description: As a ruthless gang killer, Mu Chang regards completing tasks and protecting the safety of the gang’s leader eldest daughter Bai Zhi as his only goal in life. However, the advent of the end times disrupted his life trajectory, and Bai Zhi unexpectedly turned into a zombie… Mu Chang gave up resistance for a while, intending to let Miss Bai Zhi end her life. , The arrival of the doomsday system not only reshaped Mu Chang's right hand, but also allowed him to gain power beyond ordinary people. What surprised him more is that he can actually control the eldest lady's runaway with this mechanical arm? ! In order to find a way for Miss Bai Zhi to return to normal, Mu Chang and Bai Zhi set foot on the path of survival in the last days…

title: Cultivating With an Immortal's Memory
description:
Ye Qian is a fool abandoned by the family, intimidated by his classmates, and bullied by his dorm mates.   
  
At one time when he woke up, his memory joined an immortal cultivator from the immortal realm.   
  
Since then, he has knowledge and memories from his previous life.

title: Oldman
description:
From Dan of Population GO:

The son of the empress, sentenced to life in prison, although blind and old declares revenge on his unaging mother who gave him the sentence. He recruits a fellow inmate, who lost her arms and legs in addition to her sentence, in his revenge.

title: Hippocrate In Another World
description: The genius doctor Jiu Ye Sikong reborn in another world and encountered a group of handsome princes, all of who are falling in love with Jiu Ye. In order to get back to the where she used to be, Jiu Ye spared every effort to commit suicide, which turned out to be in vain…She could do nothing but cure people with her medical skills in the new world…

title: River God Seeks Adoption
description: One day, out of nowhere, a gorgeous man calling himself a River God appears before Lin Lu. This Stunning beauty then begs Lin Lu to adopt him. Urging for a contract to be made between the two. What will Lin Lu decide? And can this River God's words be believed?

title: Teach the Devil Husband
description: An ordinary girl stumbles on an injured black dog one day on her way home and decides to take him with her. But, when she falls asleep, the dog turns into a handsome man! What will happen next?!

title: The King of Special Forces With a Negative Emotional Quotient Was Reborn on Campus but Was Unexpectedly Welcomed by Girls?!
alt_titles: The King of the Special Forces
description: When Gu Cheng, the King of the Special Forces, was killed by a mysterious force while avenging his best friend's wife and daughter, he was unexpectedly reborn into someone else's body called Xu Yuan, and even becomes a classmate with his best friend's dead daughter! How will he survive and protect his best friend's wife and daughter this time?

title: Take Me Out
description: Ye Xuan is a professional attorney, but in the inside he is actually a scum. After an incident when he is toying with a girl, he encountered and made acquaintance with a system….

title: Unemployed Monster Player
description: Ten years ago, Dungeons from an MMORPG suddenly merged with the real world, giving birth to “Paradise Heaven”. Dungeons and monsters appeared all over the world, and the survivors came to be known as Players… Among them, Amaike Leo was taken into the unique dungeon, Nonecumene (Uninhabitable Zone) as a guide. Amaike, a Jobless Player, planned to find a chance to run away, but a BOSS monster whose species, abilities, and level were unidentifiable wiped out his party! A desperate situation with no escape…! However, meeting that monster will set his fate in motion—…!?

title: Desolate Era
description: In the world of [Man Huang Ji], to survive, tribes of humans have to fight against the forces of the heavens, the earth, and demons. To live long and free, the three great disasters and nine robberies sent death without regret to the immortals. Then one day, a boy named "Ji Shi" was born to the strongest tribe in Yu Ji. As a direct descendant, he bears the responsibility to protect his people, who grow to respect him. With an iron will, he begins the long journey of an immortal guardian.

title: Anaerobic Love: Deep Sea Prisoner
description: Bin He has an unrequited love for his best friend, Hai. During their Uni graduation trip, Bin He was feeling down because his best friend is finally going to pursue the girl he likes. They decide to have a friendly diving competition. While diving , Bin He sees a man chained to a shipwreck at the bottom of the sea. Beneath the sea begins an anaerobic love. What will be born from this fateful meeting?

title: Help! Because of A BUG, I'm Getting Pestered by the Game's Babes
description:
Game characters come to life because of a bug?! Blossom, the ancient-style girl with an ancient mindset; Cthylla, the mature girl who comes from a mysterious world; Gumi, an idol of the Meow Country, Gumi; II, the mischievous, petite magical girl, and No.7, the AI-powered agent who loves money…   
  
A group of beautiful girls appears and pesters the female game producer. Is this the beginning of a wonderful harem life? No, this is the beginning of a chaotic cohabitation life.

title: Material and Spiritual World
description: In the past and present, there have been numerous special substances with strange properties, which the ancients called "divine objects" and now we call them "exotic treasures." Zhou Mu was a legendary thief, but he carelessly underestimated his enemy and got trapped in THE SOUL TRAP [divine object] for 2000 years. He vowed to seek revenge from all those who had wronged him. This is his story! The story of his revenge!

title: Super School Doctor
description: In order to fullfill his grandfather's dying wishes, Xiong Yu returns to China to marry a beautiful school principal Qiu Hongxin, but was rejected when she meets him as she has no feelings for him. In order for her to develop those feelings, Xiong Yu decided to become a Chinese medical doctor in the school. Now the peach is truly blossoming.

title: Wúxiàn Biànyì
description: Zhao Yifan was transported to an alternative reality after a Zombie Apocalypse occurred. There, the surviving humans gathered together and built the "Academy" as a refuge against the zombies. However, despite the top-notch security of the Academy, it was no safer than the zombie-infested outside world. While at the Academy, Zhao Yifan turned into a mutant with the ability to absorb the powers of other zombies after he was bitten by a variant zombie. In order to protect the people he cares about, Zhao Yifan must use the powers at his disposal to find a way to survive!

title: The Peerless Strong Man Only Wants to Return Home and Farm
alt_titles: Jue Shi Qiang Zhe Zhi Xiang Hui Jia Zhong Tian
The Peerless Strong Man Only Wants to Return Home and Farm
The Unmatched Powerhouse Just Wants to Farm
description: When Chen Fan transmigrated to the world of martial arts, not only was he abandoned by the system, he was also a cripple without martial spirit. He had no choice but to be the most inferior mortal. But unbeknownst to him, his home was full of divine things; the bath water is a spiritual spring, the person ploughing his land is a dragon prince, the person watering the vegetable fields is the first saint, the person who washes his clothes is an imperial empress. Unknowingly, Chen Fan had gathered many of the continent’s top powerhouses around him and became a landlord who controlled the world.

title: The Duke's Hidden Baby: BOGO!
alt_titles: Pregnant Wife And The Little Ones
description:
He has the absolute power. He kills without hesitation and is a cold, fickle man. Yet he becomes obsessed with her and dotes on her nonstop.  
  
The first time they met, he asked, “Was it you, six years ago?”  
  
The second time they met, he’s holding onto the DNA test, “You still dare to say he’s not my son?”  
  
The n time they met, “Mr. Duke, do you have an end to this?”  
The guy smiled with a deep charm, “The second child have yet to be born. Of course, there’s no end to this.”

title: Spirit of Peach Blossom
description: A beautiful peach blossom spirit had developed a liking to a little girl, promising to protect her at all times. The two soon began their journey through hardships, along with the feelings they have towards one another. This is a story of love, friendship, and spirits.

title: Monster Kingdom
description:
A mysterious and unknown game journey.  
In the virtual game, experience the brilliance and darkness of human nature. When the player's game journey reaches the end, what is waiting for them …

title: Travel to AD 3000
description:
This story is about a girl from the year 2011 who time-traveled to the year 3011, where androids that are indistinguishable from humans and humans with special powers have appeared. Some want world domination, and some just want their freedom. Caught within this conflict, the girl struggles to be with the one she loves.  
 - - -
**WARNING:** contains spoilers for the first couple of chapters  
<<Chuan Yue Xi Yuan 3000 Hou>> is about a young woman named Ye Bingyao (the female protagonist) who lives in the year 2011 AD. On a school outing, her friend Wei Xiaojie discovers a cave from which a strange green light shines forth. Wanting to explore it, but unable to find someone to accompany them, Ye Bingyao and Wei Xiaojie decide to explore it alone. At the end of the cave, something suddenly begins to turn, and Ye Bingyao loses consciousness with the sound of her friend's yell in her ear. Upon awakening, she finds herself in an unfamiliar place. She realizes that she has crossed through time…and that she's naked! What's more, there's a handsome, expressionless man standing before her, holding her at gunpoint. The man (Wei Si Ji) takes her for an android spy from Mars, and orders her to be restrained. Held down by a machine, Ye Bingyao loses consciousness once more. As she awakens again, the man stands over her, preparing to dissect her and prove that she's an android! At this moment, a handsome doctor (Dr. Li) appears to examine her and tells Wei Si Ji not to act hastily. Well, it seems her life has been saved…for now…

title: I Am the Village Chief of a Primitive Society
alt_titles: Becoming the Village Chief of a Primitive Society
description: Novelist Su Bai crosses over to the otherworldly primitive society and becomes the ruler of the tribe, relying on the daily assistance system as well as the knowledge of modern society to explore this novel world while leading the tribe out of poverty and evolution and gradually towards a developed civilization! Beast-eared woman! Farming! The main character will have his own frontier land!

title: Yes, My Lich!
description: Concerning a silly lich and its silly subordinates who accidentally “transmigrate” into a modern tale. Lord Reichtwein used to be a devastating underworld boss. However, now, he is merely a… pitiful moocher.

title: My Wife Is a Heavenly Big Shot
alt_titles: Wo De Qizi Shi Dacheng Qi Da Lao
Wǒ De Qīzi Shì Dàchéng Qí Dà Lǎo
description: The opening scene mentions a wife who has reached her power ceiling, who still wants a bicycle, and demands to eat only soft rice?! But when Xiao Yifeng said I was really your husband, I was nearly strangled to death by this future wife… something’s not right, I must have taken the wrong script!

title: Chicken Soup Queen
description: At the age of 20, she graduated from a top school in the United States with double major. At 23, she bought a new villa for her parents. She, Wei Yujin, had risen from the mud to the peak of fame in the 21st century, and she's going to do the same in ancient China.

title: The Deer and the Cauldron
alt_titles: The Duke of the Mount Deer
description:
He's a lazy, impish, vulgar, and irreverent playboy. From Lichun Brothel to the Forbidden City, the little imp Wei Xiaobao survives through the dangers. He doesn't know martial arts, yet the martial world and the imperial court become playthings in his hands. As it has once been said: There's danger in every step, and a beauty to bring home in every stage.  
  
Chinese:  
 ||偷懒耍滑、粗话连篇；玩世不恭，风流成性。从丽春院到紫禁城，小滑头韦小宝一路惊险闯关，不会武功的他却能把江湖和朝堂玩弄于股掌之间。正所谓：步步涉险强运渡，关关抱得美人归。||

title: The Planet Walks Alone
description: Struggling between school and his parent's constant fighting, a boy strives to go to university in order to leave his home. One day, he receives a strange message predicting that he will be killed by himself in 100 days…

title: Return of the Reborn God Emperor
description:
In his previous life, Lin Xiao accidentally obtained the Divine Judgment Technique, and awakened the ancient ancestor body, an unparalleled overlord body.  
  
After all kinds of hardships, he eventually became an immortal and conquered the gods and demons. after getting back stabbed by a traitor, he’s reborn and returned to his teenage, a seventeen years old self, with the knowledge of an immortal, in this life, lin xiao will settle all the grudges and make those people pay who bullied him in his previous version of this life.

title: I Just Want to Be Killed
alt_titles: Wǒ Zhǐ Xiǎng Bèi Gèwèi Dǎsǐ
Wo Zhi Xiang Bei Gewei Dasi
I Just Want to Be Beaten to Death by Everyone
I Only Want Everybody to Beat Me to Death
I Just Want to Be Beaten by Everyone
description:
Yu Le got sent to another world after dying from overworking and got a golden item that every male MC gets — system. But Yu Le did not meet the requirement which means that he have to say goodbye to the system temporarily. To reactivate the system again, he will have to live this life with zero motivation. So, wanting to activate the system as soon as possible, to get the ability to live forever, Yu Le has decided to court for death. But why is he not dying even when he’s trying so hard to, instead, he’s becoming stronger?!

---

**Links:**
- [Alternative Raw (BiliBili)](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc30407)
- [Alternative Raw (KuaiKan)](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/11986)
- [Official Japanese Translation (Piccoma)](https://piccoma.com/web/product/94159)
- [Official Korean Translation (Kakao)](https://page.kakao.com/home/58716301)

title: Prince Charming Has His Eyes on Me
description: Su Aixin, a female student in her senior year of college accidentally picks up a charmed bracelet. From then on, she has the ability of changing personalities. Different personalities have different strengths and knowledge, bringing a huge change to her life…

title: Song of the Sky Pacers
description:
(In a made-up dynasty) During the Chen dynasty, Consort Jing gave birth to a pair of fraternal twins under the rays of sunlight. The prince was born with a cinnabar mole between his eyebrows, while the princess was born with six fingers.

Fortune and misfortune appeared at the same time, causing the twins to experience entirely different fates as they were forced to leave their family. The heavenly tribulation is approaching, will the two twins who were separated from birth ever get to be reunited? What methods would they use to fight against their destinies?

---

**Note:** This is the **page style** version of [Song of the Sky Pacers](https://mangadex.org/title/7226ef70-592f-42b5-a3ff-8b91af15d97f)

title: My Phone Doesn't Seem to Be Okay
description: A yuri series about a girl and her cell phone.

title: Leveling Up by Hoarding
alt_titles: I Level Up By Absorbing Everything
description: Soul aura awakens, fierce beasts roam the earth. Chi Mo transmigrated and awakens the technique of collecting. Collecting High level talent of time, can let time go faster or slower! Collecting great golden sun phoenix bloodline can let the body transform into the sun and scorch the earth! Collecting the talent of swordsmanship, can make one understands the concept of the sword and slice through everything!

title: Paladin Dad
description:
Zuo Yi, a transmigrator, fought and struggled in the world of Sadya for three hundred years. During his fight with the Abyssal Lord, Saur, he was sent back to the blue planet.

To his immense shock, he had somehow gained an adorable four-year-old daughter! Zuo Yi, who has long been tired of the life of a knight, gradually interacts with the blue planet's various forces and ultimately resolves the global crisis—all for the sake of building an ideal world for his precious child.

title: When Did I Become Invincible?
description: He always thought he was a mortal, but he didn’t know that his yard was full of divine weapons and the chickens he raised were more like phoenixes! It wasn’t until after five years of living in a mortal village when the system finally allowed him to come into contact with cultivators. It was then that he discovered that no matter how strong someone was, the moment they saw him, they would be so scared that their legs gets numb and call him senior. Some even kneeled down and worshipped him…

title: Lonely, Lonely Fireflies
description:
The firefly by the water shines into the night, lonely but heartwarming.
Four teenagers meet, each with their secrets.
Trust and betrayal make an exciting youth in a colorful kaleidoscope.
“Meeting you was the best thing to happen to me.”

title: The Naive Mr. Lu
alt_titles: Pure and Innocent Young Master Lu
description:
Disguised as a man, Lu Dingning picks up a bunch of girls, with her gentleman index on max and her prince charming smile leveled up! Women are constantly surrounding her and men are getting mercilessly bent in her presence.   
Life motto: As long as the hoe is dancing well, there's not a single boyfriend she can't steal!  
Zong Jize, king of the city, treats her as his brother but ends up pushing her onto the bed.   
Lu Yining says furiously, “Master Zong, I treated you as my brother but instead you sick bastard just wanted to sleep with me!”

title: Wicked Young Master's Forceful Love: Training the Runaway Wife
alt_titles: Ba Qing Eshao: Tiaojiao Xiao Tao Qi Di
description: "Don't touch our mom!" Two children, a boy and a girl, block the demon boss outside. The woman he has his eyes on was not only claimed by someone else first but also has two kids! "Heart robber, get out here!" Facing the crazy roars of the king is the very pure and innocent yet sexy mother… X years ago, she was violated against her will, is that her fault? C'mon you perverted and possessive madman, she's a victim too! Huh? Why does this boy look like my own son? Could it be…

title: Transmigrating as a Secretly Illegitimate Millionaire heiress, I Try to Curry Favor with the Real Heiress to Survive
alt_titles: 穿成假千金后，我靠討好真千金苟活
Transmigrating as a Secretly Illegitimate Millionaire heiress, I Try to Curry Favor with the Real Heiress to Survive
description: Transmigrated as a fake millionaire heiress, Ye FengLai has to rely on currying favor with the real heiress to survive, only to be given the "villain card" by the real heiress. What can she do? No problem! Step 1: Pretend to have amnesia and become a cute girl; Step 2: Start groveling. The plan is a huge success! She saved her own life, got the money, but... why is the real heiress's gaze towards her getting weirder and weirder?! A sweet, innocent girl who thinks she's groveling but is actually flirting without realizing it X A cold, aloof, and self-assured kitten skilled at conquest.

title: Boss of the Emperor's Harem
alt_titles: I'm the Chief of the Harem
Wo Zai Hou Gong Dang Da Lao
description:
Have you ever heard of a fertility fairy? That’s what Yun Mian is! Her mission upon descending from the immortal realm is to help the imperial concubines of Xiao Guo’s emperor bear an imperial successor.  
  
What? His Majesty is infertile?! And it’s something that even the imperial physicians and divine doctors can’t cure? Yun Mian’s under enormous pressure now!  
  
“Yun Mian, we are dizzy. Give us your divine qi.” In order to fulfill her duties, Yun Mian throws caution to the wind!  
  
“Yun Mian, our stomach hurts. Give us more of your divine qi.” After the ninety-ninth time she gave him her divine qi, the impossible happens! Just as Yun Mian is about to inform the imperial concubines, the devilish emperor captures her in his arms!  
  
“Yun Mian, since you’ve cured us of our affliction… we shall grant you the imperial successor!”  
  
What? She didn’t want to take on THAT duty personally! She immediately flees, but the devilish emperor’s words follow her…  
  
“Yun Mian, until you’ve fulfilled your duties, you’re not allowed to leave!”  
  


---

title: Cannon Fodder’s Record of Counterattacks
alt_titles: Quick Transmigration Cannon Fodder’s Record of Counterattacks
description: Ning Shu had dropped dead. But fortunately, she became a task-taker in charge of counterattacking for pitiful cannon fodder. Thus, Ning Shu played various kinds of life roles in various worlds, encountering many people who caused trouble for no reason. Transmigrated protagonist, reborn protagonist. Ning Shu had no choice but to painfully collect moral integrity in various worlds.

title: Absolute Peerless Doctor
description: Tang Xiaobao was a notorious rogue in high school. After a fight with his rival, he was expelled from the school, and his girlfriend also left him. By pure accident, however, Tang Xiaobao acquired a magic watch which elevated him to a gifted doctor. With extensive medical knowledge transmitted from the watch, Tang Xiaobao started a new journey as a physician...

title: Love in Murder
alt_titles: Ai Shi Yi Chang Jing Xin Dong Po De Mou Sha
description: After finding out that my boyfriend was cheating on me with my little sister, I announced our break-up in a fit of rage. But never could I have imagined that the two of them would commit double suicide. Even the police believes that this was just an accident… But I felt that things weren't that simple. Since my university days, anyone who had a conflict with me would all perish in unnatural deaths…

title: Strange Love Rivals Increased!
description: After I isekai'd as the female villain of an otome game, I just wanted to avoid the death ending and live a peaceful life. But why are the male lead and female lead fighting over me?

title: Cultivation Through Science
description:
After traveling to the world of Xianxia, ​​Qin Yun became a peak master of a sect, with the "Super Master System".  
  
Qin Yun always said, "Learn mathematics, physics, and chemistry, and you can travel the world without any fear".  
  
Now, the master is an exam madman, and in Qin Yun's view, Immortal Cultivation is also a subject.  
  
It is like a nine-year compulsory education, and only through scientific cultivation can there be a way out…

---

Releases of this series stopped with chapter #22 on June 2021.

title: Phoenix Descends From Above
alt_titles: Phoenix Descends From Above: First Female Monarch Under the Heavens
description: Jun Aofeng, the top female cultivator, was reborn into the body of the betrayed and murdered daughter of the Feng family. Her identity stolen by her maid, she will show them what a real lady can do. She'll have revenge on all those who betrayed her, while breaking a few kneecaps in the process! Just as she finally earned everyone's respect, she ran into the prince who is just as strong as her. What will happen when they butt heads?

title: The Reborn
description: A century ago, in a continent far, far away, an ancient kingdom, Laham, was destroyed. In the war, Zeluo died and his body was reduced to ashes and bones. However, one day, Zeluo awoke from a mysterious magic. The rebirth caused him to lose all his memories and emotions. The hallucinations and voices in his mind urged him nonstop to return to his homeland, Laham. In order to retrieve his original self and his determination to return home made him embark on a long and treacherous journey without any hesitation…

title: Her Lies
description: Zhao Fugui, a high school girl who can see everybody's score in life, puts herself at the frontline every day to find the perfect boyfriend. However, she never imagined that someone by her side already held a perfect score, and that she's deeply in love with her...

title: My Lord, Pay Attention to Your Reputation!
description: A foolish and stubborn little servant girl has to serve this Lord day and night. This lord is not only crafty, unruly, and handsome, but the most most important thing is that he’s super lazy! He plays with his little servant girl all day long, but he cannot resist. What will they do?

title: The Cute Wife of the Cold Chairman
alt_titles: The Icy Chairman's Cute Little Wife
description: A punk girl turns into a great goddess to beat up scumbags and oppress fake angels. She angers all of the surrounding rotten women to death. After being reborn, I, Chi Yan, have to marry this brainless playboy with X disease? I found a handsome man to play my boyfriend, but he ended up trying to flirt with me every day! An icy chairman announced: My Yan'Er is the cutest in the world. I won't hold her back!

title: Miss Gu and Miss Qu
description:
There are two women in the entertainment industry who share a name. One of them is Qu Xizhi, and the other is Gu Xizhi. Gu Xizhi already harbored hatred for Qu Xizhi because she "stole" her role as well as her ex-boyfriend, but somehow, the well connected Qu Xizhi won't stop pestering her to be friends!

When a tsundere straight girl falls into the trap by the perfect woman, she gradually gets her heart captured by her lifelong rival...

title: Lost In Reverie
description:
The battle for the scholarship raged like wildfire. At the entrance of the school director’s office, Lin Yujing and Shen Wan came face to face.

After exhausting their tears, the two people stared at each other blankly for three seconds before turning around in unison and leaving.

Shen Wan got onto his private helicopter while Lin Yujing climbed into her Rolls-Royce.

–This is a story of two rich people trying their best to look poor in front of the other.

title: I’m A Super Rich Man, So It’s Reasonable For Me To Be A Scumbag
alt_titles: I’m A Super Rich Man, So It’s Reasonable For Me To Be A Scumbag
I'm a Rich Tycoon, So Being a Scumbag Makes Perfect Sense!
description: Jiang Cheng woke up and was reborn! He was also bound to the Godly Rich System. Every second the world runs, he can get money! As the system continues to upgrade, Jiang Cheng's wealth has skyrocketed. All the cool school beauties and queen bosses are around him. Jiang Cheng laughed up to the sky. In his previous life, he was trapped by the things that he couldn't get when he was young for so long. Now that he is reborn, who cares about those broken rules! Let's drink and enjoy it first.

title: Becoming a God, Starting as a Water Monkey
description: The protagonist, Liang, transmigrates to a world called the Great Wilderness. He was In a desperate situation, he accidentally awakens a system called the “Ze Bloodline System,” and everything changes from that moment! By infusing himself with the bloodlines of ancient divine beasts, the protagonist is able to gain immense power while gradually refining his own godly talents. Come! Fuse with the Ze Spirit bloodline!!! System: “Awakened bloodline—Water Monkey.” Protagonist: “???”

title: My Vampire System: A Dragon's Revenge
alt_titles: Evil Dragon Is Reincarnated! Revenge Begins at the Age of Five!
The Evil Dragon Has Been Reborn, His Revenge Started When He Was 5
È Lóng Zhuǎnshēng, Fùchóu Cóng Wǔ Suì Kāishǐ!
description: I was once the legendary red dragon who stood at the top of the world. For thousands of years, my brethren have been murdered by humans and the desire for revenge slowly turned into my only mission in this world! However, I failed. On the day of the decisive battle against human beings, I died with hatred in my heart... if there is an afterlife, I will definitely avenge my kind. If there is an afterlife, I will make these filthy humans pay with their blood! If there is an afterlife—hmm? I was reincarnated as a weak human baby?!!

title: The Ten Thousand Clans Invasion: Guardian of the Rear
alt_titles: Wan Zu Ru Qin: Quanmin Canzhan, Wo Liushou Houfang
Invasion of All Races: All the People Join the War, I Stay Behind
description: Invasion of the Ten Thousand Clans, universal superpowers, the era beyond time has arrived! In this age, all citizens are drafted to resist the foreign races and defend against external humiliation. Nan Ziying, at the tender age of adulthood, chooses to stay behind at the recruitment center, serving as logistical support. Many soldiers are disappointed, the youth scorn him, and white-haired elders take up arms and leave, leaving him behind with only women, children, and the elderly to guard the rear. Later, Nan Ziying awakens five great abilities and silently prepares. In this era where countless clans reign supreme and the times are filled with tragic heroism, ‘I am the calamity of these ten thousand clans!'

title: The Urban Flower's Vacation
description: The king of the Western underground world, "Tian Zi", vanished out of the blue, subsequently reappearing as the fiancé of the beautiful president! A mysterious mask gives Jiang Shaoyou boundless power, but with a catch - Every time it is used, Jiang Shaoyou will have to pick a flower; ie. a woman will fall in love with him! In order to complete his teacher's mission and investigate the dark hand behind the curtains, Jiang Shaoyou begins a life as a bodyguard without shame or restraint!

title: The Truth Mask
description:
Student Wu Mian accidentally obtained a mask. Once you wear it, everyone will agree with whatever you say or do. Even then, he has no courage to confess to a girl that he secretly loves. Until an incident completely changes his whole life…

---
**Links:**

- [Alternative Official English - INKR](https://comics.inkr.com/title/237-the-truth-mask?utm=mgd)
- [Alternative Official English - WebComics](https://www.webcomicsapp.com/comic/The-Truth-Mask/5e82e8108c252b78b752b5b7)

title: I Have 999 Abilities
alt_titles: I Can Snatch 999 Types of Abilities
description:
In a world where superpowers are commonplace, Yang Xifa swore bloody revenge on those who harmed his dear sister. He will use his ability to take away other's powers to build himself up from an innocent bystander to become the leader of a powerful organization. Combining his strength and smarts to defeat the evil-doers, he will collect 999 abilities and become the most powerful hero in the world!

(Source: Anilist (Bilibili, translated))

title: Shadow's Resurgence
description: Saal Cooper was the perfect "shadow" of the Cooper family. He was loyal, powerful, and... expendable. Spellbound to be Eren Cooper's human shield, Saal took all the wounds and pain meant for his master, making him an invincible hero. When the family discards him like a broken tool, Saal discovers the horrifying truth behind his lifelong agony. Betrayed and left to die, he reverses the spell with his final breath, reclaiming his stolen power. But death grants him an unexpected gift when he is reborn as his three-year-old self. This time, Saal is determined not to live in the shadows.

title: Breaking Through the Clouds 2: Devouring the Sea
description:
From [NovelUpdates](https://www.novelupdates.com/series/swallowing-the-seas/):  
  
Jinhai City Public Security Bureau newcomer Wu Yu is meek and mild, a man of few words, and completely unconcerned about the trials and tribulations placed before him by his strict boss. All he wants is to simply get by at his job, be paid on time, and play the role of a background actor.  
  
Nobody knew that this young man had a massive bounty placed on his head by a drug lord, as well as the youthful heroic spirit of a dragon-slayer from the abyss.

title: Wǒ Xīn Fěi Shí
alt_titles: My Heart Is Not a Stone
description: In order to start a rebellion, Jiujin infiltrated the Western Region’s marriage convoy on its way through the central plains. But her cover was blown on the very first day. Fortunately for her, it appears that the princess she was escorting might also be a fake! Pursued by forces on all sides they must rely on each other to survive. Through close encounters and shared dangers, feelings gradually begin to blossom.

title: What Do You Do When You Suddenly Become an Immortal?
alt_titles: What to Do When Suddenly Becoming the Immortal
description:
When your soul goes into others, others are also going into you. On this day, Lin Fan and the Saintess transmigrated at the same time, and later found out that they could transmigrate infinitely! Constantly going back and forth between the two time and space, the two's chaotic journey through the immortal cultivation began. "Excuse me, your name is..."

Note: Kimi no Na wa (Your Name) meets Xianxia

title: Seeking the Flying Sword Path
description: In this world exists demon spirits, river deities, and cultivators who seek for eternal youth. Through their mystic eye, cultivators can sense these supernatural beings. They cultivate their flying swords to slay enemies from thousands of miles away. With abilities attained through refinement, the second young master of the Qin manor, "Qin Yun" is one of those cultivators.

title: Hero Shi Feels Lonely
description: Shi Zhou Wu is Ren Tian Faction’s elder brother. He has been devoted to martial arts and been oblivious to worldly affairs since he was a child. He is serious, he doesn’t smile and is often feared by people around him. One time, at a martial arts conference, he was surrounded by way too many chivalrous couples, this seriously stimulated his spirit causing a sense of invincible loneliness to haunt him. Therefore, he decided to find his own happy fated marriage…

title: Starting as a Master of Female Disciples' Leisure Skills
description: Xiu Xian died and, upon waking up, found himself transmigrated into the body of a cowardly illegitimate son from a cultivation family. Without spiritual roots, he couldn’t cultivate, and the head of the family despised him. Almost anyone in the household could easily humiliate him. However, he acquired a "Female Disciples' Leisure System." As long as his female disciples cultivated various leisure skills like cooking, painting, blacksmithing, weaving, and construction, Xiu Xian would gain experience points. As the disciples improved their skills, they could even develop all sorts of incredible cultivation techniques—like eating food to restore health bars...

title: Little Twin Matchmakers
alt_titles: My Daddy's Public Image Is Collapsing!
Wo Die Di Ren She Beng Le
description:
Adapted from the novel of the same name by Mumuchen.

"Waaaait… you look familiar! You look… just like ME!" 

Two practically identical boys have joined forces and hatched a plot—for love! Their mission: get their parents together. Shi Chuxia is a plucky photographer, always working for that scoop. Mr. Lu is super famous and just the right target to get Shi Chuxia the big bucks, as long as she can nab that one lucky shot. As their kids push these two singles together, sparks fly, but will it lead to a once-in-a-lifetime love? Or a massive burnout?

title: Monstrous Heart
description:
Su Yuan, a poor student, in order to not place any additional burdens on his family, accidentally got himself enrolled into a college named, Ogus University. But soon he discovered that this institution was actually established for the protection of monsters (demons); and the physically weaker humans, in order to protect their lives, had to form partnerships—called PAL—with those monsters. Furthermore, as a result of his unique scent, many are drawn towards him in hopes of becoming his PAL; and at same time, he is also subjected to various attacks. That was, at least, until the day he rescued a fox covered in blood from head to toe, only to then discover…  


---

title: A Song of Prosperity
description:
An intelligent and domineering woman encounters a carefree, flamboyant prince at a brothel. Initially, she thinks of it as nothing more than a chance meeting, but little did she know their fates would end up being so deeply intertwined…  
  
"If you hold no love for me, then I will give up my love for you as well."  
  
A romance story about love and loss set in ancient times.

title: Counterattack: Diva System
description: Chu You has always been responsible and hard-working in order to fulfill her goal of becoming a famous movie director, but unexpectedly, she was betrayed by a scum man and woman! Not only was she falsely accused, she was also robbed of her hard-earned savings! In despair, she committed suicide with hatred, but after her rebirth, she's contracted with the Diva system?! Once a scumbag, always a scumbag! Now, what you made me experience before, I'll give it back to you in double!

title: Skeleton Evolution: Starting From Being Summoned By the Sorceress
alt_titles: Skeleton Evolution: It Starts With Being Summon by a Goddess
Kulou Jinhua: Cong Bei Nvshen Zhaohuan Kaishi
Kūlóu Jìnhuà: Cóng Bèi Nǚshén Zhàohuàn Kāishǐ
description:
Jiang Cheng, a man who unexpectedly finds himself reincarnated into a fantastical game world as a lowly skeleton, summoned by a group of beautiful female players using dark necromancy. To his dismay, this skeleton is no ordinary minion; it's the epitome of cannon fodder, barely worth a second glance! But fortune smiles upon him, for he possesses an extraordinary ability—the Infinite Evolution System!

With this newfound power, Jiang Cheng embarks on a remarkable journey, evolving from a mere skeleton into a god-tier undead warrior. Now, armed with unrivaled strength and cunning intellect, he unleashes havoc upon the game world, sending players and NPCs alike into fits of desperation and sorrow.

Follow Jiang Cheng as he rises from the depths of obscurity to become the fearsome legend—the God-tier Skeleton, feared by all, and unmatched in the realms of virtual adventure. Get ready for an epic tale of action, strategy, and unexpected alliances in a world where the line between reality and the virtual becomes blurred. Brace yourself as the laughter of victory and the tears of defeat echo throughout this extraordinary adventure!

title: Red Spirit
description: Around the 17th century, Wu San Gui overthrown the Mu Wang Palace with the help of a mysterious person, allowing them to do whatever they please to in Yun Nan, the Mu Wang Palace who had hidden in seclusion was massacred, and a simple youth named Jing Xiu Ming became the only survivor after being saved by the disciple of the Yunyou divine doctor named Ling Le Sui, but was infected with an illness that causes people to go berserk. In order to find the killer who killed his entire village and cure his illness, Jing Xiu Ming and Yunyou divine doctor's disciple set off for a journey.

title: Demon Apartment
description:
Gu Bai, carrying his painting board behind him, has moved into an amazing apartment.   
He noticed that the neighbor to his left is a headline queen, and on his right is the infamous acting king. On the upper floor, there is a supermodel living on the left side and a gold medal lawyer on the right side. And across his room, is a powerful big shot who is constantly featured in finance magazines.  
The ordinary Gu Bai will soon begin an unusual day.

title: Rebirth of the Strongest Sword God
alt_titles: Reincarnation of the Strongest Sword God
description: The top player of the popular MMO, “Divine Realm”, Shi Feng, was betrayed by his club. He drank in sadness, but then woke up realizing he had gone back 10 years, to the time when Divine Realm had just released. Using the ten years of experience he had, he started all over to climb back to the top. This time, he intends to surpass himself and reach greater heights.

title: Clairvoyant Doctor
description: Tang Qian dropped out of college to work in order to find a cure for his father’s illness. One day when he was standing up for the owner of an antique shop, he bumped into a cinnabar furnace. From that day onward, he had gained a special ability whereby an elder sage’s voice could be heard speaking to him in his mind, telling him a patient’s diagnosis and course of treatment upon seeing the patient. He verified that the sage’s prescriptions were truly effective and could even save patients on the verge of death. His actions of saving people were caught on by the hospital and people were sent to investigate him. Nevertheless, Tang Qian wanted to treat his father’s illness with his newfound ability. However, the ingredients for his father’s prescription could not be found in this world. Alas, he could only continue working for his father’s medical bills. He bought that very cinnabar furnace that he bumped into because it could have something to do with his special powers. He also believed that he had not fully manifested his powers yet. One night, he gained another clairvoyant ability...

title: Different Kings
description: Reiki is a resurrection, the entire world is covered by a strong aura, and creatures of the earth are affected by this. Humans experienced an account that they had stronger powers, and other creatures besides humans also evolved rapidly under the influence of Aura. Some powerful and mysterious races have appeared in silence. The legend says that the power remained: the family in another world, coincidentally, the soul of another world royal prince entered the body of a young common human, Huang Shang, and began the story of bloody and funny hegemony…

title: Your Ancestor Is Online
description:
When Zhang Tianling a typical Chinese Otaku plays a game late at night like any usual Otaku with a hikikomori tendency does, he accidentally migrated to a different world and became the founder of the sect in the game he played with all the max stats and skills.   
  
Everything seems perfect, right? OP character and skills? What could go wrong?   
  
But what he didn’t expect… this sect is now poor and destitute, and only the sect master and one disciple are left.   
  
Where are all the people? Even the mountain gate is rented? Wait, the landlord is coming here to collect a debt?! Fortunately, the system I have is still working. Sect Simulator huh? This could work!

title: The Great Deity
description:
This is a story of an exceptional boy, Lu Xiao Yi who wasn’t destined to follow the path of a cultivator. After resigning to his ill-destined fate, a couple of mysterious dices appeared suddenly, and he gained mysterious abilities. Entrusted to rekindle the fallen deities’ mission, the young boy’s life hence begun to change!  
  
[Official Korean Translation](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=52785045)

title: He Is So Flirty
alt_titles: In this case, it is love
description:
On the kind Qin Qing's first day of transfer, she accidentally got involved in the middle of someone picking a fight. Qin Qing used a strategy to save her senior who's been ganged upon, not knowing that he's Wen Yufeng, the infamous school bully! From that moment forward, Qin Qing's peaceful high school life was gone forever…  
  


---

title: Gods of All People: I Sacrificed Hundreds of Millions of Living Beings To Become a God
alt_titles: Spirit Sacrifice: The Path to Godhood
Everyone Is a King: I Sacrifice Countless Lives to Become a King
description:
Han Wu transmigrated to a world where everyone can become a god. He obtained the ability to sacrifice life.
At the beginning, he had a trash clan, so he sacrificed to change his fate against the heavens.
With no power, no status, and no money, he sacrificed his way to the top.
As long as he has enough followers, he can become infinitely stronger through sacrifice, becoming the main god, the god of gods!

title: Devil’s Advent
description: In this world, there is a legend that has existed for many years: One day, the demon king will appear in the world, and under his command, seven terrifying demons will unleash darkness and despair upon the world.

title: I've Got a Million Skill Points!
description:
Who said that if you are selected by the system, you will have to work hard for the system? For Su Chen, it is impossible to work part-time, and it is impossible to work for the system in this lifetime.   
  
Tasks issued by the system? No answer!   
Dare the system threaten? Beat him!   
The system knelt down and pleaded: "Host father, please have mercy on me, take a task."   
  
Su Chen impatiently said: "You wait until I spend a million skill points!"

title: Royal Agent
description: Chen Huan was once the first agent of China. In order to find out a 13-year car accident, he gave up the invitation of the organization and resolutely returned to Nanhai City to investigate clearly.

title: Domestication of Divine Beasts at the Beginning
alt_titles: Invasion of the Myriad Races: Starting by Taming a Legendary Beast
Monster Invasion: Guardian of the Rear Битва тысячи рас: Я укрощу всех чудови
description: All races have invaded Earth. Su Bai’s pet turtle evolved into the Black Tortoise , and his cat into the White Tiger . The Vermilion Bird and Azure Dragon , ancient sacred beasts, soon followed. However, these divine beasts have enormous appetites, which led Su Bai to become a notorious businessman that gives everyone headaches.“Brother, this is Black Tortoise blood, only selling for a mere ten billion. Hey, why are you cursing at me just because you’re not buying?”“The champion of the Hundred Schools competition wins ten billion? Help me up, I can still fight!”“The main city of all races has countless riches? As a human, I must protect my Dragon Country. I will lead the charge!

title: Only Need to Love Once
alt_titles: As Long As We Loved Each Other
description:
A one-shot about a girl accepting her identity amidst constant homophobia. 

[Author Weibo](https://www.weibo.com/u/2673967277?is_all=1)

title: Pharaoh's Concubine
alt_titles: The Song of Sand and Seas
Sand and Song of the Seas
description: She is a girl that everyone loves but she cannot speak of the love she has for her brother because her brother already loves someone else. In despair, she gets dragged into Ancient Egypt by a snake shaped bracelet that is engraved with a three thousand year old love oath. There, she meets the Pharoah's heir, a party boy….

title: Straight "Princess" in the Royal Palace
alt_titles: The Male Consort in a Game
description: "I'm straight, so why would I be entangled in this mess with three male suitors?!" Because of an obnoxious ad for a game, the main character, Lu Xing, accidentally enters the world of an otome game. In order to return, he must gain the affection of three male characters?! The aloof lord, the mysterious assassin, the gentle royal guard – who will be his final pick? The survival of a straight man begins now…

title: Absolute Control
description: The former general of the nation who is now a wanted man accidentally falls into a trap set by a hunter long ago. Wait! Isn't the hunter the little angel who always stayed with him before? The angel has turned into a cruel man and uses his means to convert the former strongest Alpha to an Omega with a sweet pheromone a day after they meet again. Xia Yusheng: "Qi Wangzhi, I swear I will kill you!"

title: Picking up a School Beauty to Be My Wife
description: One of the China's first secret soldier, Luo Feng returns to the city, becoming the most successful student in Zijing middle school! there are so many school beauties, which one of them can get into his eyes?

title: Skyfire Avenue
description:
Skyfire Avenue is a street that is 2048 meters long. There are 168 stores here, and each of the store owners is an extremely powerful adept.   
  
The Avenue does not permit any vehicles or any robots to pass through it, much less mecha. Even the patrolling police must move about on foot.   
  
This is because this is a street for pedestrians, a lane for nobles, hidden away within this high technology world. Lan Jue, the greatest of the mercenaries, code-named ‘Zeus’, has secluded himself here in Skyfire Avenue after the death of his wife.   
  
The name of his shop is “Zeus’ Jewelry Store”, and here in Skyfire Avenue, he has been given the title, Jewel Master.

title: She Who Is the Most Special to Me
alt_titles: She Who Is Most Special to Me
description: Ru YunYun's new roommate is the former rock star, Hao Yue, whom she is enamored by. But why does Yue want to be the roommate of YunYun? It doesn't look like Yue is interested in being just a roommate…

title: The Divine Ring Descends: The Strongest Otherworld
alt_titles: Divine Ring Descends: The Strongest in Another World
Become the Strongest Hero Through the Cheat System
The Divine Ring Descends: The Strongest Otherworld
description: When darkness invades the city, zillions of human warriors come into being, but Aiden isn't one of them. One day, he comes across a mysterious ring and is sent into the Orc Realm where humans are forbidden, by a treaty. He magically survives his execution, lifts the Orc Tribe's sacred hammer, and becomes the tribe leader. Just then, he is transported back to his original reality.

title: I Don't Want to Be Like This Too
alt_titles: I Don't Want to Do This
Trẫm cũng không muốn vậy đâu
description:
I was a cruel empress who had the world in my hands, forcing commoner men to become my concubines, finally got what I deserved. The people I once knew became my enemies, and somehow ended up in the "enemies" hands?  
  
French : ||Vous prenez votre histoire classique, un monarque dominateur, qui fait tout pour séduire sa servante…sauf que la c'est la reine qui est dominatrice et qui ne recule devant rien pour séduire son servant, qui lui ne cherche qu'à fuir.  
Une comédie déjantée qui renverse les codes dans la Chine impériale.||

title: Tang Yin in Another Realm II: The Rise of Feng Nation
alt_titles: Tang Yin Di  Dunia Yang Berbeda II
Tomin in The Alien World II
description:
The assassin Tang Yin, who had transmigrated to another world, relied on his decisive and determined heart to sit on the throne as the king of Feng Nation, but two days after he became king, he was met with an assassination attempt. The mysterious Ling Wu Academy, the superpower nation Zhen Nation, and the Hao Tian Empire appeared one after another. In the midst of many crisis and obstacles, how did Tang Yin let the Feng Nation, and dominate the world!  
  
  
- [Official Indonesia (Mangatoon)](https://mangatoon.mobi/id/detail/420554)

title: Vanguard
description:
From the live action series with the same name, Vanguard, has been renewed. It features a girl named Lei Xiaoyu that has caught the attention of a mysterious assassination organization! The tsundere Wu Yue of the Vanguard was assigned to be Xiaoyu’s protector. A love story full of youth, campus life, and action?! As the plot was revealed layer upon layer, the brutal truth gradually appeared…  
  
**Information**  
Marked as "completed" on the website itself.

title: The Great Conqueror
description:
A passionate otaku for a fighting game passed through into the world governed by the beast tribes, filled with hope.  
  
The peak of martial ability?  
Extreme beauties?  
This brother was miserable! Such an event would force even civilised people to turn crazy!  
  
The pious scoundrel Zou began his unrestrained and destructive journey through the Among De Beast God Continent.  
  
Rules? There are no rules!  
Principles? His actions define the principles!  
Occupations? Occupations are as unimportant as fleeting clouds; this brother sought omnipotence!  
  
A different world but the same passions. A story of an unimportant person becoming the great conqueror—step by step—as a human would: filled with touching emotions, explosive anger, and hot-bloodedness forever!  
  
**Links:**  
- [Original Manhua](http://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/510960) (Raw) (ac.qq.com)  
- [Original Manhua](http://www.u17.com/comic/71068.html) (Raw) (u17.com)

title: CHR-47
description:
When he woke up, the world completely changed. The end of the world arrived.  
The rich, famous and high ranks in the previous world lost their status. In this violent world, a canned food can be exchanged for a former world-renowned female celebrity.

title: Their Phantom
description: A shady undercover police officer x an innocent university student. In an accident, university student Song Xiao An is kidnapped and brought deep into the mountains, ripping her away from her peaceful and happy life. There, an undercover police officer named Zhou Si Han secretly takes care of her, and Xiao An thinks she can escape through her. However, she discovers that the policewoman is hiding a dark secret...

title: Anti-Gods Dragon System
description: Tian Ling, a persecuted young man from his clan classmate, decided to get rid of him in a tragic way that led to death. At the moment of death his blood awakened the remains of a dragon millions of years ago known as the dragon system, he revived it in order to achieve their revenge in destroying the gods and become the supreme master … in a training journey to seek to destroy the heavens!

title: I Encountered A False Spiritual Revival
description: Everyone in the world is mentally ill, except me! (Confirmed!)

title: Villain to the Rescue
alt_titles: I Am Going to Be a Bastard
I Want to Be a Scoundrel
I'm Going to Be a Great Villain
I Want to Be a Big Baddie
description:
A proper villain must be ruthless and evil, a bringer of death! Having tormented the protagonist to his heart's content, he makes a brilliant exit. Once he's finished his work, he goes out with a bang.
Wang Yi was determined to be that kind of villain. Unfortunately… His male lead can read minds. (:з)∠*)
“You mongrel!” Mr. Wang chuckled as he looked down on the novel’s male lead.
Suddenly, a thought bubble filled with cute emojis (⁄ ⁄ ⁄ω⁄ ⁄ ⁄) and the words “You’re so cute…” appeared in front of Qin.
Qin: ?

title: I Was Raised by the Boss
alt_titles: I Was Beaten up by the Boss
description: The MC accidentally entered a hidden boss lair when he was younger, and in the midst of corpses, he was found by the hidden boss and got adopted by him. The boss sees the MC as a toy at first, but as time goes by, looking at the interaction between the cruel boss and the young boy…they somehow seemed like a family?

title: God-Level Fisherman
description: Who says that breeding cannot make a fortune? Fish farming, shrimp farming, salvaging a sunken ship, and the bubble star supermodel. This is the story of fisherman Xiao Peng who became the richest man in the world with a small fish farm.

title: Peerless Ancient
description: Our main character found out that the village that he is living in is just a world created by his father to protect him. His journey starts….

title: Azure Legacy
description: Meng Chuan witnessed his mother killed before his eyes, so he trained very hard hoping to one day avenge her death. But his peaceful days were broken as his wedding engagement being called off, an invasion by foreign forces, the sanctuary fallen into enemy hands… In order to protect the people of Ning City, he picked up his sword and vowed to be the strongest. This is a heavy responsibility and a long journey…

title: Pomegranate Blooms in Spring
alt_titles: Las flores de Granada crecen en Primavera
description:
Xie Yan, the spoiled daughter of a general, lost her parents overnight, yet because of her family status, was involved in an “emperor-minister political struggle” in the royal court. At the young age of 7, she was sent to the emperor’s harem, and became the “young empress” in name only. Can the young orphan single-handedly stir up a storm in the turbulent palace?  
  
Xie Yan, la hija consentida de un general, perdió a sus padres de la noche a la mañana pero debido a su estatus familiar, estuvo involucrada en una “lucha política emperador-ministro” en la corte real. A la temprana edad de 7 años, fue enviada al harem del emperador y se convirtió en la "joven emperatriz" solo de nombre. ¿Puede la joven huérfana provocar por sí sola una tormenta en el turbulento palacio?

title: Legend of Star General
description: Song Yunxiang, the last Star Soul General of the Human Race, brought the system back to the campus era.  When he was a teenager, he was blinded by the incomplete soul, because he was weak and could only watch his relatives and friends die in front of him.  In this life, he returned with a system rebirth, with 60 years of combat experience and knowledge and technology, and returned to school. From then on, he used to build mechas to fight monsters... The things that have regretted, the people who have missed, this time will not leave regrets.

title: Tang Yin
description: He struggles for influence between the emperors and nobles, the fight for power between the underworld and imperial court. During these prosperous times, how will the fates of the people play out?

title: The Strongest Golden Kidney System
alt_titles: The Strongest Kidney in the Planet
The Strongest Golden Kidney on the Planet
Di Biao Zui Qian Huangijin Shen
description:
Ye Yun, a teenage boy who sold his kidney to buy an iPhone, is transported to a martial arts world on Cang Yan Continent. This hapless boy finds that he is not only a martial arts failure, but also has an evil second uncle who killed his father, and is threatening him to practice black magic kung fu. He then has no choice but to save himself by participating in the Ye family's test to determine who leads the family! When he finds himself in this helpless situation, he discovers that his kidney can help him make magical elixirs and even functions as a smartphone...
- - -
This manhua was rebooted under a new name (修真肾斗士). The WebComics translation follows the original manhua.

title: Upgrade From Wild Monsters
description: After Lu Chen entered the cranial neuron quantum transferring game《Empyrean God Realm》—he found himself stripped of his human character, becoming the weakest wild monster in the game, a "Weak Gnoll." Facing players who are ready to use him to level up, Lu Chen lifts the broken Gnoll club and starts to upgrade from a Lv.1 Gnoll. As Lu Chen keeps on killing more and more species, gaining new talents, and levelling up talents, his status keeps getting enhanced. Normal, Strong, Super strong... Soon enough, he...

title: Inverse Scale
description: [Original: Liu Xiahui] Born of wasteful ability, encountering the dragon possessed. Inheriting the idea and ability of the Shenlong, the scaled phantom claws, the royal water dragon breath, the rain of the cloud, the invincible body. In this era when everyone wants to slaughter dragons, Li Muyang has always been very stressed. Because he is the last dragon on this continent.

title: If I Don’t Die Soon, I’ll Become The Ruler Of The Demon Realm!
description: Humanity’s strongest warrior was killed by demons amidst a battle and gained the power to reincarnate, but somehow did so as a demon. Only by dying he can go back to living as a human, so he committed suicide non-stop. But things turned out to be the opposite of what he expected…

title: Fu Fu Qing Cheng
description: A pure yin descendant destined to be a ghost bride is actually a man! Repeated warnings not to escape a marriage predestined by fate and a Lord demanding for love! One desperately wants to run away, one ghost desperately wants to pursue his wife. Waiting for the fate of loving and killing each other in the previous life to finally be revealed. Can the emotions of the two be restored as before?

title: Vampire and Hunter
description: Long ago, a young boy named Libra Brian wandered into the vampire Lasombra's castle and became smitten, swearing that one day he would marry him. Libra grew up to become a vampire hunter, but his love for Lasombra never faded and the two eventually become lovers. Hundreds of years later, the vampire awakens from a long sleep to find his human paramour still alive, but to Libra's dismay, Lasombra has lost all memories of the love they once shared, and the vampire now believes his long-time human companion is actually an enemy plotting to kill him! How can Libra rekindle their romance and help his amnesiac lover learn to navigate the modern world when every move he makes is considered a plot to destroy him?

title: Please Fall Asleep, Emperor
description:
In order to kill the dictator, an assassin wore female clothing and snuck into the palace. He didn't expect to be caught immediately that night. But the dictator did not kill him. Instead, he asked to sleep with the assassin and treated him like a sleeping pill.   
After staying in the palace for a while, the assassin discovered a deep conspiracy, and the dictator didn't seem that bad after all. Meanwhile, he even started to feel a little sympathetic…

title: Marrying a CEO
alt_titles: Hè Shǎo De Shǎn Hūn Nuǎn Qī
Hè Shǎo De Shǎnhūn Nuǎn Qī
He Shao De Shanhun Nuan Qi
description: To become my woman, He Qiaoyan, you must fulfill these three conditions: to like being pampered, to like being loved, and to like being taken good care of. You have fulfilled all the requirements, and all that's left is for you to be aware that you belong to me!

title: Babysitting for the Handsome Guy
alt_titles: Nan Shen Meng Bao Yi Guo Duan
My Prince Charming and his Daughter
Half My Tyrant, Half My Baby
description: Zhang Xiao is fresh out of college. One day, she comes across a man and his baby daughter. When the baby calls her "Mommy" and clings to her, she doesn't know what to do. Mu Chen, the father, finds the situation even more baffling because his daughter has never called anyone that. He asks Zhang Xiao to become his daughter's nanny and hands her a contract. A professional/personal relationship begins, while dark secrets from the past, while Mu Chen minds himself caught in a dilemma as her daughter grows closer to her nanny.

title: Reborn as Emperor
description: Zhao Dongting was betrayed and killed by his lover, but he came back to life in Dynasty Song South and become emperor. He stepped on the dead sea and set foot on the throne, and turned the madness to the side, and helped to build the kingdom, and become the legend of the supreme emperor!

title: If I Don’t Die Soon, I’ll Really Become Invincible!
alt_titles: If I Die, I will Be Invincible
Zài Bu Sǐ Wǒ Jiù Zhēn Wú Dí Le
description: Ye Qing obtained the golden finger through travel, and as long as he dies, he would be invincible. So he started to go crazy. But... Empress Da Zhou: "When I see Ye Qing's life, if he dies, I will live alone.". Upper world immortal ruler: "The world is so indifferent, but Lord Ye never hates me, I will try my best to protect him". Hundreds of millions of people: "everyone in the world can be lacking, but Lord Ye is the only saint, only Ye Qing!"

title: Missy's Geek Raising Plan
description: What is the experience of a campus hottie chasing the campus geek? He Fengqi transformed from a dead fat geek into a handsome guy, and was rejected by the beauty! But accidentally discovered that the beauty likes the geek! How will the campus hottie chase her? anxious! Waiting for an answer! Why does the goddess have a unique taste? Is it human nature distorted or forced by life? Read to find out!

title: Zhan Long
description: Li Xiao Yao left S.W.A.T to become an ordinary security guard, while working, he happened to enter the VIP room and found Lin Wan Er still in the middle of changing, as revenge, she took him on a ride and kicked him out of the car, after hours of walking, Li Xiao Yao finally managed to get back home just to be kicked out of the house. He then got an offer from his previous supervisor to become the bodyguard of the Tian Xi group CEO's daughter both in game and in reality. But unknown to Li Xiao Yao the girl was actually…

title: 1.5 Meters From Love
description:
“What are your thoughts on wearing a mask nowadays?”  
  
A romance is blooming between a suave salaryman and a kind-hearted punk (who happens to be the cutest convenience store clerk he’s ever seen)… but it’s hard to fall in love in the middle of a pandemic!

title: Indulged in Your Light
description:
Shu Yun, shining star that was born in the ballet world and gifted opera Huadan Tong Yang are connected by a twist of fate. "I'm certain you're the light I want to pursue." One is the family's pride, the other a muddy white jade; looked down upon because of his low social standing when he's actually a hidden gem. Completely different paths but when the East and the West meet…when Beijing opera and ballet meet; two lives will be changed forever.

---

Official English translation on Comico's [Pocket Comics app](https://www.comico.io/pocket-comics)

title: The Hierarch Can’t Resist His Mistresses
alt_titles: Ben Jiao Zhu Shen Bu You Ji
The master cannot resist his mistresses
This Godfather Body Can't Leave the Women
description: Elite investors crossed into the game world to become the Lord of the Demon Religion? However, he could not resist the begging of the demon girls, and embarked on the road to domination of the other world!

title: Falling to  Where I Belong
description: Heart warningly honest Cheng Fei Chi X A proud and an innocent Zhen Ye Ming, a youngster who doesn't think that relations are important. their love will never change! The fallen leaf belongs to the pond and I belong to you!

title: The Lost Story
description: In the 33rd year of Kangxi rule, Emperor Kangxi issued an edict named “The Migration of People from Huguang to Sichuan”. He ordered the citizens living in Hunan, Hubei, Guangdong and other places to move to Sichuan. This is the famous “Huguang to Sichuan” incident. Was the former Land of Abundance really left barren due to the war? There was another saying that “something” showed up in Sichuan…

title: Money Makes the World Go Around
alt_titles: As the proverb says - money makes the mare go
Money can make Spirits go away
description: A cute GL between a spirit demon and a human demon slayer. Author Weibo: <https://www.weibo.com/u/1654427497>

title: Ominous Liar
description: Was that a giant face that floated past the window in the back of the class? How does some self absorbed guy always get a perfect score on the exams? In this world people wield items called 'Bai Wu' and they all have powers! Danger is around every corner, as enemies shrouded by shadows, lay in waiting! For the sake of survival we fight!

title: The Day of the Shooting Star
description: Chen Xin and Lin Anyun were looking up at the sky on an ordinary night after getting off work. They saw three shooting stars pass by at the same time and made their own wishes. When they woke up the next day, they found that their souls had been swapped and began a wonderful journey. In the process, the things that they usually ignored, the things they couldn't see clearly because of their own identities, what they wanted but couldn’t get, and the compromises they had to make... Were all solved miraculously. The two were attracted to each other and eventually they ran towards each other; turning into partners who worked and grew together hand in hand. When the night where three shooting stars pass by comes again, will they be able to return to being themselves?

title: The Evil Buster
description:
He constantly destroyed the world's sub-rules, always think of himself as a good young man of integrity. He was hated by countless upper-class guys, but he was able to hold the supremacy of the people's hearts. With blood deep hatred, the top special forces returned to the city, very cool and very hot blood!  
  - - -
Yes, this is seriously how the author wants to introduce his work… wow, right?

title: God of War
