description: Five years ago, his father’s company was framed by someone, and he lost his money. Jiang Beichen suffered humiliation in front of his relatives in order to treat his father’s illness, and was even ruthlessly abandoned by his fiancee, and finally sank into the river. Five years later, he added glory to his body and returned strong. Not only did he sweep away all abuses and avenge his father, but he also stood on the top of Kyushu, overlooking the world.

title: The Gangster Boss Is 16 Again
description: When the gangster boss, Wang Tianxia, announced his plan to give up evil and return to good, he never thought that he would be shot to death. Nevertheless, his soul accidentally attached itself to a student’s body, who was apparently the school's no.1 punching bag… Let’s feast our eyes as we watch how the gangster boss is going to turn his image around as he investigates the mystery of his assassination!

title: Miss Ghost, No Snuggling Please!
description:
Lan Ting, a Taoist, ended up meeting an ancient female ghost... And, out of nowhere, a bond of forbidden passion arose between them!

The little ghost won't stop clinging to her, asking for kisses and hugs, and even says that she "smells so good"?! How is it that a Taoist is always being bothered by a ghost?! Aren't you supposed to "forget your earthly passions", according to the Great Tao? Isn't having a forbidden romance with a ghost a problem?!

Lan Ting: "Why are you running away? Weren't you the one who wanted to sleep with me?"
Jiang Si (the ghost): "Didn't you say that humans and ghosts are from different worlds and forbid physical contact?"

title: I Want to Kiss you, in that Moment
description:
A collection of moments wherein characters kiss one another on a whim.  
  
Diversas histórias curtas sobre pessoas que beijam por querer beijar, não importando-se com o momento ou lugar.

title: Dragon Raja: The Blazing Dawn
description:
Lu Mingfei never expected to live an extraordinary life. He was content with his average achievements and took pride in his skill in Starcraft. However, all that is upended when he suddenly receives a scholarship to study in Chicago at a place called Cassell College.   
It all seems too good to be true, this can only be a scam! Little does he know, that when he does eventually accept the offer, it is but the beginning of the rest of his life, and the college's obscurity will be the least of his concerns once they start telling him about the dragons…  
  
Adapted from the original novel which has also been turned into a game.

title: The Prince Disguised as the Clown
description: RanK is a popular idol group in the country, RON(Qiu ChenYu) goes with the handsome-cool-guy route, but KIMI(Yu Lang) is set up as a noisy comic character. However, Yu Lang’s real character is not like that. His childhood friend Ying Yue always watches him silently from behind, hoping her best friend can break through this situation as soon as possible…

title: My Guardian Angel
description: Lin Xiaoyou, childhood friend of Xi Yu, died at the age of 14, but her spirit refused to pass onto the afterlife. Instead, she stuck around and became Yu's "guardian angel" due to a promise she made to him. Under Xiaoyou's constant guarding, Yu hasn't had a single girlfriend even though he's already 24. Being in a proper relationship has become his goal in life, but such a simple wish brings about a series of terrifying incidents. Is Xiaoyou really a "guardian angel", or is she actually an "evil spirit"?!

title: Left Handed Mutation
description: Human genes mutate, those with extraordinary genes may gain superpowers, and those with monster genes may mutate into monsters. Xingcun, who became a monster, was awakened and later reborn after the sacrifice of the heroine. In this life, the prodigal son shall use the mutation to fight back and protect the heroine. While he may lay hidden among the supermen, and he shall secretly use his mutation to hunt monsters, seize the power of the ancient demon god, and prevent his resurrection.

title: Born Beauty
description: This is a world where you can do what you want with beauty! The attractive high-level appearance has opened countless shortcuts for the life of Li Bin. While he smiles and moves his fingers, there are girls online who are willing to jump. In the last 24 years, it has been facilitated because it is good at using its own beauty. He has been accepting the contributions of others. Until he meets He Honey, who seems to understand him more than anyone.

title: Chao Hua Xi Shi
description:
Studious and strong-willed An Kele has always tried to live her life unswayed by others, preferring to judge people with her own eyes. Due to her mother working overseas, she moves in with her aunt and soon encounters a handsome host named Yan Shu. Though fascinated by him, she is determined to work hard in school and be noticed by her upperclassman, Bai Yiran.

Unbeknownst to An Kele, the name "Yan Shu" is just an alias of her classmate Ye Ling, who moonlights as a host to alleviate the crippling debt left behind by his absconded father. While Yan Shu charms with his confident smile and silver tongue, Ye Ling is a brooding school truant—the type of person that the diligent An Kele can't help but dislike.

Though their relationship starts off both bitter and sweet, An Kele and Ye Ling find themselves tied together by fate—and so, the duo face each trial and tribulation that comes their way, chasing the bright future that comes with the rising sun.

title: Switched Girls
description:
This story tells of a high school student named Sia. In the school, there are two of them who are named Sia; one is a popular student who has everything and looks perfect, whereas the other Sia is a quiet person who often gets bullied by her classmates.  
One day they were met with an accident which resulted in both experiencing critical conditions. In this critical condition, both were destined to exchange bodies for three months. What happens after three months? Will they return to their respective bodies? Curious? Read the story to find out what happens!

title: Lying Puppies Get Eaten
description: The puppy is clearly an omnivore, then why does he have to pretend to be a carnivore? On his first day transferring into a new school, his secret was discovered by his fox classmate. Then begins his life of living under “threat”, but after spending more time with him, the fox isn’t actually too awful…?

title: Emotional Illness
description:
Everybody is crazy except me. But is it a misfortune to be sane in a crazy world?

(Source: qq, edited)

title: The Villainous Doctor
description: When she met him for the first time, she just wanted to escape from him. From then on, however, she gradually got used to his company. He is the god of death to everyone else, but he will always give the barest hint of a smile to her. Whenever there was a danger, he would always help her like a real god fallen from the heaven, mocking her at the same time. With the lapse of time, her feelings for him was more than just dependence. If she doesn’t love him, she wouldn’t let him stay by her; If not, how would she feel so different…

title: My Wife Is the Destined Villainess
alt_titles: Wo De Niangzi Shi Tianming Fanpai
Wǒ De Niángzǐ Shì Tiānmìng Fǎnpài
My Wife's Fate Is to Be the Villainess
My Wife Is the Villain of Destiny
description: Just entered the novel world and unexpectedly became a cannon fodder supporting character named Mo Lang, who also married the villain boss as his wife? As a cannon fodder, he not only has to whiten his villainous wife to prevent her from turning black, but also has to seize the air luck of the son of destiny. Mo Lang smiled slightly, although he had no cultivation, the system gave him endless props and rare treasures to be able to stand at the top of this continent. The so-called son of destiny is nothing but an ant in his hands! But wait, why does the villain wife by his side look strange?

title: Peerless and Strong
description: I have three grandpas. Grandpa is a Chinese medicine doctor. The second grandpa is a master of ancient martial arts. The third grandpa went to South Africa. The task of going down the mountain to find the heavenly grass can only fall on me! Tongtian medicine! Huaxia Wuhun! Let me "Xiao Yao"

title: Ping Dan's Inflatable Doll: Zoe-17
description: The absolute loser Ping Dan; is a failure in life. Everything in his life is a mess, but then one day he spent his entire fortune to buy an exorbitant inflatable doll, and miraculously the doll came to life after a few days!!! What does the future have in store for him? Who is that talking and walking doll? What is her purpose in Ping Dan’s life? It seems like there is more underneath those innocent eyes.

title: I Transformed into a Demon God and Became a World-Destroying Beast!
alt_titles: Wo Huashen Moshen, Cheng Wei Mie Shi Ju Shou!
Wǒ Huàshēn Móshén, Chéng Wéi Miè Shì Jù Shòu!
description: The prosperous city and peaceful society were suddenly destroyed by the outbreak of doomsday. Countless polluted monsters flooded the world, and the forbidden area descended. Billions of people died and the sea of ​​blood surged as the doomsday worlds were connected. At this time, Chen Chu, who had grown silently and was comparable to a god or demon, stood up. And behind him, there was a black monster that was 10,000 meters tall, shaped like Godzilla, but even more ferocious and huge.

title: Tian Lun
description: Maybe it was because I opened it incorrectly. How did I enter a strange world? My attribute value of 5 slags, maybe I can get all the crowns I want at the king level…

title: City of Sanctuary
alt_titles: Real Life Is Hard For Game World Dwellers
description:
Adapted from a novel of the same name by Xiong Baobao.

“Fantasy” - a popular VR game that sweeps the world. Some people found out that they can enter the game through another way, which makes it possible for them to bring the items and skills they obtained in the game back to reality. But at the same time, dying in the game would mean actually dying in real life. Fang Tian has been in the game world for more than ten years. When he returned to reality, the world he knew has completely changed.

title: Dumped by my girlfriend, I turned to martial arts.
description:
Fang Yi, transmigrated to this world, has just been dumped by his beautiful schoolmate girlfriend. He initially thought this would be the start of a modern romance, but then the system alerts him that a spiritual energy resurgence will begin in one year, leading to drastic changes in the world and the apocalypse.
“With a system, what the hell am I afraid of?”

title: There's Something Wrong With the Governor
description: An unfavoured concubine-born son of the Xie Residence was made, due to unknown reasons, into the Governor of Dong Chang, below only one and above thousands! The world only knows Chen Jue as a savage and ruthless man, however they do not know of the only white moonlight in his heart, the Qie Lan assassin Xia Hou Lian, who has been wanted in Dong Chang for many years! Once were childhood friends, but why do they now point their blades at each other? A Yandere Immortal Governor and a loyal ruffian assassin invites you to enjoy a bloody date!

title: Ghost Blade
description:
Long, long ago in Neraland, the pious human built a great tower to show the respect to their Goddess Nera.  
Goddess Nera was deeply moved by human piety; to reward them, she opened a door at the top of the tower. This ethereal door connected to another world; it was known as *Heaven's Eye*.  
However…

title: The Descent of the Spiritual Deity
description: A genius who is tired of the real world, reborn into a different world where the strongest are respected, and he's trying to become the world's strongest spirit, what kind of adventures are waiting for him?

title: The Empress with No Virtue
alt_titles: How the Empress Breaks the Rules
How the Queen Break the Rules
description:
Ye Zhenzhen—is the Royal Secretary's legitimate granddaughter. Set to become the Empress through a marriage against her will, Ye Zhenzhen would soon be the Great Wife to the playboy Emperor, Ji Wu Jiu. But…  
  
“This damn woman.”  
  
On their very first wedding night, she kicked the Emperor off the bed and he sought out his concubine instead! Ever since then, making trouble for the Emperor has become her number one job.   
  
Long story short, this disaster was the start of a story between a free-spirited Empress and a playboy Emperor!

title: Presumptuous
description: Tang Ruoyao, who was only 22 years old, claimed the title of Best Actress. The following day, the media published an overwhelming press release, hailing her as "Little Qin Yinong." A skilled reporter interviewed both of them regarding their impressions of each other. Qin Yinong grinned like a fox, and said, "She is unfamiliar to me." Tang Ruoyao, in a rather formulaic tone, responded, "Queen Qin is a senior whom I greatly respect, and I hope for the opportunity to collaborate with her."

title: DOLO's Destiny Pill
description:
Jana’s a talented artist, but she’s also an awkward high school girl. When her first love Conrad transfers to her school, she’s over the moon until this popular genius very publicly denies knowing her. Before she dies from the online shaming, the mysterious creature Dolo has just the thing for her — a capsule to change her destiny! All it requires in exchange is something valuable to her. What will Jana sacrifice to make her dreams come true? Nothing could go wrong… right?

---

Related c96.5: [Once More](https://mangadex.org/title/42121/once-more), [The Heart Has Its Reasons](https://mangadex.org/title/43892/the-heart-has-its-reasons)

title: Father, I'm Definitely Not the Villainous Side Character
alt_titles: Fùqīn Dàrén, Wǒ Cái Bùshì Èdú Nǚ Pèi
Fuqin Daren, Wo Cai Bushi Edu Nv Pei
Father, I'm Definitely Not the Villainess Side Character
description:
I reincarnated! The good news is I'm still alive! The bad news is that I am a devil incarnate and everyone wants to murder me. If my father was not strong-willed enough, I might have been killed right at birth. My sick and petite uncle vomits blood at any time and his life is in danger, my hero father does whatever he want with the heavens, the Earth and the emperor, my goddess twin sister is cute but ignorant of the world, and there is a adorable little prince who protects me... So, how is it that everyone loves me so much, but I am set as the villainous side character of this story?!

---
**Original Webcomic:** [AC.QQ](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/652167), [BiliBili Manhua](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc31885), [KuaiKan Manhua](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/14692)

title: I Rely on My Harem to Conquer the World
alt_titles: I Conquered the World With My Harem
description: Li Haoran, once a brave youth who fell to his teammates’ betrayal in a brutal battle against strange beasts, awakens to a shocking new life, reborn as Blood Demon King in a hidden village teeming with alluring succubi. Gifted with a twisted system that fuels his power through building a vast harem, Haoran vows to seize this second chance. He will forge himself into an unstoppable demon lord, gather his bewitching companions, and lead his harem to conquer the entire world.

title: Plunder Countless Talents, I Became a God
alt_titles: I Want to Be a God
Lüèduó Wúshù Tiānfù, Wǒ Zài Quánmín Shídài Fēng Shén
description: In an era of darkness, Lin Luo, who staunchly upheld his moral values, met a tragic end at the hands of others! Fortunately, he found himself back in time before the age of universal profession change began! With a second chance at life, he no longer suppressed his talent for leveling up by killing. The Black Emperor, the Lord of Wishes, Princess Kaguya… In this lifetime, Lin Luo formed a one-man army in the midst of the dark age

title: Perfect Victim
description: "The person who is destined to be the perfect lover is secretly a murderous devil?! There are many secrets to the widowed mother. The life of Qiqi is completely changed by a mysterious stalker."

title: The Fairy Captivity
description: A dystopian fantasy. In this futuristic world, humans are ruled over by faeries. The young master Yue Hu encounters the fairy Fei Liai, and gradually uncovers the truth and dark secrets behind them…

title: Metropolis Killing Arrogant Immortals
description: I, The Supreme One has Returned, after four years, The Grudges from 4 years Ago must be avenged, I Will kill anyone who gets in the way of my revenge, no matter if it’s a demon, god, or heaven itself, they all will perish under my wrath

title: Zero Point Idol
description: Famous idol Jin Lingfeng is said to have it all - the looks, the smarts, and the success - that is, until it's revealed he's actually a complete idiot who managed to get a perfect zero points on his test during high school. Now he has been sent back to Green University to improve his image, under the threat of being fired if he doesn't score 90 points or above on each subsequent test. And taking on the role of his remedial studies tutor is none other than the top student on campus and a bookworm who is completely out of touch with pop culture, Lin Fan! With their stubborn personalities and well-known statuses at their university, how will their daily lives go from here?

title: Jiěsuǒ Mòshì de 99 Ge Nǚzhǔ
description: What do you do when a plane hits a building? Cry out? Call for help? Hao Lanren, a top martial artist, laughed: No, as a man of the world, of course, is to use his fist to hit the plane!… He died and crossed over to the zombie-ridden post-apocalyptic world, and awakened to the system, killing zombies to explode gold, buy equipment, and found that the number of women is also unexpectedly high… so in the company of many confidantes, launched a journey to save the world!

title: Revenge is Best Served Cold
description:
A Taiwanese Webcomic focused on friend taking revenge for her friend.  
  
Xiao Yue, who Just moved back to Taiwan, happen to see her best friend, Xiao Nai, jumped off the building. Once she knows the reason why Xiao Nai‘s suicide, decides to take revenge for her friend. With no time, she collects all the information of her targets. This is the story of how Xiao Yue takes down her friend’s enemies, one by one.

title: My ¼ Boyfriends
description: What would the experience of being simultaneously chased by 4 god-like men with weird personalities be like? An ordinary university girl, Mo Li, is confessed to by 4 unfamiliar men. When she finally pulls herself together, she finds that these 4 'unfamiliar' men have unexpectedly integrated themselves into her life somehow. So then how will she make her decision on who to choose?

title: Commoner's Empire
description: A wormhole with the ability to travel back to the Middle Ages appeared before Fan Li. The Middle Ages, where pastoral songs could be heard, while war and chaos ran rampant. One could have a harem of wives and concubines, and one could also compete to be at the top of the world. But no matter the kind of ideals you strive to achieve, acquiring a wealth of money is the first step.

title: The Superb Captain in the City
alt_titles: City Life of a Super Soldier
description:
An extraordinarily charming and capable retired special forces who is pursued by enemies all over the world and targeted by evil powers.  
On top of these, he is also burdened with the mission of protecting his loved one. What kind of experience will this be?

title: Reincarnated as a Scumbag, I Use My Wife and Daughter to Prove Immortality
description: A mighty Da Luo immortal, gravely wounded, descends to the mortal world and reincarnates into the body of the scumbag Jiang Tianchen. After a thousand years of being single, he encounters a gang trying to assault his wife and take his daughter — so he beats them down without mercy! If they’re dark, he’s darker! Anyone who comes will be drained dry, turning all enemies into cultivation resources for him, his wife, and his daughter on their path to immortality!

title: Good Luck, Demon King!
description:
This is a wonderful world ruled by magic. It's full of ancient myths and legends of all types, including one such legend that was on most people's tongues as of late: one about the battle between an evil demon king and great sages.  
  
In the current day, at the world's one and only Magic Academy – the Forest Academy of Magic – more and more odd creatures seem to be appearing and causing trouble. In the middle of it all, there always seems to be the shadow of an academy student named "Salaman"…  
  
Note: Act 111 leads into *Good Luck, Demon King Season 2*, with Act 112 resuming after the end of the prequel.

title: Space-Time Prisoner
description: Vampires have been defeated by Humans. A story about them wearing collars. Wait - you're mistaken, it's not like that!

title: Lifeafter
description: The misadventures of two men as they fight (and sometimes fail) against a zombie apocalypse. Based on the Chinese video game by NetEase which has also been released in NA, SEA, and AU.

title: Danwu Supreme
description:
On the continent of the sky, warriors cultivates their life soul, and the life soul nourishes their body. As everyone knows, there are eight god-level life souls, which are owned by the top eight forces on the mainland. But what they don't know is that there is a ninth god-level life soul in the world!   
  
I, Ye Xinghe, awakened this life soul after I was schemed upon by my own blood. My brother not only dug out my life soul, reducing me to waste, but he also stole my fiancee! But through this, I unexpectedly awakened the ninth god-level life soul! Since then, I have risen against the sky and received the title of Danwu Supreme!


---

**Links:**
- [Alternative Raw (BiliBili)](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc27951)

title: Stop Summoning Me!
description: After Shen Yi passed through, more and more inexplicable people began to summon him, cults, wizards, investigators, saints...Weird prayers filled my mind, and each god name was completely different. "Lord of Ashes", "Colorless City", "White Mist on the Other Shore", "Ancient Spirit", "Void Dream", "Chaos Watcher"... Every summoner has something Desire, and at the same time, various sacrifices will be offered. Shen Yi was overwhelmed with annoyance, but there was no way to refuse. On this day, he was finally summoned by cultists.

title: Female General and Eldest Princess
description:
In order to survive in troubled times, to avenge her loved ones, and to seek justice for the 118 people who died in her village, Lin Wanyue took the identity of Lin Feixing, her younger twin brother, to join the army, resolving to kill the all Huns in the world.  
The queen died in the court, leaving the sixteen-year-old princess and eight-year-old prince to depend on each other for survival.  
Several princes who were older than the prince coveted the throne, and the status of the two siblings was at stake.

title: One + One
description: The innocent and independent Mian Hua and the cautious and conservative Lan Bao. The two people met coincidentally while one was renting a house. What kind of love sparks will emerge from two people who have very different worldviews, values, ​​and outlooks on life? From the same creator of the fluffy love story <One Minute Underwater>, Bao-Ah. How will she utilize her elegant writing style and an adorable plot to create a “next-door neighbor” type of romantic drama set in Hong Kong…~

title: Office Witch Falls in Love
description: The normal life of a lax, spinster, wage-slave witch is disrupted the day she accidentally picks up a jobless youth. This energetic and cute homeless ruffian yearns for a witch, but he absolutely can't let her find out! She never once thought about signing a contract with anyone before. She just wants to keep living the single life of an office witch. But just like that, she's dragged into a difficult dating life?

title: Yuanshan Qianlin
alt_titles: Thousand Endless Rains from Faraway Mountains
description: When a female doctor and martial artist whose family was tragically murdered encounters a sultry but frail scholar, a romantic tale unfolds upon their mutual hunt for the criminals.

title: Survive on a Deserted Island with Beautiful Girls
alt_titles: Survive on a deserted island with beautiful girls
Desert Island Survival with the Ladies
The Rest of My Life on the Desert Island
description: Ancient giants, modern humans, future technology, desert islands in chaotic time and space; stone age, power age, electrical age, rapid development of desert island civilization. Living on an uninhabited desert island, starting a system, Qin Tian started from scratch to survive. The goddess of the school flower, the blonde elder sister, and the runaway loli, I will all; train the golden eagle, collect the wolf king, and retreat the python, this desert island, I am the master!

title: I'm Just An Invincible Immortal
description: In this era, people are always reincarnation, but I Lin Fei, depends on being immortal. I have lived for hundreds of million years, just to find my beloved ones that I lost for a million years!!

title: Seeing The Spark Again
description: Through an old camera in the club's storage room, Gu An saw something that should not exist. She was a shooting star from three years ago named "Xinghuo." Why do you stay in the night sky? Why am I the only one who can see you? Gu An, who usually follows the crowd, wants to investigate and take the initiative for the first time in her life. As an observer and "the most important friend," Gu An and Xinghuo set on a journey to find the former club members and fulfill their dreams from three years ago. "It's... been exposed." "But, I'm really happy. Thank you, Gu An."

title: Arknights: A1 Operations Preparation Detachment
description: Rookie members of the Columbia garrison, Fang, Beagle and Kroos have been posted to the commercial city of Tkaronto’s Infected district for their internship. Although it’s crowded and has quite a complex situation, the three of them resolve to do their duty to the fullest, quickly integrating with the local Infected. Soon, their six-month internship will be over, and the three of them will become full members of the garrison, but meanwhile a Catastrophe silently descends on Tkaronto…

title: The Smiling, Proud Wanderer
description:
The Restarted Series of Previous One ….  
  
The story is about friendship and love, deception and betrayal, ambition and lust for power. In the middle of it all is, Ling Hu Chong, an orphan who is the senior student of Yue Buqun, leader of Mount Hua Sect, and the protagonist of the story. The story deals with his journey and development as a swordsman and his witness to the various intrigues which take place in the martial world of the story.

title: Scents of Seasons
description:
A collection of omegaverse BL stories

Xiaomi, an omega, has been in love with the popular Jiang Xi, an alpha, since middle school... Even though they both changed over the years as they graduated and started living different lives, Xiaomi's feelings have not changed. It is painful to experience an unrequited love for 10 years, is it not? But what will happen when Xiaomi brings an intoxicated Jiang Xi home to his bed after their university's graduation party, knowing that Jiang Xi will soon be going abroad?

title: A Pair of Otakus
description: As a result of getting addicted to an MMORPG during exam times, high school 2nd year Xiao Nan is moved back to the normal courses. On the first day of school he goes to his new class, unexpectedly meeting his childhood friend, Su Luo, who he hasn't talked to for 10 years. What will happen between these 2 boys united by a common interest?

title: Success Rate
alt_titles: I can see the success rate
description: Bai Wu, who is frustrated with his life in the real world, suddenly gains the ability to see the success rate of events. Use the success rate to reach the pinnacle of life!

title: It Starts With The Confession To The Beauty Master
alt_titles: It All Starts With The Heavenly Fate System
description: If he fails to confess his love to his beautiful master, he’ll turn into a dog? Zhang Yi obtained the Destiny System and awakened the Supreme Holy Body. As long as he’s able win the heart of the beauties in his harem, he’ll be able to get stronger! A cold master, a charming female Taoist senior, a cute junior sister, a sickly princess, and a pure saint… In the face of thousands of beauties, Zhang Yi has no interest in love: Let me go! This is not the destiny system, it’s clearly a system that will cost my life!

title: Fairy World Mall System
description: The younger sister of the brick mover (labourer) Wang Jian was seriously ill and he was very desperate to save her. But he accidentally obtained the magical fairy world software. Not only did he cured her sister, but also added multiple skills to capture the hearts of the female president and the younger sister, and headed towards the pinnacle of life! However, with the passage of time, Wang Jian discovered that his identity is more than just an ordinary person…

title: Love Is Never Enough
alt_titles: Qíng Shēn Bù Dǐ Chénnián Hèn
Qing Shen Bu Di Chennian Hen
description:
After three years of marriage, I found my husband is a two timer and did not want to hide his betrayal any more. I tried my best to please him and save the marriage but all I have done is far less important to the other woman - his first love in his eyes. Finally, I abandoned myself and chose another path of attack. At this time, the man I met was like a landscape that opens the door to my new world. He said to me, "There are so many a**holes in the world. If I hold your hand tight, you won't be afraid."

*Chapter count for the original version is 102 chapters, but 94 on INKR/Webcomics and 83 on Tapas*
  
**Alternate Raw:** [AC.QQ](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/629232), [BiliBili](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc25556)
**Official English Translations:** [Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/loveinloating/info), [Webcomics](http://www.webcomicsapp.com/reader.html?mangaId=5b0fcb095bf9ca46113fce95)

title: The Marshal Is Jealous Every Day
description:
An arrogant and stubborn lady is dead, a revived 21st-century medical genius into her body. Medicine is excellent, the heart is pure. Facing her parents-in-law is unfriendly, her husband is not in love, and has a jealous look of concubines. Based only on a small scalpel, she won the concubine, defeated the tricky trick, and she always won. Marshal, her husband inherently despised her, but now, her husband climbed the window, crawled into her bed every night, and he wanted to be a happy couple forever.  


---

[Original Novel](https://www.lewen.la/xs/45/45683/)  
[Other Official Raw](https://www.onemanhua.com/12515/)

title: The Gale Kisses the Moonlight
description:
One is a dazzling star who dreams of shining in the world of showbiz. Another is a new designer who has the reputation of being “delicate as a flower” due to her simple beauty.

She sees your thirst for success and yearning for authenticity behind your angelic facade. She approaches, like a gale that kisses a rose, and moves away, like a moonbeam. They get involved, they let go, they take the seduction game to the limit. She becomes the rose that blooms in her blood, and reaches the height of glory with her.

Tang Wanting: “I will pluck the moon for you with my hands.”
Shang Yi: “You are my moon.”

title: Flaming Hot Desire
description: After a night of drinking, Luo Yao Yao is sexually assaulted by the boss of the Imperial Dragon gang, Yu Ao Tian. They are interrupted by gang member and she is able to escape. Two years later, she's the elevator lady at China's number one business. Unknown to her is that the business was previously acquired by Yu Ao Tian.

title: Rebirth of the Water Margin World: The Strongest Wu Dalang
description:
Modern youth Wu Zhi travels to the world of Water Margin and swaps bodies with Wu Dalang, outwits Ximen Qing,
and uses his precognitive abilities to win over the heroes.

title: Spare Me, My Beauty Master
alt_titles: Bei Meinü Shifu Tiaojiao Cheng Sheng de 99 Zhong Fangfa
99 Ways to Become Heroes by Beauty Masters
description: I, Lu Chen, am the only son of the King Lu. I thought I could live a life of nourishment at night since I was born. Unfortunately, my talent was too high, which was hard to find in the past. Five beautiful masters fell from the sky to force me to practice, each with extraordinary strength, the master of a domain, the master of a holy land, the empress of a thousand ages, the supreme empress of the world of pills, the emperor of alchemy, plus a sticky little sister…The road to holy cultivation is too much for a man to bear!

title: My Chubby Princess
description:
She was a top-tier miracle doctor, as well as a special agent in the 21st century. But, she transmigrated to become the Third Lady of Dingguo Mansion, an infamous fat and ugly trash? The moment she opened her cold eyes, thousands of beasts submitted to her. She trampled all over the wicked women and scumbags who came after her and became a top summoner! Nothing could stop her from doing what she wanted! With thoughts of losing weight and beating up scumbags in her mind, she never imagined she would catch the attention of a two-faced prince regent. 

“My consort is as beautiful as an angel. Make sure you keep a close eye on her for me. Kill all those who try to hit on her without any mercy!” 

“Help! Can I apply for a refund for this stunning yet blind and clingy husband?!”

title: You Are My Only Love
description: To the people who know Sheng Yu, he is very lazy and unpassionate. There’s not a time when he's serious about anything he does. He slacks off during his photoshoot, gets bored during his interview, and is even more indifferent when it comes to filming his movie. Everyone thought that he was probably out of his mind. But then, everyone noticed he wasn’t half-assed and was actually serious for once. It was when he was kissing Ji Qing Wan that night.

title: Legend of Exorcism
description:
Tianbao Period. 
Kong Hongjun, a young man who was ignorant of worldly affairs, came to Chang’an with three important tasks and entered the Great Tang’s Exorcist Department. Inside the department, he led a ragtag group of yao-vanquishing experts together with Li Jinglong, commander of the Longwu Army. 
And this, is the story of how they wrote out the Great Tang’s Yao-vanquishing Records.

title: Life and Death - The Song of The Night
description: Human beings have always thought that they are the only intelligent lifeforms around, but they couldn't be more wrong. There are many things that happen in the history of humans that cannot be explained by science nor history within the human world. Feral humans are appearing, they look human but they are a threat to the human species, they have been named " Sha". Normal human beings are totally unable to deal with these Sha, so before Sha are found out by the public, a group of mysterious individuals formed an enforcement department - Song of the Black Night.

title: Indestructible Primordial Spirit
description:
Is reincarnation a coincidence or a necessity? Lu Qi has been reborn into his world where martial arts reign. With his highest level of comprehension, he obtains the most valuable treasures, searches for the heavenly dao, taks in female slaves, wipes out devils! Let's step into this world where the primordial spirit is indestructible and the Heavenly Dao is eternal!  


---

title: Lord of Catastrophe
description: Known in his high school as "Calamity", the "Lord of Catastrophe" Lin Xiongchen is a high school kid who's been bogged down by bad luck for most of his life. Because he is known to "attract bad luck to those who get close to him", he is ostracised by his classmates, which leads to him mastering the incredible ability of reflection which helps him evade all forms of danger. In a situation both thanks to fate and sheer coincidence, Lin Xiongchen finds himself possessed by a Demonic Lute one day. However, the curse of bad luck is simply too overwhelming, even for the demon. In order to survive, the Demonic Lute has no choice but to teach Xiongchen ways to turn the the wheel of fate around to his benefit.

title: Your Highness, Please Don't Be a Demon
description:
Met by chance in the mortal world, the charming and prideful young master of the flower house and a two-faced prince.   
  
These two have many fights arguments, and kill each other along the way. However, the prideful young master overturns again and again in the presence of the young prince. In the process of repeatedly reviving and overturning, the hearts of these two are slowly coming closer together…

title: Blue Wings
description: Ming Lan was adopted into a new family, but her foster mother Nan Xi treated her as a replacement for her dead daughter. However, her two new brothers, Ming Qing and Ming Jing did not welcome her. Ming Lan’s quiet life under this new roof was disturbed by pranks and false smiles….

title: Please Call Me Red Panda
description:
Red panda housekeeping! "Hello, sir! Is this the service you ordered?" What's this? It's way too cute!!  
  
[Motion comic](https://www.bilibili.com/bangumi/play/ss26507)

title: Super Shared Boyfriend System
description: Lin Yi, an omega man who has been friendzoned for hundreds of times. He accidentally has access to a boyfriend sharing system where people can transfer customers’ requirements into their own skills if they accept the orders. For instance, masculinity equals to charming eyes, top fighter means an all-rounded command of wrestling, and a transvestite refers to a drag queen. But wait a second, why the customer would like their boyfriend to be a transvestite? Don't run away and explain yourself to me, boyfriend sharing system!

title: The Daughter of Duke Doesn't Want to Be Spoiled
alt_titles: The Princess Doesn't Want to Be Spoiled
The Ducal Lady Refuses to Be Pampered
description: The only daughter in the dukedom was pampered her whole life and grew up spoiled to the point where she thinks talking is a pain. However, when her family was dragged into political turmoil, she was sent far away to the border with a mercenary group. There was no high-quality food or doting servants there to look after her. Facing a completely unfamiliar environment and a cold-hearted mercenary captain, how can the young lady survive?

title: Rise of the Strongest Master
alt_titles: Rise Of The Strongest Harem King
description: “Can’t I pursue you if I like you?” Casting the net is my skill, and you’d be honored to enter that net. Catching the women of the world, I’m the king of the sea.

title: The Unfeeling Me
description: As a zombie with memory loss, school life is still a must! While fighting with his instinctive hunger for humans, he also falls in love with his destined lover. Only, it seems like not only does the lover know how he became a zombie, but he was also a schemer behind the scenes. In a SM danmei, the truth of the zombie gradually emerges.

title: My Sexy Legion in the Apocalypse
alt_titles: My End of the World Legion of Women
My Harem in the Day of Apocalypse
description: I smoke cigarettes, drink alcohol, and get perms for my hair, but I'm a good person! My sexual interest is rescuing all the homless beauties. The end of the world is hell for you, but it is heaven for me!

title: The Cursed Sculpture
description: Resentment from another's unwillingness? Or is it my own? After an incident, Ye Limei, a student of sculpture, finds herself stalked by a resentful spirit in one of the sculptures in the boarding school. Supernatural and unstoppable events start occurring one after another… After Ye Limei discovers the secret behind the sculpture, she instead uses the power to her own advantage – killing those she had long held a grudge against. With each bout of satisfaction, her mind slowly gets consumed by the spirit of enmity.

title: Kill My Love
alt_titles: Ai Yu Sha Yi Zhi Ye
Night of Love and Murderous Intent
description: A decade ago, he was a beta at the pinnacle of his assassin career. But one day, while trying to save an Alpha child, he suffered severe injuries leading him to lose the sharpness and insight an assassin needs. Left with no choice, he retired and moved into a remote small town to start a new life under a new identity. Everything was going well until an unexpected visitor showed up at his house. The child he had saved years ago has now grown into the leader of an organization, and he’s coming after the beta with a powerful intent—

title: Absurdity
description:
Really, I just wanted to take a peek around the human world, and maybe also ‘find my soulmate’ along the way. So why are things so difficult QAQ…

*(The main couple consists of two very cute girls.)*

title: Esteemed Female Masters All Want to Possess Me
description: Xiao Nan died tragically and then isekai-ed to the 21st Continent. Although reborn as useless trash, he awakened the reverse system, and his strength would increase as long as he was hurt. What he didn’t know was that he had a hidden identity-as the chosen son of heaven who was prophesized to revitalize the Sword sect. The elders of all factions in the sect therefore hid their identities and approached Xiao Nan to try to recruit him into their own ranks. Since then, Xiao Nan began to enjoy being nurtured by beautiful female masters, whilst discovering features of the system to become stronger + start a harem

title: Global Killing: Awakening SSS-Level Talent at the Beginning!
alt_titles: Quanqiu Shalu: Kaiju Juexing SSS Ji Tianfu!
Global Mayhem: Awakening SSS-Class Talent at the Start!
Quánqiú Shālù: Kāijú Juéxǐng SSS Jí Tiānfù!
description: Violent start, SSS level talent awakening! Tens of billions of people from all over the world, at the same time, descended on the heavens to kill the world. Hundreds of countries such as the Lighthouse Kingdom, the Dragon Kingdom, and the Sakurajima Kingdom are competing! Di Si Qin Feng woke up the SSS level talent at the beginning - Endless Extraction! He can extract everything! Including extracting demons! Turn on Infinite Kill Mode!

title: Wo Zhen Mei Xiang Chongsheng A
alt_titles: Wǒ Zhēn Méi Xiǎng Chóngshēng A
I Really Don’t Want to Be Reborn
I Really Don't Want to Remake
description:
Little had I known, I Chen Hansheng; the former elite of society and a Diamond Bachelor, was reborn. When I woke up, I was a senior graduate in high school? 
Later, Chen Hansheng was walking near the crosswalk, he seemed hesitant. A precious girl; Shen Youchu and two other girls; Bai Yueguang and Xiao Rongyu, who will he pick? All of them? One of them? Two of them? Read to find out. 

Side Note:  Diamond Bachelor is a slang word that means someone who’s insanely rich and single.

title: After Listening to What Inside My Mind the Female Leads Want to Flung Into My Harem
alt_titles: Fanpai: Bei Tou Ting Xinsheng Hou, Nv Zhu Xiang Dang Wo Hougong!?
The Villain: After Eavesdropping on My Thoughts, the Heroine Wants to Be in My Harem!?
description:
Traveling to the world of novels, Tang Yu gets the villain role system. As long as the mission is successfully completed, he can get rich rewards and return to the real world.

In this regard, Tang Yu can only accept it.
But in the face of the extremely mindless heroine and plot setting, he couldn't help but complain, but he didn't expect the heroines to hear his heart.

Bai Yixue gritted her teeth: "This bastard, he actually said that I am a cold ice mountain that no one wants, hehe, I must freeze him to death today!"

Lin Qingying squeezed her fists: "This damn bastard actually said that I'm big-booded, brainless, and violent? So I won't be gentle!!"

"....."

Seeing the heroine whose personality gradually collapsed, Li Qingze became numb.

"Hey! I'm the villain, it's fine if you don't follow the plot, and what do you mean with throwing yourself at me!"

title: Shen Ze
description: From an early age, Xu Shenze would often get caught up in the same strange dream. Over time, the dark shadow that the dream cast over his life grew, until, one day, the shadow became real, and suddenly Xu Shenze's life as he knew it was completely torn to shreds. His parents suddenly meet a gruesome end, and all sorts of other strange and disturbing events kept on happening to him. Alone and afraid, when he hears about a supposed "dream town", he decides to go there to look for answers. In the town that is called both the "Holy Land" and "Purgatory" by its residents, what sort of terrible truths are waiting for Xu Shenze?

title: Wan Mu
description: A girl who was adopted by two mothers met her soulmate- another girl, when she was 16 years old. After dating for ten years, the 'soulmate' decided to marry a man at the age of 28 because she did not want to live an "abnormal life". Only after leaving her to marry a man, did she finally understand the true meaning of love during those countless days and nights. However, can they still go back to the way things were?

title: Life of a Lily
description: An unexpected reunion of a proper girl and a delinquent girl. A love story was developed between the two.

title: Hold My Master
description: Being reborn after a cruel death, Bai Ye seeks revenge, and incidentally becomes the master of the Nuwa stone. Bai Ye does everything he can to receive the trust of his apprentice…

title: Ni Yu: God Is a Girl
description: Since ancient times whoever inherits the divine power would inherit the world. But who would have thought that one day the Divinity Clan would be wiped out and the divine powers passed on to a girl? Thus, a female emperor ascended the throne to rule and protect the world. Surrounded by people who always spoke flattering words, yet harbored ill intent, and constantly faced with the skepticism the people who were supposed to be close to her - how can a woman stand such hardship? How will this female Emperor deal with this unjust and patriarchal society?

title: Mu You Zhi
description: Right after she awakens, a former wage slave becomes the villainess side character with a suspicious black reputation, a rebellious and neglectful younger brother, and a cruel and ruthless male lead! Hey! Even if the one you love is the beautiful heroine, you don't have to treat me like a tool?! Good thing I still have a handsome master who always consoles me from time to time… Back to the topic~ Observe how the wage slave protagonist crosses into another world and survives through the hurdles.

title: Doomsday Sword God
description:
If mercy and kindness can’t save the world, then this time, I choose to kill—

Eternal Slayer! Heavenly Lightning Slash! Sword of Annihilation! As long as you learn the most common sword skills, they can be upgraded to SSS rank?! Divine talent + forbidden skills! I’m the last spark of hope in this apocalypse!

title: What Should I Do With My Brother?
description: The top master in Cultivation world is a damn single and has been single for thousands years. Not mention of girlfriend, not even a sister. That is the reason why he saves his enemy's sister. Step 1: Save her and bring her up Step 2: Teach her cultivation skills to protect herself and insist to tell her bedtime stories to creat himself a great image Step 3: Send her jewels that most women like to dress her up That is what a perfect brother should do. Sister, "What the hell does this pervert who pulls me up every night to tell me ghost-like stories want to do?"

title: Protect My Star
description:
Lu Yan was an unknown trainee who acts cute in public but is headstrong and straightforward behind the scenes. One day, he caught the attention of a popular fandom influencer who drew fanart of him that made him popular overnight. But Lu Yan wasn't ready to accept the way he became popular…  
  
Indonesia:  
Lu Yan adalah seorang trainee yang tidak dikenal dan bertindak lucu di depan umum, tetapi keras kepala dan terus terang di belakang layar. Suatu hari ia di perhatikan oleh seseorang yang populer di dunia fandom. Dia membuat fanart dari dia dan dia menjadi populer dalam semalam. Tapi, dia tidak siap untuk menerima bagaimana dia menjadi populer.

title: Hidden Surface Town
alt_titles: Restraining order of ant 2: Hidden Surface Town
yi zu xianzhi ling II yin mian zhen
description:
The wheel of fate began moving due to a fated meeting in a small town, where everyone is free from restraining orders and lives in “peace”……  
  
Returning to her hometown from abroad, 19-year-old Wei Sheng Bai is living a normal rural life of a high school student. With her hearing problem now fixed, she is now able to appreciate her neighborhood atmosphere as it has now flourished into a lively hometown. One night, she watches the handsome stage performer Bu Luo Xu, playing the role of a beast with many eyes. Bai remembers a similar creature she befriended in the forest during her childhood, and coincidentally has the same name. Bai thinks they are all just trivial things. Or are they?

title: King of the Night Market
description: The World-class agent opened a shop in the night market?! Apart from common folks, my old enemies, friends and even their daughters drop by for a meal!? I, Li Cheung, welcome everyone, but if ya’ll gonna pull a scheme, then don’t blame me for being uncourteous.

title: The Supreme Urban Heavenly Master
description:
Summary: The common people only know of ‘Lu Ban‘s Book*,’ but they most certainly don’t know about ‘Gong Shu’s Book’ that they are one and the same/that they can be traced to the same origin. The greatest heavenly master steps foot into the mortal world. He embraces a beautiful woman in his arms and mind, what’s more stirs up some trouble in a big city thousands of miles away. Adapted from the novel, ‘The Millenial Heavenly Master,’ with new chapters released every Wednesday and Saturday.   
  
*T/N: Lu Ban and Gong Shu are the same person, a Chinese structural engineer and inventor during the Spring and Autumn period of the Zhou Dynasty. Lu Ban’s original name was Gongshu Ban.   
  
<https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lu_Ban>

title: World of Immortals
description:
The World of Immortals, it is the world every mortals long for. For many, it is an eternal glory to cause a spatial distortion and enter the World of Immortals. But the vicissitude of time is simply merciless, the legends regarding immortality had long been forgotten.  
  
However, a miracle shall rise once more! An immortal was about to split the space with martial arts and cut all ties with the mortal world. The protagonist, Xiao Chen, was caught up in it and accidentally brought to the World of Immortals. What will they find in the vast world beyond the rift?

title: The Prince's First Love
description: The flawless Prince Nazaire changes schools in hopes of wooing a bride… only to encounter the tyrant Cassius Li! At first, the two cannot stand one another, as they constantly infuriate each other. Yet between ball dances, rescues, and secret rendezvous, Nazaire and Cassius begin seeing each other for who they truly are. But love between a prince and a commoner could never happen, and if Nazaire hopes to ascend the throne, he will have to give up Cassius. Torn between love and duty, can the prince and tyrant reach their happily ever after?

title: Yuri Box
description:
Dreams that didn't become reality, memories you want to become dreams, and realities that no longer mean anything to the one involved…  
Be it dreams, memories, or stories…this shop is a place that collects, stores, and sells them.

title: Wéixiǎn Xīntiào
description: "If you don't want your fake identity exposed to the world, then complete my seven little demands, Qi ChaoYue." [Dominant Sadistic Queen True Heiress X Submissive Masochistic Tsundere Fake Heiress] Despite how much she hates these outrageous demands, her body seems to be falling deeper into this world...

title: Honkai Impact 3rd - 2nd Herrscher
description:
Alternate fan translation of volume 0.2 of [Honkai Impact 3rd](https://mangadex.org/title/b82bc828-0f22-43d9-835d-d5ff1cb0d680/honkai-impact-3rd).  
  
"On February 1st, 2000. The entire man research staff of Shicksals Babylon facility in Siberia disappeared overnight. While Theresa investigates this mystery under orders from Otto, Walter and Einstein make preparation for *her* appearence. The stage is set for the second Honkai Impact."  
  
Timeline : Set 14 years before the start of the game.   
  
Arc is completed in CN and by official MiHoYo manga team - HOMU Comics.  


---

Main Story :   
[# Book 1001 = Escape From The Sky](https://mangadex.cc/manga/22297/honkai-impact-3#)   
[# Book 1002 = Cherry Blossom Recall](https://mangadex.cc/manga/22297/honkai-impact-3#)   
[# Book 1003 = Mystery of Stigmata](https://mangadex.cc/manga/26804/honkai-impact-3rd-mystery-of-stigmata)   
[# Book 1006 = Anti-Enthrophy Invasion](https://mangadex.cc/manga/22297/honkai-impact-3)  
[# Book 1007 = Gratitude Arc](https://mangadex.cc/manga/22297/honkai-impact-3)   
[# Book 1008 = Moon Shadow](https://mangadex.cc/manga/22297/honkai-impact-3)    


---

Side Story :  
[# Book 1004 = Violet Sea Tales](https://mangadex.cc/manga/22297/honkai-impact-3)   
[# Book 1005 = Dark Sakura Tales | Guns Girl SchoolDayZ EX - Sakura Arc](https://mangadex.cc/manga/15560/guns-girl-schooldayz-ex)   
[# Book 1009 = Purple Kite's Tales](https://mangadex.cc/manga/22297/honkai-impact-3)   
[# Book 1010 = Secret of the God Keys](https://mangadex.cc/title/31991/honkai-impact-3rd-secret-of-the-god-keys)

---

Spin-off :  
[# Book 1011 = When Kiana Play Honkai Impact](https://mangadex.cc/manga/22297/honkai-impact-3)  
[# Book 1013 = Valkyries' Dining Escapades](https://mangadex.cc/manga/26179/honkai-impact-3-valkyries-dining-escapades)  
[# Book 1014 = Summer Memories](https://mangadex.cc/title/30931/honkai-impact-3rd-summer-memories)

title: Classmate Relationship?
description: By chance, Fang Tang came across Ah Shu, someone he noticed long ago. The two became classmates and intimate friends. A refreshing and pure love school life manhua.

title: Rather Than Being an Award Winning Actress, It's Better to Study at Qing Hua
alt_titles: Dang Ying Hou Buru Nian Qinghua
17 Again: Smart is the New Sexy
description:
Award-winning darkhorse Dong Fang Fei Fei, also known as the beauty who specially attracts scumbags was sent back to the high school when she was 17-year-old after being reincarnated. In order to avoid the fate of being killed again, she must gain admission to Qing Hua University.
Dong Fang Fei Fei roared: "You want an illiterate like me to get into Qing Hua University?!"

title: Strongest Cultivation App
description: A sound of a strike of lightning! The apps in the phone start to change? If you have any money you can but as many sacred talisman, and there’s nothing you can’t do! The ordinary Han Wu used the world’s buying system into the cultivation path in the city! Change your whole life!

title: Cate Land
description:
How can you become a chef without a sense of taste? No problem! With a cheating knife in hand, the world is yours! Cate lottery system that comes with its own beautiful teacher and spirit planting space! “Coach, I want to become a chef!” From then on, Fu Yan Ze earnestly began walking on the path to becoming a Culinary God (Harem God)!  
  
Russian:||  
Хочешь быть поваром, но заставляют жениться? Убегай? Куда? В другой мир! Там ты найдёшь себя! Эта история про талантливого шеф-повара, который нашёл себя в другом мире!||

title: Perfect World
description:
A speck of dust can fill an ocean. A blade of grass can destroy the sun, moon, and the stars. A flick of a finger can turn the world upside down.  
  
Groups of heroes rise, and innumerable clans stand together. Various saints fight for power as the entire world falls into chaos. I ask the boundless Mother Earth: Who decides the ups and downs?  
  
A young man walks out of the barren wilderness, and everything starts from there…

title: Oh No! I've Swapped Bodies With an Anti-Fan
description: I’m the leader of the popular boy band TREE. But I’ve somehow swapped bodies with a random girl? Turns out, she’s a big fan of my groupmate Ji Shan, but she’s also my anti-fan?! She ends up using my body to enter TREE’s apartment, sleep in my bed and chase after her idol. She’s seriously trying to dig my grave… Ugh, I have no choice but to think of a way to get my body back!

title: Weile Fuhuo Anlian De Shi Zun Wo Bei Po Kaile Hougong
alt_titles: Wèile Fùhuó Ànliàn De Shī Zūn Wǒ Bèi Pò Kāile Hòugōng
I Was Forced to Open a Harem to Resurrect the Master I Had a Crush on
description: Pursuing your master in seven different worlds to revive her in the original world! Every world with different identities and personalities, follow Hua Yingying on her journey to make all the seven different versions of her master, Bai Hansu, fall for her while also slipping through the schemes of her old master from the demon sect!

title: Long Night Come
description:
Suivez l'histoire de Violet la voleuse et de Eric Randolph la policière.  
  
[Author's Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/11105958/)  
[Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/DeerWhisky)

title: Modern MoGal - Big Game!
description:
A short story featuring Robots and Big Monsters that takes place in the "Modern MoGal" Universe.  
  
Original comic by [Shepherd0821](https://mangadex.org/group/6025/shepherd0821), uploaded to MangaDex with permission.

title: The King and Me
alt_titles: Till We Meet Again, My King
description:
Zhang Li sees his beloved "stone statue" vanish before his eyes. Stricken with grief and remorse, he travels back in time and arrives in Elbis, a mythical ancient civilization that mysteriously perished.  At last, he encounters the "stone statue" again, only to find that he wasn't the old crybaby that clung to him every day, but a cold, ruthless "tyrant" instead. Will he be able to stay with him this time…?

Official Translations:
[Korean](https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/my_majesty)

title: Idol Manager In Another World
description:
Top-tier idol manager Le Qiu accidentally traveled to another world. To return to her reality as soon as possible and help the farm girl, Ella, save her village, fate led Le Qiu to bring six beautiful girls of different races and personalities together into a girl group.   
  
While she spreads the idol culture, she is also… saving the world.

title: The King Wants Me Dead
alt_titles: The King Wants Me to Die
description:
Pei’s mother, a goddess of the royal empire, was sentenced to death by the King for the cause of natural disasters. While she survived, she felt the cold injustices of the King and was left to be exploited. Now she must find out the truth behind her mother’s unjust death in order to change the attitude of others.   
  
While treated with indifference by the crown prince, Pei will work hard to reveal the empire’s secrets!

title: Reborn as the Heavenly Martial Demon
alt_titles: After I Die, I Transform Into a Martial Arts Demon
I, In My Posthumous Form, Transform Into The Martial Dao Demon
Reborn as the Heavenly Martial Demon
Wǒ Sǐ Hòu, Huàshēn Wǔdào Tiānmó
description:
Humanity lost the war. Businessmen who sold out their fellow compatriots, hunters who turned to the monsters, stepping on countless human corpses, all in order to earn profit. The otherworldly monsters that entered our world seized it bit by bit like a raging fire. That was until Zuo Chi arrived. 
"Back then you all were gladly invading our world, so why are you weeping now?"

title: The Djinn
description: The tales speak of a powerful Djinn, sealed within a magical lamp. Whoever finds it, shall become the master of the Djinn. The Djinn will grant them three wishes, once the last wish is fulfilled, the Djinn will attain freedom.

title: Angel Love
description:
God has run away? The world is in chaos? Michael goes to the human world to look for an old friend, and save the world together, but the reincarnated Lucifer can no longer remember him……  
  
And the reason turned out to be because Michael himself sealed his memories and powers away! To awaken him now……he must #%￥#……forget it, even if he has to cry and grovel, he will bury the pit that he dug himself!

title: This Song Is Only for You
description:
Beneath all the limelight and glory, how many hidden truths are unknown to many? When the laid back yet dominant rockstar meets a gentle but cold surgeon, will sparks fly?   
  
A story about abandoning their facades, restoring the truth, and becoming each other’s saving grace.   
  
“Will you hold on to me even if darkness befalls upon us?”   
  
They never loved someone as deeply as each other. She was willing to descend into hell with him, while he was willing to put down his bloodied knife for her.

title: Banshee Bashing
alt_titles: Zhuansheng Chengwei Lingyi Shijie De Weiwu Zhe, Ye Zhi Dui Nv Gui Zhong Quan Chuji!
Grandpa and Female Ghost Face to Face
description: What should I do if I encounter a banshee? Normal people: “Run away.” Onmyoji: “Exorcise spirits.” Monk: “Duhua.” Bman reader: “Chase her!” Huo Xie (male lead): “I punched the banshee straight in the face and grabbed her.” Then I’ll make her admit that there are no ghosts in this world by holding her hair and throwing her ashes away!

title: A Princess's Guide to Saving Dragons
description:
At dawn, the female lead suddenly died at the subway station due to overwork.

“If there is such a thing as reincarnation, please let me be born with a gold spoon. I want to have supreme authority, and also immeasurable wealth that can’t be squandered off~"

These final words which were meant as a half-hearted joke somehow came true?! The female lead’s soul entered into a game and became a true princess, is this the legendary "blessing from good karma"???

title: Secret Love (Pre-Serialization)
description:
***Note; these are from the original release of this title on Weibo, with a different numbering system. Chapters 1-36 here equate to 1-16 in the serialized version, linked below.***“I’ve recently come to like someone. He’s my classmate.”  
The short and sweet snapshots of a blossoming romance between two unsuspecting students! Packed with fluffy interactions between adorable (not to mention handsome!) characters, this series is sure to satisfy your sweet tooth~   
||The crossovers between a boy and a girl attracted to each other in short moments. Fall in love slowly…||

title: Global Beast Tamer꞉ I Can See the Path of Evolution
description: After traveling through time, I got the weakest little snowball as my pet, which couldn’t even evolve? Do I really have to be a waste for the rest of my life? Ding! The System lights up! What! I actually saw the hidden evolution route! Who said it was the weakest! Evolve! Ice Queen!

title: My Disciples Are Super Gods
description: Ye Yang, the game tester of the game company, crossed with the account of “full profession and maxed skill-set”! The life of a patriarch of man level sword master + immortal cultivator + magician starts. The headache is that a group of beautiful disciples advise him to improve every day

title: The Calamity of the End Times
alt_titles: Mori Zaibian, Chongsheng De Wo Rang Quanjia Bian Chengle Da Lao!
Doomsday Catastrophe, Reborn Me Turned the Whole Family into Bosses!
The Catastrophe of the Apocalypse, I Made My Whole Family Into Bigshot
description:
Rebirth? The end is coming! None of the family members survived in the previous life, this time it must not happen again!

Zhou Zhuo leads the whole family to fight the zombies, take in the survivors, expand the Zhou family mansion, build a self-sufficient system, and strengthen the Zhou family! Fight the zombies and help the survivors develop their skills! The Calamity of the End Times, and Rebirth turned my whole family into fanatics!

The catastrophe of the doomsday, the rebirth of me turned the whole family into a boss!

Doomsday calamity, reborn I made the whole family into big brother!

title: Capital’s Most Crazy Doctor
description: A story about a guy named Chun Xing Le whose an inheritor of the Chen medic family. Because he is the the youngest of the twins, he has to take the blame of his twin brother who could not save his patient. In these three years , he had to resist all the names and negative comments that were pointed at him. Now that the three years are over, he can finally appeal for justice form his family and show off in front of his fiancée.

title: Universal X System
description:
Zhao XiaFei had an accident, because he was hit by a car and died instantly but instead of dying he got an AI system. And he ended up living again.  
  
||Zhao XiaFei mengalami kecelakaan karena ditabrak Mobil Dan mati seketika, tetapi bukannya mati, dia malah mendapatkan sebuah sistem AI Dan dia akhirnya hidup lagi tamat….||

title: Try Me Again If You Dare!
alt_titles: Ni Zai Dong Wo Yixia Shishi
Try Breaking My Defense, I Dare You!
description: Special Ops 500 accidentally teleported to a RPG world, he has to defeat all 8 demon kings to break the curse of the goddess and go back home. Unfortunately, the main character got a bug with his system and only has 1 damage and 99999 defense, he does everything he can to get rid of his curse and does everything to go back home and decides to break through every obstacle he comes across.

title: Evolution from Carp to Divine Dragon
description: Photographer Lin Hao was attacked and killed by monster while on a shooting mission in Lin tian Ancient City. After being reborn, he found that he had become a koi carp

title: Bringing the Nation's Husband Home
alt_titles: Guómín lǎogōng dài huí jiā: Tōu wěn 55 cì
Taking the Perfect Husband Home: With 55 Stolen Kisses
description:
Qiao Anhao and Lu Jinnian marry by the will of their parents. However, Jinnian was no longer the kind boy Anhao once knew. An thus, on the night of their undesired wedding, Anhao made three rules:   
1. Don't touch me in public.   
2. Don't tell anyone that I'm your wife.   
3. Don't let anyone find out that we live together.

title: Flirt With A Prince
description: The Yiqi who sees the other person’s memories when they lock lips, falls in love with a time traveling prince. In order to retrieve his memories, the prince kisses her without hesitation. And the person in his memories looks exactly like Yiqi… Hurry and read this kissing-from-beginning-to-end manhua, an excellent time-travel story full of embarrassing and slightly masochistic scenes.

title: In the Dark
description:
“Who am I?" Death is just a new beginning. When Xie Lanshan returned to the police force after his undercover mission, another memory in his body gradually woke up and swam along the tip of a knife. What kind of sparks will happen when the elegant yuppie front-line criminal police meets the cold and mysterious analog portrait expert? Meeting each other is no accident, and it takes you step by step into the dark.  
  


---

title: Mr. Snail
description:
As September comes, a new semester has begun at Shan Ming High School. The school doctor, Song Yue, has also welcomed a new roommate - canteen chef, Xu Xiaodao. Mr. Song thinks Xu is like the "Snail Girl". Ever since he starting living here, the dorm has been super clean. Not only does he clean, he also cooks all the meals and does all the laundry! This is truly suspicious! Things get even weirder when Mr. Song realizes Xu Xiaodao knows a little bit too much about him and is a little bit too clingy. Furthermore, Xu Xiaodao cares for him way too much?? Things are not as simple as they seem…  
  
Artist's weibo: [@一根腿毛\_mudage](https://weibo.com/u/7317135023)

title: My Pet Lost Her Memories
description: The palace chief of the zodiac is looking for his lost pet fox, but due to him being playful, he wanders into the human world. Unexpectedly, after 100 years, his lost pet suddenly appears in front of him, but that's not all–his lost pet fell into a hundred-year slumber due to drinking an elixir resulting in amnesia?

title: Heaven Defying Sword
description: To defeat his uncle who destroyed his family, the teenager Xuan Tian embarked on a martial arts training journey to hone his sword techniques. From a teenager who knew nothing to a Sword God of his generation, those he once saw as strong are now mere specks of dust to him. With one finger, I obliterate all; With my sword, I defy the heavens! And his path, leads him directly to the limitless heavens!

title: Time Lover
description: Male lead Hei Tian Yi is a police officer, who died in the line of duty in 2014. 2 years later, his fiancee Yuan Xiao Jia, not wanting to stay in the city full of memories with him, decided to move, and when packing, found Tian Yi's old cell phone. On a dark night, this cell phone, with no SIM card in it, received a message…

title: Blackbird of Destiny
description: A girl whose beauty is like that of a goddess asks a guy to marry her. He says ask someone else, please don’t marry me.

title: Genius Cool Treasure: President's Wife Is Too Powerful
description: "Genius Cool Treasure: The President's Wife Is Too Powerful" is a web comic serialized by a Japanese writer. The comic tells that five years ago, in a tent with black lights, the woman drove him drunk, and gave birth to twins and lost one. Five years later, the woman filmed him secretly, healed his hidden illness, stole his heart, and took a small bun to abduct his other son to play missing. Feng Yizhen swears that she must catch the woman's fierce affection and let her know that she has to pay the price.

title: Cover the Sky
description: A story that takes place in a great continent grounded on the skeletal bones of a phoenix that is inhabited by many nations and people. Suddenly in the region to the West, seven volcanoes that have been inactive for centuries begin to erupt and its fire burns a blanket of red that is large enough to covers the sky, blazing across heaven and earth.

title: Ibuki Satsuki's Comic Collection
alt_titles: Yi Chui Wu Yue Tiao Man Ji
description:
A collection of comics depicting the everyday life of characters from the wuxia-themed MMORPG Jian Wang 3. Mainly SoL(slice of life) comic shenanigans set in the Tang Dynasty.  
  
Ep 1-42: Series of standalone episodes that don’t have continuity (aka one-shot/omake types)   
Ep 43 onwards: start of "story"

title: This Cinderella Is Not a Vegetarian!
alt_titles: 我灰姑娘可不是吃素的！
description:
What on earth must one do, in order to bag the most popular childe in the entire school?  
  
Should I act like a gentle beauty? Or should I be enthusiastic and bold?  
Should I pretend to be a Cinderella and play hard to get, or should I disguise myself as an aristocrat,and take the initiative?  
  
Nina said: "These are all not worth mentioning! Isn't it better to become the queen of the school? If he acts like a tsundere? Just give him a good beating!"  
  
But the childe said: "Miss, please just let me go! I just want to lie in a corner and become a corpse that nobody pays attention to!"  
  
Nina: "Hmph, acting so pampered and arrogant just because I like you? This Cinderella is not a vegetarian!"  
  
*Note: (Chinese Slang) Vegetarian = Easily bullied  
Not a Vegetarian = Not to be trifled with*

title: Magic Fairy
description: Introducing the defiance of natural order through force! For countless years, immortals have fallen into their doom. On the other hand, Young Master Leng Feng, a worthless person who committed suicide on Xuan Tian continent suddenly awoke as an Almighty God. From then on, an Almighty god has resurrected. All powers were reshuffled, and the glory Xuan Tian continent will rise again!

title: Dragon Soldier
description: A generation of soldier, betrayed by a traitor, resulting in the fall of their confidantes, return to the city in a rage, setting off a bloody storm. The hero saves the girl? Or are you playing the tiger? A leprechaun? A ladies' man? Female snakebite? Loli? With a beautiful woman in your arms, you'll be a king!

title: Dragon Dance
description: A dark world of swords and magic, a destiny entwining a young human and a dragon-born, and a mutual love and deathly hatred between friends and family…

title: Move Aside, I’ll Be the Magical Girl!
description: Only men can truly fall into femininity, so becoming feminine is the manliest act!” “Tch, don’t tell me you magical girls are all powered by Whale Hearts!” Mutated creatures? Kill! Cultists? Kill! Corrupted magical girls? Kill! Eldritch gods invading Earth? Kill! Redefining what it means to be a magical girl—I’ll f*cking kill, kill, kill! Mercy through overwhelming violence! Jiang Ci’s daily life after becoming a magical girl: wake up at 6:30 AM, train for an hour, wash up and eat at 7:30, go monster hunting at 8:00, cook and nap at noon, hunt more at 2:00 PM, eat dinner at 5:30, and hunt again at 7:00 PM. Enemy: “Can we win?” Jiang Ci: “Win my ass—you’re dead for sure.”

title: Eschaton Game
alt_titles: After the End of the World I Became a Zombie
description: A weakly ill boy, after knowing that he had cancer, faced a zombie outbreak. His normal life became hell, his family and crush were attacked by the zombies, but shockingly, after the boy was infected, a miraculous change occurred…

title: Sorry, My Skills Are Automatically Maxed Out!
alt_titles: My Skills Are Automatically Max Level!
I’m Sorry, My Skills Max Out by Themselves
My Skills Max Out by Themselves
Bàoqiàn, Wǒ de Jìnéng Zìdòng Mǎn Jí!
description:
Jiang Li, after being reborn on the Blue Star, has passed eighteen years. With his excellent learning ability, he is praised by everyone as a genius. However, this genius, during the Awakening Ceremony at the age of eighteen, only awakened as an ordinary mage, mocked by his enemies. However, only Jiang Li knows at this moment that he has awakened a divine-level talent, and all his skills are automatically at max level! With his auditing talent, Jiang Li levels up and clears stages all the way, establishing a guild and achieving unprecedented glory!

---

Eighteen years have passed since Jiang Li was reborn on Blue Star. With his excellent learning ability, he was hailed as a genius by everyone. And it was such a genius who only awakened into an ordinary mage during the awakening ceremony at the age of eighteen, and was ridiculed by his enemies. However, only Jiang Li knew at this time that he had awakened his god-level talent, and all his skills were automatically maxed out! Relying on his talent, Jiang Li advanced all the way through the ranks, established a trade union, and gained unprecedented glory!

title: 100,000 Levels of Body Refining : All the dogs I raise are the Emperor
alt_titles: 100,000 Layers Of Body Refining: All The Dogs I Raise Are Heavenly Emperors
One hundred thousand layers of body refining: all the dogs I raise are the emperor
description: Five thousand years ago, teenager who had countlessly longed for cultivation, but because of his special physique, was unable to break through the physical training period and enter the next realm of cultivation. He has been practicing from the ancient mythology era to modern day.

title: The Heart Will Break, but Broken Live on
alt_titles: Your feelings will never change so there's no point worrying about a future with you
Сердце будет разбито, но продолжит жить
description: How far would you go for love? Legend speaks of a sacred spring with the ability to bring the dead back to life. Princess Yun Qingran, the only master of the spring exhausted her cultivation and used her to blood to revive her childhood love but was unable to bring him back with memories of her. Origin and extinction, what will she choose in the end?

title: The Greatest Chaos in History
description: I’m way too unlucky, seriously. While others get to be time travellers, I can only watch as historical figures traverse to the present While others enjoy flirting with girls, I’m the one being played. My name is Xiao Qiang, but I go by Qiang. One day, I encountered an old man named Liu Laoliu, who claimed to be a deity, and somehow ended up making a deal with him. I run “The Nth Pawnshop,” where I now receive customers like Jing Ke, Li Bai, Xiang Yu, and Qin Hui. As the tale unfolds… This story is filled with a sense of humor, cultivation, time traversing, slice of life, romance, you name it. That’s the Greatest Chaos in History for you.

title: The Outcast
description:
The grave of Zhang Chunan's long-dead grandfather was desecrated by a group of mysterious people, but his grandfather's corpse wasn't the only thing they dug up. Secrets and mysteries surrounding the Zhang family began to surface, and Zhang Chunan is apparently more than just an ordinary college student desperate to be rid of his virginity.

One day, Zhang Chulan is attacked by zombies in a graveyard. In the midst of that situation, he saves the life of a girl, throwing the kitchen knife in his hand in order to kill the enemies. The girl tells Chulan, who is relieved, to face his hardships head on and leaves. However, Chulan later sees that girl again at his university. From that moment, Zhang Chulan's destiny begins to move. There will be strangers with special powers appearing one by one, with battles involving those abilities. Each episode will bring a new mystery to light.

First published under the title 异人 (Yi Ren, literally: "Weirdo") and with subtitle King of the Weirdo in February 2015. A collaboration Chinese/Japanese anime television series adaptation titled Hitori no Shita the outcast (一人之下 the outcast?) airied in 2016.

title: County Princess Will Not Marry Four Times
description:
Yuan Xiang Wei was the County Princess of Duan Ning in her past life, although she was forced to marry four times, but she still considers herself to be modest and upright.   
It just had to be that after her death, all four of her ex-husbands became influential figures. She considers it to be her running into bad luck.  
After rebirth she finally made up her mind, what is femininity or female virtues? She wants the center positition to abuse the scums, and to surpass everything below the heavens!  
But she didn't expect that all four of them were also reborn, and each of them all had one same wish ——in this life, she will only be mine!
- - -
**Alternative links:**
[Season 2 (AC.QQ)](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/ComicInfo/id/654835), [Korean](https://page.kakao.com/content/57342051), [Japanese](https://piccoma.com/web/product/108557)

title: Wangpai Yushi
description:
In a world where yin and yang has lost its balance and day merged with night, humans and monsters learn to coexist. Our hardworking censorates do their best to fight the ‘untamed’ monsters in this joyful story.

[Wikipedia](https://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E7%8E%8B%E7%89%8C%E5%BE%A1%E5%8F%B2)

title: Beyond the Sky
description: Han Qingyu lived peacefully for nineteen years, and never thought that one day he would become one of the main characters in an epic. An accident occurred out of the blue. The boy was forced wield a knife and began to face everything he knew nothing about: the invasion of civilization, the Azure Alliance, the mobile energy suit, the unique witness corps; the blade of exile, the sharp streams... He is narrow-minded, he is "The Qing Major" painted on cars and high-rise buildings in the era of full-scale military conscription; he will make the first cut in the Zenith War.

title: That Year, Under the Starry Sky
description:
