Following the fateful experience of birth and death with Ino, the both of them gradually learn the secrets of each other and the world…

title: My Covenant with the Monster Lord
alt_titles: Yāo Zūn Fēiyào Duì Wǒ Fùzé
Yao Zun Feiyao Dui Wo Fuze
Yāo Zūn Fēi Yào Duì Wǒ Fù Zé
The Demon Lord Wants to Take Responsibility of Me!
description:
Yu Yin transmigrated twice, once again he has returned to his original world of cultivation, but the moment he gets back he gets scammed by a demon lord he doesn't recognize? Not only was he scammed, he even bit him and forced him into an engagement?! Yu Yin was very shocked, but the demon lord won't let him go.

Bei Xiao: We already have a very close relationship, why don't you let me tease you?

Yu Yin: …You don't have to do that.

---
**Original Web Manhua:** [BiliBili Manhua](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc30102), [KuaiKan Manhua](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/5701/)

**Official English Translations:** [INKR](https://inkr.com/title/697), [Mangatoon](http://h5.mangatoon.mobi/contents/detail/858143), [Renta!](https://www.ebookrenta.com/renta/sc/frm/item/142352/), [WebComics](https://www.webcomicsapp.com/comic/60828c658c252b2c1b421fad)

title: Chan Zhi
description:
In order to prevent the villainous princess from bringing doom upon this world, Jiang Xu—who transmigrated into her imperial sister-in-law—does her very best to nurture Her Highness into a virtuous and well-behaved ruler, despite her own frail health. However, as time passes, the proud and alluring princess unexpectedly pins her down onto the bed.

"If you can accept my brother, why not me? Won’t you spare me a glance, Imperial Sister-in-law?"

Jiang Xu: …If you think I’ve lived too long and want to anger me to death, just say so!

title: Apocalyptic Thief
description: A storm of the universe brought species mutations. The poison, undead, giants and monsters in the city roared as they waved their weapons. As the beasts in the woods fought over territorial rights, humans, too, awakened an ability known as star power… Zhou Zheng, without star power, traversed to this apocalyptic world. Using the abilities of the thief character in the game, he destroys the darkness and fog, seeking supreme power!

title: Love Can't Be the Same
description: I finally met the childhood sweetheart whom I hadn't seen for many years and became his secretary, but he turned out to be a real arrogant president.

title: Ghost Emperor
description: The comic tells the story of an atheistic teenager Jiang Chengfeng who, by accident, acquired a magical power. With this power, he can easily resolve the most terrifying and fearful events in the world. This time, the mission is to rescue a missing boy, and the location is the horrifying Kun Kunyan! See how he passes through all the way! Fighting evil spirits! Don't pretend to be a ghost! Otherwise, they will all burst!

title: Finally Living Together With My Anti-Fan
description: Popular idol Juna is forced to leave the group due to a homosexual scandal. Half a year later, he enters campus as "Han JunRan", a university student. However, by a twist of fate, his roommate turns out to be his number one anti-fan!? Living together with his anti-fan will turn out to be a complicated experience…

title: Travelling Through the Universe's Flower
description: I'm a renowned genius in the History Department of my college, but I can't believe that I've travelled back in time into the body of a princess whose country was defeated in war! Was my being a genius in history all for nothing?! And not only am I stuck in the past, I'm having an arranged marriage with the Westerners as well! Moreover, I'm being married off to a country that runs of magic and has severe gender inequality issues. But don't you dare underestimate me! You're looking down on me, a princess of a defeated country? Well, I'll show you who's the real expert here!

title: I Became a First-Class Guide Thanks to My Childhood Friends
description: [The twin brothers love me too much. What should I do?] D-class guide Qiao Yang, because of a drunken accident, discovered that he could use the two A-class sentinels, his childhood friends Zheng Jia and Zheng Yan, to enhance his own class. In order to retain this rare S-class status, he chose to conceal his exploitation of them. However, during the repeated interaction with the two, he gradually becomes aware of their feelings towards him...

title: Offering My Neck to You
alt_titles: I Offer My Neck to You
description: Fang Luoan, a half-werewolf, was five years old when his father was killed. He was then adopted by vampire Fang Yanchen. Today, twelve years later, as Fang Luoan is about to reach adulthood, his werewolf attributes are beginning to emerge. His uncontrollable emotions and the abnormal power he has have caused a ton of terrible troubles. But what he never expected is that Fang Yanchen, whom he has been living with, is the foe that killed his father…

title: Dad Asked Me to Choose One of Ten Goddesses to Marry
alt_titles: Lǎo Bà Ràng Wǒ Cóng Shí Gè Nǚshén Zhòngxuǎn Yīgè Jiéhūn
description:
Dad asked me to choose one of ten goddesses to marry: As the leader of the “Dead Night” team with the most outstanding record in China’s Secret Army – “Dead Doctor” Feng Lin was asked by his father to choose one of the ten goddesses who had already engaged in marriage.
Feng Lin, who had no intention of doing so, had to come one by one to break off the marriage.
During the process, Liu Nian, the traitor of “Dead Night”, appeared. In order to get revenge…

title: Transformed Into A Piece Of Land
description: The darkness eclipses, humans began to transform into unique monsters(Darksiders), but I got transformed into a piece of land! I live together with the other humans that managed to survived, planting crops and building walls to resist the monsters and the darkness of human nature, preserving the last spark of humanity’s fate during this apocalypse.

title: Make the Best of It: Advance or Fall Behind
description: In order to avenge her sister, a demon snuck into the land of the celestials all alone. In an unexpected turn of events, she was rescued by her nemesis' fiancee! Originally, she wanted to get close to her nemesis through his fiancee, but she soon discovered that his fiancee was hiding a secret that could change everything.

title: The Sichuan Cuisine Chef and His Valiant Babes of Another World
alt_titles: Sichuan Chushi Yu Yishijie De Yongzhe Shaonü Men
Sichuan Chef and Brave Girl in Another World
description: After transmigrating into a world of magic, Qin Chuan who was a Sichuan Cuisine Chef discovers his food is key to boosting combativity. With demons rampaging the land, it’s about time to put an end to the misery and suffering.Who’s to say a chef can’t save the world? But why are the heroes super hot babes?

title: Beast Familiar for All: Beginning Awakening of Mythical Talents
alt_titles: Quanmin Yu Shou: Kaiju Juexing Shenhua Ji Tiamanfu
Quánmín Yù Shòu: Kāijú Juéxǐng Shénhuà Jí Tiānfù,
description: A soldier reincarnated into another world would he be able to reach the top or would he be left behind as others move forward or would his arrogance cause his destruction.

title: Sunshine & Bright Stars
description: Realistic and nuanced slice of school life. A cute, positive, and enthusiastic junior bumps into a girl who does hip-hop, and is emotionally shy and slow despite looking cool. The sweet, tangled-up, heartwarming, and GL story of chasing love.

title: The Internet Are Character Pairing Fans of the Movie God and Me
alt_titles: I’m Being Shipped With the King of Film!
Quan Wang Dou Shi Wo He Yingdi CP Fen
The Internet Are CP Fans of the Movie God and Me
description: (Note: CP = Character Pairing) Whaaa?! The demon spirit management just arranged a husband for me again?! This time, the guy's a movie god! OMG~ I'm only a recently matured small fox. Arranging such an old demon to me, what am I to do~

title: Regenerate Top Players
description: "Bai Qi", an unknown game anchor, is about to reach the pinnacle of his life when he accidentally dies while streaming a game called "Soul Throne". Unexpectedly, he is reborn into the world of this high-difficulty action game. With his "T0-Level" game skills from his previous life and the blessing of the system's "100 Full-Achieved Max-Level Accounts", can Bai Qi ascend to the throne once again and become the one and only king of that world?

title: Shura Sword Sovereign
description: Ten thousand years ago, the ancestor of the blade killed the Sword Emperor in Wuwang Mountain and ordered the sword cultivators to be killed all over the world. Thousands of years later, the young Chu Mu was born, crushing the soul of the blade and forging the soul of the sword, With one stroke of his sword, he pierced through the sky, leaving a mark for eternity.

title: I Am the Descendant of the Divine Dragon!
alt_titles: The Descendant of the Divine Dragon
description: In the highly competitive world of the Xuan Realm Continent, where warriors strive to refine their bodies, cultivate their martial abilities, harness the essence of the heavens and earth, and push beyond mortal limitations, our protagonist, Lu Hao, faces unjust persecution from his own clan since childhood. However, fate smiles upon him as he awakens the dormant bloodline of the Divine Dragon within him. With an unyielding resolve, Lu Hao embarks on an extraordinary journey, overcoming countless obstacles to ascend to the zenith of power. Along the way, he unravels the enigmatic secrets of his past life.

title: Can't Say No
alt_titles: I Can't Say No to Him
description: As one knows, talking too much can cause problems. This happened to Guan Cheng when he misspoke during Latin Dance and accidentally caught the attention of Yu Yunfei, who slowly intrudes on his life. “Wait, this man, where have I seen him before?" What will this dense and straightforward man do when he meets an overly attractive male?

title: Without A Daoist Partner, I Will Die
alt_titles: Meiyou Dao Lv Jiu Hui Si
Méiyǒu Dào Lǚ Jiù Huì Sǐ
Death Right Away for Not Having a Taoist Companion
Come On, I Need A Couple!
description:
Shock! His older sister regarded his ancestral grave as a furnace tripod? His strange disease miraculously disappeared and he officially embarked on the road of cultivation. Huh? You must do it again within 30 days? Or you’ll die?


---

**Links:**
- [Alternative raw (BiliBili)](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc31504?utm_source=mgd&utm_medium=uploader)

title: A Fruitless Betrothal
description: Dai Yi is a female geography teacher who has just transferred to high school. She has a crush on her colleague, the popular female teacher, Zhang Guo, and she was about to grow closer with her crush. However, Zhang Guo unexpectedly announced that she was engaged。

title: The Exceptional Farmgirl
description:
Following an accident, Su Xinyu, a 35-yeard old surgeon transmigrated to a baby's body in ancient times, becoming the seventh daughter of Tao Liuping.
She hence became the infant Xiangzhi'er, but kept her adult's mind secret as she grew, seeking a way to survive in the patriarchy. It was fortunate that her mother was a strong woman, who knew the ways of the world and thought differently. She promised to raise her daughters well and protect them from bullying, not to mention that Xiangzhi's sisters all earned their keep, and were as tough as they were smart. Xiangzhi herself became good friends with the young boy Rock, brought to her by a mysterious old man — and yet, she failed to notice that her little quirks that surpass ordinary children were noticed by an old woman from the village who held hidden depths...

title: All My Female Disciples Want to Kill Me
alt_titles: Nv Tudi Ge Ge Xiang Sha Wo
Nǚ Túdì Gè Gè Xiǎng Shā Wǒ
All of My Female Apprentices Want to Kill Me
All the Female Apprentices Want to Kill Me
description: Possessing the memories from the 21st century, I transmigrated inside a big shot, “Su Bei”, and brought my own “Apprenticeship Up to [10000] Times Feedback” system. The disciples are not only as beautiful as flowers, but they are also blessed with a revolutionary destiny. This is the chosen one who can become the main protagonist in any novel. But these disciples hate to be unable to peel my skin and tear my bones. What the hell did the past Su Bei do against these apprentices!!

title: How Small and Innocent
description: The daily life of Cui Haomin, who lacks facial expressions but has plenty of points when it comes to love. This is the story of childhood sweethearts, and the male lead is the younger brother from No Words.

title: The Grown Dog Bullies Its Owner
description:
"You there, be mine!"

School grass Xia Zhixing, unwilling to reveal his identity as a streamer, borrows the face of the mysterious top student Lin Lang.

Unexpectedly, the student that resembled a cute little puppy had actually desired him for a long time...

"Senior, the reward I want is you."

title: Gunslayer Legend
description: In the year 2035, the technological civilization of mankind reached an unprecedented height. However, it was also followed by energy exhaustion. Soldiers from various countries plundered all the resources greedily. Ulysses performance will determine whether he can become an agent fighting for world peace!

title: My Harem Depends on Drawing Cards
description: A Genius, who has now have to learns his lesson through a different worlds and now he is waste with no talent in this new world? Only using cards from his system, he now have to open a road of harem in his new life!

title: A Will Eternal
description:
One will to create oceans. One will to summon the mulberry fields.  
  
One will to slaughter countless devils. One will to eradicate innumerable immortals.  
  
Only my will… is eternal.  
  
A Will Eternal tells the tale of Bai Xiaochun, an endearing but exasperating young man who is driven primarily by his fear of death and desire to live forever, but who deeply values friendship and family.

---

**Links:**
- [Alternative Raw (ac.qq)](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/ComicInfo/id/649851)

title: Ao Jiao Wangye Zhongtian Fei
description:
She was a chef who was a fresh graduate from the famous X-university and a rising star.  
But she who wanted to shine brightly, died and crossed over.  
Even more, she was very unlucky to have ended up in a desert hungry and tired.

title: I Can Extract Attributes
description: I, Gu Shaoyang, have the ability to extract fused attributes. Extracting the enlightened roots and bones of countless geniuses, I am the top demon, the supreme heavenly pride. By fusing countless lower grade yuan stones and inferior pills, I can rub out extremely high grade yuan stones and god grade spirit pills. Now I just want to ask: when will I be invincible?!!!

title: Mirror of Innocence
description: Jiang Xiaoman, a university student and online writer, inherits a mysterious job from her father. Working as the archdemon Qin Lan's assistant, she begins to tackle strange cases with Qin Lan. As the two clashing personalities band together to solve each bizarre yet heart-rending case, they develop special feelings towards each other.

title: Became The Lucky 666 Princess Destiny
alt_titles: Wo Zhuansheng Jiu Chao Shen, Hai Bian Cheng Xingyun 666 De Tianming Gongzhu
I Was Reincarnated Into a Super God, but Also Become a Lucky 666 Princess of Destiny
Wǒ Zhuǎnshēng Jiù Chāo Shén, Hái Biàn Chéng Xìngyùn 666 De Tiānmìng Gōngzhǔ
description: In the beta test of a video game, the Super God player is forced to turn into a beautiful woman. The beautiful woman also happens to be the Lucky 666 Princess of Destiny. Don't get in my way of becoming a super god!

title: Mercury Express
description:
If you can afford the fee, I can transport anything.  
  
Ling Yu, a delivery man with strange abilities, is caught up in all kinds of trouble after accepting jobs that no one else would dare to take.

title: Egg of the Elf (Official Colored)
description: Humans and elves coexisted on the continent. Due to the Demon King’s curse, females will no longer... be born???In order to save the humans, the elves added a new law to the land. This law allowed humans to continue to reproduce, and that law is...

title: My Japanese Sisters
alt_titles: My little sister comes from a neighboring country
description: 老爸突然再婚，外表凶恶的高中生霍天麟突然多了两个来自日本的妹妹！然而这两个天降系妹妹却有着惊人的秘密！霍天麟将如何与她们相处？她们又将如何看待霍天麟？

title: The Antidote
description: I met my annoying ex-girlfriend again during the zombie apocalypse?!

title: It Turns out That I Have Been Invincible for a Long Time
alt_titles: I've Been Invincible for a Long Time
description: Over a five-year journey around the world, Ye Changqing first believed he could be like other cool novel protagonist systems with a plug-in, but even the most common immortal cultivator cannot be. Living close to a sect in a small town was his only option, so he started a business. His small store eventually turned into the holy land of all the righteous individuals, and the dog he raised up turned out to be the feared demon king. From that moment on, everyone acknowledged Ye Changqing as a Supreme Master.

title: Turning into a Tentacle Monster, Made Me Crazier
alt_titles: Turning into a Tentacle Monster, Made Me Crazier
After Turning into C-Type Tentacle Monsters, They Became Even Crazier
description: For unknown reasons, Xiao Zheng would transform into a tentacle monster when he became excited. Even if he longed for love, he would disguise himself as being cold. But suddenly he was summoned by Bai Anan, who was usually serious but secretly loved drawing. He signed an agreement and became Bai Anan’s “familiar”. He was threatened to help her – to draw the Manhua that would top the list!

title: Late Winter
description: A sudden cold current swept the earth. The burning hot summer has turned into extreme winter cold. The whole world looks like it is the end of the world. Even worse, scary and deadly creatures hide beneath the thick snow… they are the Snowmen…

title: Mad Maid with Odd Powers
description: The maid cafe's shop owner is always away throughout the year, but the two maids keep the shop orderly, neat, and tidy. Suddenly, supernatural attacks disrupted the peace in the shop, and the maids got into fights with them. Together with the male protagonist, Mo Qi and his hidden ability, they undo the manipulation and protect citizens. However, it seems like the shop owner has some sort of connection with these supernatural events, which leads to a big secret…

title: Mermaid's Dresses
description: In order to break her marriage contract, the revolting mermaid girl goes ashore to the city, to find her “fiancee” that manages a western-clothes shop, but accidentally releases the seal, on a piece of female clothing, of a monster……. For the sake of subduing the monster, the arrogant mermaid girl and the attractive two-faced brother start a fantastic new life~

title: The Lady Is the Future Tyrant
alt_titles: The Lady Is the Future Tyrant
My Wife Is Actually the Future Tyrannical Empress
description: Zhao JinYu did not expect that after his rebirth, the one he will marry would actually be the future tyrannical empress who usurped the throne. In order to prevent his wife from going astray in this life, he worked hard and made great efforts. But his wife seems to be different from her previous life, how come she doesn’t care about the affairs of the court at all and only sticks to him every day? But that’s not bad because he plan to have several children with her sooner, so that she will get busy with the children every day, so that she’ll have no time to plot for rebellion. Just as planned!

title: Strange Store
description: This is a ghost online shop that betrays desire. As long as the customer needs it, the black business card will arrive as promised and will be delivered with exclusive items with magical effects. However, no one knows how much it costs to use these items. The legend of “Strange Store” has already started circulating in the city. “The next business card… will it appear next to you?”

title: 100 Ways to Kill a Seal
alt_titles: Shā sǐ Hǎibào de 100 Zhǒng Fāngfǎ
description: North Private Academy has a new transfer student. But Youko notices something strange…

title: The Strongest Fate System
description:
The Venerable Immortal Zhutian has been undermined and returned with a mysterious system!   
  
Absorb every luck and control the fate of everything, I am the only one who decided!   
  
Rebirth into a Chinese student named Qin Yunhui, see how he uses the system to achieve everything he ever wanted in this realm of men!   
  
Modern earth meets ancient immortal story. "When I return to the heavenly realm, I will get back everything I deserve!"

title: BLISS: Divine Contract Civilization
description: Ten years ago, an earth-shattering war nearly destroyed the world. The survivors built a new world, yet it doesn't seem to have calmed down at all…

title: Harp and Poetry Under the Aurora
alt_titles: Harp and Poem Under the Aurora
description: In the north of the continent, there lies a snow-covered country dubbed the 'Snow Kingdom'. When a nomadic hunter girl first enters this land, she feels an unprecedented warmth, and even encounters a beautiful woman...

title: Brother's Sick Love
alt_titles: Hu Ru Yi Ye Bing Jiao
The Yandere Came During the Night
description: Yu Xiang unfortunately transmigrates into a merchant's daughter, who was mistakenly taken to the marquis manor at birth. She is immediately disabled, and carries the nickname of 'disaster star'. Helplessly, she can only cling to her older brother, the marquis, in hopes of surviving, and wait for the true master to return so she can give way. Years later, when the true master returns to the manor, Yu Xiang prepares to leave. however, she finds out her clinging technique is too good, that her marquis brother won't let her leave!

title: Runaway Magical Girl!
description: Magical girl Vanilla was dismissed when she was just 18-years old because the king is a lolicon?! Vanilla didn't want to be separated from her familiar, Black Mike, so he suggested that they run away together! Pursued by many, Vanilla gradually discovers her feelings for Black Mike during this chaotic situation.

title: In Front of Mental Illness, Ghosts are Nothing
alt_titles: In the Face of Mental Illness, Ghosts Are Nothing
In the Face of Mental Illness, Nothing Matters
Jīngshénbìng Miànqián, Guǐ Dōngxī Suàn Gè Qiú
With Mental Illness, I Am Immortal
description: Meet Chen Zhuo, the resident troublemaker at Qingshan Psychiatric Hospital. Despite the system's attempts, his quirks remain untouched. The system's response? "I'm here for technical support, not miracles. Your crazy is your own business!" Get ready for a comedic, horror-filled adventure that defies sanity, where even the system can't fix the chaos within Chen Zhuo's mind.

title: Invasion of the Immortal Emperor
description: The miserable and ugly man, reborn into a sect full of beautiful sisters! He thought he'd spend his whole life with them, but he was faced by countless mountains, bloody battles, rainy winds… The rubbish Tian Chen in the eyes of others, the abandoned son of a martial family, destined to be a good for nothing for a lifetime! in order to prove himself, and get back what he lost, and protect his loved ones, he embarked on a road full of hurdles, stars move and fight, everything is unified, a generation of the best immortal emperor finally arrives, he stands on the top of the continent, trying to become the most dazzling existence in tens of thousands of years!

title: The Constellation of Us
description: Asterism is both a bland and cruel story between a rebellious boy and an obedient student. Like how two shooting stars fly towards each other, converging and separating without even a single word, the two gradually find their place in each other's lives. The pair become each other's model, and this might just be the strongest display of their feelings.

title: Succuba & Siren
description:
An entry for "Let's Meet at the Witches' Gathering."  
  
  
  
  
[Weibo](https://www.weibo.com/u/5372531272)

title: The Princess Back From Hell
description: After taking revenge on the ex-boyfriend who used to abuse her, she died and transmigrated as the heroine of the popular otome game "Rose Spiral". She found out that the targets who could be captured possessed evil intentions, approaching the female lead only to use her. The frozen heart of a reborn girl burns with hatred, and a revenge plan slowly unfolds. While attacking and taking revenge on the men, will she learn to love and be loved again?

title: Adorable Spoiled Little Princess
description: This is a story about: a female lead who transforms into a child after losing her virginity, her identity switches between an adult and a kid. With the crown prince who has a dual personality too, there's equal parts love and bite.

title: He Flew Back From Hell as a Crow
description: A guy known as “the Raven” is supposedly left for dead by hired assassins from the “Predator Group.” But instead, he gained mutant powers such as speed, reflex and immortality just like a raven would. As he is given another chance to live, he wanted to hunt down every single assassin as a plot of revenge.

title: My Girlfriend Is A Bit Weird, but She Is Very Cute
description: My name is Ma Yun and I recently made a girlfriend. Although I always feel that she is a bit weird, she is really cute~

title: Celestial Jailer
description: Liu Lang was the number one guy in Nanshan City. He was killed then thrown into a ravine. Afterwards he woke up in a prison. He was ordered to watch over the deities who committed crimes in the heavenly prison.

title: My OTP Is So Sweet That I Want To Fall In Love
alt_titles: My CP Is So Sweet That I Want to Have a Love Affair
My OTP's So Cute I Wanna Fall In Love Too!
description: Zou Ming, a girl who creates fan works for her OTP and wants to fall in love, and Li Dongxu, a boy who looks honest but enjoys teasing others. Who says science and engineering majors don't understand romance? Who says love at first sight doesn't exist? An ignorant first love like a sweet and sour lemon is about to quietly bloom during the summer…

title: I Am A Humanoid Cultivation Pill
description:
A masterful pill was born at the top of the Peak of Not Returning. It is Yushu who is in the wind, is chic and suave, and has a broad mind..!

Yes, it's me! Beat and beat, eat.

title: Burn my Calories
description: I'm so invincible that everyone calls me Big Daddy! How dare someone call me his Stepford wife? Me, I weigh half a ton! I can fight! I'm invincible! I root out the strong and support the weak! I'm the protector of all the boys in the school! However, one day, I got thinner and weaker... But I became handsome...

title: Bewitching Demonic Beauty
description: Thousands of years of cultivation have made me into a youthful and glamorous red fox spirit with a bewitching face that makes all heads turn. Captivating the weak new king should be easy! Is there any man I cannot defeat? Eh? This isn't right! Stop, your majesty, don't touch my heart!

title: Love Data
description: This is a yuri love story between a human and an android.

title: Aged Beauty
description: The world's greatest doctor fell off the cliff and died, resulting for his daughter, Xu Youran, to seek refugee with Lord Rui. Unexpectedly, she was betrayed by her maid which resulted in the loss of her memory. Her maid took that opportunity to assume Youran's identity and attempted to marry into the Lord’s family. What no one expected was that the soul of the infamous doctor, Yue Qianqiu, reincarnated into Xu Youran's body. Now that she is reborn, how will she, with her once notorious reputation, live out this life?

title: Arctic King
alt_titles: Bing Feng Mo Ri: Jue Wu Sheng Huan Zhi Lu
Frozen Apocalypse: No Chance of Survival
Frozen Armageddon: There’s No Way Back
Frozen Doomsday: No Way to Survive
Bīng Fēng Mò Rì: Jué Wú Shēng Huán Zhī Lù
description: The stars shift, the blizzard persists, the icy apocalypse is imminent, food! Temperature! Violence! Dependence! In this dilemma, under the distortion of human nature, has desire given birth to monsters? How to break out of adversity and find a way to survive!

title: My Amazing Wechat
alt_titles: Wo De Weixin Lian San Jie
My WeChat Links The Three Realms!
description:
Leo, a common middle school student, was accidently invited to a Wechat group full of miracle figures, such as Lord of Thunder, Mother of Lightning, Mighty Miracle God…since then his life became totally different with wonderful equipment he got from the wechat group.

[Additional Official English (Webcomics)](https://www.webcomicsapp.com/comic/WeChat-in-the-Third-Dimension/5d78c9808c252b612719af74)

title: Start Raising Dragons From Today
description: In a world full of magic, Lynn, who got isekai-ed, obtained the cheat – the Dragon Ranch. Lynn relied on the power obtained by raising dragons, so I started to raise dragons diligently. Fire Dragon, Earth Dragon, Ice Dragon, Steel Dragon… Dark Dragon, Bright Dragon. many years later to enter the Holy Iris Academy to learn magic. He wanted to hide his strength and develop wretchedly, but he always encountered all kinds of difficulties and had to show his amazing ability. Accept as a direct disciple, become an unparalleled powerhouse, and find the truth of this world…

title: I Can Change the Timeline of Everything
alt_titles: I Can Change the Timeline of Everything
description: “What should I do if the elixir has expired? Don’t be afraid! Just reverse the elixir’s time, I want all of your expired elixirs! What should I do if the cultivation method is too slow? Don’t be afraid! Just adjust the cultivation time forwards by hundreds of years, the cultivation method will be successfully mastered immediately. What if the growth of Spiritual Grass is too slow? Don’t be afraid! Just accelerate the growth time of the Spiritual Grass by tens of thousands of years, and the Spiritual Grass immediately becomes a Divine plant. Traveling to another world and discovering that you are a waste material? Don’t be afraid! I can change the timeline of everything!”

title: Limbless Schira
description: Childhood friend turning into demons? And the reason is because of me? In order to save BaiYe who is corroded by a curse, YeYi went on a journey to purify the curse. Along the way, the truth of previous life unfolds…… This is a story that consist of conspiracy, monster hunting, friendship, romance and all the comedy elements of an magical adventure story!

title: Million Times Attack Speed
alt_titles: Wǒ Yǒu Bǎi Wàn Bèi Gōng Sù
description: After being reincarnated into the Tianwu Continent, Ye Yun activated the Multiverse Devouring System and received the reward of a million times attack speed in the beginner's gift package. From then on, he became an invincible powerhouse! As the saying goes, in the world of martial arts, speed is paramount. Do you think I was just picking my nose and cleaning my ears? In fact, I just executed thirty-five thousand people with a single sword strike and eighty-seven thousand people with a single sword swing, while also unleashing various boxing techniques and secret arts.

title: Frankenstein Family
description:
A scientist couple has been arrested for conducting illegal studies, allegedly for performing genetic modification on five of their children. Youngest child, Dannis, is the only one who grew up as a normal human, and has become the only family member who has to tend to rest of the members and to try to find a medicine to turn them into normal humans again.

Dog human, plant gene, spider web gene, as well as mind reading, how will these family members who grew up in the laboratory survive in the outside world?!

This series was first digitally serialized in Suncomics by Taiwanese publisher Anime in August 2015, now it has been also serialized in Japan published in Comic@Bunch of Shinchosha since December 2017.

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Japanese](http://www.comicbunch.com/manga/wed/jikkenhin/)
* [French](https://chattochatto.com/boutique/manga/frankenstein-family-tome-1/)
* [Simplified Chinese](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/545310)

title: Super God System
description: “As long as I  level up 10 more level, I will be able to unlock the gene  again, and then I will be able to destroy this planet!” Travelled to  the future, reborn in the body who is known as trash of the academy, in this future world where zombies and giant beasts co-exist, Lin Xiu accidentally obtained an upgrading system, surpassing the limit of the human body and devouring the starry sky!

title: Just One Smile is Very Alluring
alt_titles: A Slight Smile is Very Charming
Wei Wei Yi Xiao Hen Qing Cheng
description:
What is it that makes a man fall in love with a woman at first sight? Appearance? Aura? Wealth? NO, when campus prince and gaming expert, student Xiao Nai first saw Bei Wei Wei, what made him fall in love was not her extraordinary beauty, but her slim and slender fingers that were flying across the keyboard and her calm and composed manner!!! Embarrassing, no?  
  
At the same time, gaming expert Bei Wei Wei, at this time and place is on the computer, methodically commanding a guild war, and won a perfect and glorious victory despite being at a disadvantage, and was completely unaware that cupid is nearby.  
  
Soon after basketball player, swimmer, all-around excellent student, and game company president, Xiao Nai, uses both tactics on and off-line to take this beauty’s heart. Therefore this romance slowly bloomed.

title: The Way My Nemesis Looks At Me Is Slowly Shifting
alt_titles: Sudi Kan Wo De Yanshen Zhujian Bianzhi
description: Yu Wan is a spoiled rich brat who was given everything and never had to work a day in her life. Her father forces her to intern at acompany where her childhood bestfriend, Ni Chang, works at. Unbeknownst to Yu Wan, Ni Chang has had a crush on Yu Wan since they were children.

title: A Wisdom Tooth
description: The unspeakable secrets between a handsome dentist and his patient's classmate.

title: I Can Use the Card Drawing System to Summon Beautiful Girls
alt_titles: Wo Neng Yong Chou Ka Xitong Zhaohuan Mei Shaonv
description: “It’s a disaster! I’ve been taken over by a mysterious card-drawing system and found myself surrounded by adorable girls in a mobile game! What’s even more terrifying is that among them is the antagonist sister sent by the Demon King from another world to hunt me down. What should I do? Seeking urgent advice online!”

title: Prices Crash, I Rise
alt_titles: With My Price Deduction System, I Became Invincible
Dominating With the Price Collapse System
description: Yifan activates a system by chance with a pop-up telling him that everyone in this world will lose 1,000,000% in purchasing power except for him. The following day, the market crashes. Luxury cars only cost 1 yaro each and mansions 5 yaros each. With hundreds of thousands in his account, Yifan suddenly becomes a rich man with enough money to buy everything on Earth!

title: Honkai Impact 3rd - Valkyries' Dining Escapades
description:
This is a story about the Valkyries living in the dorm and their culinary adventures. Each valkyrie has a different specialty but they all share the same desire to convey their feelings to their loved ones through cooking.  

---

Valkyries are more than warriors. They are also exquisite chefs and connoisseurs of fine living. Study from these masters of the kitchen because their recipes actually churn out delicious gourmet food!

---

Main Story :   
[# Book 1001 = Escape From The Sky](https://mangadex.org/manga/22297/honkai-impact-3)   
[# Book 1002 = Cherry Blossom Recall](https://mangadex.org/manga/22297/honkai-impact-3)   
[# Book 1003 = Mystery of Stigmata](https://mangadex.org/manga/26804/honkai-impact-3rd-mystery-of-stigmata)

[# Book 1008 = Moon Shadow](https://mangadex.org/manga/22297/honkai-impact-3)

[# Book 1014 = Summer Memories](https://mangadex.org/title/30931/honkai-impact-3rd-summer-memories)

title: The Evil God Descends, I Own Great Hell
alt_titles: Evil God Descends, I Have a Great Calamitous Prison
description:
In the apocalypse, an evil god descends, devouring humans and threatening my homeland, China! Little do they know, I hold the control of the Demon-Suppressing Hell, where countless gods and ancient monsters from China have been secretly imprisoned for thousands of years! All for this moment... to annihilate the foreign gods and cleanse the human world!

— Of course, if you surrender, as the Warden, I might consider letting you evil gods into the Great Hell to work on sewing machines. Meals and accommodation are provided, of course.

title: Umbrellas
description: A comical story of anthropomorphic umbrellas.

title: I Changed My Life By Signing In
alt_titles: By Registering, My Life Has Been Altered
My Life Changed In Another World
description: After the male protagonist crossed, he was mistakenly taken in by the Jade Female Sect, which was full of female disciples, and became a nursing home to watch the gate. Favoured by the god-level check-in system, he obtained a magical physique that had never been seen in ancient times: the Spring Heart Divine Body. It is necessary to constantly adjust the girls to obtain welfare stimuli and convert the excitement points into cultivation. The Jade Girl Sect is surrounded by strong enemies and is in danger. In order to protect his own En (NV) people, the male protagonist relies on the super god sign-in system, fights the same way, kills the demon Xiu, fights the alien race, and zhen eight.

title: Emperor-in-Law
description: An ordinary self-funded university student suddenly acquires a rich, mature wife and activates the ‘Life Decision System.’ Does this system provide options that will become reality upon choosing them? Little children make choices; I want everything! Find out how Lifan, the son-in-law of a wealthy family, counterattacks little by little with the system in hand to become this generation’s greatest son-in-law!

title: Monster Bar
description:
A quaint little bar awaits its destined clients… Meanwhile, the strange bartender with a glass of cocktail reveals the mysteries of your life by looking into your past reincarnations — containing stories of love and hate throughout the centuries.   
Come and explore the brotherly bond between a dragon bartender and demon hunter. A touching story that even dazzles the heavens with its world of monsters; a world where a dragon searches for traces of his demon hunter friend from his past life, longing to meet again. But how did the talented demon hunter and mysterious dragon meet?

title: The Beauty of the Apricot Forest
alt_titles: The Beauty in the Apricot Forest
description: He thought it was just an accident that he got sent back a thousand years by a rogue lightning strike. Little did he know that someone had been waiting there for him for decades. His arrival brought a person back from the dead, and reunited them with what they had lost. Through a series of coincidences, he and the person who’d been waiting came to meet, know, and love one another. The strings of fate which drew them together, stemming from broken threads of a previous generation. The beauty remains even when the Apricot Forest blooms no more, the story of their love and tragedy, spoken of only by whispers in the wind.

title: Rising with the Monsters
alt_titles: Calamity and I: The Dual Ascension
description: 100 years ago, a dimensional doorway was opened for reasons unknown, and the world has been plagued with disasters ever since. A group of extraordinary individuals who have been dubbed the heroes are sworn to save the world.

title: Campus Master
description: An unruly youth, son of the underworld godfather, enrolls in high school, sets off the bloody winds while still does not forget engaging to various gorgeously beautiful ladies. Teachers, models or big sis, all belong to him.

title: Peerless Martial Spirit
description: In the continent of Longmai, thousands of clans stand tall, countless sects exist, and cultivation is the way of life. The strong can do anything they want while the weaklings live like ants. Youngster Chen Feng has an incomplete dan region, causing him to be unable to cultivate, he withstood countless sneers directed at him. Until he obtained a mysterious dragon bloodline, breaking out of his cocoon and opening a new chapter to his life! Coquettish demonic fox spirits, cold female emperors, demon girls or princesses from a prestigious clan, all of them jump into my embrace. With the unparalleled inheritance, I will manifest the strongest martial spirit, obtain all the beauties and look down from the heavens.

title: Alcohol ?%
description:
Has 2 pairs: OL x high school student, store worker x tattoo artist  
  
  
[Author's twitter](https://twitter.com/DeerWhisky)

title: The Guy Inside Me
description:
Who would've thought that rivals, the academic tyrant, Xu Sheng, and the top student, Zhao Zhan, would exchange bodies a few times and then start to like each other secretly! After many clueless situations the two became closer to each other, after they experience some funny stories and incidents, they finally understand their feelings for each other.  
  
¿Quién hubiera pensado que los rivales, el tirano académico, Xu Sheng, y el mejor estudiante, Zhao Zhan, intercambiarían cuerpos unas cuantas veces y luego empezarían a gustarse en secreto? Después de muchas situaciones sin pistas los dos se acercaron más el uno al otro, después de experimentar algunas historias e incidentes divertidos, finalmente entienden sus sentimientos por el otro.

title: What’s Wrong With Liking Big Tails?
description: They say the big shot light slayer Erl has no interest in women, but only he knows that none of YOU are his type~

title: The Demon Lord and the Hero
alt_titles: The Demon Lord and the Hero

title: Travel to Tang Dynasty
alt_titles: To Be Reborn at Dynasty Tang
description: One representative of the king's special forces, to protect the country's treasures, he was struck by thunder and sent to the early days of the Tang Dynasty. In this strange and ever changing era, he will fulfil all modern human dreams with a sincere heart: beautiful princesses, shui queens, loli, beautiful harem ladies!

title: Your Highness, I'm Pregnant
description:
The cute and clever "eunuch" was discovered to be pregnant and unexpectedly became the Crown Prince's personal attendant? The Crown Prince is rumored to be erratic, two-faced and aloof… and yet he keeps indulging her despite her testing his bottom line again and again…Why would she disguise herself as a man after crossing over and insist on staying beside him…"It's my turn to face all these hardships for you in this world!"  
  
Based on the [Original Webnovel](https://www.xbiquge.cc/book/48292/) by HONG You Ling

title: Mr. Liar
description: Coquettish Lawyer x Tsundere Detective! Officer Shen, the human-lie-detector detective, finds it difficult to resist the smooth-talking lawyer, his nemesis who spits out lies like flowing electric current. "You used to be my closest friend, yet you ruined my reputation. Now you actually dare to come back and lick me?!” The elite police officer, after demoted to the Useless Department, meets his Mr. Liar again. Can the past misunderstandings between them be resolved? Can they go back to how they were in the past?

title: Memory Lost
description: Once a proud woman, but because of a chain of major events, was taken away by the killer group and lost her memory from then on. In order to find her, he traveled through mountains of water and from the player he once was, he became a cold and quiet police officer. Fate had allowed them to meet again. When they regain their memories, will they be happy or will sink into the abyss once again?

title: Silkflower Fantasy Dream
description: D List actress Bai Muzhi just received her chance to shine but she ends up getting tortured to death by film director Ye Ze. Afterwards, she's reborn…as Ye Ze's secret wife, Yun Xiaoran?! She never thought that revenge would involve so many…men!

title: Tempted by Our Echoed Heart
description:
On the first snowfall of that year, Shan Xianchun, who had been roped in to help as a photographer for a cosplay shoot, unexpectedly captures a picture of a girl in a long, green dress through her lens. The girl’s gaze—staring at her—full of complexity and affection, seems to be locked on her, leaving Shan Xianchun as though her heart had been gently pricked.
Many years later, when she crosses paths again with the girl who once captivated her so, what kind of sparks will fly between them?

title: Adonis Next Door
description:
Su Shuang Shuang comes home one day to find that someone has moved into the apartment next to hers. When curiosity gets the best of her and she goes in to meet her neighbour, a handsome guys comes out of the shower? And he calls the police?  
  
[Official English WebComics](http://m.webcomicsapp.com/comic/5c86037fd5626e789d67b03d)

title: There Can’t Be Girls In My Guild!
alt_titles: There's No Way There Are Any Girls in My Guild
description: In reality, Li Yu, who is an introverted otaku, is a senior player of MMORPG "Star Trails ol". The elite guild where he belongs is nicknamed the "Geek Group" because the characters in the game are all male. Li Yu, who has been worrying about this, only accidentally learned a long time later that he is actually the only boy in the group. All the other members are actually beautiful girls with their own cute attributes, and they all have a deep connection with him

title: Xiaobai's Dream Daddy
alt_titles: Xiao Bai's Father Is a Wonderful Person
description: Because of a conspiracy, she got pregnant and gave birth to a cute little darling. A few years later, she met her “sweetheart” again. Only, the cold, unfeeling man from the legends didn’t seem as bad as she had imagined?

title: The Lord Has Hidden Intentions
description: I treated you like a brother, but you treated me like a love rival! You stole every girlfriend I ever had! I just wanted to get married and have a baby, why is that so difficult?! A black-hearted white lotus vs. straight guy. A wild omegaverse fantasy,  that's both sweet and seductive~~

title: Dragon and Phoenix Flip
description: Fang Minzhu, a small agent in the entertainment industry, was introduced to the most popular idol girl star Liang Youxi as a life agent. But Liang Youxi asked for a male agent. Minzhu, who is in desperate need of work, gritted her teeth and pretended to be a boy who applied for the job, but Liang Youxi was very mysterious; "I choose a boy because this can make you stay away from my private life with integrity." It is strange of the female star to say that. In a certain accident, Minzhu found out Liang Youxi's secret. It turns out that Liang Youxi is…

title: The Reader and Protagonist Definitely Have to Be in True Love
description:
An internet troll who wanted attention, the reader criticized his favorite web novel, saying: “The protagonist is dumb and the author is s*upid.”  
  
Author: “… Got it.”  
  
Unfortunately for him, the author actually listened to his (troll) feedback. The formerly lighthearted tale of a cute harem master suddenly became super dark and edgy. The reader could only helplessly look on as the protagonist was abused and betrayed, finally embarking on the road to becoming completely evil. Everything was a mess!  
  
After that the reader transmigrated into a strange world. How come the person in front of him looks like the protagonist (evil undead version)? Just what is going on?!

title: The Waste Female Demon God
description:
Bai youling, one of the three demon cultivators were betrayed by her only disciple, who was also her husband-to-be.
Reborn in a commoner’s body, she will once again rise to the top!

title: 1st Kiss
alt_titles: Nǐ De Rénshēng Shì Wǒ Lái Chíle
Ni De Rensheng Shi Wo Lai Chile
1st Kiss – I Don't Want to Consider You as Sister Anymore
I Don't Want to Treat You as Sister Anymore
description: He is her younger brother, although the two have no blood relationship but she always considers him to be her biological brother … can only be brother that’s all. of course he doesn’t want to be like that, but he is also afraid that he will create distance with her more and more far away. If their first meeting in life was not like that, would they have another result? The girl he loves is right in front of his eyes but is like a wind and can’t hold … Can only as younger brother? How must he do to let her know that he can also become a guardian for her whole life?

title: The Wretched
alt_titles: I Am the Bane of Others' Existence
description:
Ji YouChuan was investigating the mysterious organization Blaze in order to take revenge for his parents. 36 demons were released during one of the confrontation with Blaze and he signed a contract with the strongest demon, Chelsea.

He joined the “Wrath of Heaven” team for the sake of investigating Blaze even more deeply and to retrieve the 36 demons, but after getting betrayed by his teammates, the sacrifice of his friend, wandering the wastelands and various other incidents, Ji YouChuan and Chelsea will uncover the thousand-years conspiracy behind the Red Rain catastrophe!

title: God of War Mad Concubine: The Path to Obtaining the World
description: A special ghost, Sheng Qianyu woke up and did not expect to wake up and become a lady of the Prime Minister’s Mansion! She was supposed to be married into the princely palace, but she was betrayed by her fiancé and her sister. The wedding night was stained with blood. With the identity of the three daughters of the honor king and the third daughter of the royal family, She was involved in the investigation To find the truth of a murder in the palace. With he outstanding skills of a agents, Sheng Qianyu not only resolved many crises, but also won the favor of the six princes. Strong cooperation, step by step tricks, turn your hands over the clouds in the power! But what is waiting for them is more serious conspiracy…

title: Prepaid Dragon King Tanks Everything!
description:
“You ate me, so at least give me some kind of compensation, yeah?!”

Dragon King: “Fine! I’ll give you a prepaid cultivation technique—comprehend it first, then catch up with the training later!”

Me: “You think that’s enough?! I had to smell your nasty dragon breath—mental damage times two, buddy!”

Dragon King: “What do you want from me?!”

Me: “From now on, we’re like immortals sharing a single health bar. All the damage? You take it!”

Dragon King: “Damn it! You lunatic! Why does my ten-thousand-war-chariots-level HP bar feel so short now?! Guess it’s time to get a job…”

title: City of Darkness
description: Everyone in his Triad gang looked up to him. He was the boss's favorite pupil, but then in a single night, after he had won so many territorial fights for his gang, he lost everything! Why?

title: I Upgrade by Rewarding Apprentices
alt_titles: I Rely on Rewarding Apprentices to Upgrade
Wo Kao Da Shang Tudi Shengji
description: The master is driving the crane west, what should I do if the enemy comes to the door? ! Awaken the apprenticeship rebate system, the more you give to your apprentice, the more you get back to your master! Hahaha, good disciples, hurry up, as a teacher, you never hide your secrets!

title: Uniform and Parasol
description:
A girl of strong character in a school uniform, and a solitary figure under a dainty parasol. Across age and class, two lonely hearts thread together.

---
Part of the "青春18×2：重返最初的悸動" anthology

title: None of These Witches Are Serious
alt_titles: None of These Witches Are Serious
None of These Witches Are Decent
Zhexie Nüwu Mei Yige Zhengjing de
description: Ron accidentally travels to another world, but before he can even enjoy the thrill of his journey, he's framed and guillotined. On his deathbed, the system sends a cheat to avert the crisis. He also picks up a super cute and clingy witch along the way. A beautiful duchess from the empire suddenly appears, offering her territory, and a tsundere dragon maid takes care of her. Guided by the system, Ron is about to embark on a joyful journey into another world. But no one ever tells him that the same system has killed all ninety-nine other travelers before him! Whose conspiracy is all this?

title: Upgrading the Frivolous Emperor
description:
Stabbed from the start, upgrading with his own wits, self-proclaimed "No.1 Playboy" Wen Zhao Sheng was forced to become the emperor. After being unluckily assassinated, he was reborn miraculously. Now, he plans to use some "dirty tricks" to make an unexpected comeback! This man sure is more cunning than a fox! Playboy emperor x Heartless assassin  
  
[Official Korean Translation](https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/renounce_the_emperor)

title: Poisonous Witch Doctor
description:
The witch’s descent, David Sun, has decided to join the modern society after learning all the witchery and vermin from his master. He doesn’t have any goals other than his family’s well-being and earn some extra money by saving people from illness. He did not expect trouble to come to find him. While facing all the temptation and evil, watch how a fatty hides from others’ sight and promotes witchery…  


---

**Links**:  
- [Original Manhua (Bilibili)](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc28973)  
- [Original Manhua (Tencent Comics)](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/649324)  
- [Original Manhua (Kuaikan Manhua)](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/3139/)

title: Emperor’s Domination
description:
The rise of revered cultivators has been witnessed for countless years.
However, the eyes of the world fail to notice that, behind every cultivator, there seems to be a mysterious… Yin crow.
After the Yin crow guided a legion of young cultivators to the peak of cultivation and established a sect, he chose to leave and abandon it.
Thousands of years have passed since his departure, and circumstances have changed. The once brilliant sect was left in shambles and vulnerable to imminent danger.
Aware of the impending downfall, the Yin crow returned as a young boy in order to fulfill his agreement to guard and restore the sect to its former glory.


---

**Links:**
- [Alternative Raw (AC QQ)](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/651972)
- [Alternative Raw (BiliBili)](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc31570)

title: Unity of Heaven
description:
Unity of Heaven and Earth is an action-packed manga set in a fictional modern society. It features the characters from Journey to the West, but all completely different. Introducing the master-turned-loli San Zang; the dragon-turned-horse-turned-beautiful woman White Dragon Horse; the pig-turned-Adonis Pigsy and Sun Wu Kong, who has been reincarnated as a human. All of your preconceptions from Journey to the West will be turned upside down!

---
**Original manhua:** [u17](https://u17.com/comic/74952.html)

title: The Strong Man From The Mental Hospital
description: This is a world where evil creatures are gradually rampaging. However, the evil creatures are strong, they all disappear after this mental hospital, and even without dignity, they are reduced to ingredients and pets. This is the green mountain mental hospital, where talents are abundant and strong people are surrounded. In this regard, the seriously ill Lin Fan, who is carrying the system, said: I am definitely not a mental patient, I am a normal person who likes to cultivate. Usually is to touch the socket, climbing high voltage box, thunder days standing on the rooftop to the heavens dance a stick method.

title: Azur Lane - Azur Lane for Dummies (Doujinshi)
description:
A long strip comic series based on Azur Lane series made by Toucailao. This series offers the sight of KAN-SEN dealing with various problems they face in their daily life. From a minuscule thing like the mechanic to a huge problem like intergalactic war. Expect references, wacky interactions, comedy, fourth wall breaks, and insanity. Especially, insanity.  
 
Toucailao's weibo:  
<https://m.weibo.cn/u/2125874520>

title: Another Happy Ending with My Jerk Friend
description:
Waking up from a car accident, Bai Tong realizes that he has been unexpectedly reborn as a 4-year-old. After getting his heart and body played with, in his previous life, he vowed to keep away from playboys in this current lifetime! However… who actually is this playboy? Hazy memories from his previous life, unusual pheromones, and suspects that constantly target him… Can Bai Tong unravel the truth behind his previous life?  
  
*Note: Omegaverse.*  
  
Al despertar de un accidente de coche, Bai Tong se da cuenta de que ha renacido inesperadamente como un niño de 4 años. Después de que hayan jugado con su corazón y su cuerpo, en su vida anterior, se comprometió a mantenerse alejado de los playboys en esta vida actual. Sin embargo… ¿quién es realmente este playboy? Recuerdos confusos de su vida anterior, feromonas inusuales, y sospechosos que constantemente lo atacan… ¿Puede Bai Tong desentrañar la verdad detrás de su vida anterior?

title: Sweet Candy
description: Li Xiao Guo is a new nurse at Jiayu Hospital. Her life takes a drastic turn for the worse when a string of unfortunate incidents strike. Her parents get scammed out of their life savings, her family goes more and more into debt, her phone gets stolen, and Xiao Guo's job is at risk. Desperate for a way out, Xiao Guo tries to sell her blood for quick cash. At the same time, a special patient is admitted to the hospital and Xiao Guo's world is turned upside down. It soon becomes clear that Xiao Guo and this new patient are tied together by more than just coincidence…

title: A-Lan Doesn't Know How to Love
alt_titles: A-Lan Doesn't Know How to Fall in Love
description: How do you date someone who doesn't know how to fall in love?

title: The Gods Come and Go
description: College student Sean Hanks has been cheated by his first ever girlfriend. Shocked, he accidentally slips down a cliff and falls down directly on a container that seals a powerful being. Now that the entity inside the container has been released, what fate awaits Sean?

title: It All Starts With a Group of Primitive People
alt_titles: Starting With a Group of Primitive Men
description: Chen Liyi, who was shopping with a rich woman, accidentally traversed to the Stone Age, leading primitive people to fight beasts, build civilization, and become the emperor of this land. The system is in hand, the inheritance of technology can be obtained at will, Not only that, even the primitive people can also play with guns!

title: Forced to Become Villainous Son-in-Law: Frost Queen
alt_titles: Forced to Become Villainous Son-in-Law: Frost Queen
description: The useless son-in-law returned to the underworld just to find out that his right-man hand has already ascended to the throne. With monsters going rampage, doubts and suspicions, and constant humiliation from other tribes, she finally unleashed her full potential. Carrying two pairs of ice wings on her back and dual-wielding frost spears – The Frost Queen has returned.

title: I Opened The Gates Of Hell
description: Yie Fan became YAMA, the king of hell, he has to do missions to upgrade “hell”, make hell a better place, and as his destiny, his fate, he will do whatever it takes to become the best king and rebuild hell

title: Ultimate Devouring System
description: After transmigrating, Ye Xuan obtained a devouring system, not only can he devour items, he can also exchange blood vessels, martial arts, magic weapons, elixirs and treasures…holy! This is easy as f-! “Dont bother me, do you believe i can’t devour your magic weapon?”

title: A Free Ride Everyday
description: Cheng Huan, the female lead, unexpectedly runs into Liao Jia, her senior from high school who works at the same company, on her way home. Taking the opportunity to hitch a ride from him, the number of times they start to meet each other begin to increase wildly. For some reason, Cheng Huan is always able to get a ride from her senior. Unconsciously, they start to realize each other's feelings, with every ride together becoming yet another opportunity for them to grow even closer.

title: Qin Si
description: Little Immortal Hua Yu (lit. cherry blossom fairy) who lives in the Ninth Kingdom's Cloud River, gave up immortality to fall to the mortal realm in search of that beloved person. Getting to know that beloved person again, starting off as strangers, losing oneself in the rivers and lakes until, finally, that moment when that sound was heard. Will that iceberg face be able to sense the feelings in the maiden's heart?

title: Lost At The End Of The World
description: It tells the story of the survivors of the storm caused by unknown creatures who plan to end the human race.

title: Fairy, Wait a Moment! Please Listen to My Argument
alt_titles: Immortal Lady, Wait! Please Listen to My Cunning Defense
Xianzi Qieman! Qing Ting Wo Jiaobian.
description: My fellow Taoist is truly useless... Don't come over here.

title: I Am a Small Kitten
alt_titles: Wo Zhishi Yi Zhi Xiao Maomi
description: Somewhere within a family of three, lived four cute pets: three balls of purrs and a little puppy. Not a moment goes by without something interesting happening with these four adorable pets each and every day…

title: My Master Only Breaks Through on the Edge of Death
alt_titles: My Master Only Breaks Through on the Edge of Death
My Master Only Breaks Through Every Time the Limit Is Reached
description:
"Master, I'm sorry... It's all my fault that you could not break through before your last moments."

"Don't worry, my disciple. I will not die," said Xu Fan as he smiled at his disciple, whose face was covered with tears.

“If only… If only I could get you a few more Foundation Establishment Pills..." The genius of the sect knelt on the floor while crying like a baby.

Xu Fan looked at his oldest disciple and sighed. He then took out a Foundation Establishment Pill and nonchalantly threw it into his mouth.

The next second, divine lights of five different colors filled the world.

title: My Wife Is Rich and Beautiful
description: After being married, Qin Cheng, an orphan, was framed and suffered serious injuries. By accident, Qin Cheng awakened, and from that point on, Qin Cheng began an extraordinary life path.

title: Goddess' Commoner Soldier King
description: The famous soldier king returns to the city and became the assistant and driver of the beautiful chairwoman. For various reasons, he has been integrated into the circle of beauties, becoming the envy and hatred of all men. Be an ambassador for the flower envoy, earn some pocket money, and help beauties solve some troubles. Tang Xiaoyao says: I am the best friend of the goddess, don't try to hit on my goddess, or I will finish you. The commoner walks under the heaven, while the rich and wealthy moves in any direction they please.

title: Chang Le Makes Me Unable to Confess
alt_titles: Unable to Confess to Chang Le!
description: Man Qian, an ordinary girl in university, is crushing on Chang Le, a boy from the xiangsheng (comedy) club. She wants to confess but fails every time because she can’t look him in the eye without laughing! How will she learn to control her laughter?

title: Back to Spring
description: Because of her personality, highschooler Xu Ting is often picked on by her classmates. Until one day, the school’s young, new maintenance worker saves her.  His attractive looks and mysterious aura enthrall the bullies.  Xu Ting feels indebted, yet in the small forest after school, she accidentally discovers his deepest secret?!

title: Reborn as God of Destruction
description: The Taoist god-killer brings the nine-day stone to life in the city, He can refine the alchemy, refine the tools, and understand the methods of battle, and sees how Lin Fan hangs all evil in the city, stepping to the top, overlooking the living beings step by step.

title: I'm so Cute I Might Explode
description: The leader of a gang turned into a girl? And the only way to turn back to normal is by destroying others' dreams!

title: The Soaring Phoenix
description: To save her mother, Qing Ge is adopted by the Wei Manor as an orphan. To the outside world, she’s an adopted daughter, in reality, she’s surviving as a spy. Ten years later, she follows a step by step plan, catching the eye of Second prince Ran Zhao. A conspiracy slowly unfolds… A female spy walking along a knife's edge. Let's see how she can reverse the situation and be reborn from the ashes…

title: Hope You've Been Well
description:
From Jupiter Scanlations:  
  
Ten years ago, the frustrated Gu Zhuoyan met Zhuang Fanxin, a bright ray of sunshine. Zhuoyan was healed, and Fanxin was moved- but their mutual interest ended due to the distance between them.  
Ten years later, Gu Zhuoyan finds himself on a blind date with the one that got away. All the feelings he had long sealed away in the depths of his heart awakes once again, but how will he win back the heart of his old flame?  
  
 [Adapted from the JJWXC novel of the same name by Bei Nan](https://www.jjwxc.net/onebook.php?novelid=3535685)

title: Master's Secret Baby
description:
A young Aryan wakes up in a hotel room and sees a man lying on top of her, but all she can remember is having a drink with her sister. Luckily she manages to escape from more terror, but still ends up broke. She passes out after giving birth, and when she wakes up her stepsister and stepmother can no longer be found in the hospital…  
  
Five years later, she moves to Ningguo as an exchange med student, and with her is her 5 year old son who walks into another kid with identical appearance.

title: Counterattacking System Available At The Grand Ascension Stage
alt_titles: Only in the Mahayana Period Does the Counterattack System Exist
description: Jiang Li, after crossing over, discovered he possessed no cheat abilities so he had no choice but to diligently cultivate. Five hundred years later, he became the strongest in the Nine Provinces. Suddenly, a system appeared, claiming it could help the host go from the Qi Refining stage to becoming the number one in the Nine Provinces. Jiang Li stared at the first task, lost in thought. “Host, please defeat your cousin (at the sixth level of Qi Refining).” “Your system seems to have quite a delay, doesn’t it?”

title: Mommy Is Coming, Daddy Watch Out!
description: She, the sexy hot superstar, is 100% black-hearted. He, the sole heir of the Ye family's century-old wealth, monopolizes the brilliance. Their encounter, doomed to spread like wildfire. Ye Jinze: "Keke, you promised you would be responsible for me seven years ago." An Keke: "You believed me?"

title: Reborn as a Monster 2: Rise of the Beast God
alt_titles: Reborn as a Monster 2: Rise of the Beast God
description: A thousand years ago, under the blood moon, spatial rifts opened, heralding the era of monsters! Countless monsters rampaged across the globe! Just as humanity was on the brink of complete extinction, the emergence of “Beast Spirit Masters” brought a glimmer of hope to all of humanity! With generations of inheritance and the development of “Beast Spirit Masters”, humanity successfully created a new civilizational order to combat the monster invasion! Lin Yuan, who was a top assassin in his previous life but was tragically betrayed and killed by his organization, transmigrates…

title: At The End Of The World, I Still Want To Be With You
description:
“Even if the world ended and you were the only woman left, I’d rather date this waiter!”  
Just as Nuowan said these words, the apocalypse hit!? When he wakes up, there’s a male waiter by his side… Senyu. And although Senyu’s survival skills are invaluable, he keeps kissing Nuowan out of nowhere! Is he a post-apocalyptic hero, or a kissing demon? Can the pampered young heir and the OP waiter peacefully live out their days at the end of the world?

title: Fusion Fantasy: I, Invincibility Starting as the Prodigal!
alt_titles: Mixed Fantasy – My Journey To Become Invincible From Big-Spending Begins!
description:
Ye Feng transmigrated to XuanTian Continent and activated the invincible big-spender system. Hence, the journey of a big spender to become invincible begins. 

The Sect Leader Of the Star-Spirit Sect, Luo QianXue: “I am actually a Saintess from the upper realm. I fell prey to a conspiracy which led me to be reborn in this XuanTian Continent which belongs to the lower realm. I just want to cultivate peacefully and pass the tribulation as soon as possible in order to return to the upper realm. Ye Feng, can you stop being a big spender like this? I absolutely don’t want to grow the Sect at all. You are sent by the heavens to torture me, right?”

Feed the long-lost 9th Grade Breaking Tribulation Pill to the dogs, Use the painting containing forms of ruthless sword arts to light the fire. Use the supreme martial arts scroll as toilet paper. Every big shot in various sects went crazy. 

“Sect Leader, Ye Feng is too much of a big spender. I request you to do something about him!” 

Rare spiritual herbs, valuable spirit mines, supreme martial arts and unlimited spirit stones. 

“Every treasure you dream of obtaining… I have it all! Whether to give them to you or not, it all depends on my mood. I’m just a big spender for fun.” 

Seeing Luo QianXue successfully pass through the tribulation… Ye Feng thought to himself: 

“Big spender points have been used by the system and you’ve been directly promoted to the Nine Level Of Transcending Tribulation Realm.”

title: Beastmaster: I can see the complete encyclopedia of evolution
description: An awakening in a desperate situation, Li Wenxuan, an ordinary college student, was pushed into the era of fantasy beast masters by fate. Starting from the lowest level fantasy beast, he groped forward in revenge and protection, pursuing his own power and beliefs. This is a golden age where fantasy beasts and humans coexist, and Li Wenxuan is destined to embark on a unique path of rise.

title: Nine Star Hegemon Body Arts
alt_titles: Secret Arts Of The Nine Star Tyrant Body
description: Is Emperor Dan reborn? Is it a fusion of souls? Long Chen, who was stolen from his spiritual roots, spiritual blood, and spiritual bones, relied on the alchemy divine art in his memory to practice the mysterious nine-star hegemony tactics, to clear the heavy fog, and solve the shocking situation. The world in the palm of your hand, the sun, the moon, and the stars on your feet, hook up with all kinds of beauties and suppress evil spirits and evil spirits. Rivers and lakes rumors: When Long Chen arrives, the earth roars and the sky screams. When Long Chen came out, the ghost cried.

title: The Strongest Cultivation System
description:
Long Wanjun’s parents died unexpectedly, and he was attacked during an investigation.   
  
At the time of life and death, the pendant he carried was activated, and he obtained the "Daily Cultivation System".   
  
He needs to be calm in order to carry out his revenge and had to be patient to complete the tasks specified by the system.   
  
This kind of mission day after day, while trying to find the truth at the real cause of the death of his parents. The road is long and arduous but at the same time, it can be fulfilling.

title: How Do We Fall in Love Without a Body?
alt_titles: Mei You Shen Ti De Wo Men Ru He Lian Ai
description: Chen Nuo, who has a physique of “virus girl”, originally thought that she can leave behind her past by being a transparent person. Unfortunately, she messed with a cold, popular Prince Charming and became the school’s public enemy once again! However, her experience in the “Virtual World” that she unintentionally entered seems to be going smoothly? Should she continue to hold onto reality or should she free herself and be proud online? And at the same time getting a virtual relationship with someone with a model like body? Mm… the scheming little wolf at work seems to be a good choice too?

title: As Lovely as the Peach Blossoms
description: Legend has it that an invasion of foreign enemies during the last years of Daqi disrupted the people's peaceful life. Aspiring men rushed to join the army to protect the country. The tall and handsome Liu Yan was no exception. Meanwhile, noble-born Ye Qinxue joined the army in search of Liu Yan. When they meet again, Liu Yan is strangely affected by Ye Qinxue…

title: The Lost City
description:
Decommisioned police officer Zhounan, is perplexed by a peculiar psychological experience. Upon contact with any object, he is able to perceive an individual's thoughts and envision what they experienced. Evidently he finds himself entangled within the city he is in - the numerous legends within the Lost City cities. And those seemingly absurd legends hide surprising secrets. A weird world slowly opens its doors to us…

---
**Notes:**
- This is not long strip.

title: Masters of Endurance
description: In this world, there are a group of masters known as “Death God’s Enemy”. Those masters can withstand all kinds of diseases, disasters, and even death itself. As long as you have the right qualifications, you may even employ them to free you from the Death God’s grip.

title: Magic of Love
alt_titles: The Brave Men All Want to Practice Asceticism With the Devil King
Yongzhemen Dou Xiang He Mowang Xilian
Yǒngzhěmen Dōu Xiǎng Hé Mówáng Xiūliàn
description: The cold-blooded Demon King who has beaten all his enemies, who has always been second to none, ended up losing all his magical powers to a female hero who hexed him. What is this magical ritual that you do with the opposite sex’s lips? I can’t believe that even I, the formidable Demon King, have been defeated by this mysterious move! But no worries, I can retrain my abilities. It doesn't matter if you’re a succubus, an elf, a beast woman, or a noble hero’s descendant. I’ll use you as my training partner if I can help it. In order to revive the demon race, I’ll show you the Dual Cultivation Method!

title: Untouchable
description: A bad boy on the surface, a good kid on the inside; A bully on the surface, but a mischievous little devil on the inside. Two teenagers with different lives and different personalities develop a wonderful friendship by sheer chance. How will they make it last? "Untouchable" is here to answer that!

title: Handsome and Cute
description:
Tang Xiaohan (Han-Yi) almost lost her life in a traffic accident, but a miracle happened — she was revived in the body of a brain-dead vegetative patient. However, something isn't exactly right… The patient was a man!  
  
ES: Charlie sufre un accidente y para salvar su vida, usaron el cuerpo de un paciente recién fallecido por muerte cerebral…

title: The Queen's Knights
description: A good-for-nothing young lady was chosen by a chess piece by fate and crossed over to a strange, gorgeous magical world just like a children's fairy-tale. She went on a journey to save the world and become queen while collecting knights. An endgame covered in dust for a long time, a world on the edge of being shattered, finally arises after a new queen was born. Battles between kings, restraining deep feelings between the queen and the knights. Where will the fate of the magical world head towards? The young lady will become queen and her knights' glory will forever be with the her.

title: My Employer Can Only Sleep If I Hug Her
description: Xia Yu, a college student, takes on a strange part-time job: she's asked to accompany her employer to sleep?

title: Xyrin Empire
description:
The legendary tale of the Xyrin Empire is not about its struggles... or the tempest of another world or some cultivation myth. This is a super-serious, super-hard sci-fi manhua about saving the world.
Take what I’m saying seriously...
Not.
Okay, this is just a funny story about a deceptive human emperor, bringing his bunch of slippery alien leaders to have fun saving the world every day.
Chen Jun is an unmotivated otaku who turns into the Emperor of an ancient intergalactic magic sci-fi empire. With the aura of a stay-at-home dad, he is nothing but a middle-aged man who adopts a group of lolis... and an army of freeloading aliens that came out of nowhere. Er, what?
Ahem. Really though, this is a super-serious story... a super-mega-ultra-serious sci-fi story.
For the Empire!

title: Fox Concubine, Don't Play With Fire
description:
Can a fox successfully cultivate to get her human form back? And can she bring this handsome prince back to the 21st century with her? Let’s see!

---

**Links:**
- [Official Raw (Season 1)](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/645890)
- [Official Raw (Season 2)](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/650946)
- [Alternative Raw (KuaiKan)](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/5783)

title: The Pampered Regent of the Richest Woman
alt_titles: Rebirth as Richest Lady: Coddle Regent
description:
Great Yan's richest woman, Wen Jiu, struggled throughout her entire life to become wealthy. However, she was deceived by a scumbag, which caused her to lose both her life and wealth.  
  
When she woke up, she has become 15 years old again. Opening her eyes, she sees an old enemy on top of a sedan coming for marriage in place of his fifth brother! Knowing that the handsome man in front of her will one day become the regent, Wen Jiu firmly decided to show her favour to him: I will be responsible for earning money to support our family. Eldest brother please be at ease!  
  
Who would've expected that on the wedding night…  
Wen Jiu (Stunned): Eldest Brother, why did you enter the bridal chamber!

title: No Doubt in Us
description:
His Majesty comes too close. He is so handsome that the embarrassed Empress pushes him away reflexively and falls with him together into the pond. It was then they swapped their bodies. The way to swap back is unknown. The most important thing is that the emperor is quite angry now!!

Before everything could return to normal, Emperor has to deal with his mean imperial concubines that he never really known and the Empress now has to mediate between those Ministers.  
Having misunderstood each other, they learn to love and trust. To become husband and wife, and to love without doubt.  

---
- [Official Animation Page: Bilibili](https://www.bilibili.com/bangumi/media/md28223053/#detail)
- Official English Translation: [WebComics](https://www.webcomicsapp.com/comic/No-Doubt-In-Us/5a2deffe5bf9ca3b607e8bbf) | [Webnovel](https://www.webnovel.com/comic/no-doubt-in-us_14874427006993801) | [Bilibili](https://www.bilibilicomics.com/detail/mc2083)

title: Listen Attentively
description:
Born into a musical family, Gu Si was known as a genius, but was never recognized by his father because of the lack of emotion in his music. In order to overcome this shortcoming, Gu Si began to study the music of Charles, a musician known for his emotions. Who would have thought that halfway through the book, he would wake up 200 years ago and find himself in front of an inexpressive man with rusty piano skills, in front of me is actually the legendary Charles ?!  
  
  
Español: Nacido en una familia de músicos, Si Gu fue conocido como un prodigio, pero nunca fue reconocido por su padre debido a la falta de emoción en su música.
