Para superar esta deficiencia, Si Gu comenzó a estudiar la música de Charles, un músico conocido por sus emociones. ¿¡Quién hubiera pensado que a mitad del libro, me despertaría y volvería a hace 200 años, y este hombre inexpresivo y con habilidades de piano un poco oxidadas, delante de mí es en realidad el legendario Charles?!

title: My Life as the Retired Hero
description:
On the year I arrived on this continent, I ascended as the Sword Saint at 20 thanks to my unparalleled talent and extraordinary opportunities... Eh? Am I the protagonist? You've got it all wrong—look over there. Yes, that blonde narcissist is this story's real protagonist... Demon Lord? She pulled out at the start. As for a harem... Do you think a character like me has that sort of interest?! 

Ahem! Anyway, this is the tale of a disenchanted and unambitious Sword Saint...

title: The Witch's Daily Life
description: A witch getting married with a paladin is definitely a rebellious act in the eyes of those old and stubborn people from the Church. However, the Church haven't found out the fact that a useless and decadent witch shamelessly relied on her husband, a reliable and righteous paladin to live. And talking about their married life… obvious it won't be a peaceful one!

title: All Purpose Apocalyptic Upgrade System
description:
In a world overrun by zombies, survival is difficult, but I suddenly gained an all-purpose apocalyptic upgrade system.
What is this?!
By killing the zombie and completing tasks, you can earn upgrade points that can be used to upgrade anything. With this, I no longer fear material scarcity, I just have to keep upgrading. From fruit cores to trees that last for millennia, from wild fields to super farms, from broken guns to plasma explosive weapons, from peas to super zombie-killers, and from paper airplanes to F22s. With this system, a single person is equivalent to a whole city!

title: Journey to Heavens
description: Jiang Li is a cultivator traversing provinces which were engulfed by civil war in search of a legendary qilin. During his journey, he makes a living by fulfilling commissions to kill monsters.

title: The Love's Oath
description: “The ambition to pursue freedom is because I don’t want to marry into the tyrant’s family. I’m escaping from them and when I am surrounded by people, a mysterious young man rescues me. Who is he exactly?!”

title: Bloodline of Dragons
description: According to the original book of the same name of Zen Sword, in the Kowloon continent, the warrior is respected, and "blood" determines the achievement of life, and the strongest is the dragon blood! Jiang Ting was bullied by his family for his low blood grade. The help he got from his ancestors, with this opportunity, worked hard to train the blood, promote martial arts, and vowed to give everyone who looks down on him a slap in the face!

title: Prices Depreciated, and I Became the World's Richest Person
alt_titles: KāIjú Wùjià BiǎNzhí, Wǒ Chéngwéile Shìjiè ShǒUfù
description: I woke up to find the world had changed! Prices everywhere have decreased by a million times, yet my funds remain the same, making me wealthier than the world’s richest person! How should I spend all this money…

title: Fusion Fantasy: Nine Celestial Maiden Masters From The Get-Go
alt_titles: Xuanhuan: Kaiju Jiu Ge Xiannv Shifu
Xuánhuàn: Kāijú Jiǔ Gè Xiānnǚ Shīfù
description: Ye Xiu awakened the Eyes of the Gods from the start; No matter which superlative technique, it’s at full mastery! “What did you say, it took you tens of thousands of years to cultivate the rank nine immortal swordsmanship? I’m sorry, I just took a look and got full mastery!”. “The flame of the phoenix? The flame of the Vermillion Bird? The soul of the dragon god? Once I look at it, it’s mine!” “What? You say you are the strongest in the universe? I’m sorry, I have nine Celestial Masters for guidance!” In the vast world, who is pretentious enough to be the king? Ye Xiu: “Please call me the pretentious prick king!”

title: Master of the Resurgence of Spiritual Energy
description: The resurgence of spiritual energy on Earth. Shen An receives a message from his future self and embarks on an invincible path! Shen An wants to keep a low profile, but the beautiful women around him won't allow it!

title: Divine Perspective
description: An accident gave Ye Han an amazing perspective ability. Since then, his life has become rich and colorful, pioneering the strongest business empire, dominating the world of gambling, rejuvenating with one-handed medical skills, and becoming a master of medical ethics. Sitting on billions of fortunes, Loli, Yujie, Jinghua, and the goddess rushed towards him. As a man, but also a limited edition man, Ye Han was under great pressure and had to explore with several grave robbers. However, , A shocking secret that has been traced from ancient times to the present has gradually

title: Pantheon of Gods
description: Su Mu of the Su family of the Great Tang Dynasty was arrogant and gifted, but his cultivation was wasted due to a disease. One day, an arrow shot from outside the sky hits him, not only helping him to recover his strength, but also making Su Mu a divine master, and the eighth son who doubled back on his revenge returns ……

title: She Seems To Be Flirting With Me
alt_titles: Ta Hao Xiang Zai Liao Wo
Tā Hǎo Xiàng Zài Liāo Wǒ
She Seems To Be Flirting With Me
She Seems To Be Teasing Me
description:
Yu Chaoyan, who became wildly popular with her performance in Black and Red, is as well known for her various rumors as she is for her fame. However, in reality, she is just a girl with a poisonous mouth. Recently, Yu Chaoyan was angered by a male actor's linked publicity stunts, and in a fit of rage, she powerfully challenged him on live cameras:

"If this world only had this man, I would rather date a woman"

This bold statement immediately exploded into the hot polls and caused a huge uproar. As a result of this, Yu Chaoyan was attacked in the parking lot by the male actor's fanatical fans who were lying in wait. At the moment of danger, Yu Chaoyan was heroically saved by Yin Zhou, who entered by mistake after taking the wrong path…

title: Best Wedding
description: Xia Nuanxin is a prominent member of a thief organization. However, one of her missions is thwarted by underworld leader and business tycoon, Xiao Jue! Now, she must work as his assistant in order to get another opportunity. Could this be the start of a relationship?

title: My Disciples Cultivate, While I Slack Off!
description:
My family was scammed of all its money, and I was about to die and become the shortest-lived elder in the history of the sect… Luckily, my cheat code awakened, and created the Disciple Rebate System, giving my disciples trash pills and returning me the best-quality pills! First I’ll get revenge, then riches, and then I’ll fight against the strongest immortal emperor! 

A gentle pharmacist, the sexy daughter of an emperor, the one best at the way of the sword… they’re all my disciples!

---
Alt. Official English: [Webcomics](https://webcomicsapp.com/comic/Milking-my-Disciples/664b0feb8c252b273e560a3e)

title: Although I Obtained a Rare Profession, I'm Being Hunt Down by the Whole Server?
alt_titles: Although I Obtained a Rare Profession, I'm Being Hunt Down by the Whole Server?
I Attained the Legendary Profession But Now I’m Being Hunted Down by the Whole Server?!
description: [The reputation value reaches -100, Reputation level: villain. All attributes increase prestige value*-10%] [Prestige value reaches -1000, prestige level: terrifying. All skill level +10, CD reduced by 90%] [Reputation value reaches -10000, prestige level: Notorious. ? ? ? ] Gradually when Yuan Ye came back to his senses, he found that he had become the biggest BOSS-level celebrity player in the entire game world!

title: I Am Really Not the Demon Lord!
alt_titles: I'm Really Not The Demon King
description: Awakened from killing, to become the strongest demon lord! To survive, Fang Cheng is forced to sign a contract with the “Killing Devil”, and unlock skills by killing other devils, in this dark age under the invasion of devils, Fang Cheng swore to become the strongest, and kill his way towards being the strongest!

title: My Bodyguard Is 4 Feet Tall
description:
On the cusp of becoming a middle-aged man, Gin poses as a private investigator during the day while running an illegal body-modification drug business on the side. This seemingly "tranquil" lifestyle is about to be shattered by the arrival of a mysterious boy. Ian, the boy, claims that from now on, he will protect Gin, who'd lost both his parents at a young age. Faced with his new pushy, pint-sized roommate slash "bodyguard", will Gin cooperate or…

---
Alt. Official English: [Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/my-bodyguard-is-4-feet-tall/info)

title: Dominating the Cultivation Realm with Muscles
alt_titles: Dominating the Cultivation Realm with Muscles
I Use My Muscles to Dominate the World of Cultivating Immortals
description: Astonishing! A top-tier powerhouse defeated by a set of radio calisthenics! In “Today’s Immortal News,” witness a tale where a man punches his way through luck-favored experts, kicks against powerful cultivators, all without spiritual roots or the ability to manipulate spiritual energy. Yet, he defies all odds, using his sheer MUSCLES to ascend the heights of cultivation and reach the pinnacle of immortality.

title: YuZe of the Peach Blossom Springs
description: A runaway young master accidentally falls into the water and strays into the legendary Peach Blossom Springs. Just like described by the ancient poem, no pressure or disputes would arise in there, and the whole place seems like from a fairytale. Everything is perfect, but a feeling that something is wrong still remains. What is hidden behind the Peach Blossom Springs?

title: I’m the Girl With the Hacks!
alt_titles: The Tyrannical Lady Has a Cheat!
Bitch, I'm a Young Lady With HaxI
description: I barely managed to confess to my idol and was about to experience my sweet first love life, but I was electrocuted and sent to a cultivation world?! Cheats given to me, my IQ raised from idiot to genius, I could go mob XP by grinding with my senpais, and I still had to face a happy new life. Isn't a goddess's life the best?! I wonder which senpai's flag I'll raise tonight…

title: Love Never Fails
description: A Young boy and girl live under one roof and go through the ignorance and troubles of youth. The warmly-influenced ultra-popular girl goes through a mix of confusing feelings as she experiences her youth.

title: A Story About How a Human and an Elf Met
description:
A oneshot fan-comic by Shi Yi Er of the Chinese mobile game "Time Princess".

Disclaimer: Only the setting and few selected scenes in the comic are canon.

title: Wei Ming Shen Dou
description: A reclusive youth, Ye Feng, fell into a foreign world. He then started a new chapter of his life in the world of "Ming".

title: I Can See the Forbidden Zone Rules
description:
Two hundred years ago, the White Mist Forbidden Land suddenly appeared, and the world underwent a huge change. Monsters and supernatural beings with various strange powers appeared. 

The White Mist Forbidden Land is known as the Forbidden Zone for Life. Only one in ten thousand people who enter it survives. 

After being imprisoned by the mysterious wall for seven years, Ye Shiqi, who was tired of life, finally stepped into the White Mist Forbidden Land again. 

With the reappearance of blindness, a set of information suddenly appeared in front of Ye Shiqi’s eyes: That is the forbidden zone rules that have troubled mankind for many years!

title: Super Gene
description: As foretold, countless alien monsters have invaded the world but by eating them, humans can obtain their genes. With this, mankind began a new era of gene evolution. Hansen, a newcomer to the sanctuary is regarded as a ‘Crazy Demon’ but no-one knows that he is also the ‘B God’ respected by everyone. Hansen: Sorry but only I can obtain the Super Gene!

title: Nine Days of Martial Arts
description: Wearing the blood of the sky, holding a blood-drinking mad sword, chasing the traces of his father, advancing with the body of waste wood. Comprehend the Three Thousand Avenues and start the road to the king of nine days step by step!

title: The brightest giant star in the world
description:
She, the prodigious girl that stood at the pinnacle of the Global Martial Arts Competition, won the championship for five consecutive years, dominated the arena, and was dubbed the undefeatable king! He, a top tier superstar born into a wealthy family, possessed transcending beauty, was cold and black bellied, and had countless fans. When she accidentally reincarnated, as his fiancée, a sky full of blackmail material from trivial white formicas flying around, facing a world full of black fans, Lin Fan laughed coldly: If the whole world dissed her, then she’ll make the whole world tremble! Even if the wind blows against her, she would never back down!  
  
  
tl/n: white formicas(白富美）are slang for women who have fair skin, are financially capable, and are beautiful

title: My Wife Is a Male Sensation
alt_titles: My Wife Is a Male Idol
Wo De Laopo Shi Nan Shen
description: A girl had a dream of singing, and she was scouted by accident on the street by her producer. But the producer said her voice was too low to be a female singer, so the producer decided to dress her like a man and told her to sing in a duo. But then the girl got married, which led to the story that is being told of her hiding her secret identity to others as a popular male idol.

title: Divine Spirit
description: Taichu Realm is where people's souls belong after death. The terrain is complex and the cities are numerous. They are ruled by emperors and generals who have awakened the spirits of the gods. Qin Xi and Fang Qian entered the Taichu Realm by mistake, but occasionally they met Raksha and invaded them. Bearing the legend of Tianzong, they had high hopes from the Five Divisions and practiced the spirit of the martial arts. However, with the passage of time, they gradually discovered that there was a greater danger behind Raksha ’s attack.

title: My Cultivator Girlfriend
alt_titles: Wo De Tian Jie Nv You
description: In the modern cultivation world, everywhere is law of the jungle, everyone feels insecure. After saving a cultivatior girl, the security guard Ma Yingxiong accidentally starts the journey of practicing cultivation.

title: The Code to the Evolutionary Spiral
description: In 2024, mankind's insatiable appetite finally opened the Pandora's Box of technology, releasing the long-sealed demonic seeds and catalyzing the process of life's evolution. The irresistible catastrophe instantly annihilated the entire human civilization, leaving behind only the scorched earth of steel and iron, a symbol of the former prosperity, and the survivors who lingered on top of it. In this chaotic world of collapsed order and crumbling faith, can humanity unite to rebuild civilization? In this devastated wasteland, the heroes representing various forces pass a number of tests to complete their own redemption and finally embark on a difficult journey to find the truth of the end times.

title: My Wife Is the Union Leader of Martial Arts Circles
alt_titles: My Wife is a Kung Fu Teacher
description: He was originally just your average joe, but he was chosen by the female martial arts union leader, Murong Ying, to be her husband because of his pure yang physique. The 11 years of cultivation he absorbed from Murong Ying helped kickstart his cultivation career, allowing him to dominate the campus, become an escort, become an island owner, and fight on his own path. After finally reaching the immortal realm, he became the world's number one hero.

title: I Really Don't Want to Be the First
alt_titles: I Really Don't Want to Be the First
description: After repeated reincarnations and repeated deaths, Xu Xiaowen discovered that he had the first BUFF, and would easily rise to number one in everything no matter what he did, and then violently die the same day. This time, Xu Xiaowen made a wish: he should be wasteful and strive to live to be eighty years old! However, God toyed with him again, did he reveal himself with an all-powerful superpower?

title: My Girlfriend Is Long Aotian
description: In legends, the most powerful person in the world is called Long Aotian... I always thought it was the name of a man, but she was actually the name of a beautiful woman?! She can make people think she's amazing without knowing why with just a cold smile, and bring people to their knees with a single stomp! She can flatten mountains with a flick of her hand! She can tear the skies open with a single finger! She is invincible and unparalleled in the world! However most importantly... She is my girlfriend and listens to everything I say!

title: This Love is Not For Sale
description: A kind girl, who had her first love… but unfortunately, her parents were in debt to a gang, and was beat up for 5 years… In an alley, a rich handsome man come saves her, yet he is a stranger, but also knows everything about her.

title: The Invincible Warlord
description: Zhian Tian was abandoned by his father along with his mother and sister. They moved to East China Sea to earn a living, but his mother was murdered and framed to look like a suicide jump off of a building.. Fortunately, a mysterious person rescued him and took him to join the army. After ten years of bloody battlefields and fighting bravely to kill enemies, Zhan Tian ascended from being a border pawn, all the way to being called 'The God of War'. He lead the iron cavalry under his command to sweep borders, guard territories, drive out the barbarians, and set a world-leading feat. Ten years later, he received an imperial edict and returned to Beijing to report on his duties. Finally, he had the opportunity to make everyone tremble under his feet.

title: Zoombie City
description: [exclusive/updates on every Saturday] Doomsday suddenly occurs, and Qin An's girlfriend, who has been in love with him for 7 years, suddenly betrays him. Then, things are not as simple as they seem. Many clues slowly unravel. All of the stories are not so plain and ordinary. Qin An is unsure of what is going on and what to do. So, he embarks on his own quest, while simultaneously searching for love.

title: Zhen Zhen Nan Wei
description: Transmigrated into a harem game, Li Zhenzhen became Luxian Peak's most popular disciple. Practicing the sword with assertive male disciples, having heart-to-heart conversations with warm-hearted female disciples, solving everyone's problems... whether the capture targets are gentle or strong, express their love directly or indirectly, Li Zhenzhen must raise their affections in order to survive. But she never would have thought the consequences of raising affections would be so serious...!

title: Cultivator x Contract Spirit
alt_titles: Dao Shi x Qi Yue Yao
description: In a world where all the cultivators and spiritual beasts are chasing after the peak of cultivation and looking for a strong partner to create a contract with, a weak and low-ranking fox spirit was left out. While wallowing in his disappointment and despair, he met a dashing little cultivator, who at the age of 11 was already a genius cultivator that could circulate Qi in his body!? Would he really be willing to create a contract with such a useless fox spirit?

title: Transmigration Journal : The making of a Star
description: Zhuang Min is a popular artiste's assistant, due to one accident while filming an ancient set, she transmigrates to another world! Become a maid servant of a big family! After a series of shock, she reluctantly accept that she doesn't have the luck of other transmigrators , she decide to rebel against the norms , shaving off her servant status and obtaining freedom! A few miracles meetings, Zhuang Min gains some support, adventuring in the ancient era creating her leisure kingdom, and also some hot guys!

title: All the Girls in the Cultivation World Want a Piece of Me
alt_titles: The Girls in the Entire Cultivation World Want to Catch Me
description: I, Xia Yi, have the Congenital Cultivation Body, and can master any and all techniques under heaven, and would be able to improve the constitution of any woman who dual-cultivates with me. But what will happen to a person who has the Congenital Cultivation Body and hasn't become strong yet? Of course, he'll be sought after by all the women who want to use him as a cultivation tool!

title: These Years in Quest of Honour Mine
alt_titles: Ten Thousand Miles in Search of Honour
description:
Yu Ziyou and Zhong Wan served different masters.  
  
They had once been the closest of souls, and were the bitterest of enemies.  
  
After losing the fight for the throne, Zhong Wan brought his two young masters with him far toward the borders for the sake of survival. He relied on the little friendship that existed between him and Yu Ziyou when they were young. He borrowed some of his personal belongings while also dropping various hints around which made everyone think that there was something intimate going on between them.  
  
Given the Yu Clan’s powerful authoritative presence in the imperial court, this appearance of a close tie allowed Zhong Wan to live a much better life than before. As such, the stories he cooked up began to carry more and more weight.  
  
As rumors of their lovely romance spread a thousand miles into the horizon, Yu Ziyou, who was located in the distant capital city, eventually caught wind of his deeply moving and epic love affair. In a trance, Yu Ziyou, who had been completely brainwashed for seven years, believed in them. He guessed something special really did happen between them back in those years…

title: I Am A God Of Medicine
description: He studied medicine in the prefecture and eventually became a god of medicine. A hapless dick can be hell because of an accident. She embraces the judge's big thick legs, learns from ancient famous doctors, learns magical medicine, and eventually becomes a generation of gods of medicine.

title: Shattering the Laws of Plot Armor!
description: F*ck! Another harem novel?! Why is it that as long as it's a woman, she will inevitably fall for you?! I really hate this type of male MC! Lin Yaofei complained as he read through the webnovel. At the same time, a notification popped up on his phone in a form of a choice question that asked: Do you like reading these types of novels? A: YES! B: NO! He chose B without hesitation, then was suddenly summoned by an unknown system…

title: Demand Killer
description: The killer, Cong Zhong Feng has always despised those who fail to keep their word, especially those first parties who keep changing their requests! When he meets a bald young painter, Cong Zhong Feng agrees to avenge her for free. Who would have expected that along the way, they would meet “a set of Matryoshka”, who is the ultimate target?

title: Barbaric Husband Gently Loves
description:
She was kidnapped by a man all over the city! "Hey, give me a baby…" This black belly prince madly pets the young wife.  
–  
She encountered him by mistake but now he won't let her get away that easily. And he seems to be a real prince?!

title: Sijin
alt_titles: The Brocaded Tale of the Girl Si
description:
A noble girl traveled back in time to when she was 15 years old. Her mistakes and those who have harmed her or done her injustice, she will get revenge on all of them! A super smart female lead shall turn all of her misfortune around!  
  
The misfortune of her life began with a bad affair. The first husband hated her for killing his white moonlight, and the second husband, though so fond of her, seemed to take her as a substitute? Now reborn again back to her past, she pledges to keep her fate firmly in hand!

title: With A Sword Domain, I Can Become The Sword Saint
alt_titles: Kai Ju You Jian Yu, Wo Neng Gou Cheng Jian Shen
Kāi Jú Yǒu Jiàn Yù, Wǒ Néng Gǒu Chéng Jiàn Shén
Becoming A Sword Deity By Expanding My Sword Domain
description: Zhang Fan, who transmigrated into another world, finally became a cultivator but was framed by others and lost all his cultivation. Just as he was about to die, the system was activated and gods, immortals, demon emperors all became nothing to him. The invincible Zhang Fan wanted to tear apart the skies with one strike, however, there was a limit to the range of his sword domain. In order to get the experience points required to increase its range, Zhang Fan had no other choice but to lure evil to himself. From then on, a new legend of him conquering gods and overpowering countless rulers appeared in the world.

title: The Strongest Peach Blossom
description: Lu Dequan, a poor college student with excellent academic performance and excellent academic performance, suddenly “becomes” to become a descendant of Huaxian, and has various special abilities that are conducive to picking up girls. It’s just that he hasn’t practiced the “Taoyun Collection” and he must cleanse himself. Once he has close contact with women, he will die on the spot. The only way is to gather the true love of different types of top-notch beauties and cultivate the highest realm of the collection. At the same time, there are also the night-evil clan with strange behaviors who have repeatedly shot … and see the pure male college students, what is the adventure after having the strongest peach blossom? !

title: The Revenge of the Betrayed Strongest Knight
description: Klein, who fell from the throne of the King of Knights, was betrayed by his comrades and sentenced to be burned at the stake. In his final moments, Klein scoffs at the foolishness of this world and his past self. Now, having returned from hell, Klein has gained unparalleled power. He will make those who betrayed him pay the price...

title: Paranormal Flirting
alt_titles: Strange Tales of the Republic of China
description: Even in the nation where Strange Tales had become a myth, occurrences of the paranormal persisted. Lu Wuji, an ordinary hoodlum, inadvertently crossed paths with the young demon huntress Xiao Zhai, and a destined adventure full of freakishness commenced…

title: Miss Zuo Ying
description:
Zuo Ying, a once-renowned criminal investigation expert at Huanyang University and a prominent figure in the legal community, was brought to trial by her own daughter, Zuo Yang, who accused her of crimes. Just as Zuo Ying was about to be sentenced to death, the court abruptly changed her sentence, ordering her to be confined in an insane asylum instead. Due to her success in solving this case, Zuo Yang was promoted rapidly. However, soon after, a series of murders broke out in the city, and unable to solve the cases, she was forced to seek her mother's assistance.

Facing her mother, who had once brought her love but now only left behind a complicated and indescribable mix of emotions, Zuo Yang felt a thin layer of sweat form on her cheeks.

"My darling daughter, if all it takes is a little pleading to get my help, why not?" Zuo Ying said, glancing at the newspaper in her hand, squinting as she smiled. The shackles on her hands were so conspicuous—who really was the caged bird here?

title: Circle
description:
The best way for the diverse human beings who make up society to unite is to find themselves a common enemy. School is a mini-version of society, so why shouldn't the same thing happen in a classroom setting?  
  
This particular class has chosen Xiao Shang to be that common enemy. But one of its more popular students soon finds himself becoming intrigued by Shang's unapologetic, straightforward way of life.  

This comic is posted for free on the author's weibo: <https://weibo.com/u/3567976483>

title: One of Them Is the Devil
alt_titles: Among Them Is the Demon Lord
description: I am a professionally trained second-generation hero! Goal: Find a way to seal the demon lord through kissing! Are all the demon lords super beautiful?! Oh, that's just what I’ll kiss and destroy~

title: Rejoice in Your Enemies
description: His beloved crush was snatched up by the nerdy new student.  Furious, Ren Zhichu tries to harass that nerd at every chance he gets. Unexpectedly, during their interactions with each other, Ren Zhichu actually develops feelings for that nerd...

title: Ten Miles of Peach Blossoms
alt_titles: San Sheng San Shi Shi Li Tao Hua
description:
Through the course of unlikely coincidences, a man and woman meet again and again in three different lives. What will become of their love in the world of the immortals?  
  
Based on the novel which plagiarized (almost word for word, yet the author still denies) from a BL novel.

title: 404 Case Manual: 30 Seconds Till Apocalypse
description: A young man named Hope lived a life without hope. Unemployment, break up, unimportant, family debt… When he was finally pushed by the despair in life to jump off a building and end his life, his phone strangely received a 30 seconds countdown timer. When the countdown finished, strange things happened…

title: Reincarnated as the Villain in a Cultivation Game
alt_titles: Become Villain in the Game Cultivation
Becoming the Villainous Young Master in a Cultivation Game
Becoming Villain in a Wuxia Game
Crossing to Became the Villain of the Game of Cultivating Immortals
description: After the sudden death of a high-ranking player, he crossed over into the game and became the villainous young master that had died after being cursed and stabbed. Within the dark coffin, the pretty System gave him a starter pack and bestowed 10,000 Spiritual Power upon him! The same tragic life, but a chance to turn the tables! He kicked away the cover of his coffin, then used the power of words to romance all the beautiful girls! In this script filled with death flags, he will overcome all challenges to spite that damned game designer!

title: War Dao Sanctification
description: Ye Dongfeng, the supreme master of the world, was an inch away from the ethereal way(Becoming an immortal), but was calculated at a critical moment and reborn at the beginning of everything. In this life, Ye Dongfeng created a perfect Taoist heart. He slightly got up and pushed the world with awe-inspiring resources, turning his hands into clouds, making rain with his hands, and stepping over and crossing every difficulty with his own power. The regrets and unwillingness of the previous life were wiped out, and he became famous in the ancient times, and he became the holy lord with war as his way.

title: Shoujo Kageki Revue Starlight - Fox Demon Maya and Human Claudine (Doujinshi)
description:
Maya is a nine-tailed demon fox who meets a kind human girl named Claudine. She befriends the human girl and is impressed with her character and sense of self, enough to decide to stay by her side as a companion; however, the more time she spends with Claudine, the more strangely familiar she begins to find the other girl's presence…  
  
(Doujinshi - 7 Chapters Total)  
  
Source Anime: Shoujo Kageki Revue Starlight ☆

title: I Created a Salvation Organization
description: He got a doomsday salvation system. As long as he saves the world, he can have everything. He recruited top talents to build the Pan-Human Principle Guardian Association. He descended into the doomsday worlds as the guardian of human principles, allowing the whole world to admire him and worship him as a god. The ultimate natural disaster. The mutation frenzy. The whisper of the evil god. Thus, a huge organization spanning many worlds, taking the protection of human principles as its own responsibility and saving civilization from the fate of destruction, gradually appeared in the eyes of the world.

title: My 1000th lifetime as a furnace
alt_titles: YIqie cong wo chengwei lu ding kaishi
Yīqiè Cóng Wǒ Chéngwéi Lú Dǐng Kāishǐ
Everything Started When I Became a Furnace
It All Started When I Became a Furnace
description: Ye Yan, a thousand lifetimes as a furnace has actually been reborn again and became the direct disciple of an immort sect's sect master. However, fate isn't that kind, he as a furnace is actually being captive by this so-called discipleship. When he is about to be harvested, the system awakened!! He obtained a novice gift pack and obtained a bottle of pills to forcibly improve his cultivation for a short period. The Berserk Pill, a Yuan Ying pill, and a second-stage Qi cultivation base. Suddenly, the system gives out the task: Escape from the master's abode. Update every Friday!

title: Ultramarine Magmel
description:
One day in the middle of the pacific ocean a miracle occurred, a new continent appeared out of nowhere!   
The new continent was the home for new & mysterious plants, creatures & minerals!  
  
Humanity is excited as the age of exploration has returned.

title: 10 Years That I Loved You the Most
alt_titles: 10 years where I loved you the most
The 10 Years that I loved you
description: I've loved you the most for most of my life. Now I am a piece of crumpled paper in the corner you would never glimpse. I thought you would be my today and all of my tomorrows. I imagined that someday you would turn around again and stare at me with all your love. However, when our love is gone, I'll just pick a sunny afternoon with gentle wind, put on my coat and leave for good...

title: My Apocalypse Street Stall
alt_titles: I Set Up a Stall in the Apocalypse
description: After a car accident, college student Gao Xiaoliang is bound to a ‘**Gourmet System**’ and transported into an apocalyptic world. To earn his way back to life, he must set up a street stall and survive in a city overrun by zombies.

title: Sea You There and Us
alt_titles: Mao Yu Hai De Bi Duan
description:
Coming from a single parent family, Wu Xiaorong is ridiculed by both her peers and teachers. She despises going to school yet when she enters her third year of primary school she meets the class celebrity, Tong Kewei. Although Wu Xiaorong feels like the two are from separate worlds, a moment of impulsivity leads to an intimate encounter...

Won silver place at the 2022 Japan International Manga Award

title: Dao Yin
description: Jiang Xiaofan accidentally traveled to a different dimension and ended up as a beggar. He never had a chance to practice martial arts previously, but he accidentally obtained fragments of Dao Yin and inherited its secret moves.This is a journey of our hero in this trouble-filled new world!!

title: Myths from Heaven
description:
A fantasy story based on twins! The heartbreaking past that has resurfaced in the present.   
  
In my past life I was a pair with my disciple, and in my present life complicated feelings between my sister and I have started to arise…

title: Feng · Jin Shen Lu
alt_titles: Sealed Record of the Forbidden God
description: Every night, Jiang Xiao Ya has a recurring dream of the same mysterious man. He’s got fire-red hair and indescribable power. One day, by pure coincidence, she meets him in real life! As it turns out, this man has a very important job: he’s guarding ancient, dormant beasts. To make matters worse, Jiang Xiao Ya inexplicably inherits the powers of Jiang Zi Ya, and gets drawn into the battle against these ancient beasts. A tale that transcends time and space unfolds!

title: Desharow Merman
description:
Desharow, a Biology student at the Russian Maritime Academy, embarked on a long distance voyage with his mentor, Rhine, where the two caught a mysterious black scaled merman in Iceland. Little did he know that this mysterious black and evil creature had long viewed him as his prey…

Official Translations:
[Official Korean Translation](https://www.peanutoon.com/ko/comic/detail/11357)

title: Heavenly Robber
description:
Xiao Yu, a genius of Go on the modern earth, is a Go idiot (A boy with a crazy mind).  
 Abducted by an old man with white beard to another world, and encountering a weird GoBoard with secrets and spiritual power etc.   
This GoBoard seems to be a colour embryo.   
Look at how our 21st century gifted Go teenager conquer exotic beauties and Daxing Go Road!

title: In a Post-Apocalyptic World, I'll Become the Richest Man Ever!
alt_titles: In the Last Days, Just Became the Richest Man
Become the Richest Man in the Last Days
description: Zhou Yuan, an ordinary office worker, has a rough life, aside from being oppressed by his higher - ups, he also is poor. But due to this unexpected opportunity, Zhou Yuan gained a system. And now, his life takes a complete 180° turn.

title: My Young Lady is a NEET
description:
The daughter of the Li Family has always been mysterious, and it has always been rumored that she's a prim and proper, graceful young lady. In reality, however, she is a shut-in otaku who never puts on make up nor brushes her hair, and even has social anxiety.   
  
Upon being met with an engagement from Han Group, the young university student-cum-insurance promoter Gu Yuan has been hired to transform this girl into an upper-class young lady. Can he succeed?

title: Surprise Marriage
alt_titles: A Doting Marriage Dropped from the Clouds
description: She was confused by the marriage, but more confused by the fact that he was not a willing participant! He forced her to withdraw from the marriage and realized that he was too harsh on her. Later, he comforted and pampered her like a baby, giving off an illusion of sweet love. When she got tired of their relationship and tried to back out, she was drawn back in with a promise for responsibility...what’s going on in his mind?

title: Zhi Zi Zhi Jian
description:
One is a little demon genius Zhi Jian (Sword Controller), and the other one is an indifferent Brother with excellent qualifications that has been coveted by countless people. What tactics could a sword genius use to form a ‘Dao Lu’ (Cultivation Couple) union with his brother? What difficulties and obstacles await them behind their backs…?  
  
||||

title: War of Mountains and Seas
description:
Between the mountains and the seas, there was a war with the beasts for survival. A man, named Bo Yi, discovered that drinking the beasts blood would grant him powers. Bo Yi traveled the world, recorded these beasts, and wrote the "Shan Hai Jing", he also established «Shang Hai Jing» city, to promote the idea of eating beasts to gain the power to hunt them. But when relations with other countries soured, Bo Yi had disappeared. Since then «Shan Hai Jing» started the pursuit of fame and profit.  
  
A young man is a slave at «Shan Hai Jing», however, he has an astonishing ability. The battle with the beasts changed the fate of both this young man and the entire world.

title: Her Smile So Sweet
alt_titles: Ta De Weixiao Xiang Ke Tang
description:
Xu Jingshu of second-year class 1 is a cold person who doesn't talk a lot, and if it weren't for the teacher constantly sending her out of math class as punishment, she may as well be invisible.
That is, until the transfer student Chu Youning shows up. He's attracted to her candy-sweet smile, so on certain afternoons, one could see the god of studying, Chu Youning in the upstairs independent study room teaching math to Xu Jingshu.

title: The female teacher who fights back
description: Like black to white, the blood-curdling Blood Rakshasa, in an unexpected turn of events, became a teacher at the Shengtian College. And was even entrusted with an important task? In class, some truant, grinning students would ask, “Teacher, what is life’s greatest pain?” In response, rushing ahead to block the door, a certain woman would casually reply, “Life’s greatest pain is that you haven’t graduated since I came!”

title: Heartsick
description:
As two girls with completely different personalities meet each other, their share of interests resulted in them coming together. However, both of them face a hard journey ahead by being in different cities and having difficult parents…  
Author Weibo: <https://www.weibo.com/u/5360925536>

title: Boss wants to eat me!
alt_titles: My Boss Keeps Trying To Eat Me!
description: Hillbilly-CEO with Zero (0) fashion sense X Bamboo-rat-turned-Mukbang-streamer. Even though he's just a bamboo rat, Ou Yixi still has his own hopes and dreams! But why do I keep feeling a chill down my back on the road to achieving my dreams? And why does my CEO keep salivating every time he sees me?! Bamboo rats are so cute - how could you even think about eating us!

title: The King's First Embrace
alt_titles: The King's First Embrace (western & eastern vampire)
description:
Qin Xiaoqing, a pretty female vampire, was cursed by another jealous vampire and sent to another realm. There she met the king of the vampire who's got a hot face and a six- pack that no girl can resist. However, the curse she got made men think that she was ugly. Then how could she seduce the hot vampire king?  
  
(Chapters 1-43 can be read on WeComics.)

title: Confession
description: A story between the handsome yet loving pilot Zhou Jingze and a gentle yet dependable doctor, Xu Sui. Summer has always been warm, so is the boy I love. Stay tune to see the undying love of the "infatuated playboy" Zhou Jingze.

title: Detective Duo
description: During a thrilling escape from her wedding, the energetic female detective Su Mu bumps in to the Ministry of Investigation's boss, Zhang Zhao. The two bicker and harass each other while maintaining a complete, yet silent, mutual understanding. As they journey, hand in hand, cracking cases together, feelings begin to grow. But at the same time, details about their heavily linked past start to come to the surface…

title: The Most Powerful Brother-In-Law In History
alt_titles: The Most Powerful Brother-In-Law In History
description: After going through the ups and downs of life, Tang Yun, after having awakened the golden finger against all odds, strongly refused to become a worthless son-in-law, took care of his own life, and fled with his wife and disobedient sister-in-law.

title: Thank You
description: On the eve of her wedding, Bai Qiandu received word of her fiancé, Zhongli's death. This shocking revelation turned Qiandu's life on its head and she learns from others that he suffered from severe depression. Was it an accident that Zhongli died or pre-mediated suicide? In order to uncover the true circumstances behind Zhongli's death, Qiandu sets out on a journey to retrace his steps. And the unexpected truth she ends up finding out is…

title: Rakshasa Street
description:
Rakshasa Street, one of many Requiem Streets, a place where spirits and humans co-exist. Not all humans can enter a Requiem Street, only those rare-soul users with guardian spirits may. 
Xia Ling was just a normal university intern, but a chance meeting changes her ordinary life… In this world full of evil spirits, can she cooperate with her guardian spirit in order to survive?

title: Touch Your World
description: Xie Cheng, born unable to see colors, has been living in a world of black and white for years. Until one day he encounters Mr Bai Lu who was being chased by people, and unexpectedly discovers he has a unique beautiful color. What kind of spark will happen when two different people meet by chance?

title: Run Wild
description:
As soon as Jiang Cheng finds out he's adopted, he's abandoned by his adoptive family and sent to live with his deadbeat father, who has a gambling addiction. Everything about his new life, from his pathetic father to the unfamiliar environment, makes Jiang Cheng depressed. But then he meets Gu Fei, who's like a shining bright light in this run-down city, and the two become each other's salvation and hope.
(Source: Tappytoon)

title: Unorthodox Spiritualist
description:
With his teacher's command, he is the only sole seedling left in the gate, fighting the demons of this world alone, known as "South City Little Monster Road"! No spell matrix methods are left alone, and the Master Zhen Chuan Ling Quan Sword has to be mastered, but the enemy is far stronger than he thought! The road to killing demons must be walked on fearlessly.  


---

title: Violent Path Martial Arts School
description:
Please note that this Manhua is read from Right to Left!   
  
Sold for 20 coppers as a lifetime apprentice to WuDang, how will Yun WuWei deal with the impoverished WuDang Academy's daily life? What kind of hilarious hijinks will the rest of the gang from E'Mei, KongDong, and HuaShan get up to? Who will be selected for the highest institution of martial arts?

title: Leaf and Bell
description: Linlin is a fashion design student, upon touching the tree spirit “Ye”, the two agreed to help each other out. Linlin turned from an ordinary student to the talk of the school due to Ye’s power and her life changed drastically. Ye slowly fell in love with Linlin and with Linlin’s help, Ye finally found his long dead sister’s body but he must face love, affection, and deception……

title: His Mystery Girl
description:
The glamorous daughter of the city’s richest family falls from grace- quite literally, as she falls off a building and dies! However, her story is just beginning.
___
**Background Artists:** [Lao Wu](https://mangadex.org/author/986fcf5b-73cb-4b07-ac01-a0acdf9e3297), [Youxia Zhier](https://mangadex.org/author/5a6c167d-4fa8-44ca-b79f-b8c54a09c87f)
**Colorists:** [Amu](https://mangadex.org/author/798b4cd9-1d55-4ef1-9ef0-fa30c8786f90), [MAY Zi](https://mangadex.org/author/fd82d970-a724-4a4b-b443-845d388d606f)

title: Li Zi and Nian Nian
description: In a large city, a small social circle, how do people fall in love? Tang Li, a housing agent who joined the workforce in Hangzhou, unknowingly fell in love with Nian Nian, a part-time female shopkeeper at a late-night restaurant. The two helped each other out, became roommates, and gradually started falling in love.

title: Stop Bothering Me, Emperor!
description:
Song Xiao only wanted to be a man of virtue, but somehow ended up being forced into a marriage with his Highness, plotted by the cunning emperor himself. However, just as the generation of great businesses began to flourish, the emperor died… When Song Xiao opened his eyes again, he finds himself in a college entrance exam… but why does his seatmate look so familiar?!  
His Highness: ▼\_▼ Let me copy your homework.  
Song Xiao: …

title: 61 Days with You
description: “Let’s break up, but just give me 61 days, okay?” — this relationship that cannot be continued, two hearts that still throb, nine long-awaited destinations and 61 days with you. This time, no one knows if this break-up trip will end as a regretful make-up or something left to luck. A very sweet, sincere and romantic love, the reality of confusion and struggle; will we still have a future? A masterpiece on a cure for metropolitan affections, a bittersweet story is now online.

title: ONCE
description:
Mo Li's appearance is Bai Jiu's salvation, and the hope and light in Bai Jiu's eyes are treasures that Mo Li is willing to do her best to protect. ...Can we give each other another chance?

[Original Webcomic](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/10925/)

title: Dragon Raja III: Back Moon Tide
alt_titles: Dragon Raja III: Back Moon Tide
description:
When a mysterious heartbeat is detected under the seas of Japan, Luminous, Caesar Gattuso and Johann Chu, (also known as the Ace Team of Cassell College) get sent on a mission to Tokyo, where they must cooperate with Cassell's Japanese branch, led by the conflicted Chisei Gen.   
After an unexpected turn of events, the trio will find itself in the middle of a hybrid mafia war.  
  
Adapted from the original novel which has also been turned into a game.

title: Stockpiling Ten Thousand Tons of Pork During the Apocalypse
alt_titles: Kongjian Xi Lao Liu, Moshi Xian Dun Yi Wan Dun Zhurou
Kōngjiān Xì Lǎo Liù, Mòshì Xiān Dùn Yī Wàn Dùn Zhūròu
description: “Mr. Chen, the one hundred portions of roasted duck that you ordered is here.” “Mr. Chen, the ten thousand pounds of pork that you ordered is here.” Chen Luo, also known as the Void Sovereign, hid like a coward with his outstanding powers until all the survivors died before him. Having found no meaning in life, he decided to bury himself. It wasn’t that he couldn’t survive, he just didn’t want to live anymore. After waking up, Chen Luo is shocked to find out that he has been reincarnated to one month before the apocalypse, and that the subspace he created in his past life with his powers was also retained.

title: Hot Mother
description: She is the top killer of the killer employment center. Her auntie threw her to a strange man. When she wanted to ask who was the child's father, Auntie's feet ran away… Six years later, the baby was caught by the black empire. In desperation, she was disguised as a man pretending to be a driver lurking into the black empire boss side to do undercover…

title: I Dominate the Apocalypse by Cultivating Immortality
description: Craft celestial-grade treasures from apocalyptic scraps, and roam the wastelands of the end times using immortal cultivation techniques. With a soul traversing two realms, truth and illusion blur… In the realm of the void, a frenzied path of cultivation begins!

title: My Roommate Found Out That I Drew Her in a Yuri Manhua!
alt_titles: Shìyǒu fāxiàn wǒ bǎ tā huà jìn le bǎihé màn!
description: Amateur manhua artist Xiu Yang (♀) drew her roommate Wu Xi (♀) into her own yuri manhua. While she says it's for reference purposes, in reality...

title: Local Supplier of Alien Goods
description: The exclusive update every Monday and Friday was originally a local tyrant, the second generation ancestor, who was driven out of the house by the villain due to his father’s disappearance. However, it is this supermarket that connects other worlds and makes the male protagonist a business tycoon in both worlds! The chewing gum is exchanged for the god pill, the boy returns to the yuan, the orders of the big guys are soft! Perfume to change the marrow liquid, to strengthen the body, see the uneven road, solve it with one punch! It’s okay if you want the unicorn beast of the Eastern Fairy World as a mount. As long as the money is in place, cash on delivery is no problem. What do you want the colorful heart clothes of the Nine Heavens Profound Girl? There are many ways to make money, and the little brother is full~ As long as you have money, I can get you what you want to buy. I am Liu Lei, the only supplier in the world, and I speak for myself!

title: The Strongest Sect of All Times
alt_titles: Wo De Zang Men Yi Dian Qiang
Wǒ De Zōng Mén Yì Diǎn Qiáng
My Sect Has 100 Million Strength Points
My Sect Is 100 Million Points Stronger
description: Wang Feng finds himself transmigrated to the Xian Lan Continent. With the help of a  powerful system, he summons mighty individuals to crush all opposition, leading his Immortal Sect to unparalleled glory.

title: Dafeng's Night Squad
description:
In this world, there is: Confucianism; Taoism; Buddhism, Demons, and Magicians. Xu Qi’an, a graduate from the police academy, suddenly finds himself waking up in prison, to be exiled to the border three days later …

His initial goal was to protect himself in this world with no laws, and to be able to live a leisurely life as a rich man..

Many years later, Xu Qi’an looks back on the past, and the long-dead enemies and friends, as well as the numerous bones he has left behind.

As the Yangtze River flows eastward, the waves wash away the heroes; right and wrong, success or failure will all turn into nothing but history. However, just like the sun’s rays gleaming over the towering mountains, after the sunset, a new sun will rise.

title: Diagonal
description:
Two idiots sitting diagonal from each other. A GL oneshot. Scanlated with author permission.  
  
Author weibo:  [一条废狗狗狗狗](https://www.weibo.com/u/6055804589?is_all=1)

title: Houkai Gakuen EX - Sakura Arc
alt_titles: Guns Girl Z EX - Sakura Arc
description:
Houkai Gakuen EX is a special comic introduced in version 2.3 of miHoYo's online game, [Houkai Gakuen 2](https://www.benghuai.com/). [The story also comes with her own MAD version.](https://www.bilibili.com/video/av2645577)  
The story set in Middle age, when black death known as honkai pandemic haunt entire europe. The Schicksal using honkai box to purify outbreak causing the victim turned into honkai beast. Kallen Kaslana decided to steal honkai box and destroyed it but instead she got shot by bullet and stranded upon in land of yamato(known as Japan) in Yae village. After that she was saved by guardian miko in that village named Sakura. This is fateful story between two girls.  
  
(Houkai Gakuen 2 timeline: version 2.3 as World Boss and 4.0 as Limited time Coop Mode)  
(Honkai Impact 3 estimated timeline : Direct Sequel of #Book 1009 and Half Century before #Book 1001)  


---

Main Story :   
[# Book 1001 = Escape From The Sky](https://mangadex.org/manga/22297/honkai-impact-3)   
[# Book 1002 = Cherry Blossom Recall](https://mangadex.org/manga/22297/honkai-impact-3)   
[# Book 1003 = Mystery of Stigmata](https://mangadex.org/manga/26804/honkai-impact-3rd-mystery-of-stigmata)   
[# Book 1006 = Anti-Enthrophy Invasion](https://mangadex.org/manga/22297/honkai-impact-3)   
[# Book 1007 = Gratitude Arc](https://mangadex.org/manga/22297/honkai-impact-3)   
[# Book 1008 = Moon Shadow](https://mangadex.org/manga/22297/honkai-impact-3)    


---

Side Story :  
[# Book 1004 = Violet Sea Tales](https://mangadex.org/manga/22297/honkai-impact-3)   
**# Book 1005 = Dark Sakura Tales | Guns Girl SchoolDayZ EX - Sakura Arc**   
[# Book 1009 = Purple Kite's Tales](https://mangadex.org/manga/22297/honkai-impact-3)   
[# Book 1010 = Secret of the God Keys](https://mangadex.org/title/31991/honkai-impact-3rd-secret-of-the-god-keys)   
[# Book 1012 = 2nd Herrscher/Lawman](https://mangadex.org/title/30935/honkai-impact-3rd-2nd-lawman)    


---

Spin-off :  
[# Book 1011 = When Kiana Play Honkai Impact](https://mangadex.org/manga/22297/honkai-impact-3)  
[# Book 1013 = Valkyries' Dining Escapades](https://mangadex.org/manga/26179/honkai-impact-3-valkyries-dining-escapades)  
[# Book 1014 = Summer Memories](https://mangadex.org/title/30931/honkai-impact-3rd-summer-memories)

title: Cohabitation
description: A boy and a girl, living together… They are both best friends and best enemies ! This is a simple comics about love in the city…

title: The Girl of the Black Lotus
alt_titles: The Guide to Capturing a Black Lotus
Become the Girl of Black Lotus
description: Ling Miaomiao transmigated into a novel. She became the cannon fodder girl No.3 and she still has to finish those extremely cliché missions?! It's already enough that she has to spoil the relationship between the original male and female lead, but she also needs to 'conquer' the vicious and merciless Black Lotus, Mu Sheng?! How hard can this be? Genius Miaomiao will conquer you now~ Wait a minute, the plotline’s direction doesn't seem right, why is the Black Lotus paying close attention to Ling Miaomiao? Could it be that Miaomiao's spring day has arrived?

title: The Villainess Wants to Turn Over a New Leaf
alt_titles: Max-Level Green Tea Transmigrates Into Little Pitiful One
Man Ji Lvcha Chuan Cheng Xiao Kelian
Mǎn Jí Lǜchá Chuān Chéng Xiǎo Kělián
Villainess Wants to Turn Over a New Leaf
description:
Lin Feilu is an oscar-winning actress. Acting cute, slandering, feigning innocence, or playing the white lotus. Regardless, she wasn't a good person. She then died on her 27th birthday. She vowed, if there was a next life, she would be a good person. In the end, she transmigrated into a five-year-old princess of the great Lin Dynasty. Her imperial mother was not favored, her older brother was mentally challenged, and her life was constantly in danger, with having little to eat and trying to stay warm.

Lin Feilu: …You all forced me!

title: After School Exorcism
description:
**From [Inept Scans](https://mangadex.org/group/6421/inept-scans)**  
In the nation’s capital, there is a female demon! The city is a huge university campus built by all the world’s nations. In this city that symbolises peace, there are countless demons and ghosts possessing students from all over the world. Every evening strange events overlap and cause havoc throughout the city. A mysterious girl, Ji An, walks between the light and the shadow. She has all kinds of wonderful adventures with demons and humans alike.

title: Lost in the Wrong World
description: The story of an intelligent teenager leading a group of students to survive amidst the chaos of the supernatural after their field trip goes awry.

title: Guang Xiang
description: A story about two youthful boys–one named Yu Xiao Guang, the other named Lin Xiang–who have to deal with the problems forced upon them by both society and their families. How will they console each other during the tough teenage years? What will be the true nature of their friendship? And what does the future hold for them?

title: Deathwalker Chronicles: From Murloc to Glory
alt_titles: Walking with Death: Start From Murloc Dungeons
Journeying Together With Death: Beginning From Murloc Dungeon City
description: After unlocking the hidden class “**Deathwalker**,” becoming a legendary adventurer should be straightforward… right?

title: Hamster
description: A series of short oneshots from the author’s weibo about the misadventures of a sly house cat and an earnest hamster.

title: Devouring Eternity
description: Lin Chen was betrayed and his martial arts were crippled however, he had unexpectedly made a fateful encounter with the sacred engulfing star map, which led to the awakening of the Holy Vein constitution, and reaching the pinnacle of cultivation!

title: 9000 Years Old Empress
alt_titles: Gian thần mị quốc: Tà Vương, đừng quá hư
description:
The invincible commander of the Ye Jiajun was killed by a traitor and died in the battlefield. The Heavens are merciful; I was reborn, but I did not expect to be a eunuch?! Then, I almost got killed by the crippled prince on the spot?! Can someone tell me why does this prince hug me whenever he can? And even want to kiss me?!  
  
One is a servant who gets thrown away, and the other is a prince who gets treated coldly, being looked down by everyone. After their fateful meeting, they begin working together to purge corruption and bring prosperity to their imperial reign.

title: The Skin Painter
description: On Earth, spirits roam. As thousands of years pass, many curious and peculiar species are birthed. Some spirits satisfy their own desires by devouring weak human beings. With this, a group of humans possessing special powers came into being: exorcists, wizards… Within them, include those miraculous beings who defy natural laws. With one pen, they are able to redraw one's features… We call them: Skin Painters. The manhua tells the story of the master (The Skin Painter) and his disciple as they travel the world.

title: Affection Level ↟ Max ══ What Happens Next ══
alt_titles: Make the Level up to Max
description: After maxing out the affection level of all the collectible characters in the MMORPG Shangyang, Liu Yuan transmigrated into this fantasy land. This resulted in the birth of the biggest con in Shangyang's history, and also the coming of the unprecedented "Love Sage."

title: How a Ride-hailing Driver Comes to Dominate the World?
alt_titles: What's wrong with me, an online car-hailing driver, who has a little money?
Wo Yige Wang Yue Che Siji Youdian Qian Zenmeliao?
Wǒ Yīgè Wǎng Yuē Chē Sījī Yǒudiǎn Qián Zěnmeliǎo?
description: In a comical turn of events, Yang Chen quits his job after a heated argument with his boss, only to receive a breakup notice from his girlfriend of six years, Zhao Feifei. Left with no other choice, Yang Chen decides to become a ride-hailing driver. After an annoying passenger complained about him, Yang Chen unexpectedly gains access to the “**Prize Bad Review System**”. With generous rewards from the system after getting bad reviews and his great ambition, Yang Chen worked hard and finally established his dominance in the world.

title: By a Deity's Side
description: Xiao Bai recently moved to a new city with her family due to her father's job offer, despite her being so shy and timid. One day, Xiao Bai and her family were visiting the temple where she noticed a statue of a lucky cat. She decided to make a wish, and suddenly she found herself concerned with a black haired cat god…

title: Old Era Dragon Tamer
alt_titles: Dragon Rider of the Olden Days
Dragon Master of the Olden Days
description:
A masterpiece of the Beast-Taming!

In a wasteland where mutant beasts run rampant, human survival space is rapidly shrinking. Su Huan, a genius teenager, accidentally obtains the Old Era Dragon Manuscript that combines Old Era knowledge and magic, thus embarking on a path to the fantasy world.
Hatch pet-taming eggs to activate advanced bloodlines that surpass those attainable by ordinary people, and enlighten their skills to create unprecedented top-tier combat power. There is also the "Dragon Transformation Secret Technique" that allows the tamed beasts by his side to transcend their mortal forms and become colossal dragons!

title: Kiss the Abyss
description:
As a rookie game designer, Wang Zixin never imagined that his life would depend entirely on a video game character, and that escaping death meant crossing into the game and raising Abyss, the game's protagonist by himself.   
"Not only do i have to go into the game, now i have to raise a child????? What even is this situation…"

title: Despite Being Summoned as a Demon, I Still Need to Practice Chinese Medicine
alt_titles: Bèi Zhàohuàn Chéngwéi Yījí Mówù De Wǒ, Yīrán Hái Yào Zuò Zhōngyī
Bei Zhaohuan Chengwei Yiji Mowu De Wo, Yiran Hai Yao Zuo Zhongyi
That Time I Was Summoned as a First-Level Monster
I Was Summoned as a First Class Monster, yet Practice [TCM] as Before
description: The 30-year deadline was up. Huang He, who could have easily inherited 10 billion yuan, married someone rich and beautiful, and walked to the peak of his life, ended up transmigrating into the game and became a level 1 little zombie… In his despair, Huang He learned that as long as he died, he would be able to transmigrate back to his original world. Thus, he began his path of seeking death. But little did he know that wanting to die was not that simple…

title: Sages Who Slaughter The Heartless
description: An inexperienced protagonist and a big-chested maiden, seeking revenge…

title: A Concubine's Daughter and Her Tactics
alt_titles: The Strategy of the Concubine's Daughter
description:
During the Great Yan dynasty (756-763), The Eleventh Miss Luo was forced to marry her brother-in-law as a second wife.   
  
She thought it was an arranged marriage, but for the benefit of the family, she unexpectedly became the true favorite of this man's heart.   
  
Even though she is a concubine’s daughter, why should she be bullied? Let's see how the little concubine’s daughter finally became the mistress of the house!

title: I Cloned My Newlywed Wife
description: Underground human cloning services are becoming more and more common in society. After my wife, who I’d just married, died in a plane crash… I had to ask myself— should I clone her?

title: Face With Love, Affection, and Time
alt_titles: Towards Feelings of Love, Towards the Passing of Time
description: "You were originally the heartless one. The one who wanted to leave was you, and now you say you love me?!" Liang Zijin pulled Luo Xiangdong's shirt: "Since you came I won't miss it a second time." Luo Xiangdong turned the situation around, and kissed Liang Zijin: "Lian Zijin, you can't run away from me in this life."

title: Save a Female Assassin
description: The ordinary courier Daniel saved a wounded girl killer who was in a coma on his way home. Facing this unpredictable and ungrateful killer, can Daniel keep himself alive? When destiny makes them come together, the door to a dangerous yet exciting world of killers has opened.

title: My Silent Girl
description: Hu Yimeng looks handsome but actually likes cute things, Zhang Luoyu is a holy girl on the surface, but she speaks with a strong northeast accent, and she is not a cute girl at all but a decathlon fierce girl! A handsome female cosplayer and a Sanwu beautiful girl painter, the contrast between the two is hilarious and anxious daily love story.

title: Dingji Fanpai Dashi Xiong
alt_titles: Rebirth of the Top Villain History's Strongest Martial Brother
description: For the first time, Yan Zhaoge has the equipment of a full-level boss. The second crossing, before the development of the martial arts civilization, was like a person who was used to playing the hell mode and was suddenly thrown into the simple mode. Don't be too cool! But is this plot wrong? I am not the protagonist? But the villain Gao Fushuai who is competing with the protagonist?

title: Princess, Please Stay Away From Me!
alt_titles: Gongzhu Dianxia Qing Li Wo Yuanyidian A
Your Majesty, Please Keep Away From Me
description: Women? It’s fine to play with them for a bit, but as for those sacred vows professing eternal love? Heh, I’m sorry. I won’t believe a single word! Especially if they’re coming from the mouth of a beautiful girl… That’s what I used to think. However, after I transmigrated one day and was bedded by a certain loli princess, I… seem to have changed.

title: The Snake Demon Wants to Flee
alt_titles: The Snake Demon Is About to Escape
description: An extreme two-sided war of romance between a flirtatious snake demon that claims to fuck the gods VS a righteous but cold Daoist who only knows how to fight! Due to an unexpected mishap, the Snake Demon King could only bond with the (weird) righteous genius. This story about how the Snake Demon King tries to undo the bonding while trying to figure out how to take back his throne, but loses his body and mind in the process.

title: With All Kins, Have No Pity
description: Zhou Yun knows that servant Yin Jun, is the Zhou family's most loyal dog. Then, after his death and upon opening his eyes, he found out that not only was he the captive of the step-son who took his position as son of the first wife, he was actually reborn into the body of a good-for-nothing son! A loyal dog becomes mad???

title: Demon King's Rules x Witch's Covenant
description: Warning! An association of valiant individuals formed by the villainous demon lord and the rebellious witches has surfaced! Through casual methods of operation, they will turn the definition of justice upside down! By committing crimes across dimensions, they will ultimately snatch the halo of the main characters away from the hands of pesky humans!

title: God-Level Takeout Man
description:
(Adapted from the novel: “God-Level Takeout Bro”, also known as “The Almighty Urban Takeout King”)  
  
How did a famous TV anchor end up in a car accident? Who was the mysterious singer with the heavenly voice that appeared on KTV? What trauma was it that caused an innocent young woman to suddenly pull out a gun and shoot someone? Who is the person wearing a golden robe behind all these incidents? Read on to find out what really happened!

title: Ma'am You Have Been Uncovered
alt_titles: Ma'am, Your Mask Has Fallen Off Again
description:
Mother always said to Qinran: "Your stepfather is from a famous family, your eldest brother is a genius, and your sister is a top student in her high school. You, a country bumpkin, don't embarrass them."

Everyone with status in the capital received a warning from Mr. Juan of the Cheng family: "Mr. Juan's wife is from the countryside and doesn't understand our current situation, and she has a bad temper. In short, everyone should be extra patient."

Until one day, when Master Juan was investigating a certain big boss, his men fell into a confused silence while looking at one of the waistcoats of his sister-in-law who claimed to know nothing…

title: BABY
description: December 1, 2043 AD. The mysterious lifeform BABY invades Earth and takes control of a number of human hosts, parasitising them. The possessed bodies metamorphise into monsters called ‘Organos,’ which slaughter a great mass of humanity in a series of bloody massacres, bringing mankind to the brink of extinction. Thereafter, December 1 comes to be known as ‘Extinction Day.’ While battling an Organo, Elettra, the protagonist of the story, finds that her left hand has been infected by BABY. However, aside from a throbbing pain in her hand, nothing about the rest of her body changes. Elettra begins to search for other survivors, hoping to solve the mystery of BABY…

title: Only I Shall Be Immortal
description:
In the Heavens or on Earth, only I shall be immortal! In the vast Divine Lands, at the western border, upon the recommendation of his best friend, he began walking on a path he had never thought possible.  
  
 The Cloudlink Sect, as the ‘Final Path’ of the 7 main sects of the Divine Lands, on their sacred disciple acceptance ceremony that happens once every 5 years, took in a single 5th generation disciple who had a beggar-like bearing.   
  
With the gates of cultivation opened wide for him, will this bright and mischievous child be able to mature into a powerful Immortal that rules the world? Please find out in - Only I Shall Be Immortal

title: Good Night, Liang Xiao
description:
“I fell in love with you at first sight. I’ve been in love with you for such a long time! Finance dogs doing overtime together fell in love overnight!   
Liang Xiao “ Senior, you are the one who is destined to be loved by me."

title: Day 100 of My Sister's Disappearance
alt_titles: Mèimei Xiāoshī de dì Yībǎi Tiān
description: I killed my younger sister and managed to get away with it. But on the 100th day after her death, something strange happened…

title: My MMO Wife Is a Cultivator
description: All it took was one meet-up, a simple meet-up with his MMO wife and suddenly he was dragged into the world of urban cultivation. Thus he believed that he would begin his journey as a cultivator in this urban world and live a life of overbearing dominance. However...why is life as a cultivator so hard and so impoverished? How come everyone's still playing the MMO even though they're piss poor? Wait a minute...playing the MMO is part of cultivation too?!

title: Where the Clouds Stop
description: Time is a strange thing. The person she killed the day before yesterday had already begun to rot. But when she came home the next day, they were standing in her house, smiling at her. What is happening? The doctor told her if she took the medicine she would wake up! Where am I? What is this? Who are you?

title: The Fresh Start of Elegant Beauty
description:
Millennia-old Chinese clothing culture intertwines the fantastical lives of two girls.

One day, Bai Tang, a freshman in university, accidentally "picked up" a girl named Zhu Lian, a quirky girl dressed in Tang dynasty attire who valiantly claimed to be from over one thousand years ago... From that moment on, Bai Tang's ordinary life takes a wild turn.

title: Prejudice
description: The star of a male idol group who has a cold demeanor, who also has no control in restraining himself. And an idol with a harmless and childlike cutesy personality on cameras and is able to stay in character, but is an complete opposite off-stage… They're sworn enemies that hate each other and somehow ends up having to act like a couple with each other as fan service?! Yup, Looks sweet!

title: I Am a Living Beast in the World of Cultivating Immortals
alt_titles: Wǒ Shì Xiū Xiānjiè Huó Chùshēng
Wo Shi Xiu Xianjie Huo Chusheng
description: In order to speedrun the game and win the mysterious grand prize, I used every possible trick in the game and ended up offending the entire world! What? The mysterious grand prize is actually transporting me into the game world? Seriously!

title: Sealed Lips
description: She was exploited, mistreated by her stepmother and stepsister. They were scum, insane, crazy. She became a tool for her sister's success. After dying from a painful death, she was reborn. In her previous life, she had a fiancee that she admired and loved for a long time, but he was cold and felt disgust toward her, which brought her pain and made her hopeless. But now, facing him again, she said while smiling: « Let break off the engagement, I don’t want this marriage anymore! » However this man wants to stay in a relationship with her— « Shang Zhen, you were already my person the day you were born. You want to break up? That’s too late »

title: Little Prince
description: Short story about a prince who met the captured son of the enemy's general.

title: Zhiran Chenghun
description:
A young girl plays truth or dare with her friends one evening and gets challenged to ask the first male that walks into the bar to give her his belt.  
This evening was meant to be her bachelorette party after making a deal with her adoptive mother. The deal they made was that if she agrees to an arranged marriage, she will get to continue her studies. In order to keep her education going, she sacrifices herself, but little did she know the identity of her fiancé…

title: Cinderella Chef
description:
I will conquer your stomach first and then conquer your mouth with my excellent cooking skills.
I can always handle both evil husband and nasty mother-in-law.
As for those ill-disposed sisters-in-law, just let them be jealous!

I’m not going to play with you~

title: Magician Rebirth
alt_titles: 重生魔术师, Magician Rebirth, Rebirth Magician, Reborn magician
description: Ai Xiaoming, who was framed to death, was reborn in the year 2008. When he was reborn, he planned to perfect his life and find his enemies …

title: Mobile Suit Gundam: The Witch from Mercury - Nideaneng's Suletta x Miorine Shorts
Poisoning the World
alt_titles: Du Bu Tian Xia: Te Gong Shen Yi Xiao Shou Fei
Queen of Poison: The Legend of a Super Agent, Doctor, and Princess
description: She is an ace agent, the queen of medicine and poison. Sweet and adorable she looks; resolute and cunning she actually is. She is half an angel and half a devil. When she travels through time and stays in an orphan girl’s body, will she rewrite the history? “I quit the marriage with this coward girl. To my surprise, she is so shrewd and eloquent! How ignorant I am!” Some lord regrets. “She is such a hottie!” Some prince sighs. “

title: Shine and Sweet
description:
Suen, 19 ans, universitaire, est en couple depuis 1 an avec Shen Luo, designer, quand elle découvre de manière inattendue un secret incroyable, il a de super pouvoirs…une comédie douce et pétillante.  
  
—  
  
After dating for one year, my boyfriend suddenly confessed that he had a special ability! Not only does he use it anytime I ask, he can also be summoned at will!  
  
A cute yet forgetful girl and a handsome boyfriend with an ability—what kind of sweet and troublesome love story will unfold?

title: His Royal Highness is Hungry
description: My name is Qiu Kui, and I time-traveled! From the wonderful modern world to a poor, ancient village where there's no internet, and even electricity! Worst of all, my parents drowned themselves and my younger sister is physically challenged, and not forgetting the fact that our family is also in debt. I mean, seriously, how can I live under these circumstances! Thank goodness I time-traveled with a bag of groceries and daily necessities… But has anyone time-traveled with items like these? This is ridiculous!

title: Digimon Adventure
description:
Seven kids at summer camp are unexpectedly transported by 'digi-vices' to a colorful and enigmatic world. Lost and alone, they are befriended by small digital monsters, Digimons. The kids and their Digimon partners quickly become inseparable, and the strange creatures guide their human friends through the wondrous DigiWorld, protecting them from the hordes of evil Digimons. The group soon discovers that some of the giant Digimons they encounter are not evil Digimons but good Digimons gone bad. A dark power is corrupting even the most gentle of Digimons by embedding Black Gears into them, turning them into vicious monsters. Creating chaos and destruction wherever it goes, the evil power threatens all of DigiWorld.  
  
As they try to find their way back home, the seven kids are drawn further and further into the mystery. Through teamwork and trust, they help their newfound Digimon friends digivolve from 'monsters in training' to giant champions that must save the DigiWorld from the powerful evil intent on destroying it.

title: The Summoner: Apocalypse Rewinds
alt_titles: Lord of Summoning! When Anomalies Descend Upon The Human World
God of Summoning! When Mutation Descends Upon The Mortal World
Lord of Summoning When the World Changes
description:
As the apocalypse descended, game monsters bled into the reality, unleashing a bloody massacre that pushes Blue Star’s civilization to the edge of extinction.In humanity’s final moments, time rewinds for him—returning him to the day it all began.
Now, with a single burning purpose, he will hunt down the hidden mastermind behind the catastrophe, defend his homeland, and ensure the tragedy never repeats.
The apocalypse looms. The countdown has begun.
In this deadly race against time, he must seize control—and turn despair into his game of vengeance.

title: The Final Boss Became a Player
alt_titles: Final Boss Volunteers to Become a Player
Ultimate Boss, Volunteering to Join the Player Ranks
description: A recently launched game in its closed beta testing phase fell victim to a mysterious AI hack, transforming what was once a tranquil and delightful adventure into an inescapable pit of monsters. Influenced by this AI, the final boss gained sentience and swore to defend its own virtual realm, determined to reclaim the game's former glory!

title: The Emperor's Strategy
description:
Born into the royal family, every move by Chu Yuan needs to be cautious; constantly afraid that one moment of carelessness will cause him to lose everything. After ascending to the throne at 18, not half a year passes before civil strife erupts in Yun Nan. Though the intentions of the old guard at the royal court are not exactly the same, all are waiting to see how the new emperor will resolve this situation.  
   
Unexpectedly, before this incident comes to a head, the King of Xi Nan, Duan Bai Yue, had already personally commanded troops to battle a few thousand miles away. Not half a year has passed when peace has already been restored.  
  
With sparse moonlight shining into the royal palace, Chu Yuan stamped a wax seal on a secret letter, and had it sent urgently to Yun Nan 800 miles away – this time, what will we be asked for in exchange?  
  
Brush marks can be seen on the back of the paper, almost as if it can be seen how angry the young emperor is when he wrote this line.  
 Duan Bai Yue spread out a piece of paper slowly, and replied deliberately with one word.  
   
You.  
  
[synopsis taken from translator's site: <https://pucari.dreamwidth.org/>]

title: Two&Too
description: Ah, the young and in love. Read to see where Shen Nantang's lighthearted university endeavors take him!

title: Almight Network
alt_titles: Wo De V Xin Shi Waigua
description: When Fang Lin bought a new smart phone, he found out the phone app gave him a special social network with the immortals. In a dog eat dog world, Lin is taking a stairway to heaven with this special social network.

title: Countdown to Graduation
