title: Urban Harem Path
alt_titles: History's Strongest Immortal Returns To The City
description: The strongest ancestor in history re-cultivate in the city, captured beautiful women, and fought against the younger generation.

title: Fatal Oxygen
description: Su Mu, male singer, gentle as water, is now paired with the dominative president Ning Ye of a large business group. The marking of pheromone puts both men’s life at stake. However, the former boyfriend of Su Mu just came back from Germany, turning from a poor actor to an award-winning one. The love from two different men is overwhelming Su Mu. Is he going to get stuck in the middle?

title: List of the Villains
description: The most dangerous villain is the one who only learns martial arts. Aura’s rejuvenating ability appears. A confrontation between traditional martial arts and superpower begins from that

title: The King Is Back
description:
Hell is crowded and the hall is closed. The king of the underworld, Chen Yan Luo, died and became a high school student! “I wanted to be a normal person, flirting with the school girl and going to my father-in-law’s house for dinner, but there are always rivals who come uninvited, so fuck it, I’m going to show my cards! Oh shit, here we again!”

Alternative Raws:
[Bilibili manga](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc32372)
[KuaiKan manhua](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/15981/)
[IQIYI](https://www.iqiyi.com/manhua/detail_qtb93mck6t.html)

title: Metropolitan Prodigal
description: "It's my first time, and neither of us would have expected anything like this to happen. You are my first and only woman, I will take responsibility." Li Feng, who came back from a mysterious land, wielded his superior skills and conquered his hardships along the way, fulfilling his goals and finding love at the same time.

title: I'm only two thousand five hundred years old
alt_titles: Wǒ Zhǐyǒu Liǎng Qiān Wǔbǎi Suì
Wo Zhiyou Liang Qian Wubai Sui
description: The 2,500-year-old Su Ye lived to the day when he was 22 years old and traveled back to the ancient times. When another person traveled back to the ancient times, he regained his identity as a college student and officially started his glorious life. Qin, chess, calligraphy and painting, all are excellent, and all are well-known in civil and military affairs. "I just want to live for a hundred years, don't mess with me, I'll hammer it all back for you!"

title: Don't Tell Me This Is the True History of the Three Kingdoms!
description: I suddenly got hold of a feather fan, and came to an era of the Three Kingdoms which I completely do not know about. What? Gender equality? Girls can join the army? You, you and you, why are you all girls!? An interesting story unfolds in a familiar and yet, also unfamiliar time. But perhaps this is the Three Kingdoms, the true Three Kingdoms!

title: Slightly Sour Secret
description: This is a story about a girl who is in love with her (clueless) childhood friend (that is a girl). Story of unrequited love between friends.

title: Opening up Prince Charming Using the Right Strategy
alt_titles: Opening up Prince Charming With the Right Strategy
description:
In order to recover her memories, a female tyrant must travel through the multiverse capturing the hearts of all the Prince Charmings.

What?! I need to make the perfect Mary Sue type character's male lead… fall in love with me? System, what kind of mission is this?

---

title: My Girlfriend Is School Belle + Zombie
alt_titles: School Belle Girlfriend Is a Zombie?!
Campus Belle Girlfriend Is a Zombie?!
description: Waking up through time travel, my girlfriend wants to eat me?! Without seasoning!

title: Exorcism Records: Journey to the West
description:
A journey to exorcise all demons told with paintings…  
It's like remake of Journey to the West.  


---

title: Goshu Wushuang
description: Расположившийся в городке Хайчэн бойцовский клуб «Небесные воины» — это филиал самого большого в мире боксёрского клуба. Сирота Су Чэнь, ради того, чтобы заработать денег на лечение своей названной младшей сестрёнки, устраивается туда спарринг-партнёром. Будучи очень способным в обучении и сообразительным малым, Су Чэнь становится «спарринг-партнёром золотой медали» клуба. Успехи Су Чэня не проходят бесследно — они вызывают лютую зависть со стороны капитана команды Ван Тинвэя, который строит ему козни. Но невзирая на опасную историю, в которую его втянули, Су Чэнь хочет не только остаться в живых, но и использовать появившиеся шансы достигнуть ещё больших высот на своём профессиональном поприще.

title: Leveling Up by Killing Gods
alt_titles: Kànjiàn xiě tiáo de wǒ, chǔxíng shénmíng
Kan Jian Xie Tiao De Wo, Chuxing Shenming!
description: The abyss descends, and the invasion of the alien races begins... The young boy stands amidst the dense white mist, with no light ahead or behind him. In this situation, how will he make his choices? In the era of the Long Night, do the gods truly live forever? The young boy sees through the lifeblood of all things and executes the gods!

title: Reborn- Deceiving My Financial Backing Husband
description: In Zhuang Ling's heart, Shu Boheng has always been his number one enemy. He had caused his own family's ruin and kept himself in captivity for ten years in the name of love. Although it was self-inflicted, he will not sympathize- let alone fall in love with him. However, when he accidentally died, he realized that not everything was what he initially perceived.

title: My Pet Dog Is a God
description: What?! My doggo turned out to be a god…if you found out one day that your doggo was a god what would you do?

title: The King Likes to Bully Me
description:
The Leader of the Imperial Guard, Li Sheng, doesn't believe that "getting back together is torturous". So long as he does a good enough job (at being a simp), even an iceberg will melt into a puddle of water! It's a good thing that Master Lang is so handsome! This time, Li Sheng isn't running away! He's putting down roots and staying put! o(*////▽////*)o 

[Ruthless Emotional Military Genius Dom x Idiotic Masochist Imperial Guard Sub]

title: The Great Villain Who Threatened to Kill Himself
alt_titles: The Great Villain Who Threatened to Kill Himself
description:
At the age of 18, Nie Xiaotian, a senior high school student specializing in martial arts and physical education, suffered a left leg fracture while rescuing a girl crossing the road. 

From then on, he bid farewell to his sports career but gained the “Study Genius System.” In order to successfully pass the college entrance examination, he entered the system’s virtual space to study academic subjects. 

Ten years later, when he wanted to return to the real world, the system informed him that the only way to leave was to be killed by someone. Thus, he embarked on a long and arduous path in search of death.

title: My Senior Brother Is Too Steady
alt_titles: My Brother Is Actually Too Stable
My Senior Is Really Extremely Firm,
description:
After being reborn in ancient times before the Great God-Conferment War, Li Changshou became a small cultivator.

To survive in the cruel Primordial Times, Li Changshou tries hard not to accumulate any karma. He always plans thoroughly before doing anything and never allows himself to walk into dangerous situations. He hides his trump cards well, trains himself in escape techniques, refines poisonous pills, and masters mystical abilities.
Li Changshou originally planned to remain hidden and safe in the mountain until his ascension to immortality. However, everything changed one year when his master brought home a junior sister…

title: Qiang Jin Jiu (2024)
description:
During the Xiande period of the Dazhou dynasty, the Prince of Jianxing, Shen Wei, suffered defeat at the Chashi river in the northeast, leading to the Six Prefectures of Zhongbo almost falling to external foes. Shen Zechuan, meanwhile, was arrested and taken to the capital, to be the target of everyone's hatred as the surviving villain. When the young son of the Prince of Libei, Xiao Chiye, heard the news, he came and delivered a ruthless blow that nearly cost Shen Zechuan his life. Unexpectedly, the latter, who had seemed weak, was actually quite fierce, turning around and biting him, causing the former to bleed profusely. Henceforth, an enmity developed between the two, with the strife continuing both within and outside the court. Amidst this open and secret conflict, the true reason for Shen Wei's defeat was surprisingly discovered.

---
**Note:**
- After a huge backlash about the character design, the series has been undergoing a revision with a new art style, This title contains the revised version.

title: Genshin Impact - Aether & Lumine's Daily Sibling Life (Doujinshi)
alt_titles: Daily Life of Travelers brothers and sisters
description:
A comic about Aether & Lumine's daily sibling life~

Adapted from: [空：我的妹妹有点奇怪…](https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1oe4y187st/)
Animated version: [空荧的兄妹贴贴日常](https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1LT411t7FE/) ([English Sub](https://youtu.be/yJHnag9397M))

title: Peak Prophecy
description:
[Updated Every Sunday]   
  
Li Zihan, who has the ability to predict the future and change reality, chooses to be a community security guard because he runs into trouble every time.   
  
In order to rewrite the future that killed Su Xin, Li Zihan decided to re-use his prophetic powers, he inadvertently created a butterfly effect and attracted a bevy of women into his harem ching the fate of others and his own as well.   
  
Fate had decreed that he has the potential, and step by step he shall become the strongest "prophet" in the universe! Reaching the Peak!

title: Become a Girl at Night
description: He comes across a cute girl on the way home in the late night. Out of kindness, he helps "her" get out of trouble and decided to let "her" stay just one night at his house. But "she" doesn't seem to interest him much, by contrast, "she" is kicked out of his bed when "she" is trying to sleep with him…

title: The Strongest Demon Becomes the Protagonist's Strategist
alt_titles: Retiring as the World's Strongest Demon
Retirement Life of the Demon Lord Starts From Dealing With the MC!
description:
An overworked game designer dies from exhaustion, and reincarnates into his own game as a Demon Lord who killed the female MC’s family?! Just when he is about to achieve his dream life, the defeat of female MC returns him to the last checkpoint of the game! To retire and live in luxury, he sets on the journey as the main antagonist… to help the MC?!

---
The game planner Zou Yu died suddenly during an overtime work and traveled to the immortality game designed by himself, becoming the demon guard who killed the heroine Jiang Yunbo's family. Zou Yu, who thought he would reach the pinnacle of his life in one step, was forced to return to the starting point of the game countless times because of Jiang Yunbo's life-threatening character. It turns out that although he is valuable as a demon, he is still an NPC in the game. This damn Jiang Yunbo is the protagonist… So, Zou Yu embarked on a peculiar adventure where the villain BOSS helps the protagonist grow up (by the way)…

title: Solo Strike: A Hundred Million Damage
alt_titles: Wo De Shanghai You Yi Diandian Gao
My Damage Is a Little Bit Higher by a Billion Points
My Damage Is a Little Bit Higher Than 100 Million
description: When the game world and Blue Star merge into one, the era of dawn arrives. Zhou Yi teleported into it and became a mere assassin, but something wasn’t right about his skills. The Eye of Death: All True Damage becomes five times more? 9999 damage is easily dealt with the flick of a knife? The Hand of God: Definite success in stealing. Even monster attributes and skills can be stolen? Therefore, Zhou Yi decided not to be a human being anymore. Turning into an elite monster? In seconds!

title: Divine Realm Online
description: Welcome to Divine Realm Online, where victory means everything. Schemes, battles, betrayals, sacrifices, this is not just a game; the price you have to pay is nowhere near what you can possibly imagine…

title: Devil's President Sacrificial Bride
alt_titles: Èmó zǒngcái de jì pǐn xīnniáng
The Crazy with His Reluctant Lover
description: Chu Mujin's brother with Miss Lu Ming Yue were eloped. Because late being escaped, Miss Lu Ming Yue's s fiancé, Lin Cheng Yao caught her and thus began her tragic 99th day contact lover's life. Being entangled between two men, tyrannical Lin Cheng Yao and gentle Gu Ting Zi and she found, she was pregnant ….

title: It’s Just Fortune-Telling. How Did the Nine-Tailed Demon Emperor Become My Wife?
alt_titles: Suanming Eryi, Jiu Wei Yao Di Zenme Jiu Cheng Wo Niangzile?
Suànmìng Éryǐ, Jiǔ Wěi Yāo Dì Zěnme Jiù Chéng Wǒ Niángzǐle?!
description: Jiang Jue travels through the world of Xianxia and obtains the Destiny Deduction System.Observing other people's destiny, knowing their past and knowing their future can even change their fate against the sky!It's just that there seems to be a big problem with this system.No matter what he calculates, he has to truthfully tell the fortune-teller's destiny.On this day, he met the leader of the Ten Thousand Demon Kingdom, the Demon Lord.Tu Shanlan: "Sir, you might as well do the divination for me.""Thousands of years later, you will be married and have five children." "...""By the way, your husband-in-law is me."

title: Fox Volant of the Snowy Mountain
description:
Based on Jin Yong's novel of the same name.  
  
After the Dashing King seized the capital, all the generals of the Ming dynasty surrendered and gave their wealth as tributes to save their own lives. In a few days, gold and silver piled up like a mountain. After the Dashing King retreated from the capital, he sent his trusted subordinates to hide the treasure somewhere beyond the Great Wall, intending to use it as a military fund to make his comeback.  
  
In the 45th year of Emperor Qianlong's reign (1780), three groups of people started fighting over a treasure box somewhere in Changbai Mountains. The box content did not merely revealed the location of the Dashing King's treasure hoard. It also revealed the past related to the Dashing King's four personal guards as well as the plots and grievances of several generations.  
  
Note: The Dashing King (Li Zicheng) was the Chinese rebel leader who overthrew the Ming dynasty of China in 1644. He was later forced to abandon the capital city as the Manchu Banner Armies invaded. The Dashing King himself appeared in later chapters of Jin Yong's The Deer & The Cauldron (鹿鼎记).

title: Evil King and Concubine: Healing Hands Cover the Sky
description: The poor modern female doctor picks up the mess when she travels, rejuvenates her life, makes countless treatments, and eventually becomes a myth!

title: Changan Fantasy
description: A long time ago, humans coexisted with all living beings in this world. All of them were able to cultivate with the Heaven and Earth Soul Force to become a deity or a demon beast. Although everyone had equal chances in cultivating not all of them were able to understand the cultivation techniques. Other than deities and demon beasts a strange new power formed from the concentration of heaven and earth soul force. We call it Soul.

title: A Tough First Love
alt_titles: Zhou Cheng Yi’s Bumpy First Love
description: In his 27 years, the investment tyrant Zhou Chengyi has never had time for so much as a romantic fling. But when the embodiment of hard work chances upon a particular model's billboard, he finds himself smitten for the first time in his life! Zhou knows first loves can be tough, but what he doesn't know is that he's fallen for Dao Tian, a male model who specializes in modeling female clothes!

title: Rebirth, I am the King of Entertainment
alt_titles: Rebirth, I am the King of Entertainment
description:
Lin Ce, a big shot in the entertainment industry, was reborn, but found out that his girlfriend who became a big star wanted to break up with him, but no one knew that Lin Ce's mind was filled with endless entertainment works in another world!

Zhao Siman: Lin Ce, I am a big star, and you are an ordinary person, we are not suitable, let's break up! Stop pestering me!

Lin Ce: Well, you never know what you missed!

title: Xiu Tu
description: After Pangu separated the Heaven from the Earth, the excess divine energy that remained was left to degenerate on the earth, and gradually ended up forming various divine weapons that were passed down across generations of carnage and bloodshed in the Jianghu. An arrow that can pass through walls; An umbrella that can summon a colossal whale; A spear that can transform an entire snowy mountain into lava… Li Changsang and his son must defeat the masters of these powerful divine weapons, and only then will they be able to find the location of the archenemy of their clan and undo the 100-year curse that has burdened their clan.

title: Apocalyptic Forecast
description: Life never seems to go Huai Shi's way. No friends, no family, no money... He applies for a job as a restaurant musician, but it turns out to be an ad for a gigolo! This is no way for a main character with a cheat to live... However, when the supernatural finally starts catching up with him, he begins to wish it never did.

title: Cypress Vine Tales: Oneshot Collection
description: Cutlet Warrior's yuri oneshot collection.

title: The Primordial World: Starting by Taking the Minghe as My Adopted Stepdaughter
alt_titles: The Primordial World: Starting by Taking the Styx River as My Adopted Daughter
description: Yang Li, a modern man, finds himself crossing into the Primordial World, where destiny takes unexpected turns. What starts as an ordinary journey soon becomes legendary as he outwits celestial beings, subdues sages, and rescues the world from catastrophe. A story of wit, power, and unshakable determination awaits!

title: Almighty Supreme
description: Li Haifeng, a teenager, accidentally broke into the mysterious tomb when he was eight years old. The yin and yang awakened the soul of Xuanyuan Luoxue, the owner of the tomb, and was possessed by Xuanyuan Luoxue. Li Haifeng was later accepted as a disciple. Ten years later…..

title: My Cards Can Level Up Forever!
alt_titles: Wo De Ka Pai Neng Wuxian Zengqiang!
My Cards Can Be Infinitely Enhanced!
Wǒ De Kǎ Pái Néng Wúxiàn Zēngqiáng!
description: In a world where cards reign supreme, where monsters, mech-beings, and furries can all be summoned, what chance does Zeng Qiang, a poor and ordinary orphan, have to become a card master? Faced with a life-or-death crisis, Zeng Qiang discovers that his talent holds unexpected potential! Who knew cards could be played this way?! You’re asking what his special ability is? — My cards can be infinitely strengthened!

title: Chronicles of the Jungle Sovereign
description: Lin Tian, a genius game designer, was ordered to be executed because he knew too much of the company secrets. At a critical moment, he was betrayed by his lover Luo Yue and was killed in the jungle. When he woke up, he found he became a low-level monster in the jungle. In order to avenge the past, the male protagonist started on his path as a Monster in The Jungle.

title: Sorry If I'm So Ugly
description: Yi Feng is a diligent girl in her studies on science and engineering, and a person who believes in the power of ones own strength. Until one day, she could suddenly see that everyone had a score on their heads, and this score seemed to be related to the value of ones beauty. Finally, Yi Feng, who was able to distinguish between beauty and ugliness, found out that all kinds of troubles come with being ugly. Then, a male beauty appeared in front of her. Will he be the start of Yi Feng's new hope? But this path to becoming a CEO goddess and marrying Gao Shuaifu does not seem to be an easy one…

title: Extraordinary World! I, a vampire...
description:
Ten years ago, when faced with an alien civilization's invasion, Earth's "Extraordinary" ability users not only stood up to fight back, but also transferred their powers into "ability books" for ordinary people to learn. After humanity joined forces to repel the alien invaders, Earth had already become a world where only "ability users" reign supreme.

Today, Quinn—whose parents died in battle and who has no money to buy an "ability book"—steps through the gates of the military academy.

What no one knows is that he is desperately craving blood…

title: National School Prince is a Girl
alt_titles: The School Prince is a Girl
description: On the surface, she is a waste wood. In fact, she is the hacker, Z, a villain-terminator in the online world sought after by the gods. Reincarnated into a body of a woman, she is forced to disguise in men's clothes, while dominating the game and having first-rate skills! Fu Jiu: "Almighty Qin, do you have a girlfriend?" Her flirting makes her come across the Almighty Qin. Over time, the Almighty Qin falls for him/her. Has he turned gay for him/her?

title: One Hundred Thousand Years of Tribulation by Heavenly Thunder
alt_titles: Ten Thousand Years Under Heavenly Tribulation
description:
After transmigrating into a cultivation world, young Fang Lingxiao rises to greatness with a talent that defies the heavens. In just a hundred years, he reaches the peak—the Great Ascension Stage. But during his final tribulation, the heavens unleash something unimaginable: a lightning storm that rages not for days or months, but for a hundred thousand years.

When he finally emerges from the ordeal, his cultivation is shattered—reduced to that of a mere mortal. Yet, his body, forged by countless years under divine lightning, has become indestructible.

Soon, Fang Lingxiao realizes the truth—this wasn’t fate. It was sabotage from a powerful figure in the Upper Realm.

Now, with his cultivation lost but an unbreakable body as his weapon, he sets out on a path of vengeance. He’ll uncover the traitor, climb the heavens once more, and make them all pay.

title: Oh No! It Became A Spirit!
description:
Terminology Explained:  
Guo Shi: Teacher of the Realm. An official or honorary title given to prestigious religious masters in China.  
  
Description: An erotica book suddenly became human. She just wanted to cultivate, sleep, and flirt with Guo Shi. Yet…every object around her seems to come to life? Oh, and the dragon throne wants to bang the emperor too!   
  
Warning: This story is a bg story, but its side ship is gay (yaoi). So if you are uncomfortable with gay ships, I would recommend not reading the series. If you are alright with it, please go ahead~

title: Black Lotus
alt_titles: He Said I Am Black Lotus
Ta Shuo Wo Shi Hei Lianhua
description:
Heartless President x Gentle Pianist!   

After three years of wasted effort, all Wen Nian’nan got were cold eyes and a body filled with scars. While looking at the ring on his hand that represented a broken promise, he became embittered.  
  
“Gu Yansheng… You wish to let me go? Fine…”  
  
Wen Nian’nan rejected him with a sneer a few months later, when Gu Yansheng, shocked by the truth, brought his bodyguards to break open his door. How does one relieve the pain etched into the bone? How does one resolve an indefensible misunderstanding? Will the two be able to return to what they once were?

title: Eternal Kingdom (2022)
description: On a seemingly ordinary and mediocre day, a rift rips open the sky and countless monsters start falling from above. The main character, Yi Tianxing, survived the “Seven Days of Cataclysm'' along with his sisters and the others by relying on his innate third eyes. Immediately, a myriad of planets appear out of nowhere and start combining with Earth, converging into a giant planet. At this point, the Earth has opened a new chapter - The Eternal Kingdom.

title: Prodigal Son of Xuanmen
description: This is a story about a prodigal son who, while squandering his money in various ways, beats up a group of destined men.

title: Rebirth of the Earth Immortal Venerable
description:
Chen Mo, a great cultivator of the divine transcendent realm, after dying with his junior sister while on their journey to the sacred land, he is reborn back on Earth in his senior year of high school, he rebuilds his cultivation base, he starts restoring his cultivation level, relying on his memory of his past life, he takes the initiative to plan, to eliminate all his mistakes and protect his friends and loved ones, to defeat the enemy forces, to crush all the conspiracies and to find his junior sister's whereabouts.   
  
by Demonrage Scans

title: How to Raise a Cross Dressing Master
alt_titles: Notes of the Cultivation of the Experienced Crossdresser
Nv Zhuang Da Lao Yang Cheng Ji
Nǚzhuāng Dà Lǎo Yǎng Chéng Jì
Record of Raising the Big Shot of Women's Clothes
description: In the middle of Mt. Fu Yun and on the banks of Lake Egret, there is a school called tao yuan academy, which houses the children of imperial and wealthy families. Su Li's twin sister, Su Li, who was intelligent and sensitive at an early age, was given an imperial order to study at tao yuan academy. however as the start of school was just around the corner, Su Li (the sister) ran away with a handsome young foreign boy... to avoid the punishments of lying to the emperor, Su Li (the brother) had to dress up as a woman and attend tao yuan academy in place of his sister. Initially, he wanted to keep things low-key, but to his dismay, he had caught the attention of multiple suitors... Hey, we're all brothers, can't we settle this peacefully! Stop it! Don't run away you rascal! Damn it, what do you guys have that I don't?

title: I Must Spoil You
alt_titles: Flash Marriage Difficult to Leave, Will Spoil You
description:
Eng  
Feeling full of despair, Tao Di bumped into "physician" during the house emergency call. The reserved man stared at her with the look of deep love, spoke in a resolute tone, "Girl, if you don't mind, let's experience a flash marriage!" In anger, Tao Di agreed to marry him. Who'd knew that later, she would discover her husband's secrets?  
  
Ru  
Тао Ди узнала, что жених изменил ей прямо перед свадьбой. В порыве отчаяния она согласилась на предложение незнакомого доктора выйти за него замуж. Только вот хватит ли ей решимости остаться с новоиспечённым мужем, раскрыв все его скелеты в шкафу?  
  
По роману Чу Чэн.  
 «Мгновенным» в Китае называют брак, заключенный между партнерами, которые знают друг друга меньше месяца.

title: The Witch of the Cage
description: In a seemingly quiet and peaceful magical town lives a hidden murderer. When the two girls came to this town, they thought they could try to learn magic happily until they fell into fear. Who is that murderer who has been traveling through the magic realm and the mortal realm…? How will the love and hatred between the two girls balance out? Welcome to another Shoujo-Ai thriller series with magic involved~

title: IF Future
description: Wei Lai accidentally picked up a mysterious camera that can take pictures of the future but found that it only has an effect on her secret crush, a senior.

title: In the Name of Bai Ze
description: Several decades ago, the young boy Bai Ze mistakenly entered a mystical world's immortal mountain and formed a bond with an Immortal Gege. Over ten years later, the college student Baize once again arrives in the mystical realm, only to discover that the Immortal Gege he had dreamed of day and night has become a pitiable figure forgotten by the mortal world. In a world where demons and monsters wreak havoc, the unfortunate originator turns out to be this pitiful divine being. Unable to ignore the situation, Bai Ze forcefully brings his Immortal Gege back into the mortal realm, helping him fulfill his desire for a peaceful life. After all, who could resist someone so beautiful, powerful yet pitiful?

title: Did Qi Fei Take Flight Today?
alt_titles: Did Qi Fei Take Flight Again Today?
description: Even though we have very different personalities, we're still drawn to each other. Qifei, who's finally become the captain of the girls' basketball team, discovered during recruitment that she'd ended up at the same school as the senior that she longed for! The tsundere little fangirl tried her best to hide her excitement, but her sly senior had already seen everything...?! Will the junior help the senior recall her basketball dream, or will the senior make the junior confess her feelings to her first? A GL school story of youth!

title: White Cat Legend
description: This amusing and charming story happened in 7th century ,when the first and only female monarch of ancient China got the throne. We follow the daily life of Chen Shi, a kind young man who came to the capital city Luoyang to look for his brother. To find him, he went to the Dali Court (a government institute like nowadays High Court of Justice). One thing led to another, he eventually became a secretary for Li Bing, a senior official with the appearance of a white cat.

title: Fanservice Paradox
description: The two members with the worst relationship in the group are now trending all because of a fan-taken video that suddenly dominated the social media! Young and cute husky X Cool and cold Gege who has great self-restraint?! The shippers are going feral over this pairing! They had clearly never gotten along since their debut, yet they were now forced to embark on an endless path of selling their fake ship together~

title: The World of Lilith
description:
Lilith, a 500-year-old vampire, is determined to leave her harem of pretty boys ! Will she be left alone in the human world ? Or will she starve herself ?   
  
French:  
Lilith, jeune vampire de 500 ans, est résolue à quitter son harem de jolis garçons ! Sera-t-elle laissée à elle-même dans le monde humain ? Ou bien s’abandonnera-t-elle à sa faim ?

title: Marriage in a Heartbeat
description:
Because of an accident, he was forced to lose his virginity by his blind date! Who is he? 

One of the most powerful childe in this city. Rumor has it that countless beauties are willing to bow in homage. But he preserves his moral integrity and stays away from being womanizing. Who is she? The eldest daughter of a rich and powerful family. But she is out of favor with her family. 

He said: “Marry me, our marriage will be a protective umbrella for you.”
 She said: “I don’t want to make a convenience of you. I am not in love with you.”
 And he said: “But I kind of like you.”

title: Wu Ji Jian Shen
description:
Su Yun was a prodigy, blessed by the gods. However, life is never so easy. Soon after reaching 6th stage in spirit novice realm cultivation, his progress stagnated due to incurring a rare medical condition.  
  
A few years go by, and Su Yun has spent all his time gambling or drinking, wasting his youth away, but one day everything changes. Qing Er, the only one who stood by him was forced by his clan to be a sacrificial bride to someone she didn’t love, only to be executed by the groom on the wedding night for fleeing. Burning for revenge, he scoured the world for a cure for his rare medical condition from both righteous and villainous side.  
  
Countless years go by, and finally Su Yun not only found a way to cure his rare condition but also gain immense knowledge on a myriad of martial techniques.  
But before he could fully cure himself, he received news that the groom suffered an assault that damaged his internal organs. Rather than wait for decades to become fully cured, Su Yun decided to hatch a plan for the assassinate of the groom. Unfortunately, he underestimated the strength of the groom’s family and was killed instead.  
Then he regains consciousness. He comes to a realization that he went 15 years in the past. This time, he vowed to protect Qing Er, but first he must cure his rare medical condition. Will he learn from the mistakes of his previous life or is everything still set in stone?

title: Before The Girl Disappeared
description: The connection between a girl and another girl, and something that purify your soul

title: A Wicked Beast
description: XiuRui, a suspense writer, personally involves in tracking the mystery for the sake of writing materials, only to find that the truth of the murder case is exactly the same as his novels! And who is the secretly manipulating man that is lurking around him…? Crime makes love grow fangs, while discrimination will eventually devour and destroy trust, and the tangled love triangle will unfold. Whom should he trust, and can he trust?

title: Punishing Gray Raven: Interlude
description: Constructs — The weapons of mankind against the Punishing virus, rekindling the spark of hope in the desperate, burning night. They, too, were once the children of humanity. This is their story, before they plunged into a never-ending long struggle.

title: Maidfever
description:
Usually about messing around, infrequent updates. Translated with author permission for MD only.  
Author Weibo: <https://weibo.com/yurirakuichi?refer_flag=1001030103_&ssl_rnd=1609471865.9667> // @楽弌\_思慕  
Author Twitter: @Rakuichi\_simu

title: Level Up in the Mirror
alt_titles: I Brush The Levels From The Mirror
description: My name is Feng Yun. No cultivation resources, penniless? It doesn’t matter, I have a mirror, as long as it shines, whether you are human or beast, whether you are dead or alive, all things are projected out. What martial arts techniques, what heavenly treasures, what weapons, even talent qualifications are all projected for you! Ding! Dropped 《The Seven Stars Soaring Cloud Technique》! Ding! Dropped Canglan Battle Armor! Ding! Drop Advanced Gold Talent!

title: The Fallen Prodigy
description: The Continent of the Goddess is divided into two realms, the Xuan, Ao, and Ling tribes are gods in the sky. The human beings who have awakened the soul wheel can summon the gods to inhabit the gods in their bodies and become the goddess masters! Song Xiaoliu, a young man from the border town, possessed peerless talents and was tragically assaulted. He was judged that he had no destiny for his life, but because of fate he would summon many peerless gods to descend from the earth, and then embarked on a journey of surrendering against the world…

title: Spider Silk
description: The mysterious murderers who commit crimes frequently hide in the dark and stalk their prey silently! They may also stroll past innocent passers-by indifferently… or put up a kind smile, but wave a butcher's knife at the next moment! There's another possibility that… You're that demon…

title: The Supreme Reincarnated
description: The Emperor of Thunder, Chen Lei, failed in his ascension, and as fate would have it, he reincarnated back to his teenage days when his family hadn't been destroyed and his parents hadn’t died tragically. Chen Lei is determined to make up for his regrets! With memories of his past life, Chen Lei, with his enormous talents, embarks on his ultimate journey to become invincible—to protect his family, to crush his enemies, and attain all the treasures in the world. When he’s drunk, he’s surrounded by pretty women; when he’s sober, he’s the invincible supreme with the power to control the world!

title: Zhege Fanpai Youdian Liangxin, Danshi Bu Duo!
alt_titles: Villain: My Brother Is The Chosen One
This Villain Has a Little Conscience, but Not Much!
This Villain Has Some Conscience, but Not Much!
Zhège Fǎnpài Yǒudiǎn Liángxīn, Dànshì Bù Duō!
description:
Qing Feng accidentally transmigrated to ancient times and became an overlord, the master of the Qing family. He thought that he could finally live a life where he’d have everything just by lying down. Who would know that his twin brother is the “legendary chosen one” and he’s the “destined villain”? To survive, he can only work hard with the help of the system!

[Ding Dong detected that the host smacked the chosen one’s ass. 100 villain points acquired]

[Ding dong, congratulations, host, on triggering the mission, tease the bathing Bi Yu. reward 200 villain points.]

Hehehe

Sometimes being a villain doesn’t seem like a bad idea.

title: Martial Fist
description: In a world where experts harness and strengthen their martial soul to become a Martial Fist Master! Follow the adventure of a young martial fist master as he makes friends and fights against all before him.

title: Good Mood of Dragon Girl
alt_titles: The Good Mood of Dragon Girl
description: The aloof yet monotonous Ao Xiaqiu does not hesitate to use her beauty to her advantage. She sets out on a fantastic journey filled with love and romance accompanied by the idiotic workaholic, Qi Mingfei. As their bonds deepen, fate will dictate that humans and dragons may be too different from each other...

title: Houkai Gakuen 2 - Comic Special
description:
A collection of Houkai Gakuen 2 stories.  
  
Comic list:
Sweet Little Happiness: Chapter 1
Shigura Kira Origin: Chapter 2
Apocalypse - War: Chapter 8

**Note:** Chapters in Volume 0.1 and 13 are not part of this title, Are to be moved to there titles once found

title: Xi Yao
description:
Palace Maid X Empress

Su Zhiqing was born with breathtaking beauty. Upon entering the palace she failed to rise to the top and was sent to the Cold Palace, a place for unwanted things. There she met the person she would swear her heart to for the rest of her life. For the sake of that person, she hid her own brilliance and willingly became their servant, to stand by their side.

Xiao Wuchen met a young maid near the Cold Palace gate. The maid was stunningly beautiful with clear, bright eyes. Beneath her palace attire, her slender waist was so delicate that one could barely encircle it with a hand, and even if seen only once, was enough to make one long for her...

title: What Should I Do If I Found a Witch?
description: On his way home from work, ordinary office worker Ji Ze Chen met a young girl claiming to be a witch. And she even asked if he could take her in! What would you do if you found a witch one day? Why take care of her of course!

title: I Have Survived 999 Calamities
description:
Zhen Hetu always thought that he was an unlucky transmigrator. After cultivating for ten years, he remained in the lowly Qi refining realm (8585520/????) and didn’t know when he would break through! His 999th heavenly tribulation is brewing above his head and it was the kind that would make even the greatest cultivators shiver in fear! It wasn’t until he took his junior sister out for an adventure that he realized… that he was too strong.

---

**Links:**
- [Alternative raw (BiliBili)](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc31571)
- [Alternative raw (KuaiKan)](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/14256)

title: Starting With Full Charisma Points
alt_titles: Maxed Out Charm from the Start
description: Qin Yuan transmigrates into a game-like otherworld and unexpectedly obtains the "Charm Value System", allowing him to continuously increase his charm through the system. Watch as Qin Yuan captivates all and becomes unrivaled in charm!

title: Game of the Strong
description:
If the city is an ecosystem, then the people living there would be the food chain. I, Jiang Ming, will get to the top of that chain.  
  
Thai:||  
ถ้าเมืองนี้เป็นเหมือนดั่งห่วงโซ่อาหาร, ฉัน, เจียง หมิง, คือผู้ที่จะไปยืนอยู่บนจุดสูงสุดของห่วงโซ่อาหารนั้น||

title: Joker Danny
description: In a small town in the countryside lives a boy named Danny, an orphan with a tear-shaped birthmark. While the town is peaceful, there are rumors of a plague spreading in the outside world, which turns people into flower petals…

title: It's Not Fun Being the Empress of the Empire
description: My name is Clara, and I am a renowned romance witch. The most outstanding Crown Prince of the Empire fell into an everlasting slumber, and was unable to awake. People made many speculations that it was I who did it out of love and hatred. However, I have never even touched his hand before! I merely went to visit the Imperial Palace one day, and sneaked in to catch a glimpse of the Crown Prince. But because of that glimpse, he actually fell in love with me at first sight and insisted on marrying me?! As a result, the Crown Prince led his troops into the forest. "Clara, stop playing around. I've come to bring you home."

title: I Have a Billion Achievements!
alt_titles: Wo De Chengjiu You Yi Dian Duo!
Wǒ De Chéngjiù Yǒu Yì Diǎn Duō!
My Achievements Are More Than 100 Million Points!
description: Xu Chuan discovered that he could get an achievement for everything he did. “DING! Moved a wooden box once, gained an achievement, Wooden box mover, received God-tier skill [Mobile Fortress]!”. “DING! You are the very first person to drink water in the game, gain an achievement, Water-drinking youth, received God-tier skill [Water Control Technique]!”. ”DING! Opened a can once, gained an achievement, Can opener, received God-tier skill [Duplication Technique]!”.

title: MONSTER: The Quiet Beast's Warmth
description: A young girl who is cursed by a black butterfly has met with all kinds of mishaps, but every time gets saved by a white butterfly. This time the curse of the black butterfly strikes once more, but along with the white butterfly that came, was unexpectedly a long haired, beautiful man with wings! "Could it be that an angel came to save me?" "No, he is not an angel! He is… a beast!"

title: Human Use
description:
In the near future, human science and technology will stagnate, accompanied by the decline of the global economy and civilization. The use of technology by mankind, the redemption method that was once highly anticipated, and the only way to realize human evolution using potential, has now become a costly criminal tool.  
  
The 18-year-old Shen Daiyu is the earliest experimental sample to be transformed and become a "user". He has the special ability to project fantasy into others' brains. At this time, Xun was in the post of Investigation Bureau, while investigating and hunting down illegal users, while correcting the mistakes that his family had made in the first place.

title: Sweetheart V5: The Boss Is Too Kind!
description:
Jing Yiren was a proud and talented 14-year-old princess. One night, she was transmigrated, and she became the 19-year-old wife of the Lu Conglomeration's President.  
This sudden change would test every fiber of her being!  
  
For his part, Lu Ming now has to deal with a wife who is wholly confused by her new station in life.  
  
In the face of such problems, he can only get through to her with his actions  
  
*Note: This is a Reverse Isekai.*

title: The Unrivalled Medical Sage
description: He is a medical expert with the magical powers of the sky. He is also the first-class soldier in the underground world, but he… married a superb willful wife, let’s see how the soldier can respond…

title: The Story of a Cursed Armor
description:
ZhangBao, the strongest Qi practitioner, is unwillingly transported to a world of knights, where awaits a terrorizing evil called the “cursed armors.”
To return to his own world, ZhangBao has no choice but to battle against these monsters….

title: Warring States Martial Academy
description: Battle soul - a soul that carries great power. Only those who possess a battle soul can use ancient martial arts that have destructive techniques. The Warring States Martial Academy is a mysterious school founded over a thousand years ago for the purpose of receiving and punishing people with battle souls. The protagonist was sent to the Warring States Martial Academy by his parents without any knowledge of the place. What he saw and discovered in the school completely changed his concept of the world and of martial arts. The Warring States Martial Academy has the right to decide the life and death of the martial artists who possess battle souls. Who decides if what the academy does is true justice? In the modern society, are the powerful ancient martial arts a boon or bane for mankind? Please look forward to the development of the story!

title: CAT
description:
The third World War is nearing. Each super power country is going through a communications war to be ready for it: 
a battle to obtain enemy countries' top profiles information rampages between the Russian secret squad BEAR, China's Hao Long
and the United States' Confidential Assassination Troop a.k.a. CAT with disastrous consequences for everyone involved...
  
[Author Gallery](https://www.deviantart.com/cellar-fcp)

 [Official Vietnamese](https://tiki.vn/mat-sat-chien-quan-tap-1-p411052.html)

title: Childhood Friend & Me
description:
The story of me and my childhood friend, who's so cute I just want to eat her.

GL oneshot, fluffy. A manhua I made to practice over summer break in high school, the art and writing are both pretty rubbish. I hope you don't dislike it.

title: Rabbit Doesn't Want to Talk to You
description: A die-hard fan of a game climbed into the Boss's bed through a guide.

title: I Get Stronger Just by Lying Down While My Apprentice Cultivates
alt_titles: Tudi Shengji - Wo Tangzhe Jiu Bian Qiang
Apprentice Upgrade - I Get Stronger Just By Lying Flat
description: When my apprentice cultivates, I become stronger— my apprentice's cultivation is returned ten thousand times over, and from then on, I dominate, invincible in heaven and on earth!

title: Hualong
description: In his previous life, Qiongtian, after one thousand years of practice, was able to leap through the dragon gate and transform into a real dragon. However, he has fallen into a trap. Family and friends turned against him, eventually leading to his demise. Now that he is reborn, he has vowed to take revenge against everyone who has caused him pain. Behind the truth lies a conspiracy and now that he has found out....

title: Wo Kao Qiangpo Zheng Shang Wangzhe
alt_titles: Because of My OCD I Became a King
I Rely on Obsessive-Compulsive Disorder to Become the King
I Rely on OCD to Become the King
Wǒ Kào Qiǎngpò Zhèng Shàng Wángzhě
description: High school student, Yin Yongtian, has OCD. He got on the wrong side of a bully after His OCD interrupted his proposal. He was almost beaten to death, But he activated-The my Compulsion, your Compulsion system! The protagonist, Yin Yongtian, has no interest in cultivating, but due to constant reminders like “Unfinished Notification Mission” “Almost Full Skill Proficiency” and “Extremely Irregular Hexagonal Panels,” he makes his compulsion even stronger! Relying on his skills that are a hundred times more powerful than ordinary people, home and his friend’s adventure to the dungeon world- and his compulsions set him on the path to becoming a king.

title: Dragon Raja II: The Mourning Eyes
alt_titles: Dragon Raja II: The Mourning Eyes
description:
The summer break is about to end and Lu Mingfei (Luminous) is just doing his best to survive it.  
In the middle of this, his classmate Johann Chu shows up to bring him back into the world of dragons.  
As a series of mysterious incidents begin to threaten their lives, a conspiracy to take over the college will put their loyalties to test.  
  
Adapted from the original novel which has also been turned into a game.

title: Puppet
description: After having lost his son many years ago, an elderly carpenter seeks to reunite with him by reviving him as a wooden puppet. While they live happily together in a peaceful village, their newfound lives would all be disrupted when news of a serial killer erupts. What challenges will they face now?

title: After Becoming Everyone's Favorite, I Went on a Killing Spree
description: Growing up as an orphan in the arena, Ora was determined to awaken her summoner bloodline and gain immense power. However, her world turns upside down when she learns that the king has taken her loyal companion, Dragong, putting him in grave danger. In a daring escape, Ora and Dragong flee together, embarking on a series of thrilling adventures. Along the way, Ora hones her strength and resilience, while meticulously planning her revenge against those who have wronged her.

title: Eternal God Emperor
description: 800 years ago, Zhang Ruochen, the son of the Ming Emperor, was murdered by his fiancee Princess Chi Yao, and the proud prince passed away. When he was reincarnated 800 years later, he found out that his murderous fiancee had united the kingdoms to form an empire and crowned herself as Empress Chi Yao. As he stared at her portrait in the temple, a vengeful fire burned within him. "Give me 13 years to cultivate my strength, and I'll send the empress to hell myself."

title: I Exploit Bugs
alt_titles: Wǒ Gěi bug Dāng Guà Jiàn
description:
The top student and the class teacher is mysteriously transported along with the whole classroom into the gaming world. A world that determines life or death through an elimination system based on accumulated marks. 

A system setting that is constantly and mysteriously changing, randomly matched "team members" from various backgrounds, undercurrents and benefit-based entanglements within "legions". Here, everyone is carefully selected from the other challengers, but failure means death, and winning is the only way out. 

How will their lives turn out with this twist of fate?

**Alternate raw links:**
[Bilibili](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc30813)
[AC.QQ](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/651262)

title: Supreme Saint's Love Debts
alt_titles: Too Much Love Debt Before Invincibility
Before Being Invincible, There Were Too Many Love Debts
Unrivaled With Too Many Former Love Debts
The Revered One Has a History: Me and My Suddenly Appearing Children
description: After a desperate struggle, Supreme Saint Ling Yunfeng along with a team with determined beliefs have finally restored order to the world. I was just about to enjoy the hard-won peace, but suddenly discovered that before the struggle, he actually forged a lot of love debts and had children. It's time to pay it back! The supreme saint, who is a single dog and has no experience in raising children. The Supreme Saint has to fight in this new battlefield!

title: A guy who likes wearing women's clothes
Love Under the Sunset
description: One is careless and the other is cold, expressionless, and independent in mind. Once they meet under the sunset, what kind of bonds will these two young people create?

title: Infinite Evolution Starting from Zero
description: Exhausting all waste and decline, breaking the limits. Innate talent of a celestial being, a top scholar at the peak. Multiple forms, transcending evolution. Reborn, starting from zero, infinite evolution.

title: Demonic Awakening
description: Mai Xiuying, an office worker, heads to her first interview. Instead, she walks into the arms of a wolf, aka Kai Yang, her boss, who is also a demon, this couldn't possibly go wrong, right?

title: Record of Yun Hai Celestial Chef
description: Food is the most important thing to everyone– the gods in the Heavens like delicious food too. However, in the Heavenly Realm, delicacies can be eaten, but it can also be used in fights! Pheonix Siew Mai, Exploding Lava Bi Fang, Crystal Prawn Shrimp noodles… Your imagination is the limit to what you can eat. Watch how San Chi steps into the cultivation path to become a Food God. Using food to depict a brand new world of martial art and causing foodies far and near to be consumed into the world of food.

title: Honkai Impact 3rd - Secret of the God Keys
alt_titles: Honkai Impact 3rd - Secret of the God Keys (#Book 1010)
description:
A story arc that explores the fall of the previous civilization at the hands of the Honkai despite their unmatched technological capabilities. It Unravels the mysteries of the surrounding God Keys, a series of thirteen powerful weapons that were a statement of humanity's last stand.  


---

[# Book 1014 = Summer Memories](https://mangadex.org/title/30931/honkai-impact-3rd-summer-memories)

title: Kill My Love
description:
Certain lovers are selected anonymously, only to find a strange symbol etched to their necks. Once those who are selected get too close to each other, or within the “Danger Zone,” one of them will die an explosive death. Suspicion, scheming, and murder… Once star crossed lovers, now enemies, willing to kill each other without hesitation…   
Ning Yuan, a young emotionless man, is suddenly thrust into this cruel game of death. How will he protect his “Soulmate?”

---
Lovers have been dying in the cruelest way possible. Victims were sliced up into pieces, as if their bodies had exploded. Andrea and Ian were mere bystanders to this spectacle until a misunderstanding throws them into “Killing My Love” (KML)!

This is a game that uses love to fuel murder. Each team of pairs are given targets that they must kill… or else. All the while, a sadistic gamemaster watches from the shadows.

KML is a game with no end in sight, but one thing’s for sure… this hell is just getting started.

---
**Official Translations:**
* English: [INKR](https://inkr.com/title/1404-killing-my-love), [Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/killing-my-love/info)
* [Korean / 한국어](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=59485481)

title: From Dust to Throne
description: After Quinn Solomon’s grandfather – the most powerful Blade Emperor in Continent’s End – was executed on charges of treason against the Empire, his descendants faced uncertain futures. Separated from his family, Quinn was sold into cruel slavery and used as a test subject for dangerous experiments, sinking to the lowest form of human existence imaginable. That is, until he awakened the taboo Dark Demon force of Bloodline Remembrance! Having suddenly inherited the unique powers and skills of his deceased relatives, Quinn’s journey takes a sudden turn. Fighting for his family, he now embarks on the road of revenge against the entire Empire!

title: Don't Touch Me!
description:
A highly educated and wealthy elite who suffers from Haphephobia(fear of touching or of being touched) is forced by his grampa to work in the countryside for a few months if he wants to inherit the company. There he meets an ordinary, kind-hearted man.  
When the hot headed cat met the cheeky dog … what kind of sparks will it burst out?

title: I Actually Recognize the Ancient Scripts
alt_titles: I Unexpectedly Recognize the Godly Language of Ancient Times
Wǒ Jūrán Rèndé Shànggǔ Shén Wén
description: I actually recognize the ancient scripts: The male protagonist Zhong Wen was picked up by a little loli and brought back to the floating flower palace with only female disciples; The world’s top exercises, spiritual skills, and knowledge all come from ancient times; Therefore, the study of incomprehensible ancient characters has become the trend of the times and a symbol of status; By chance, I opened a book written in ancient scriptures; He was surprised to find that the so-called divine script was actually Chinese characters, and it naturally merged to open up life without enemies!

title: No Choco for Doggo
description: The unknown UP owner Long Kai Ran fed a stranger on the side of the road on his way back from a supermarket purchase, and the other person showed symptoms of food poisoning! Ryu Kai Ran, who wanted to leave, but his conscience didn't let him, returned to see what was going on, and took a look at Shepard, a canine who claimed to be homeless! Giving a helping hand - "If you can share the rent, anything?"

title: Phoenix of the Nine Heavens
description:
Feng Ming was only 19 when he lost his life saving a child from death without hesitation. The grateful father of the rescued child grants Feng Ming a second chance at life. Unknown to Feng Ming, his soul is whisked away to a far away ancient land (resembling the dynasties of China). 
Upon waking up, he finds himself inhabiting the frail body of Thunder Kingdom's crowned prince who is also graced with the title of the most beautiful man across all the lands. However, his beauty has a price as he attracts the unwanted attention of the minister of affairs, Rong Tian who finds every reason to torment the prince mentally and physically. As Feng Ming starts to get a hold of the conspiracies surrounding him, what will happen when the prince's true identity is revealed? And what happened to the 'real' prince?

title: Ugly Woman's Harem Code
alt_titles: Reverse Harem Rules of Ugly Woman
description: This comic is full of charming guys! Ji Guanxue is a doctor in the Bian city, an underground black market. She is surrounded by an aloof official, a loyal guard and a powerful mob boss. And there are even more hot guys awaiting her! In order to save herself and her loved ones from more trouble, she...

title: Age of Terror
description: After a weird hundred years where ghost were appearing, only one-tenth of mankind remained and the number of ghosts exceeding the number of humans remaining! In order to survive, humans needed to choose a “companion ghost” from birth, and constantly cultivate their own companion ghost so that they can be used to fight against other ghosts. The world has entered a weird era of co-existence with ghosts! With the help of the system, the invincible ghost cultivated by Lin Feng causes the whole world to tremble

title: Wuming Qishi
description: The Sun Knight is a man who has shining golden hair, sky blue eyes, a compassionate nature, and a brilliant smile. He is the spokesperson for the God of Light, the captain of the Twelve Holy Knights, and (some say) the man closest to perfection. Beneath the veneer of the Sun Knight, however, lies a very different sort of character…

title: Quick Transmigration: The Villain Is Too Spoiled and Flirty
description: In order to be resurrected, Sheng Nuan needs to travel through time and space to become a cannon fodder in different worlds and complete the task of stopping the villains from turning evil. However... these cold-blooded, paranoid villains, why are they all suddenly saying things like: "Nuan Nuan, you are not allowed to go anywhere except by my side..." "Nuan Nuan, for you, what does it matter if I destroy the country!" "Nuan Nuan, you are my inner demon." Sheng Nuan:???

title: I Fell in Love with my Girlfriend's Brother
alt_titles: I Fell In Love With My Sister's Boyfriend
Wo Ai Shang Le Nu You De Di Di
description: When Qiu Zinan graduated from high school three years ago, he went to the bar with friends. He disguised himself as a girl and met the man named Liu Ye on that very evening. That night Liu ye and Qiu Zinan then had a one night stand. Zinan has always been obsessed with him. He didn't expect this man to be his sister’s boyfriend three years later.

title: Red Thread of Fate
alt_titles: There Is a Red Thread Under the Moon
description:
Are the two people in love or just because they are tied by the red strings of destiny because they love each other? Wake up matchmaking god!  
Why are we tied together with the red thread?! we're both male gods!

title: Nagano Hymns
description: The mortal, Ya Xuan, had wandered around in all four directions. A mortal and a demon became companions, marking the start of an endless journey through the vast wilderness. A person who seeks for immortality, the evil spirit who massacres without a care, the cold-hearted god, the magnificent Ying Zhou's prisoner cage… Amidst the vast wilderness, a thrilling anecdote was painted across Ya Xuan's picture scroll. The countless of years revealed more and more secrets. Who actually is Ya Xuan? Why does he not age nor die? Why was the Blood Sea Phantom Sparrow's clan exterminated and condemend by the Nine Heavens? What is Ya Xuan's true goal…?

title: Black Feather Love Song
description:
"If you can't even help the dying or injured, how can you call yourself a veterinarian?!"  
Veterinary student Ju Kui risks losing her diploma to save a dying cat, but she never expected it would change her life completely! A magic kiss allows her to switch between being a human girl and a parrot, and the same goes for Xuan Dai, who can change from a cat to a human boy. This marvelous event allows a warm and touching adventure to begin!

title: Dragon Emperor Martial God
description:
Ling Yun, a cultivator, fails to cross the tribulation, and his soul wears the body of Ling Yun, a scum who was assassinated in the modern city. Facing the mysterious forces that want to kill him, and the world that he knows nothing about, Ling Yun cultivates immortality and martial arts, draws talisman and formations, refines pills and weapons, and kills demons!
Ling Yun: "suffer a loss? It's not my style to suffer!"

title: Wuchang Gui
description: Zu Huaixuan, a child raised in an orphanage, signs a contract with Yi Yang Shigong to travel into the underworld and to become a Bai Wuchang (a good spirit cop) in the god’s army in order to save a teacher who is very important to him. This story takes place in the spirit world that does not only feature Taiwanese and Chinese spirits, but spirits from other cultures as well.

title: Honkai Impact 3rd - Summer Memories
description:
A series created for the Honkai Impact 3rd Anniversary Event, the Summer Memories Arc lets readers take a closer look into the daily lives of St Freya's Valkyries as they enjoy the sights and sounds of the coastal city of Soukai, bathed in brilliant sunlight as wispy clouds scuddle across the azure sky. No matter whether it's Kiana consulting the great Bishop for culinary advice, or Himeko visiting the Yae Hospital to look for a magical love potion, there's never a dull moment in sight when the girls are serious about having fun!  


---

**# Book 1014 = Summer Memories**

title: Millennial Cultivator
alt_titles: Wo You Yi Wan Nian Xiu Wei
I Have Hundreds of Millions of Years of Cultivation
description: Since time traveling, the transmigrator Ye Fan has been living in seclusion in Tianwu City with the intent of living a worry-free life, until one day he awakened to his millennia of cultivation. While others feign at advanced cultivation, Ye Fan acts as though he knows nothing of it.

title: Psychic Princess
description:
Yunxi Qian, the oldest daughter of the prime minister was born with a special ability. Because of this she was deemed 'abnormal' and was raised at Mt. Lin Yun.  
Upon turning 16, she took her younger sister's place to marry into the royal family of Ye.  
Rumors say Youming Ye is strange, cold and cruel. Just how will Yunxi Qian's fate play out?

title: I Want To Be The Emperor
description: A generation of actress Ye Zhen accidentally crossed the award ceremony. I thought this was the unlucky limit, who would have exchanged bodies with the emperor! This time, thousands of miles and three thousand harems became hers, and even the emperor became her "sweet wife". Very good, I will govern the country, go to Gongdou! …Wait, how can the memorial mountain be so high, do you have to read all of this!

title: Demon King Domination Pet: Genius Meng Bao Belly Black Mother
alt_titles: A Genius Baby With a Dark Mother
Mojun Bachong: Tiancai Meng Bao Fu Hei Niang Qin
description:
As soon as Lin Yun-shik crossed, a man slept with her, then sadly she fell down of a cliff. Six years later, she was reborn in flames, and returned strong, and all demon kings pursued her. So, a man became jealous. 

A male general, Lin Yun-shik, blocked the corner and said, "The child is mine, and you are mine, too!" 

Two little dumplings attacked: "If you want my mother, get over us!" 

A man with a sad and angry face was attacked and said, "You're not good at martial arts!"

title: Qi Refining Level 3000: Starting with the Empress as your apprentice
alt_titles: Qi Refining Level 3000: Starting with the Empress as your apprentice
Qi Refining Level 3000: Accept the Empress as your disciple
Lianqi 3000 Ceng: Kaiju Shou Nüdi Wei Tu
description: Ye Kong traveled through another world, and he could break through a realm every day he fished. In the past ten years, he has broken through to more than 3,000 levels of Qi training. He thought his life would be dull, roasting white tigers and catching phoenixes, but one day, the empress was reborn and came to worship him as her master. Ye Kong: Hey, disciple, can you please stop worrying me? Empress: No way, no way, my master is practicing Qi, he is just pretending, he can never be a peerless master!

title: The Unyielding Ancient Cultivator
alt_titles: Shi Shang Zui Qiang Lian Ti Lao Zu
The Strongest Grandmaster of Body-strengthening Cultivation
The Strongest Body Refiner in History
Shǐ Shàng Zuì Qiáng Liàn Tǐ Lǎo Zǔ
description:
Ye Cangxuan, the grandmaster of Body-strengthening Cultivation died while passing through the Eternal Heavenly Tribulation.

When he wakes up again, he becomes mortal and returns to the sect he founded.

This time, the invincible grandmaster is set to punish the villains and restore his godly might!

title: His Apple
description: Linling, an ordinary high school girl, is actually the daughter of the Scarlet-Haired Witch — an existence akin to a max-level top player! However, she’s being hounded by a handsome and frivolous miscreant prince from another world for an unpaid debt. Thus begins the countdown for an emotional game with debt on the line…

title: Demon King Is a Hero
description: The otaku Ren "accidentally" becomes a reincarnates and starts an adventure in Kenolan. In order to be free, Ren abandons god, and the ancient gods sent disasters to punish the Kenolan continent for this. In order to save Kenolan, Ren embarked on the road to resist the rule of the ancient gods.

title: One Life, One Reincarnation
alt_titles: Nhất Sinh Nhất Thế Mỹ Nhân Cốt
description:
For the most part, the world is a superficial place. We see only the surface, and not what’s underneath.* What would you do if there existed a person who was blessed with the memories of their past life and continued to love you deeply in this life? He, Zhou Shen Chen, was granted such an opportunity. She, Shi Yi, who carries the burdens of their memories by herself in the present, has only ever wished for one thing in her lifetime: to find a story that truly belonged only to them in both the past and present. For richer or for poorer, in sickness and in health, no matter what’s on the surface, I will always return to you. **  
  
*TL Note: “皮相” and “骨” is used in this sentence, which literally translates to “skin” and “bones”. Another meaning for the “骨” character can be in reference to your character/personality. Thus, the sentence is referring to the fact that the world is a shallow place, as you are only judged by your outer exterior (your skin), as most do not bother to delve further to see your inner self (your bones).  
  
**TL Note 2: The final sentence is a very waxing poem that she will forever follow him no matter what the destination is and whether he’s wealthy/prosperous or dirt poor which is akin to something we would find in a wedding vow.

title: Dragon Hermit
alt_titles: Dragão oculto o eremita dos dragões
Dragón escondido el ermitaño de dragones
description: Xia Xuan, an ordinary university student, has been inherited by the Lich of the Other World, and his life has become wonderful since then. Bringing a group of skeleton babies to the city is both a death and a superhero act. The beauty of the school flower, the queen of the music scene, the overbearing female president … sheltered under the fire of Xia Yi's soul! vampire? Werewolf? angel? demon? All turned! Riding a bone dragon against the Sky Mothership, the Undead Scourge creates a biochemical crisis, and all those who have caused the Lich have trouble!

title: Always Be Your Guardian Angel
description:
The leading character is Yue Qing Tao. Born in a poor family, she was picked home(hole) when she wandered the street, and the one who picked her actually knew her for several generations. Although he clearly knows that the girl wouldn’t be the same person after she gets reborn in each generation, it's his selfish motive to get close to her, then just let them be together.  
  
[Alternate Official English](https://www.flying-lines.com/comic/spiritual-power-improving-strategies)

title: Holding Onto Him
description: She sinned for her beloved man and was jailed for five years. Five years later, she came out of jail, and he greeted her not with proposal, but a betrayal with her sister. Desperate and helpless, she met the richest man in City A...

title: I Get A Random New Occupation Every Week
alt_titles: I Get A Random New Occupation Every Week
Wo Mei Zhou Suiji Yige Xin Zhiye
I Get an All-Career Experience System
I Randomly Have A New Career Every Week
description: After being fired from his company, Lin Yi accidentally gets the All-Pro Experience System. Lin Yi relies on the various career arrangements and generous rewards given by the system to achieve his ambition and path to wealth step by step, becoming the ultimate all-powerful big brother who dominates the world.

title: Divine Contract: Starting With A Cat
alt_titles: Shen Ji Qiyue: Kaiju Yi Zhi Mao
Shén Jí Qìyuē: Kāijú Yī Zhǐ Māo
God-Rank Contract: Starting With Only a Cat
description: Xuan Ye, the evil sword saint, was reborn as a half-baked beast tamer. He used the strongest spirit beast summoning talisman given by the unreliable system, but only managed to summon a tsundere fat cat?! Fine, if you want to restore your previous cultivation, you should start by being a qualified poop scooper… But this cat seems to be a bit abnormal?

title: I Became Invincible After Descending
alt_titles: I'm Invincible After Going Down the Mountain
description:
After cultivating for 10 years and reaching the Innate Stage, Liu Mo decided to descend from the mountain to experience the world, but…

“I only reached the innate stage at 18, yet this world has 8 year-olds who have already ascended?! Sigh, my talent is totally garbage!”

This world is too scary. It has experts everywhere.

title: Dìqiú Rén Shízài Tài Xiōngměng Le
alt_titles: The People on Earth Are Too Ferocious
Diqiu Ren Shizai Tai Xiongmeng Le
Oh My God! Earthlings are Insane!
description:
Fifty years ago, Dracon City fell into another dimension. Despite having to fight and defend themselves alone, they held fast to the banner of Earth and stood tall against the terrifying Exbeasts found within the Altermension.

Fast forward to the present day, Meng Chao was reborn. Much to his surprise, he found out that he could become stronger by contributing to society. He then decided that he would become the most powerful of them all, wipe out every single Exbeast, and conquer the entire Altermension.

title: Mobile Magical Girl
description: Dai Hong is dead or alive, or maybe alive or dead? In the end, will he choose his childhood friend, or this outsider, who happens to be… a magical girl?

title: I'm a Villain In A Harem Comic
alt_titles: I'm The Villain With The Beauties
description: As an ordinary honest young man, Qi Zisui, after borrowing a harem comic book given by a friend, accidentally crossed into the world of this harem comic, and he actually became the villain in the comic who threatened the heroines in it and cuckold the original main character? Having nude photos of the female protagonists on his mobile phone and having female protagonists aggrieved on him, how can Qi Zisui survive in this harem comic world?

title: Keyboard Immortal
description: Zu An is your typical flame-war keyboard warrior. But then he was transmigrated into a world of cultivation, where political power is tied to the cultivation level of the temples and dojos. The Emperor of the Dazhou Kingdom is himself one of the most powerful cultivators in the world. Zu An migrated into the body of the despised husband of the princess Chu Chuyan. His reputation was irrevocably ruined when he was found sleeping with his wife's sister on his wedding night. But actually his whole marriage was part of a conspiracy, and the seemingly irrelevant son-in-law was the key piece in the imperial intrigue. See how Zu An will navigate the dangers and come out ahead, with the help of his keyboard!

title: Falling for My Boyfriend’s Substitute
description: A girl who has just recently lost her boyfriend ends up falling for a "man" that looks strikingly similar to him.

title: The Comic Changes My Destiny
description: When the book of destiny can portray and change the future, when the characters in the pen become a living reality, the comic world and the real world overlap! Ordinary female college student Luo Youzhen is about to experience an unprecedented experience, and embark on an adventure journey… A hidden cartoonist, a cartoon character with abilities, a hegemonic young man next to him, a mysterious female killer, who represents justice Who is evil? The comic legend that crossed the dimension opened!

title: Royal Brother, Away With the Sword
description: Song Qing Chen died a regrettable death after being killed with a sword by Song Huai Chen. She wakes up in fiery after awaking to her younger self. The reborn Song Qing Chen only wants to avenge those who have looked down upon her, but she never knew that it was so hard to kill the youth Song Huai Chen….

title: Age of the Awakened
description: On a new land, appears a trekking young girl from the dragon race, controlling a special element as a weapon, her body possesses a mysterious power – The Breath of the Sun. Not only did this power reduce her lifespan to two years, her only relative is also sick because of her own power. To change her own destiny, she steps forth on a journey. This long journey is full of dangers, what would happen on the way?

title: Doomsday Mechanic
description: Doomsday broke out, and the zombie virus spread wildly. Ye Bei was persecuted by the squad leader of the “Holy Bitch”, his arm was bitten off by a zombie, and he lived like a cockroach for fifty years in the apocalypse. With his own efforts to become a mechanic, Ye Bei developed a time machine, returned to the beginning of the apocalypse 50 years ago, and re-written the legendary life. He has seen the sinister human heart, and swears that he is better than everyone else

title: Start with Seven Stunning Senior Sisters
alt_titles: At the Beginning There Are Seven Outstanding Senior Sisters
description: Start with seven stunning senior sisters: Ye Chen was reborn in the Holy Land of Immortal Fate in the Profound Sky Continent and became the son of the Peak Lord. There are seven beautiful senior sisters above him, each with their own areas of expertise. After Ye Chen got the golden finger of the sign-in system, his cultivation was all the way, and he quickly grew into the leader of the Holy Land of Immortal Fate and won the favor of several senior sisters. After helping Xianyuan Holy Land solve the threat of a group of hostile sects, Ye Chen walked out of the sect again, supported several senior sisters, and then embarked on the long journey to become the number one in the world.

title: I am Picking up Fragments in Player Unknown's Battleground (PUBG)
description: Jiang Siming suddenly discovered that the PlayerUnknown's Battlegrounds he played was different from others. He can find fragments of various colors in the game. After synthesis, he can turn into various kinds of treasures such as skills, attributes, talents, money, antiques, even medicines, exercises, etc. Relying on constantly picking up pieces in the game, Jiang Siming completed a life counterattack and made a fortune!

title: Elven King War
description: He Dongdong inadvertently traveled through other worlds, and became the elves known for their beauty-a hybrid with the orcs: the beast elves. Even if your personal conditions are poor, you’re still a slave…Look at the most nasty, most wretched, and most cunning Elf King in history, attacking all the way, smashing the two mountains of humans and beasts, reviving the Elf dynasty and sitting in the harem of beauty!

title: Swallowed Star
description: In the Year 2056, a teenager clad in a tactical vest, combat pants, and alloyed combat boots sat atop a ruined and shattered six story apartment building. The building lies in a Prefecture-level city in the Original Jiangsu area. With a Hexagonal Shield and a Bloodshadow Combat Sword on his back, the young man sat silently on the edge of the roof. Under the brilliant hue from a starry night, it brought forth a breath of fresh air as the night breeze caressed his body. However, within this now ruined city, all was silent… all except for the occasional chill-inducing howls…

title: Shi Yi Lu
description:
Anthology of stories set in the world of Song of the Long March.  
  
Story 1: Spoiled Rich Kid (Chapters 1-2)  
Story 2: Master (Chapters 3-7)  
Story 3: Slave (Chapter 8)

title: My Boyfriend Is So "Use-full"
description: I have no money, no car, no work, my life seems to be at it's tip… "God! Please please give me a hottie and take me to the climax of my life!!" ——As if the summon was heard upon, a boy fell from the ceiling and the cake loving Zhen Tian’s greeting was surprisingly…the taste(a)of (French) the(kiss) lips!!? What do you mean it doesn't taste good?!! Hmph!

title: Loser Fox
description: This is the life story of a cute and dumb fox.

title: Invincible Within My Domain
alt_titles: My Martial Junior Sister, Your Martial Senior Brother Must Meditate in Seclusion
description: What kind of shabby book can only make me invincible in a fixed small area?! Cultivating can increase the range?! In this terrifying world where ferocious beasts run rampant and monsters come forth in large numbers, this senior brother, I will resolutely not leave the sect unless necessary! Junior sister, don’t cause trouble anymore! Senior brother is going to retreat! How about… you let them come up the mountain?

title: Duo Xuan Shi
description: After the gold medalist agent was betrayed and killed, the mysterious beauty possessed the system and reincarnated him. Xiu Xuan’s world is dominated by hegemony, and Warlords. This world has set a small goal for Chu-Yue - becoming the strongest

title: Copper Coins
description: The monk, Xuan Min, having lost all his memories yet retaining some skill in fengshui, geomancy and other arts,  on the first day in Ningyang, unceremoniously raided a cursed mansion, and incidentally also dragged out the true dragon, Xue Xian, hiding within. Here begins the story of the half-paralysed dragon, Xue Xian, and the cold and haughty monk, Xuan Min, joining efforts to search out the dragon bones and lost memories.

title: Subdue My "Villain" Hubby
alt_titles: Wo Cheng Le Fan Pai Da Lao De Xiao Jiao Qi?!
description: The dainty flower idol Chen Cong Rong unluckily fell into a trap and awoke to a stunning naked man in her bed! Hahaha, is it okay to be with such a beautiful man? Hang on… Are you telling me I've switched places with the toxic, evil, and manipulative side character who won’t even survive 20% of the plot?! No, I'm definitely not ready to die!! Watch as I keep on living my ideal life!

title: My Boss Calls Me Little Devil
alt_titles: My Godfather Calls Me Little Devil
description:
“You’re mine. I’ll never let you go”. 

When I opened my eyes, I heard these familiar words. In my past life, I’ve escaped But now I clung to my things in the eyes of the outsiders. Mr. Fu represent a wealthy, powerful, and profound figure. In the Madame’s eyes, she’s cold-blooded like a Tibetan mastiff, aloof and smoothly easy to manipulate.

title: Crack of Dawn
alt_titles: The Other Side of the Mirror
description:
Lin Jian, whose body is part mechanical, and Bu Xizhan, a mysterious youth, have a destined encounter when they both witness the destruction of a small mountain village.
