The pair somehow end up journeying together, during which it becomes clear that the two are complete opposites. The former is a straightforward and heroic champion of justice, while the latter is a secretive schemer who tries to avoid fighting as much as possible.  
Will this journey drag the pair of them to hell? Or will it result in their salvation?

title: Your Vision
description: A girl who is introverted and incompetent finds a bow in her room. After wearing it, she sees something unexpected… Adolescent feelings, afraid of discovery, and longing for new knowledge. My love for you comes not from you, but because I like you. My gaze is on you and you only.

title: Tales of the Wandering Immortal
description: The protagonist, Du Yun, an unpopular storyteller who yearns for a storyteller's free life, dreams of writing works that will last forever. One day, he comes across a mysterious woman who gives him the ultimate ability to write. No matter how boring his story is, he will be welcomed by all. This makes him one step closer to his dream, but will it really turn out as he thinks?!

title: The Chronicle of Teenage Boys
description:
Simple and shy, the boy has a crush on his class president, but the two-faced class president teases and rebuffs him! Oh my, will the first spring of his life be a good one or not?  
  
This story is divided into two stages: their high school years and adulthood.  
  
- [Author Twitter [NSFW]](https://twitter.com/dalegeyu)  
- [Author Pixiv [NSFW]](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/18133979)  
\_\_\_  
  
Ele, que é inocente e tímido, começou a desenvolver sentimentos pelo representante de sua classe, mas o representante tem suas emoções em altos e baixos! Ah, será que na primeira primavera de sua vida, poderá dar frutos?  
  
Nt. Essa história é dividida em duas etapas: eles jovens e a idade adulta.

title: The Villain’s Cultivation System Is Truly Crooked to Be No Good
alt_titles: Fǎnpài De Yǎng Chéng Xì Zhēnshi Wāi Dé Bùxíng,
Fanpai De Yang Cheng Xi Zhenshi Wai De Buxing
description: Xia Xia, a modern scientist, was abandoned after being used by a scumbag ex-boyfriend, and unexpectedly crossed into the biggest antagonist in the world of mystery novels.

title: Someday I Never Knew
description: A lot happened that day… An older brother flees with the adopted younger sister. The two survive with only each other after getting labeled as “The Murderer’s Children”. In those days where they accompanied each other, the two children carried their own concerns. And during someday no one knew, they developed feelings for each other…

title: Machspeed Starscars
description: Dark special abilitiy is devouring; spatial special ability is mysterious. By fortune or misfortune, a young man from the gutter possesses two abilitities. What enemies will he fight? What is his true identity? His fate changes as he encouters a vampire, a holy lady, a witch, and more people.

title: Humble System, Beg Me to Be Invincible
alt_titles: Bēiwéi Xìtǒng, Guì Qǐng Wǒ Wúdí
Humble System, Kneel and Beg Me to Be Invincible
description: While others transmigrate and get bound to systems, working like slaves. Wang Yang transmigrates and has a PUA system do all the work for him! As long as he lies flat (tang ping), whatever he desires is granted by the system. Divine-level skills, invincible cultivation, beautiful girls——everything is within reach! Transmigration should be this fun!

title: A God's Invitation to Eat
description:
The God of Rain is finally able to go on vacation, and for three years at that! With the dreams of an independent life, he goes to the mortal realm.

One night, a neighbor collapses on his doorstep in danger of starvation. With no other choice, he lets her eat his dinner. 

That should've been the end of it. However, because of the neighbour's kindness, the two become quickly acquainted.

In the end, the neighbour discovers the Rain God's identity, and her life becomes a little more magical...

title: The Diary of a 100 Day Part-Time Witch
description: An ordinary girl who knows nothing of magic accidentally stumbles into the world of the supernatural. Unfortunately, she signs a contract with the most wicked of monsters, thus setting down the road to becoming a witch.

title: Azur Lane - Wales and Eugen (Doujinshi)
description: author's pixiv <https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/11775395>

title: Worthless Reincarnation
description: In the realm of historical annals, Chen Xuanqiu, a descendant of a historian, enters the stage to avenge the grudge of Qingping Mountain. Entangling himself in an unresolved matrimonial fate, he steps into the chaos of troubled times. Through numerous strategic maneuvers, Chen Xuanqiu unveils the hypocritical facade of immortals. With unwavering determination, he vows to single-handedly rescue the suffering populace. A mere youth with a solitary sword, a new wind emerges, originating from the depths of Qingping.

title: Lady Yang Is in the Special Forces
alt_titles: The Magnificent Concubine Yang From a Special Troop
Yang Guifei Is a Special Soldier
description: A special forces soldier has transmigrated into the body of Lady Yang, destined for greatness on the Imperial throne! Her future husband, Li Longji, is actually a devastatingly handsome and clever man, despite his young age. Watch as the couple plays the fool to gain advantages. Their goal? To have the Great Tang Dynasty wrapped around their fingers.

title: Idol Is a God
alt_titles: Becoming a God by Being the Center of Attention
description: With the constant development of technology on Earth, people no longer need to worship the weather gods. Because of this, the rain god, Yushi’s, power starts disappearing. He decides to venture onto Earth under the name “Shiyu” in order to restore his power. Soon scouted by an evil boss into a near-bankrupt entertainment company. Shiyu is sent to participate in the show “I am an idol.” With absolutely zero common sense he somehow still manages to gain popularity and debut in the group SWEN alongside three other members. Overtime, Shiyu comes to discover that his groupmate, Yang Dongjun, and Zhong Yun were also gods who came to the world to work and earn faith…

title: Reincarnated Marquis
alt_titles: Back in the Ming Dynasty to be a Prince
Hui Dao Ming Chao Dang Wangye,回到明朝当王爷（神漫）,回到明朝当王爷（神漫版）, Reincarnated Marquis
description:
Everyone else wants to live forever while all he wants is to die. Others have to die while he couldn't no matter what, but he couldn't live, either. No matter how many times he dies, he'll be reincarnated and start a new life as a different person. But no matter how many times he revives, he won't live longer than one year and then he dies again. All this because the "Cops of Death" in the underworld miscalculated his lifespan which contributes to him being tortured! "When can I finally die?!" he howled and they kicked him to reincarnate again, but this time things are going to be more interesting…  
  
  
Todos os outros querem viver para sempre enquanto ele quer morrer; todos os outros têm que morrer enquanto ele não pode morrer, mas ele também não pode viver. Não importa quantas vezes ele morra, ele será reencarnado e começará uma nova vida como uma pessoa diferente, mas não importa quantas vezes ele revive, ele não viverá mais de um ano e morrerá novamente. Tudo isso por causa dos "policiais da morte" no submundo calculou mal sua vida útil, o que contribui para ele ser torturado! "Quando eu poderia morrer!" ele uivou, e eles o chutaram para reencarnar novamente, mas desta vez, as coisas são mais interessantes …

title: Lost in Zombie City
description: One day, the zombies spread all over the world. The living people do not know whether they are lucky or unlucky. They are comrades who become zombies, or are trying to survive. But in the end, they may still become food. How to choose?

title: I, the Destined Villain, Will Become the Righteous Patriarch
alt_titles: Wo! Tianming Fanpai Bei Chengle Zhengdao Lao Zu
I, The Villain of Destiny Will Become the Righteous Patriarch
description: Zhang Yuan, who died overworking from 9am to 9pm 6 days a week, entered the mental system he created — the strongest villain system in history. He became the strongest villain — the demon lord. Zhang Yuan could totally destroy all the humans in that world with one finger and complete his mission, but he doesn’t want to! He wants to enjoy retirement life in this system! When the slackest MC meets the most hardworking system, they go against common sense! Think outside the box! Enjoy the apex of life! Get everything he wants!

title: The Cat Immortal
description:
I was originally the son of the shrine official for the Year of the Tiger in the Immortal Realm. Since I underwent tribulations, I had to come down to the Mortal Realm to search for the one who can help me get through the immortal tribulations to advance in rank as an immortal.  
  
Who knew that my power would be sealed and that I would turn into a kitten!  
The one who can save me also turned out to be an extreme cat-lover, h-he pulled my tail, rubbed my belly, a-and even touched my balls! （＞﹏＜）

title: I Learn to Kill Gods in an Asylum
alt_titles: I Learned to Kill God in a Mental Hospital
Wǒ Zài Jīngshénbìng Yuàn Xué Zhǎn Shén
description:
Have you ever thought that behind the city filled with neon lights, monsters from ancient tales reside?

Have you ever thought that high above the sky, behind the moon, stood a God watching over the mortal world?

Have you ever thought that in this crowded 21st-century city, there are superhumans who are Seraph’s agents?

In this society ruled by humans, multiple weirdness lurk within. Mikaela the Seraph, Hades the Ruler of Hell, Poseidon the God of the sea… where have the Gods of Xia gone?

In this world that belongs to “man”, “Mythical beings” must be eliminated.

title: Lost Powers Restored: Unlocking a New Skill Every Day
alt_titles: Língqì Fùsū, Wǒ Měitiān get Yīgè Xīn Jìnéng
Aura Recovery: I Get a New Skill Everyday
description: After restoring his aura, the weakest awakened Lin Qiu was chosen by System 9527. Now, he gets a new skill every day!

title: Wanted: Criminal Heartthrob
description:
Rookie cop and a genius thief - two outcasts from opposite worlds are forced to team up to catch the criminal mastermind.

One’s a hot-headed rookie shunned by her precinct. The other’s a brilliant thief ostracized by her peers. Thrown together against their will, they soon realize… The person they’re chasing might not be as dangerous as the reflection staring back at them.

When the long arm of justice meets a shapeshifting trickster, this mission starts to spiral into something no one expected…

title: Golden Crow from Chaos
description:
The Golden Crow appears in this world, burning all the wastes, shocks the ages generation, and rules the heavens! The Prince of the Golden Crow, reincarnated, has set off countless tremors in the heavens and the world, and the King was reborn and started all over again!


*Official English Translations:*
[BiliBili (Defunct)](https://www.bilibilicomics.com/detail/mc398), [INKR](https://comics.inkr.com/title/1205-golden-crow-from-chaos-season-1), [Comikey](https://comikey.com/comics/golden-crow-from-chaos-webtoon/630/)

title: As Soon as I Became a Quasi-Sage, I Was Summoned by the Empress
alt_titles: Gāng Gǒuchéngzhǔn Shèng, Wǒ Bèi Nǚdì Zhàohuànle
Gang Gouchengzhun Sheng, Wo Bei Nvdi Zhaohuanle
description: In the empress' palace, the assassin fell to the ground. Lin Ke led a group of beautiful guards guarding the Empress's bed. Looking at the empress on the bed, he said domineeringly: From now on, I will be the man behind the empress!

title: Hibiscus and Bamboo
description:
A rich little heiress runs away from home and meets a swordswoman in seclusion deep in the mountains. What sort of story will unfold between the two of them? (Probably a simple and sweet little love story)

---

**Note:** Please support the creators and read the original webcomic [here](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/9747/).

[Artist Weibo](https://weibo.com/u/5282101552)
[Artist BCY](https://bcy.net/u/3325067)
[Artist Mihuashi](https://www.mihuashi.com/profiles/88557?role=painter)

title: Immortal Cultivation Do Over
description: Taixu Continent advocates cultivating immortals. Due to lack of talent, Wu Yuan is often ridiculed and bullied by his colleagues. On the day of the red moon, Wu Yuan suffered from the destruction of the immortal gate. When he opened his eyes again, he found that he was back ten years ago, and he had the memories of the past. In order to avoid the mediocrity of the previous life, Wu Yuan went through various trials and became the benchmark of the new generation in the fairy world. Just as Wu Yuan was proud, he was framed to death by the respectable fairy gate. When Wu Yuan opened his eyes again, he once again returned to ten years ago. This time, Wu Yuan retained his previous cultivation base because of the treasure. As Wu Yuan’s strength stacks up, can he break through ten years of reincarnation? What is the cause of the immortal destruction of the Taixu Continent? Why is the mysterious organization sacred?

title: Bocchi the Rock - Futari no Rokku (Doujinshi)
description: Kessoku band never happened. and Bocchi quit the guitar. Bocchi (21) got fired from her job, and while walking saw kita performing a song. Rekindled, she repicked up the guitar. and years later. they met...

title: No. 1 Grandmaster in History
description:
Lin Feng travelled through worlds and even obtained an overpowered system, but he still faces a pressure as huge as a mountain.

System’s main quest:
Lin Feng is to create a school; establish history’s number 1 sect and Lin Feng himself to become the number 1 founder.

To become history’s number 1 founder, Lin Feng started to work hard.

“Your name is Shi Tianhao? Natural born sovereign roots but it was stolen by your cousin? Now being raised in a little village your father placed you in? Come come come, follow your master and we’ll let those people know that justice that is owed must be returned!”

“Your name is Xiao Yan? A genius of the past but a loser now? Even your fiancé came over to humiliate you by asking for a divorce? Come come come, follow your master and we’ll let that brat know the meaning of: don’t bully a youngster just because he’s poor!”

“Your name is Zhu Yi? The son of a marquis but you’re being suppressed by your father? Your mother was a saint but she was assassinated? Come come come, follow your master and we’ll let your dad know the meaning how problems can be solved with your fists…no, with reasoning!”

title: A Manual To Raising A Dinosaur Boy
description:
One meteor shower night, a young actress Xu Meng "picked up" a dinosaur man, Yue Ba. From scaredy-cat to a bodyguard, Yue Ba sets off a new start.  
As for raising and feeding him, Xu Meng still has a long road ahead of her.

title: The Abyss Kitty
description: Jia Ke, an ordinary university student is raising a very strange cat, but kitty is super cute

title: Love Me in the Wilderness
description: The ten billions of properties has caused the reunion of two men, the love and hatred stories of the rich second generation.

title: The Proxy of Yama
description:
Don't think that mediocre men have no spring time.   
A little gangster that takes protection fees in front of the school entrance strangely became the highest administrator of hell. Now, things are getting interesting. Being King Yama, fighting the heavens, reforming hell's system, and leading ghosts to resist the oppression by the gods of heaven… Finally, I'm at the highest position within the heavens and hell.  
Mwahaha…

title: Ghost Marriage
description: Su Sheng was born with the Character Yin. A fortune teller came to her house and told her parents that she must marry a dead man or she wouldn't live over 18 years old. A few months before her 18th birthday, weird things started to happen.

title: Finger Girls
description: Feige, a high school student, has no special characteristics except that his left hand is thicker than an ordinary person, and his biggest wish is to have a wonderful youth encounter. Unexpectedly, on this day, Banhua would take the initiative to invite him to the rooftop for lunch! ! It didn’t take long for Feige to realize that things were not simple. On his left index finger, a grumpy girl lived in, claiming to be a warrior guarding the "love" of mankind, and wanted to destroy a creature called silkworm ghost around Feige. . Even more frightening was that he found that the other four fingers of his left hand were in a state of waiting…

title: I Have a New Identity Weekly
alt_titles: I Have a New Identity Every Week
Urban: I Have a New Identity Weekly
Wǒ Měi Zhōu Yīgè Xīn Shēnfèn
Wo Mei Zhou Yige Xin Shenfen
Urban: I Have a New Identity Weekly
description:
After activated the **Ultimate Disguise System**, Su Xun - an ordinary student, can have a new identity every week. A chairman of Multinational Enterprise, a highly skilled doctor, a master chef, a world’s top killer, or a superb hypnotist? He has countless identities!

**Su Xun**: I just wanna be a normal guy, is it that hard?

title: Peerless Martial God (Version 1)
description: The first version of God of Martial Arts, completed with 5 chapters.

title: Legend Reboot
description:
The lonely e-sports team manager Ài Dé suddenly found himself transported five years back in time. A road of making smurf accounts, crazy star players, and crushing other famous teams awaits him! His only goal? To become World Champion!  
  
**BRASIL** ⠀||  
Depois de ser traído por todos, o gerente solitário da equipe de Esporte eletrônico, ED, de repente se viu transportado cinco anos atrás no tempo. Seu objetivo agora? se tornar campeão mundial!||  
⠀

title: I Only Want To Meet You
description: Boy meets dragon girl. Boy released dragon girl from 1000 year old sleep. Boy get’s engaged with said dragon and live happily…no, WRONG STORY!!! This is a story about an ordinary boy who was the reincarnation soul of the god of matchmaking apprentice. Meet Jin Fairytale when he suddenly finds out he is turning into a god and had to resume his previous duty as the god of matchmaking apprentice in the modern world and juggle the responsibility of living a normal life and having to babysit the dragongirl he accidentally release. See Jin go on an adventure with his partner dragon girl and tying the red strings of fate to fellow lovers…but something went horrible wrong in this world. a man is in love with a chicken? this guy is into another guy? hello? it’s actually the soul of the girl? wtf.

title: Cultivation Begins When You're Betrayed by Your Family
description: Lin Xiaotian, a prodigy in cultivation with exceptional talent, yet lacked emotional intelligence, making enemies wherever he went. Ultimately, he was betrayed by friends and family, left alone to perish. Fortunately, he seized a slim chance and reincarnated into a modern urban world where martial spirit was fading, becoming an esteemed university student. As they say, when one door closes, another opens. He not only found that he could cultivate in this world but also discovered he could traverse to another realm of cultivation to acquire resources.

title: My Boss is My Ex-Boyfriend's Brother
alt_titles: My Boss is My Ex-Boyfriend's Elder Brother
Shàngsi Shì Qián Nányǒu Dí Gēgē
Shangsi Shi Qian Nanyou Di Gege
description: Qu Qi discovers on her first day of work that her boss is the brother of her college ex-boyfriend - a dark and scary man.

title: The Deadly Countdown
description: Because she can foresee death, she is regarded as an ominous person. In order to help those who are about to die, she fights with death … However, when she finally meets the god of death, she finds out that he has always been by her side…

title: The Legend of the Ancient Soul
description:
Thousands of years ago, the gods left the earth, but they left behind their own Divine Artifacts, which were passed down through the bloodline of the Chinese children, hoping that one day they would be able to use the power of the Artifacts to return to earth… The student union of Hongjun Academy's senior high school is an organization called the "Pool of Ultimate Bliss," which consists of the "Primordials," wielders of these weapons. The addition of a new member, Hua Yi, would result in drastic changes in the Pool of Ultimate Bliss…  
  
Note: L.DART and CHONG Liu are the same person. L.DART is Liu's pen name.

title: Schrödinger's Sheep
description:
An ordinary corporate slave, Ding Xueyang, has a secret - he has a special ability! But his special ability has a flaw; if he is seen using it, the special ability will be randomized to a new one.

For over twenty years, in order to keep this secret, Ding Xueyang has been living very cautiously. He didn't have a significant other, didn't make any friends, and didn't even keep a pet.

Until one day, a homeless person came across his secret, and from then on Ding Xueyang has plunged into an abyss of suffering!

title: A Depiction of Hell
description: A story about a demon living and dying in hell – the life of the 13th generation spirit.

title: Crazy Detective
description:
An unscrupulous ruffian accidentally crossed into a parallel space and turned into a serious crime detective.
An evil system of adventures led him to solve strange cases repeatedly and became a detective with an insolent personality!

title: Demonic Sect Imposter
alt_titles: It's Hard to Mix in With the Demons
description: Qin Yao, a disciple of the immortal sect, was seriously injured and fainted during a mission. When he woke up, he found that he was mistaken for a disciple of the demonic sect and was rescued. In order to survive, Qin Yao had to disguise himself as a demon disciple and quietly seek a way to escape back to the immortal sect. However, the demon clan is not so easy to mix in!

title: Craftsman
description:
Cheng Shan, a mysterious one-armed young man, travels around the world with his companion, a young girl named Ming Cai, in search of a miraculous medicine, the "Faded Dragon Scale". The theft of the black umbrella from the imperial palace resulted in heavy sins.  
  
Due to past relations to the black umbrella, Cheng Shan and Ming Cai decide to search for the black umbrella and recover it. However, after several twists and turns where their lives were in danger, they find that the matter is not as simple as they thought.   
  
Will Cheng Shan finally be able to unravel all mysteries and distinguish good from evil? Will he be able to escape unscathed from the lethal threats and dangers lurking in every corner, and eventually find the Faded Dragon Scale? dragon? Or, is there a greater conspiracy behind this?   
  
In this life, he is destined to be unable to hide and have no other option but to fight with his life because he is… The Craftsman.

title: Remnants of Ambiguous Love
description:
I don't care for any of life's joys  
  
As long as I can see that split instant of your tenderness

title: Battered Young Woman Doctor
alt_titles: The Daily Life of Female Doctor
description: The story of a strange female doctor who is a lesbian and holds totally different attitudes towards men and women.

title: Breathless
alt_titles: There's Only You in My Heart
description:
Shen Fei and Yi kun had been living under the same roof for years, and ever since childhood, Shen Fei has had a special feeling towards Yi kun. Without realizing it, Yi kun started to grow feelings towards Shen Fei. This is a story of a romance between 2 loving teenagers in their last year of middle school.

_Note: This scanlation is based on a Chinese translation of a [Korean Manhwa](https://mangadex.org/title/00e3ccc4-0ec3-4fd2-9c2e-a574b463f2af/there-s-only-you-in-my-heart)_

title: The Hunter G
description:
Read left to right.  
  
AD 2199, the “degration” virus breaks out, hence biological gene becomes indefinite, species started merging, resulting in the birth of unexpected new living creatures; humans who has fused with other living creatures are called “hybrids”. The collapse of civilisation, the world plunges in chaos; some humans received inconceivable powers, others would rather die, and there are some who hunt for the rare gene, making a living out of finding solution for the cause of the hybrid incident – they are known as The Hunter G.

title: The Son of the First Emperor Kills Enemies and Becomes a God
alt_titles: Daqin: Shi Huang Zhizi Sha Di Shengji Cheng Shen
Dàqín: Shǐ Huáng Zhīzǐ Shā Dí Shēngjí Chéng Shén
Daqin: The First Emperor's Son Killed Enemies to Upgrade to Be God
Da Qin The Son Of The First Emperor Kills Enemies And Becomes A God
description: Zhao Qi gets reborn to the warring period. At the time when the Qin emperor, Ying Zheng, started sweeping the 6 nations, and rule the world. Enlisting in the army Without hesitation, I didn’t expect once I start killing enemies I would level up the system! Slowly but surely, Zhao Qi became the commander for Da Qin’s army, when he saw emperor Qin he was immediately startled, he is actually the son of the emperor, Da Qin’s prince!

title: Glasses You Can't Talk About After Seeing With Them
alt_titles: Glasses You Can't Talk About After Seeing With Them

title: Have I Found You?
description:
One day, the lone workaholic Liu Yixia was declared to have abnormal blood stem cells from within and now suffer from acute lymphocytic leukemia. Her life takes a drastic turn and the usual independent Yixia has to now turn to her family for help. In the process of chemotherapy as if fighting a tug-of-war with death, would she truly be able to accept her family's love and care for her?

If I found you within 100,000 people, would I shake hands with a lonely life?

Family, strangers, and blood related relationships.
Taiwan's first blood stem cell topic comic. 

[Initiated by the Kaohsiung Northwest Rotary Club and hosted by Assistance Professor Luo Helin of Tainan National University of the Arts of the project "In Comparison with Us - Blood Stem Cell Database Creation Project", they invited the Gold Comic Award winner Monday Recover and popular author Wu Xiaole to collaborate on the comic strip "Have I found you?". They hope to promote the concept of blood stem cell creation through the form of comics to help more blood cancer patients.]

title: Ge's Spirit Weapon
alt_titles: Jiang Chao Ge and the Spirit Weapon
description:
Based on the novel of the same name (Completed at 167 chapters) by Shui Qian Cheng (水千丞), and from the team that brought you "The King's Avatar", comes a fantastical adventure story about the twelve ancient sacred beasts.  
  
Why is it that others get to enjoy all the glory, wealth and love when they travel to another world, while he's wanted as a criminal throughout the new world? Even the supposed "sacred beast" he summoned to protect himself is just a damn brat that's incredibly rude.. Jiang Chao Ge now just wants to return home from this blasted trip to another world!  
  
[Side note: 戈 is part of the MC's name, which means Dagger-axe; it's also homophone with song 歌, so the title can also be interpreted as "A Song of Spirit Weapon"]

title: The Evil Game
description: Lu Yao, a terminally ill patient, accidentally got a mysterious account and traveled to a different world called "Extremely Evil Game" to forcibly continue his life. As soon as he arrived at the scene, he became the No. 1 in the extremely evil list and was publicly wanted. As a rookie, the first time I have to face is the most dangerous "fierce" level trial - an extreme pull with the extremely evil monster girl group... Come here, it's better to play a big one! Isn't that the joy of living?

title: The Glutton
description: The human world was destroyed by the demon lords. Having lost everything, the awakened warrior Si Chen chooses to launch a desperate, final attack… sacrificing himself in order to take down the demon lord of gluttony, Lan Yue. But when he wakes up again, he finds himself transported ten years into the past, before any of this happened. Realizing that his powers have awakened earlier, he decides he must act early. With his return, everything else in the world seems to have changed as well…

title: Romantic Relationship System
description: Popular beautiful hostess Lin Tang has seized a chance to bind a romantic relation system to survive after an unexpected accident and time-travels to a strange world. Let's see what love tactics will she use to make all the handsome guys appointed by the system fall in love for her and go back to the top of her life.

title: I'm Raising a Man in a Different World: The Divine Doctor, Miss Jiu
alt_titles: Miss Divine Doctor: Conquer The Demon King
Wo Zai Yijie Yang Nanshen: Shenyi Jiu Xiaojie
How to Tame a Male God in an Otherworld
description: Jun Jiu, the Huaxia magic hand, excelled both in medicine and poison. After the time leap, she virtually became a waster that anyone could humiliate. A waster? She’s good at everything! She beats jerks up in the face, makes powerful elixirs with ease, owns a mythical beast, And sleeps with the emperor at night! So now who’s that trash?

title: Love is (Literally) War (Doujinshi)
alt_titles: かぐや様はバトりたい
description:
Artist twitter: <https://twitter.com/JackTheFridge>  
Artist pixiv: <https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/707646>

title: The Hero
description: The reckless "summoning" by the girl links up two completely different worlds! The Ghost Immortal Qin Fengqin who was attacked during the trial unexpectedly breaks through to another Realm! The clash of the two civilizations ignites a brilliant spark, igniting the girl's path to become stronger.

title: Night Actors
description: The opera singer Lu Cai and her theater troupe moonlight as a notorious gang of thieves, easily running circles around police investigators. That is until she becomes the target of a deranged serial killer and barely escapes with her life—but at the cost of revealing her true identity to Sergeant Lin Guanliang, the officer in charge of investigating her crimes. However it turns out that despite his pursuit, Lin Guanliang actually wasn't interested in catching them at all. What exactly is his aim then?

title: Chāo Cài Yǒngzhě Què Yōngyǒu Sǐwáng Huídǎng
alt_titles: The Super-Weak Hero Has A Death Rollback Ability
Chao Cai Yongzhe Que Yongyou Siwang Huidang
description: The Demon Queen has the ability to go back to a save point, but she never thought she would encounter a super-weak and idle hero with a Death Rollback ability, where even a slime can make him get stuck and constantly roll back time! Finally unable to take any more, the Demon Queen decides...

title: Don't Mess With Missy!
alt_titles: Không Gian Trùng Sinh: Phu Nhân Hào Môn Không Dễ Đụng
Chongsheng Kongjian: Haomen La Qi Buhaore
description:
Reborn in pursuit of revenge, I am sure I can easily achieve my goal, as I happen to be as rich as Bill Gates, as beautiful as Audrey Hepburn, and as deadly as deadpool. However, none of these above works when it comes to dealing with a sweating and panting CEO, who is poisoned, who is in need of "immediate relief."  
  
I'd love to help, but don't pull an ice-cool face when you're kissing me, sir!

title: The Legend of Luoxiaohei
description: A cat spirit, while stealing the famed Heavenly Bright Pearl, was injured heavily by the spirit Diting and turned back into a cat. While wandering the streets, he was adopted by Luo Xiaobai, and became Luo Xiaohei. Their story begins now.

title: Miss Vampire’s Bullying Game
description:
Irina, la antepasada del Clan de la Sangre, se disfrazó de loli oscura para vigilar a su comida de sangre -una cazarrecompensas maldita llamada Chelsea- y se hizo pasar por la prometida de Chelsea. Sólo para entrar accidentalmente en un pacto de esclavitud con ella. Al principio, Irina pensó que el estilo de la pintura era: "Chelsea arrodíllate, sé mi esclava de sangre ......". Quién sabía que el verdadero estilo de la pintura es: "Angelito, por favor, intimida a Chelsea sin piedad...".
Contexto

title: Evil Museum
description: In a dark and obscure museum with an enigmatic collection, a group of teens, Millennials, work. Behind each piece is a chilling story of sorrow. A rubber ball retrieved from a haunted cave, a strange robot with the form of a butler, a salted pork rice from the window of a shop of murders.. What is the depth of darkness of the human condition. Come closer and I will tell you more.

title: Fantasy: My Apprentice is Going to Become Dark
alt_titles: Fantasy: My Apprentice is Going to Become Dark
My Empress Apprentice is Becoming Evil
Xuanhuan: Wo de Nüdi Tudi Yao Heihua
description: This book will never abuse the protagonist, the system is just a tool. Travel through the fantasy world! Become the master of the empress before she turned evil. The little apprentice who was abused in every way suddenly found that her master became gentle and powerful, and became more and more hard-mouthed and soft-hearted towards her... Su Changge: Damn system, I don’t want to be a scumbag villain! System: Born as a scumbag, destined to be a villain! Feng Wanqing: What should I do if I like my own master? I want to have a sweet love affair with my master, and my master can only...

title: Yandere Disciples Entirely Think About Overthrowing Me
alt_titles: Yandere Disciples Entirely Think About Overthrowing Me
Yandere Apprentices All Want to Push Me Over
description: The great Ji Baitai wakes up early from his slumber in order to survive the calamity--and his female disciples that all used to compete to serve him were gone! When they meet again, the succubus, the flirty furry, the violent loli, the cold swordswoman, and the brilliant twins come rushing in, with all sorts of schemes to dominate him. Not only that, he learns a startling secret--he has to choose between his female disciples and becoming a god!

title: Black Card
description: One day Shi Lei, a good looking guy, received a mysterious black credit card with no money limit and a set of strange and life threatening rules. becoming addicted to his spending habits all he does after waking up is spend money. “will i really die if i don’t use the money? ” “I’ve heard that growing stronger makes you lose your hair, how about being rich?” “What? The one who has the closest relationship with me can help me spend money without breaking the rules?” “Spending money with childhood sweethearts! Spending money with beautiful ladies from heaven! Spending money with cute little girls! I am your personal ATM! Oh yeah!”

title: Raise A Mink As My Wife
description: An adorable beast fell from the sky to become a concubine? The cold-faced prince actually did such a thing to a little beast! A certain beast:"Don't ask, if you ask you'll regret, I shouldn't use someone for the sake of survival. Now I'm being eaten in a different way every day. A cute beast v.s. a cold master.

title: Legend Of Spirit Blade
description:
Zu Yi had been abandoned by his parents when he was young, and because he was a slave he was treated badly and died two tons. After seeing the death of his girlfriend Chafat Xiao king (just the name.she is slave as well) .  
Zu Yi loses the hope of life.hi meet the soul sword who promised him pawer if hi help him back and so the adventure of the young mand and the legendary spirit sword…

title: After 10,000 Years I Will Do Whatever I Want
alt_titles: After 10,000 Years I Will Do Whatever I Want
description: Wang Rui was an cultivator 10,000 years ago. The cultivation civilization in Tongxuan Continent 10,000 years ago was extremely prosperous. However, after encountering a catastrophe involving the invasion of extraterrestrial evil spirits, the immortal cultivation civilization in Tongxuan Continent suffered a major setback. Almost all the knowledge and people related to immortal cultivation were annihilated. Wang Rui reborn in the Young master of Wang family, Who has the same name “Wang Rui” as him after 10000 years.

title: The Hero and the Harem Are Mine Now
alt_titles: The Protagonist and the Harem Are Mine
description: Li Xiu, a genius schoolmaster, complained that the author of the comic book "I'm Alone Eliminating Demons" wrote off his favorite supporting role of the same name, and received a letter from the author: "Since I think I wrote it badly, come here! You are Li Xiu, Li Xiu is you ." Attempted to frame the protagonist? Was tortured to death? After death, the body was manipulated by the demons and chopped down by the protagonist? You who are crazy and handsome shouldn't end this way! This time, let Li Xiu rewrite Li Xiu's destiny!

title: Metropolitan Super Doctor
description: Fang Han, the grandson of the King of Shen Needle, has the body of nine Yin and no veins. He entered the world to search for the lower part of the "Huangpu Needle Sutra" for autonomy, but by accident, he became a security guard at the Medical University. The security guard knows martial arts, and the hooligans can't handle it. The security guard knows medical skills, and the beauty can't walk. A turbulent love, a bloodbath, a story of promoting Chinese medicine starts from this security guard…

title: Boy's Dormitory 303
description: The stupid antics of four dudes living together, their “no pain, no gain” lifestyle in school, and maybe there’ll be some romance in the mix~

title: My Salted Fish Was Released
description:
The popular actress Lin Meiyu woke up and became her vicious supporting actress! Holding the script, she knew that sooner or later the handsome guys around her would ruin her reputation and die without a burial! 
Black-bellied assistant Qin Fei: You taught me! Do anything to achieve your goals! 
Sunshine Security Shen Zai: You said you hate me? Well it's you! 
Ji Yuancheng, the ultimate boss: Lin Meiyu, interesting.....
My name is Lin Meiyu, and my salted fish has been released!

title: The Last Of The Devil's
description:
Note: The series has an ending, but was cut short. Should you choose to read it, read it at your own risk.   
  
Due to his father's disappearance, Rhine stepped into the vampires territory in search for his father. Little did he know that the cold and arrogant leader of vampires behaved abnormally to him after one night.   
Every single day he worried if he could make it out alive while finding his father, and the secret behind this vampire household, can he escape the vampire's control over him?

title: Emperor Qin returns! I am the Eternal Immortal Emperor
alt_titles: Emperor Qin returns! I am the Immortal Emperor of the Thousand Years
description: Emperor Qin Ying Zheng was unable to overcome the tribulations in the immortal world. He was reborn in the city, where the spiritual force was restored. With his sword, he vanquished the strong men from outside the realm, conquered the ladies in the harem, and called forth the fierce warriors and fierce generals with his hands to conquer the entire world! He held the title of Emperor of the Immortals during his previous existence. He pledged to return to the immortal realm and reach the pinnacle of immortality in this life!

title: Rebirth: Back to 1983 to be a Millionaire
description: Chou Yufeng, the listed president, was unexpectedly reborn in 1983. Looking at his lovely wife and siblings who lost their parents, Chou Yufeng decided to create his own era here!

title: Resurgence of the Solo Beta Player
alt_titles: Moshi Wudi: Zhiyou Wo Shi Nei Ce Wanjia
Apocalypse Invincible: I Am Only a Beta Tester
Doomsday Invincible: Only I Am a Closed Beta Player
Invincible in the Apocalypse: I'm The Only Beta Player
description: Five years ago, the online game “Star Brilliance” unexpectedly manifested into reality. Ye Chen, the only surviving beta-test player, tragically met his end due to his own naivety and folly. However, perhaps favored by destiny, on the brink of death, he found himself transported back to a time before “Star Brilliance” descended upon the world. In this life, he is determined to rectify all the mistakes he made in his past life, vowing never to repeat them. Even if it means standing against the world itself!

title: The Herbalist Is Hard to Please
description: Protagonist Xu Ruo Lan found out that her husband was having an affair, got murdered and got reborn to Wen family. She was reborn as Wen Bi Wan, the illegitimate daughter of Wen family. With the help of the male lead, Jiang Tian Lin, she takes revenge.

title: It Feels so Wrong to Bite People
description: What?! Do I have to do all the bad things to get stronger? What kind of system is this! I just want to be a ordinary person!

title: Male God, Your Persona Has Collapsed!
description:
Reborn back to his college days, Zhou Yuwen knew well the importance of maintaining one’s image.
In this life, his labels were: maturity and extraordinary talent!

“I’m a rather traditional guy. I believe love comes with responsibility — so one must be cautious when falling in love.”

“Zhou Yuwen, let’s remarry!”

“Get lost! I already have a girlfriend!”

He runs, she chases — and even with wings, there’s no escape!

title: Grave Robber
description: As human beings are advancing and developing now, more and more unknown things are being explored, like ghosts and monsters in land and sea, folk legends coming to reality one after another. Tracing these unsolved mysteries, all these answers come from the graves of each dynasty. Some humans are wantonly robbing these graves, causing the myths and legends that were originally buried in the ground are slowly coming to life. Therefore, a mysterious organization emerged —— The Inspector of Graves.

title: I Can Hit Infinitely
description: Lin Jing, who arrived in a fantasy world, faced hostilities from rival sects, betrayal from fellow disciples, and the burden of accompanying a sect’s daughter who had lost all her cultivation. Fortunately, he possessed the power of the “Critical Strike System.” With this system’s blessing, everything he did—be it attacking, defending, moving swiftly, cultivating, alchemy, or enlightenment—could trigger critical strike effects! No matter how formidable his foes were, they couldn’t withstand this simple yet unstoppable power of critical strikes!

title: Treasure - Demon's Museum
description: Luo Luo lost her memory in a car accident. She was rescued by something not human. Her journey into a fantasy world has just begun.

title: General Gentle Teasing
description: This comic tells about the mighty general who was forced to live with the beautiful iceberg man through the modern age! General scared?! Never!! Buy food and wash dishes, doing live broadcasts to make money, fighting villains! But why do you always transform into a large puppy in front of your beautiful "guardian"? No way, the beauty is too provocative, who can withstand this … but this general is not that innocent too! Take the beauty in minutes! I am the god of war admired by thousands of people, and you are also one of them

title: Devil's Lover
alt_titles: The Bride of the God of Magic
description:
After CEO Qi's death, he crossed over to a different world. He originally thought that he was a savior, only when he got dressed up and sent to the wedding bed, did he realise that he became the bride for the devil! When faced with a frivolous and doting devil, when exactly can the cold and aloof CEO give birth?!

---
After being murdered, the CEO of Qi's Group travels to an otherworldly land and becomes its Savior. The only way to save the world is to become the wife of the God of Desire and awaken the power of new life with him?!

---
**Original Web Comic:** [AC.QQ](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/649185), [BiliBili Manhua](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc30514), [IQIYI](https://www.iqiyi.com/manhua/detail_1aedr7uj5bp.html), [KuaiKan Manhua](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/8386)

**Official English Translations:** [INKR Comics](https://inkr.com/ik-title-688), [WebComics](http://www.webcomicsapp.com/comic/612dda758c252b0ce439d134)

title: I Like Your Pheromones
alt_titles: Wo Xihuan Ni De Xinxi Su
description:
As a good-looking Beta with a good family background, Duan Jiayan has lived a smooth sailing life for more than ten years, until he met Lu Xingci in high school.

Lu Xingci’s family situation is better than his, he is taller than him and plays basketball better than him. Needless to say, his grades are a whole tier above Duan Jiayan’s. Even his friends can’t help but occasionally praise Lu Xingci.

Most importantly, every girl that Duan Jiayan has set his sights on, all admitted that they have liked Lu Xingci for a few years already.

Since then, Duan Jiayan has never thought well of Lu Xingci, till the day he received his new medical report. He is a late-blooming Omega, and because he became an Omega this late, it came with dire consequences. Now Alphas will feel the need to beat up other people whenever they come near Duan Jiayan. He himself is now allergic to every Alpha’s pheromone, except Lu Xingci’s.

title: Vampire Beru and Ghost Aki
description: Once on the All Saints' Day vampire Beru and ghost Aki, despite their very different personalities, started living together in a castle. Multiple obstacles and difficulties already waiting on their way. But when they'll know each other better, eventually they'll become the most important companions for one another.

title: Dream City
description:
NOTE: SUGGESTIVE SHOUJO AI. NOT ACTUALLY SHOUJO AI. This is more of a friendship story. If you're not okay with it I suggest that you do not read it.   
  
The story of the encounter of two ladies - one of them a DJ and the other a successful businesswoman. As they live within this vast city, do they watch as bystanders or become lost within the maze?

title: Forced Marriage, True Love
description: They forced me to marry to replace my sister, at the wedding I was alone. I ran away and got into a car, the driver was the boyfriend. Unknowingly, she confessed that her boyfriend was old and ugly. She said "I want to go home," since then, there have only been misunderstandings ….

title: Wolf and Commander
description: Xia Ge's life was about to come to an end, when she realized that she is a beast tamer who can control the demon race. But at the last moment, Xiu Yu from the wolf clan appeared to protect her.

title: Ore no Daisukina jiji kyu ni kuso erokawai BBA ni natta
alt_titles: My favorite old man suddenly became a sexy and cute BBA

title: A Moonlit Spring River
description: A Moonlit Spring River: A story about the eunuch Army Inspector Huai En and the General Hua Shichen as they fight traitorous court officials, battle the northern barbarians, guard the frontier, and make their love and ideals a reality.

title: The Nether World Mix of Jiang Long
alt_titles: Dragon of the Guandu Misto River
The Nether World Mix of Jiang Long
description: Originally, Zhang Muji just wanted to be a part-time job to buy gifts for the goddess, but he found a strange door. Zhang Ji door of wood of greedy has angered a senior official, and thus be punished to do more part-time, Zhang Ji heart of wood very reluctant, part-time and earn money salty fish What is the difference! Zhang Muji even thought of an idea to charge the gods from various quarters of "doors to the construction costs" a fortune …… "Do not be bullied by a master of the game! Or you are the government should shake turned from head down!"

title: Girls' Frontline 4koma (AC130)
description: Developed by Mica Team, Girls' Frontline is a mobile Tactical SLG for Android and iOS where the player takes the role of a newly recruited commander in a Private Military Company named Grifon&Kryuger and completes various tasks by commanding highly advanced androids known as Tactical Dolls.

title: A Pretty’s Super Zombie
description:
Yang Cheng, a loser who got cheated on by his girlfriend, drank far too much and got lost in the woods where he was bit by a zombie and turned into a zombie with super power himself! After then he became a pretty, Ye Xuanlin’s bodyguard and found out that she was in great danger! Will he protect her? What should he do now?Portuguese (BR) / Português (BR)Yang Cheng, é um jovem órfão que um certo dia levou corno de sua namorada com um rico empresário. Humilhado e envergonhado ele bebeu demais e acabou se perdendo na floresta, onde foi encontrado e mordido por uma linda zombie que o transformou em um zombie com superpoderes! Depois disso, ele foi recomendado por seu chefe para trabalhar como guarda-costas pessoal da herdeira de uma importante empresa! O que será dele a partir de agora?  
  
Source: MangaToon

title: Fair Wind Scroll
description: For the crime of stealing the Fair Wind Scroll, He Xianzi had his soul crushed and was expelled from the celestial realm. Just before his execution, he made a promise with his disciple, San Tu… Now, thousands of years later, San Tu has achieved great progress in his cultivation and descends into the world of mortals in search of his master. He meets a man with the same appearance as He Xianzi, as if he was his reincarnation, yet that man claims not to know him. Facing the onslaught of evil and nefarious plots in the shadows, will San Tu be able to clear He Xianzi's name from injustice and continue toward their destined fates together?

title: Celestial Master
description: Xie You has been blessed by thousands of evil spirits since he was born...but the blessings and kindness of the evil spirits are not good things for humans. According to the contract back then, Xie You can only continue to pretend to be disabled. Under such circumstances, the five families are asked to fulfill the marriage contract. If one family fails to fulfill the marriage contract, Xie You will become truly blind.

title: Training Relationship
description: Xiao Bai is a teacher with two little siblings. Their father left them with a huge debt (20 million) from the Zhuo Shan Group, which is a mafia group. The third generation leader, Zhuo You, came after them after their father fled from the country. Once caught by Zhuo You, he was asked to pay back the debt with his 'body'! Just what does he mean by that?

title: Ring
alt_titles: RING - The History of Two Angels
description: A sweet story between a little angel and a big angel~

title: Poisonous Phoenix
description:
In her last life she devoted everything to her beloved, the third prince. However her devotion was met with the sharp dagger of betrayal, as the man whom she loved carved her heart out.  
Years later, she is reincarnated as the bride to be of her enemy’s brother, the fifth prince, a silly prince whom the royal family regards as worthless. In him she sees her past pitiful self and promises to protect this foolish yet kind prince. But is this foolish prince really all that he seems? Can she really protect him and seek revenge for her past life? Certainly the royal family has nothing to fear of this dimwitted prince and his beloved wife who is seeking revenge… Right?

title: I Don't Want To Leave Bachelorhood Just Like That
description: After a car accident, Yi Wen discovered that he travelled to a queer world. Where he wasn't endowed with exceptional power or wealth , nor there are chicks falling into his him arms, basically there wasn't any restart life cheat, but….

title: Light vs Shadow
description:
A badly injured boy was luckily saved by fencer Isabella and Ana, but unfortunately lost all his memory.   
Ten years later, the teenage fencer Ryun got a magic sword by accident and all have changed since then.   
He's eager to explore the mystery of his own life and to solve it.   
The quiet life was over, the teenage boy, Ryun, started the adventure on his own.   
Meanwhile, in the North Pole - Savage Land, a grand plot was being hatched.  
  
The continent Irmo was protected by a sphere of light, so evil spirits could not enter the Kingdom. But one day the monsters start to get out of the forest. Is that dark energy driving them crazy? Ren, a guy who has forgotten his past, goes on a journey to find himself and the missing answers…  
  
Континент Эрмо был защищён сферой света, поэтому нечисть не могла проникнуть в королевство. Но в один из дней монстры начинают выбираться из леса. Неужели это тёмная энергия сводит их с ума? Рён, парень забывший своё прошлое, отправляется в путешествие, чтобы найти себя и недостающие ответы…

title: My First Love is A Guy
alt_titles: My First Love Is a Boy
description: The adorable Sha En has a little secret – he likes to wear skirts. However, by pure chance, he was discovered by the antisocial and reserved Xia Zuo! What Sha En never expected is that Xia Zuo has a knack for designing lolita dresses; what’s even more unexpected is, in order to get Sha En to wear the lolita dresses he makes, every time Sha En rejects him, he would bawl his eyes out… A bond that formed between the both of them because of skirts, and a sweet day-to-day life that is tailor-made is about to begin!

title: The Boss's Shotgun Wedding
alt_titles: Hasty Marriage Contract With The Heir
The Wife Contract Ran Away of CEO
description: Tricked by her best friend, her first time was taken away by the cold CEO of the company she works for. After she finds herself pregnant and forced to marry by his grandmother. He comes up with a marriage contract. What will their life be like, and will it turn as true love in the end?

title: Rising to the Azure Sky
description:
Ling Yufei overcame many obstacles on his journey to become a pilot. However, a sudden company order dashed his dreams by assigning him a new captain, who's younger than him and parachuted in above him?! Under these circumstances, Ling Yufei can only rely on his wits on this flight of romance...

Skyhawk Airlines is about to take off, please enjoy the amusing shenanigans of the captain, co-pilot, and their flight crew!

title: Heart Beat Plan
description: A VR game called "Heartbeat Plan" has gained over whelming popularity worldwide and was just launched in China. The game's main topic is related to love and exploration. Our introverted heroine found out that her secret crush is also playing that game, and thus a tangled love story is about to begin quietly…

title: Fragile Relationship
description: Ye Shen is just your everyday ordinary designer and yet, the person he likes is the unreachable, aloof president, Lin Xiang Yao. On the surface, the two are seemingly friends, however secretly, they have an abnormal physical relationship. Ye Shen is aware that involving himself with Lin Xiang Yao, whose heart already belongs to someone else will not result in anything. He too knows that these feelings of his will never be returned, but he’s already trapped deep inside it, unable to break himself out from.

title: Calm Down, Revenge Queen
description: Abandoned, framed, tragic ending... A quick-transmigration female supporting lead has had enough! Why must a supporting character have to be a contrast to the main lead?! From this world onwards, she has decided to take fate into her own hands, no longer listening to the system's plans! Pushing aside all obstacles and difficulties, she fulfils her own dreams, whilst using all sorts of methods to get back at those who harmed her previously...

title: The Blind & the Homeless
description:
Through a chance encounter, a bright but dissolute tramp and a melodramatic but kind-hearted man with a visual impairment form a unique relationship. Thus begins their daily chaos.  
  
Can two imperfect people support and heal one another? The answer is blowing in the evening wind…

title: My Master Knows Everything
alt_titles: Wo De Shifu Shenme Dou Dong Yi Diandian
Wǒ De Shīfu Shénme Dōu Dǒng Yì Diǎndiǎn
description: The main character, a programmer, was accidentally reborn in the Xuanhuang world in a coma and became the master of four treasures, the peak of hundred peaks sect. He became the administrator of the Tianyuan system and could have the ability to load users into the system, from which he continuously improved his own administrator’s level and his own strength, and he and his disciples thus embarked on cheat life…

title: The Strongest God of War in the City
alt_titles: The Strongest God of War in the City
The City's Strongest God of War
description: Ning Bei suffered a family rebellion when he was young, and fled to the northern border alone. For thirteen years, he honed himself as the invincible god of war in the northern border, and protected his home country with a northern king sword. One day, Ning Bei returned to dragon city and faced the battle again. Once love and hatred, his road to revenge began.

title: I Can't Fall in Love With Paperman
alt_titles: Wo Bu Keneng He Zhi Pian Ren Tan Lian'ai
description: When a BL comic artist transmigrated into the princess of Liao, she resumed her career... but encountered her "dear son" who crawled out of the book and refused to be gay! Faced with a sword to her neck, will she surrender or resist? What's worse, the plot is no longer under her control; who's the mysterious person behind the scenes controlling everything?

title: Only Love
description: Bully × The first love of many, an interpretation of the deepest love. Reborn as a high school sophomore, it was the best year in Meng Ting's short life. She wants to live it to the fullest, she wants to dance again, and never mess with the demonic boy who later raises his butcher knife - Jiang Ren. This summer, around the corner of the school building, Meng Ting heard Jiang Ren, the bad boy, laughing wildly: "What kind of girls do I like? Girls like Meng Ting."

title: Monster Hunter in the Apocalypse
description: In an apocalypse overrun by monsters, where everyone lives in fear… I possess a system that lets me capture them!” “A seductive spider demoness, a city-sized behemoth, even the legendary Black and White Wuchang—all have become my pets!

title: Radiance of Tribulation: The Old Man Leads the Way
alt_titles: Po Jie Zhi Hui: Lao Da Ye Dai Fei
description: Together with the Demon Lord, he is reborn 60 years into the past. Witness how the dashing elder mercilessly crushes the Demon Lord, all while safeguarding his beloved.

title: Fuying Zhuxin
description:
While out begging at the tender age of ten, Momo was snatched by child traffickers and hidden away on a storage vessel.
But luckily, he met up with Qiao Boqi, who had arrived to apprehend those traffickers; the two bonding instantly.
Qiao Boqi then brought Momo back to his private residence and bestowed the young one with the new name "Qiao Ying (影: Shadow)".
Thus, Momo—as Qiao Ying—began his new life as Qiao Boqi's adopted younger brother.
But sometime later, Qiao Ying will become dragged into a spiraling struggle with the Prince of Yan...

title: God Among Men
description: Dong Nu was an ordinary beautiful girl in her junior year of high school. After an accident, she met a very powerful yellow-haired man. Although his behavior was a little eccentric, he attracted her attention. As she learned more about him, she began to discover that this man had a shocking identity, as he was not just an ordinary mortal….. In fact, you might even call him a…..

title: Sunny With a Chance of Dragons!
alt_titles: Today is Sunny, a Dragon Fell!
description: There exists a young girl with a pair of braids from bones that’s called the witch, suddenly a dragon egg fell on her head and met a fierce baby dragon, the two discriminated beasts, worked together to find where they belong, what will they meet in their adventure?

title: My Classmates Are All Very Strange
alt_titles: Wo de Tongxue Dou Hen Qiguai
description:
Liao Yuqing, who’s just an ordinary female high schooler, somehow bumps into a Prince Charming-like* student on her way to school?! At the same time, the highly anticipated foreign mad dog, pretty boy student, Ryan, finally meets the frightening Demon King—Chu Feng. Surrounded by these four people, an ordinary teenage girl and her eccentric schoolmates begin living an unordinary daily life.  
  
T/N: "Prince Charming" literally translates to "White Horse Prince" in Chinese.

title: Tonight's Menu: Magical Beasts!
alt_titles: Jintian De Wancan Shi Shan Hai Shenshou!
description: Food is the best thing in the world. It can let someone feel indescribably wonderful~ The genius Mo Bai once thought that he stood at the peak of the culinary world. However, since his encounter with that person…it opened up a door to a whole new world for him!

title: Digimon Tamers
description:
When three Digimon fans – Rika, Henry, and our lead Takato – suddenly find themselves with "real" Digimon, they discover a living creature under your care is far harder to deal with than a few pixels on your TV screen. The kids try to be Digimon 'Tamers,' aka Digimon caretakers, but they all seem to have different opinions on what that should entail. Rika thinks Digimon should fight, Henry thinks they should never fight, and Takato … seems to be somewhere in the middle.  
  
Being a Tamer isn't just about believing one thing or another. It's about learning and adjusting for the good of everyone else. But they have a long way to go, and their problems are just beginning.

(The English translation is based off the script from the FoxKids version of the anime.)

title: World's Ruler
description: He returned from the depths of hell. Using this nine feet long sword, he splits mountains, ocean dividing, flies to the heavens, and rules the word! He was poisoned, losing all his power, he was accused of high treason. Can he take back what's rightfully his ?

title: Romance in the Beast World
description:
(From Solstice Translations)
Lin Huanhuan, a regular 20-year-old girl who just joined the workforce, suddenly transmigrated while taking a bath! What’s more, it’s a world filled with handsome men who wear loincloths and can transform into beasts! Romance with another race is bound to be difficult, but luckily, there’s a transmigration system which teaches her how to survive in this strange new world. Study hard to achieve your sweet romance, Huanhuan!

title: Immortal Devil Emperor
alt_titles: Don't Bother Me From Immortal Cultivation
description: Li Yu Lan sold his body to a devil in order to save his sister. But due to his weak body, the devil decided to help him strengthen his body before getting taking his body.

title: Concealed and Blended
description:
Once upon a time, there was a make-up artist, whose talent drew crowds, and his beauty was second to none. But he had a terrifying secret, —he was a straight man.   
Once upon a time, there was a closet gay that pretended to be a straight man, he was formerly the god of esports, and currently a superstar.   
He is explosive, likes to silently curse at people in crowded places. Then, what will happen when a male make-up artist “tangles up” with an explosive idol, just what kind of fireworks will emerge from this drama?  
  
t/n: Fen Dai could refer to black and white powder, cosmetics, but it's also a slang for beautiful young women.

title: Sinful Heart
description: They used to be infatuated with each other, but they broke up and became strangers. When they meet again 10 years later, the one who used to be nobody has become a ruthless general who holds supreme power over his country, while the other has fallen from being an honorable crown prince to a lowly slave of a conquered country. Their love affair 10 years ago has changed Ji Ning completely. He loves Bai Qingyan deeply but hates him deeply as well.

title: Daisaiyuuki Bokuhi Seiden - The Story of a Very Handsome Man
alt_titles: Da Xi You: Mo Fei Zheng Chuan
description: Based on [Journey to the West.](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Journey_to_the_West)

title: Night Tide
description:
After Xiang Wan transmigrates from the past to the present day, she follows her friend Yu Zhou's advice and becomes a voice actor. There, she meets the gentle but tenacious senior Chao Xin. What begins with an accidental invitation leads to the two women growing closer and closer, and amorous feelings develop between them...

Set in the same universe as *Pat Me Please* by the same author.

title: My Majesty Wants to Ruin the Country
alt_titles: Wǒjiā bìxià zǒng xiǎng huò guó
description: She always thought she was just a parentless orphan, yet the mentor who took in her made her swear right in front of her that she would ruin a country to its demise? All of a sudden, this girl became the emperor of the country and there is 6 husband candidates (plaything) for her to choose?

title: Hero
description:
Oldman, a mysterious man who wears an old-man mask and punish the criminals and evils in the city, is the idol of many, including an elementary student named Tong. Even though Tong’s father is a policeman, he feels embarrassed and ashamed of his father’s inability to solve any crimes. However, on the day of Tong’s 12th birthday, something shocking happened…  
  
Please read left to right!

title: A Lonesome Fragrance Waiting to Be Appreciated
description:
She has unparalleled intelligence which earns her the title of ‘Female Zhuge’ and is a servant of JingAn Palace – Bai PingTing. He holds the title of ‘Duke’ of the Donglin Kingdom, also known as the ‘God of War’ – Chu BeiJie. They are separated by their loyalty to their kingdoms, therefore making them enemies… yet they cannot escape their love for each other. When the world is finally at peace, is it still possible for them to be together, and this time, for a lifetime?  
  
‘Zhuge’ was a famous statesman, ideologist and strategist during the Three Kingdoms Period. Known to be one of the most intelligent men in Ancient China’s history.

title: Married to a Stupid Eunuch
alt_titles: Jia Gei Yi Ge Si Tai Jian
description:
Chen Hui has transmigrated into the body of a girl, who committed suicide by bashing her head against a pillar out of reluctance to get married to a eunuch.  
  
The eunuch is insidious and cunning, enigmatic in every way. He's cannon fodder, just like the eunuchs depicted in the average TV drama series. In order to ensure her survival, Chen Hui was left with no choice but come up with various schemes to get close to the stupid eunuch, understand him, and gain his favor…

title: Huijin Huayuan
description: In the medieval witch-hunting religious tribunal, the squad leader, who only slaughtered foreign tribes, was appointed to care for the vampire—an experimental subject who happened to be the murderer of her father.

title: Dominate the World Only by Defense
alt_titles: Zhǐ Kào Fángyù Chēngbà Zhū Tiān
description: Teenager Zhang Chen encounters an accident that brings him back to his life during high school times, the difference in his memory is that the world is now in a state of “spiritual revival”, everyone training martial arts, practising their qi and cultivation, all to prepare for the attack of extraterrestrial beings, another surprise is that a “beating system” was activated, getting beaten up strengthens him, being on defence provides power, status, riches, he must get beaten down to the core to be the saviour!

title: Bodyguard
description:
[Adapted from Liu Xiahui's novel of the same name] The mountain village boy Ye Qiu came to the bustling city and became the personal bodyguard of the wealthy daughter. Let's see how the bodyguard gets rich and reaches the pinnacle of life.  
  
*Manga Toon Summary*  
Village young man got a job in down town city-being the bodyguard of three girls from a rich family. Usually, the bodyguard will win the girl's heart by his great skills but it is not the same with this ML…. He win's all the girls' heart with cooking on top of his skills!

title: When My Organs Awakened, I Suddenly Became Invincible
alt_titles: My Organs Awakened and I Suddenly Became Invincible
description: After transmigrating, Ye Qing discovered that his organs could cultivate themselves under certain conditions, and sometimes they even had their own thoughts. With the help of these overly independent organs, Ye Qing advanced rapidly on his cultivation journey. While others were busy cultivating, comprehending, and breaking through, his organs had already paved the way for him. However, because his organs had too many of their own ideas, Ye Qing frequently encountered some 'small' troubles.

title: School Bully's Online Dating Got Overturned
alt_titles: Xiao Ba Wang Lian Fan Che Le
description:
[Showoff Gap Moe School Bully X Ice Cold Possessive Academic Lord]
Yu Yang thought he had picked up a cold and shy chick on the Internet, but when online date appeared, the other party turned out to be a 1.8 meters New Campus Academic Lord! The other party also witnessed his online date flop!
Yu Yang: I treated you as my enemy, but you miss me?
The two campuses merged, long-distance relationship became next door class. Yu Yang immediately went to the toilet after class, pretending to pass by the window of his next door class boyfriend coincidentally.

title: Providence at Dawn
description:
This world, has been destroyed once before.  
During 2060, A huge meteor crushed on the center of the North Pole. 
 
Causing a global disasters, but, it also brings opportunities for evolution, "The Crystal From Other Side"  

Humans home, soar in the sky. Refuges filled with hatred, as the sky filled with endless crusade. Number 85 District the Largest Fortress, slowly repelling the attacks from terrorists in the shadows. Lu the new pilot who joined FD at the right time.  

The "Original Impact of Doomsday" symbolizes the beginning of a new world.  
This is the best and the most beautiful time in the history.
  
Until his appearance…  
  
 ---
- Weibo | [CN](https://m.weibo.cn/u/6481464224)

- Facebook | [CN](https://m.facebook.com/PADAWN/)
---

title: The Crow
description: People become ‘ghouls’ upon dying, and will enter the physical world through a door to cause chaos. Zhang Zha, a mere delivery boy, accidentally entered a haunted house, and resulted in a crisis— a ‘ghoul’ breakout. As such, people from all factions began to make an appearance in the story, while Zhang Zha continues to grow upon experiencing a series of adventures and fights with a mysterious scroll about modern Jianghu slowly unfolding alongside.

title: Between the Sea of Clouds
alt_titles: Between the Clouds and the Sea
description:
In a world with only the sky and the sea, there exist two opposing tribes. After Iona from the winged sky tribe meets Helen from the scaled water tribe by happenstance at the water's edge, a deep bond starts to form between the two.

[Author Weibo](https://weibo.com/u/7189187167)
[Author Twitter](https://twitter.com/nianwanwanwan)

title: Starting on a Deserted Island
description: Lin Tian is stranded on a mysterious island, only to discover it’s filled with goddesses from countless worlds—and deadly foes like demon kings and evil gods. By binding with powerful beings like Yuki-Onna, he gains ice powers; from Shiranui, he commands fire; and with Medusa, he unlocks petrifying might. Wielding countless divine artifacts and abilities, Lin Tian slays demon kings, cuts down evil gods, and rises as the island’s supreme ruler—founding a paradise for gods and legends alike!

title: Online Game: Champion
alt_titles: Unparalleled in the Online Gaming World (Remake)
description: Lu Chen had an abnormal game physical test, reduced neural delay, and lost his memory from yesterday. He was surrounded by layers of mysteries. When he unlocked a special profession and was ready to return to the peak, but another accident happened…

title: The Abandoned Wife's Rebirth
description: Wu Ruo couldn't see the true colors of the people around him until the day he died. The family of the friends who he treasured had been using him, and the husband who he neglected was the one who rescued him in the last moments. God's mercy allowed him to be reborn, reborn into his most useless, most hateful, and fattest times. At this period of his life, not only was he a waste unable to cultivate, but as a man, had to relive being married off to another man. But he found that this man... was actually pretty good to him. This time, he will have revenge on those who wronged him, and pay off his debts to those who were kind to him.

title: 999 Girls Chased Me
description: Chen Fan, who was rejected by 999 girls after confessing his love, surprisingly succeeded on his 1000th attempt! What's more, the 999 girls who had previously turned him down came back to chase after him, creating the ultimate harem chaos!

title: The Trapped Beast
alt_titles: The Stain of the Trapped Beast
description: With his back against the wall, Crispin Tadelville, the last surviving alpha of the Tadelville family, disguised himself as an omega to escape death. Now, forced to bide his time as a plaything for the Ethelanian nobles who slayed his people, Crispin waits for the perfect opportunity to exact his revenge. His only obstacle? The prince of the Ethelanian empire he seems to have mistakenly marked.

title: Sunshine as ever
description: When we meet again, will we still be as important to each other as we used to be?

title: The Greedy Princess: My Husband Is a Warm Baby
alt_titles: Greedy Princess: My Husband is a Warm Precious Treasure
description:
Ça ne me dérange pas d'être bien habillée, mais je suis la fille d'un criminel ? Mon mari m'ignore, je suis victime d'harcèlement et je suis sans le sou. Attendez ! Regardez-moi gagner de l'argent, obtenir l'amour et le bonheur !  
  
  
English:  
If it was just transmigration, I wouldn’t have minded, but I unexpectedly transmigrated as the daughter of a guilty subject? Ignored by my husband, bullied by everyone who meets me, absolutely penniless. Wait and see! Watch me snatch over affections and make money, make no mistake in both, because feelings of love and business are going to blossom in doubles!

title: My Lover Is Paranoid
alt_titles: I Love My President Though He Is a Psycho
description:
Do you want to steal my genes then leave?? He grabbed her and tried to force her to hand over the child that was born three years ago.

She never had a baby? Then conceive one!

The delusional CEO's desperate love. Her inability to resist as she fell deeper…
  
Based on the webnovel by Jiang Xiao Ya (姜小牙).

---
**Original Web Manhua:** [AC.QQ](http://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/628414), [BiliBili](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc24476), [KuaiKan Manhua](http://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/1696/), [Mkzhan](https://www.mkzhan.com/212432/), [U17](http://www.u17.com/comic/165140.html), [Zymk](http://www.zymk.cn/2130/)

**Official Translations:** 
* English: [Bilibili Comics](https://www.bilibilicomics.com/detail/mc461), [INKR](https://inkr.com/title/950), [Mangatoon](https://mangatoon.mobi/en/detail/785), [WebComics](http://www.webcomicsapp.com/comic/5ce66ebd62661d387f504a32)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://mangatoon.mobi/id/boss-sombong?content_id=785)
* [Korean / 한국어](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=3462869)

title: Invincible Starts with a Severed Hand
alt_titles: Invincibility Begins with a Broken Hand
description: The weakest awakened one, Chu Mingxuan, is swallowed by a giant beast. On the brink of death, he unexpectedly inherits a system, thus embarking on a long journey of continuous strengthening towards godhood. But how are awakened ones formed, and where does the system come from? Beneath the calm surface, undercurrents surge, and the world’s bloody great revolution is about to begin.

title: Dungeon: Start by Enslaving Blue Star Players
alt_titles: Dixia Cheng: Kaiju Nuyi Lan Xing Wanjia
Dìxià Chéng: Kāijú Núyì Lán Xīng Wánjiā
description: Sherlock is a newly promoted dungeon master, determined to become a great demon king, until he summoned a group of people who would give themselves some strange names, form gangs, trade with each other, and even the goblins will fight, they called themselves players!

title: The Female CEO's Close-Quarter Mad Soldier
description: He's the best special forces soldier ever. After being forced to retire from the military, he came to the Zhonghai city and started a reign of terror! There's another super legend in the city!

title: The Eighth Consciousness
description: The consciousness of human beings can be separated from the body. On the eve of publicizing a revolutionary paper Dr. Ling is captured by The Company and disappears without a trace. Ling Hong begins looking for the whereabouts of his foster mother, secretly starting to confront The Company, and exploring the ultimate secret of [awareness].

title: Rebirth: Giving You My Exclusive Affection
alt_titles: Rebirth: Giving You My Exclusive Affection
Reunion: A Love Only for You
Reborn And Meet, Give You My Exclusive Love
description:
Yun Xiangxiang was reborn as her seventeen-year-old self.  She swore that she would never let herself be bullied this life. She slapped her cheating fiancé and made a high-profile announcement that she was looking for a partner. 

However, she was forced to accept a crippled man. She was ridiculed and mocked, but that man treated her as the apple of his eye. When people insulted or bullied her, he would make them pay a hundred times over. 

One day, Yun Xiangxiang exclaimed in surprise, "You can walk!?"

The man looked at her innocently and said, "I never said that I can’t."

title: Supremacy Of All
description: Whoever hurts my family, kill! Whoever steals my woman, kill! How dare you pretend to be a pussy in front of me? All the more reason to kill! After all the worlds have sunk, Tan Yun finally remembers who he is - the moment I awaken, the entire world will tremble beneath my feet!"

title: A Star Reborn: The Queen's Return
description:
She was the Queen of Song, but she died during her greatest years.  
After she was reincarnated, she became a simple trainee. She lost her former glory? It doesn't matter—no one can compete with her beautiful singer's voice. She's mocked for her lowly birth? It doesn't matter—her true identity is enough to make the whole world tremble. She owes huge debts? It doesn't matter…  
A powerful boss whispered to her: "The debt will disappear if you would become my woman."  
But she is proud: "I'm sorry. I would sell my art, but not my whole self."  
————————————————  
This is the story of the Queen of Song, of her return to the peak… and an overbearing chairman.

title: Evolutionary Game
description: At the end of the 28th century’s metamorphosis era, the organizer AI’s control of the dungeon society has reached the point of pervasiveness. The protagonist Fantian was identified by the A.I. ​​as a restless person and was forced to be cast into the mysterious and unknown [Evolutionary Continent] by the AI. The crisis-ridden evolutionary continent’s survival journey has officially kicked off.

title: Touching Melody
description: How certain were you that it wasn’t a dream? Was there a certain moment where you’d think ‘Ah, deja vu’. This happened to the MC who met a senior from his dreams, even though their graduation tore them apart… They met again via teleportation?! Just what is happening? How are they able to teleport and switch places?!

title: Coddled Princess's Second Life
alt_titles: Zhong Sheng Zhijiao Chong Xiao Gongzhu
description: Sonia Syland, the only princess of Syland Empire, fell ill and died in her youth. Be pitied by goddess, she reborn to 10 years ago and lived her life again. In her second life, she found that there was a great conspiracy behind her painful death. The beloved father and brothers, who is the one that framed her? In this new life, Sonia made up her mind to live…

title: Exclusive Furnace of Future Empresses
