alt_titles: Weilai Nvdimen De Zhuanshu Lu Ding
Wèilái Nǚdìmen De Zhuānshǔ Lú Dǐng
description: I don't know when men lost their comprehension physiques, unable to gather their souls for cultivation, and cultivation became exclusive to women. What's more terrible... There seems to be a huge problem with the aesthetics of men in this world! The handsome male protagonist Luo Yang is considered an ugly man, and became a ferryman in the magpie building, but secretly he is a super paparazzi who has a lot of information, and as the only male in the cultivation world who can cultivate, his cultivation has reached the emperor level . Because of falling in love at first sight with Xia Peng who came to the Que Que Tower , she voluntarily became her exclusive stove. Since then, the sect that was originally mixed with fish and dragons has been turned upside down because of the arrival of the male lead...Hmph...What I want to cultivate is the future Empress!

title: Sworn Enemy or Lover?
description: Lu Xi Li, with only 3 months to live due to cancer, unexpectedly meets with his first love in the hospital, Chen Jun Ge. He thought it was fate, but a second later discovers that he already has a boyfriend. 3 months after his sad death Lu Xi Li realizes that he is in the body of his first love's boyfriend. At that moment he discovers that they are not a couple, in fact they are enemies…the journey to conquest* that man is very long!

title: Book of Yaoguai: Tale of the Nine-tailed Fox
description: The Yang Eye of this life is a young a literary genius and a high-ranking member of the Imperial court. Facing hardships, one day he meets a fox spirit, starting a wonderful journey. In this life, can the two achieve happiness?...

title: The Billion-Luck Player
description: Dungeon Descends! Luck is My Greatest Weapon How a Critically Lucky Assassin Elegantly Clears Dungeons Wealth and Freedom Through Luck—A Perfect Life Begins? My Evolution Skill is the Seven Deadly Sins?!

title: Cat Swordsman
description: Legend has it that over 400 ancient demons are sealed within the magical demon-collecting vessel known as the "Voodoo Tower." However, in a terrible accident, the seal was broken and released the demons into the human world! Now, the keeper of the Voodoo Tower- the demon-collecting lynx war god- has to embark on a journey to recapture his demons!

title: Bloody Taboo
description: Bai Yao had just became an intern as the assistant of the big-headed celebrity, Ji Chen. Even though he had thought that this was already unfortunate enough, never would he have expected that Ji Chen was a vampire! What's more is that, the way to break the blood-sucking taboo was a k…kiss?!

title: Secret Sweetheart
alt_titles: Si Chong Tian Xin Bao Bei
description:
Xia Lin, a rather unpopular actress who had just debuted, finds that she is terminally ill and was then betrayed by her boyfriend. At some point in time, she was forced to go to a man with unparalleled wealth and power. However, that man said to her, "I am not someone who does charity, I will only help you if you become my woman!" Watching her storm out in anger, the corners of the man's mouth rose to a smile.  
  
- - -  
Live Drama Adaptation:   
<https://www.netflix.com/title/81092192>

title: Fake Sister
description:
The sensitive and pampered younger brother and an independent older sister who always takes care of people are both not biologically related to each other. But because of a promise to “take care of him”, she takes care of him as he grows up.   
  
However, when the uncertainty of youth arises, he gradually starts to realize she is an irreplaceable person in his life… A story about the worries of a boy growing up as an adolescent.

title: Mr. Magician and Miss Science
description: A girl who loves both science and the environment accidentally discovers that the world-renowned magician has superpowers. This shocking secret connects the fate of the two people who live completely different lives from one another. They realise that love will always be more powerful than magic.

title: Rebirth From 0 to 1
description: Shelly Natsu is a girl who suffered too much from school bullies' torment and died when she fell off a school building. After her death, she actually reincarnated into her classmate, the tall, rich, and handsome Ewan Duncan. While she begins her counterattack and takes revenge, she also begins an ambiguous relationship with Ewan's best friend, who was previously Shelly's secret crush. The most motivational story of all begins!

title: The Exhilarating Life of a Sword God
alt_titles: Sword God's Life Is Not That Boring
description: After ten years of cultivation, I’ve become a Sword God. Time to head down the mountains and make a name for myself…

title: My Sister Is Out to Destroy the World
description: What do I do? I think my sister is plotting to destroy the world! Recently, my sweet and adorable sister suddenly became strangely irritable and violent. According to my investigations, not only has my sister become involved in a murder, she is also possessed by a witch from a thousand years ago! Now, my sister seems to be plotting to destroy the world! What’s worse, my sister is trying to pin the blame on me. She even told me that the food in prison is delicious and that there is good company in there! What am I supposed to do as an ordinary person?!

title: Cry for Me
description: Ye Zi And Gao Hang reunite years after their childhood friendship ended. After a misunderstanding, Gao Hang left Ye Zi behind for university and Ye Zi picked up the pieces to become stronger. At their reunion years later, Ye Zi has changed to better fit Gao Hang, all he wants is for times to be like they were before. Can they return to the bliss of the past?

title: Punishing Gray Raven: Dominik's Orphans
description: As technology had grown enough to reach forbidden territories, the break out of the Punishing virus destroyed almost every fruits of human civilization. But even under such cruel environments, survivors lived on with hope, and swore to take back Earth to rebuild civilization. This manhua records the stories of people in such a world, who influenced the course of history with their own hands.

title: Sword Intent
description: The 28-year-old 3D modeler with 40 years of work experience was reborn in the fantasy world of sword cultivation and mecha… Binding the sword casting system, loaded the sword map of a different world, using cheats while being careless. No way. Whether the world casts swords or shapes, it is too simple for a three-dimensional modeler…

title: Eclipse Walker
description: A futuristic world where the light and darkness coexist, an underground city intertwined with crimes and corruption. A cruel and ruthless humanoid armor. An unexpected plan that mixes faith and changes. Betrayals, framings, conspiracies, deceptions. Let’s see how the Chief Assassin of the Xi He organization, Leng Zhe, will fight against the whole world on his own and embark on his road to bloody revenge for his past lover, Ah Miao!

title: The Hormonal Trap
description: Professional veterinarian Ling An’an - also a professional single lady for many years going - is tasked with the everyday job of breeding animals. In a pet store overflowing with an extremely “hormonal atmosphere”, what happens when a disgruntled and sexually repressed company president appears?

title: Honkai Impact 3rd - Mystery of Stigmata
description:
According to legend, in ancient China, the hero Ji Xuanyuan held the Xuanyuan Sword and saved mankind from the threat of the Honkai Beast. 5000 years later, in order to find the legendary Xuanyuan Sword and Stigmata, Wuliangta Jizi, Qiyana and Fu Hua came to the bottom of the southern part of China to explore the lost legend... (MTL)

**History:**
- 1952: 1st Honkai Eruption in Berlin
- 2000: 2nd Honkai Eruption in Siberia
- 2014: Honkai Outbreak in Nagazora

**Timeline:** Direct Sequel of [book 1002](https://mangadex.org/title/6a2fce05-4ec3-4b2e-9c0a-8f69ca7f5521).

---

**Note:** The raws for book 1003 don't exist anymore, because it got censored due to using the image of historical figures on Stigmata.

Volume | Status | Year/Era | Arc

title: Evil Again
description: One rainy morning, in a small church on the outskirts of the city, it was found that Jin Min Jun, the second year of Yingcai High School, was hung on a cross, tortured, and then killed. This technique was used 16 years ago. This happened in the first year after the team leader of an investigation team, Team Leader Zhang, became a policeman, where a chain of serial murders that used these techniques resurfaced, making old criminals nervous.

title: Facelift Game
description:
An unattractive office lady in the fashion industry gets the chance to alter her appearance through a beauty app by completing tasks with heavy consequences.  
  
---

**Notes:**
- Season 1 has 49 chapters  
- Season 2 has 27 chapters

**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [Comikey](https://comikey.com/comics/facelift-game-webtoon/20/), [WebComics](https://www.webcomicsapp.com/comic/Facelift-Game/5f4ca0378c252b4b2221cb33)

title: Remote Sister Battles
description:
M&M games, also known as money magnet games, are operated by one player manipulating another player to earn a bounty. The game is usually delivered to the player in the form of a courier. When a player accepts, they enter the game, another The player’s bank account will receive 50 million remittances. Only when the players work together to make a billion in the game can they be saved from the game.  
  
Control the sister to escape the game…

title: Second Life
description: National idol Gu Ming is a cute and docile little sheep in front of others and a two-faced and quiet little demon behind their backs. The ordinary female lead unexpectedly swapped bodies with him and actually decided to "live the carefree life of a boy!" What should he do in order to return to his own body and life?

title: Hero and Shero
description:
French : Chen Mo, est une femme d'affaire, à la réputation froide et sans coeur. Elle déteste les surprises. Mais elle a un secret bien gardé…quand un homme surgit littéralement d'un arbre, sa vie s'en trouve bouleversée.  
  
  
You need to know one thing about Mia Chen: she hates surprises. New foods, new people, dates…she has a single priority in life: her work as a director for a top fashion magazine. And keeping her superpowers under wraps, that too. When a handsome but half-dead man emerges from a magical portal and witnesses her powers, she has no choice but to help him recover. When her magazine sales begin rapidly declining, she has no choice but to use him as their top model?! The biggest surprise in Mia’s life? True love.

title: The Rest of My Life With You
description:
After losing his wife Yusheng, Heling was utterly devastated. But somehow he found a girl who is a mirror image of Yusheng, but has the memories of someone named Wenning. Even worse, some guy who claims to be her childhood sweetheart hangs out around her everyday nonstop!   
  
How will Heling find his way back into her memories again? And how will he find the girl he loved before?

title: Quick Transmigration: Top-Notch Villain Must Be Cleansed
alt_titles: Kuài Chuān Zhī Dǐngjí Fǎnpài Yào Xǐ Bái
Quick Transmigration: Top-Notch Villain Must Whitewash
Quick Transmigration: Top-Notch Villain Must Be Cleansed
Rapid Transmigration: First-Rate Villain Wants to Whitewash
Kuai Chuan Zhi Dingji Fanpai Yao Xi Bai
description: Once the big boss with a thousand lifetimes is reincarnated, the boss will be the little pitiful Lonely Star? In order to change that fate, Liang Yin transmigrates through time and space, oppresses scums and bitches, and strives to cleanse their reputations and reverse the fate of tragic characters. But cleansing always involves a kiss (no) and the location is always in the bath (no!), on the bed (no!!), and out in the open? (no no no!!!). Several times after, Liang Yin fell into deep contemplation. Could the answer be in the riddle? Cleansing until they're clean?

title: Please Call Me Ghost Messenger
alt_titles: Qing Jiao Wo Gui Chai Daren
Qǐng Jiào Wǒ Guǐ Chāi Dàrén
description: After the eternal night, terror resurges! Supernatural ghosts and monsters descend upon the modern city! All common knowledge and rules are overturned! Blood rains down beneath the calm campus, tombstones crack open in the outskirts’ cemetery, and dilapidated apartments are haunted by numerous apparitions… In this dark and desperate environment, there stands a midnight-revealing post office, and a young boy dressed in black navigates through mysterious and terrifying places. The young boy in black becomes the forbidden legend in people’s mouths, “He is the Great Lord of the Underworld!”

title: Goddess Above
description: The scion of the Jiang family, Jiang Jiang, unexpectedly inherits the legacy of her ancestors. The Feng Shen journey of a new generation begins!

title: The End of the World: The Emperor Banner invites all female disciples to take their seats
description: Su Bai was about to ascend to heaven but was framed by his female apprentice. When he woke up again, he had traveled to a modern society where zombies were rampant and he had become an ordinary person. The only thing he could use was a low-level magic weapon, the Ten Thousand Souls Banner. With the awakening of the Ten Thousand Souls Banner system, Su Bai had hope of returning to the top. What made Su Bai even more excited was that the female apprentices who framed him also traveled to this world with the turbulence of time and space.

title: 99 Arrows
description: Cupido es el joven dios del amor, sus flechas llevan al aumento de amor o a la ruptura. Por alguna razón sólo tienen efecto para el lindo Jia Boai, sólo en él, sólo en él, sólo en él. Los dioses no provocan al travieso de Cupido porque temen que afecte su amor y que este no tenga ninguna dirección.

title: The Almighty Demon Emperor
description: Call him a demon, but when he takes to the skies on his sword, he is more graceful than an immortal! Call him a buddha, but he leaves mountains of corpses and rivers of blood in his wake with acts more heinous than a demon. He washes himself with blood and cultivates his bones with fire. He cannot be killed. He is the greatest demonic Daoist of the world! The young Lin Feng rises from the dump and obtains the primordial demon seed, turning into the only grand demon in the world!

title: Evolution In The Flood
alt_titles: Evolution in the Great Flood Era
The World Has Entered the Age of the Great Flood
description: The earth is suddenly surrounded by a tsunami of unknown origin and a powerful flood makes the mountains tremble in the waves as the ground groans… Su Yi wakes up to find the city flooded, corpses revived and beasts mutated… In the game of the gods, the hunt and Evolution begins.

title: My Battleship Can Be Upgraded
description: This is an interstellar era represented by warships as the supreme force, the cruelest age, and the gorgeous age! Wang Dong was reborn and returned twenty years ago… Explore countless unknown civilizations, harvest the origin of civilization, and strengthen himself! What’s even worse is that he still has a system! Your battleships and modules will be raffled, but mine is optional! Rebirth + System! What are you fighting with me? Steer the most powerful warship and smooth out all dissatisfaction!

title: Najo Line
description: Being helped by the attendant of the subway line she usually takes, and the reason why her heart always thumps when she sees her ever since then is because...

title: Young Sorcerer Master
description:
As the strongest sorcerer of nine states of China, he was expelled by his family for practicing the ultimate martial manual, Which is regarded as a unforgivable action that against the rule of ancestor. But his mother managed to send him to a new land, where he begins a new journey of cultivation…  
  
Indonesian:  
||  
Sebagai penyihir terkuat dari sembilan negara bagian di Tiongkok/China, ia diusir oleh keluarganya karena mempraktikkan manual perang utama, yang dianggap sebagai tindakan yang tidak termaafkan karena bertentangan dengan aturan leluhur. Tetapi ibunya berhasil mengirimnya ke tanah baru, tempat ia memulai perjalanan kultivasi baru…  
||

title: From the Serpent's Eyes
description:
"I will stay by your side until you grow old." He kept his word. For 50 years, he held his hand with a smile by dawn, and embraced him by dusk. Over the valleys and hills, across the river of time, walking side by side to the ends of earth. 
By the grace of this miracle, I will dedicate every moment to you.

title: Ten Thousand Layers Of Qi Refining
description:
“I’m already at the 10,000th Qi refining layer, why haven’t I built my foundation yet!”

 Su Li, the top cultivator for three years in a row, became the laughingstock of the school before the entrance exams – because he was the only candidate in his senior year who hadn’t built his foundation. On top of that, he was unlucky enough to encounter killers sent by an evil organization one after another. 

Let’s see how the qi-refining young man defies the odds!

title: Save Me Gently
description:
The super rebellious teenager Xiang yang was born with an instinctive anti-social nature. His difficult attitude caused adults headaches and classmates fear, but also strongly attracted the class president's sharp eyes. It is unknown when it started, but Ming Xu's feelings towards Xiang yang became more complicated: distressed, angry, pitying, and … love? With the never-wavering tenderness and some necessary strictness, he tamed the boy. A collide of strong hormones, they succour themselves though laughters and cries.

---

Official English translation on Comico's [Pocket Comics app](https://www.comico.io/pocket-comics)

title: The Strongest Useless Prince's Battle for the Throne
alt_titles: Zuì Qiáng Fèichái Huángzǐ De Dìwèi Zhī Zhēng-Àn Dòu Piān
Zui Qiang Feichai Huangzi De Diwei Zhi Zheng-An Dou Pian
description: 雄踞弗凯洛大陆中央的亚德勒夏帝国，因为皇子间的帝位之争而暗流涌动。面对愈演愈烈的斗争，第七皇子艾诺特终于决定拿出真本事。“我没有打算成为皇帝，但是要我被斗垮而死于非命嘛，想都别想。”被帝国上下视为“废柴”的他，真实身份却是……他将带着帝国第一美姬，从幕后支配这场帝位之争！

title: Lost Lovers
description: Losing memories after a confession?! A crossdressing boy and the one he loves are cursed to never fall deep in love, and are forced to repeat their confession over and over. What is the antidote to love? Can there be miracles in true love?

title: The Beast in the Tower
description: Leah, a rural teacher went to the imperial capital to find his father who went missing for many years. Under the introduction of the headmaster, he applied for the position of the Royal teacher and successfully passed the examination to become Prince Porter’s tutor. To his surprise Prince Porter is a savage Orc imprisoned in the tower, and he didn't even know human language. Leah , who wanted to escape in order to save his life, was locked in the tower and taught the prince the corresponding lessons according to the articles and instructions sent in through the door.

title: Words and spirits
description: Xu Zao Yue, who had just become a comic editor, was the editor in charge for the first time as a comic artist, and met an eccentric comic artist who looked like a duck. After confirming the look in her eyes, it turned out to be an illusion. Later it was discovered that the ghost stories drawn by the original cartoonist were all based on real events, including his worldview. The spiritual world and the wheel of fate have drawn the two into an unknown lost journey…

title: Imperial Nian Masters
description: The ancient Imperial Nian Technique has roots traced to the various supernatural techniques, such as the Five Elements, Yin-Yang, and Feng Shui. The people who practices this technique are called Imperial Nian masters. In this world, the Imperial Nian masters are the symbol of evil. The main character, Zong Tian Yi, is one of the young Imperial Nian masters secretly training in the mountains, and he will be going on a dangerous quest to change the fate of the Imperial Nian masters.

title: The Supreme System
description: With a mysterious energy from a news system called CNNBBC, a common earth boy got a time travel and was reborn in an alien land, where he started his journey to grab the treasure, practice the most powerful martial arts and get to the peak of his life!

title: 100 Ways to Heal a Psychopath
alt_titles: Zhěngjiù Jīng Fēn de Yībǎi Zhǒng Fāngfǎ
A Hundred Ways to Save a Soul Splitter
description:
Tang Dong Bao was so close to becoming an immortal. Before he could receive an official certificate, he had to complete a task. Thanks to the guidance of his senior immortals, he accepted an amazing task! His objective was to travel to different worlds and save the target, Xiao Yi. However, in the first world, Dong Bao was directly killed by him! What exactly can I do to save you, my dear target?!  
This is the story of one man’s attempt at treating a psychopath.

title: The True Scandal
description:
Xu Sheng x Tang Zhi  
Using all of one's brain power and pawning away one's life.

title: Zodiac: Twelve Souls
description: In a world where the strong eat the weak, the powerful Shou Clan hunts the Chu Clan without mercy, while the steadfast Chu Clan refuses to stop fighting for survival. Their war has spanned over a hundred years, destroying the livelihoods of people of all clans. In an effort to break this cruel cycle, a group known as "The Zodiac" begins to assemble...

title: In or Out
alt_titles: You and Me, in or out
description: Before the age of five, Shen Wang's memory was black and white. It was not until he met Lin Chao Xi that his life began to have color. He knew that this person was his adoptive father, but he still had a strange feeling. Don't want him to be taken away, want to monopolize his feelings, more and more intensively…

title: The Demon Goddess is My Maid
alt_titles: The Demon King Is a Maid
description: Xiaobai Su is a teen who is down on his luck with life from being poor to having no girlfriend. After being tricked by his friends, he ends up meeting a demon goddess and accidentally forms a pact. With a demon princess as his servant, weird and demonic shenanigans start to infiltrate his life

title: All Hail Empress Her Majesty
alt_titles: Audience with Her Majesty the Queen
description: Ming is a Year 5 primary school student who had a dull and meaningless school life in the worst class of the worst school in a declining heavy industry city. However one day his deskmate Hua became the class president and declared herself "Empress". The class now goes on a journey to fight against the old order made by adults.

title: Fate/A...what?
description: A series of fan comics made by this author. It is basically a Fate/Apocrypha parody comic. Original:<http://www.pixiv.net/member.php?id=1440499>

title: A World Ruled by Cats
alt_titles: Jiuming! Zhege mao tongzhi de shijie
description:
Nora didn’t want to die. All she wanted, was to save a cat from drowning. When she drowned instead, she woke up in another world: Catsrule, a world ruled by cats! These aren’t your normal kitties though, they walk on two legs and look like us but we’re their pets! It’s not all milk and catnip however, soon Nora is captured and adopted by a cute cat boy who hates humans named Caesar. Can Nora return to her normal life or will she spend nine lives as a cat’s pet?  
  
Russian:||  
Коты правят миром! Нашим - тайно, другим миром явно. И могут даже завести себе бездомного человека. Вы в этом еще сомневаетесь? Рано или поздно придется признать: коты правят миром.||  
  
French:||  
Nora ne voulait pas mourir.   
Tout ce qu'elle voulait, c'était sauver un chat de la noyade.   
Après s'être noyée, elle se réveille dans un autre monde : Castrule, un univers gouverné par des chats !   
Pas de simples chats cependant, ceux-ci marchent sur deux jambes et nous ressemblent et à l'inverse, c'est nous, leurs animaux de compagnie !   
Nora est capturée et adoptée par un adorable garçon, appelé Caesar, qui déteste les humains. Nora pourra-t-elle reprendre une vie normale ou passera-t-elle neuf vies en tant qu'animal de compagnie d'un chat ?||

title: How to Tame a Wild Lion
description: A main vocalist with the temper of a lion x a cheerful and straightforward bassist. Who knew that the band couple I fangirl about is actually real! In order to understand and save the band that is on the verge of getting disbanded, he found a child prodigy star, who had to secretly leave the entertainment industry because of a car accident. But, this gangster-like youth, who became a "backside singer" at a bar, how should I tame him? Should I chase after my dream or choose my husband? I want them both!

title: There Is a Demon in the Fairy Painting
description: Ye Fang, el director del Instituto de Seguridad Sobrenatural para el Medio Ambiente de la Tierra, trabaja en casos extraños en la ciudad mientras busca a su maestro que ha estado desaparecido desde hace más de 400 años en medio del inmenso mar de personas.

title: My Milky Way Love Story
description:
A manhua artist with no house, no car and no girlfriend. The Princess of the Milky Way who has studied hard in the ways of love. An outwardly kind but black hearted queen of the hive who is also looking for a man. Li Xianyu, not knowing whether to laugh or cry, has had is life completely turned upside down. Of course, there's still the biggest problem of all. How to deal with the overbearing and charismatic father who always gets his way.  
  
没房没车没女友的三无漫画家，努力学习谈恋爱的银河系公主殿下，温柔腹黑愁嫁的虫巢御姐首领，自此李羡渔啼笑皆非的逆转人生开始了。当然，最大的难题是，如何搞定霸道多金魅力值永登榜首的岳父大人？

title: Passengers in the Eternal Night
alt_titles: Yong Ye Zhong de Cheng Ke
description: A lighting engineer master boarded a train and prepared to start his first trip after his eyesight was restored. It's bound to be an extraordinary journey. The university student he met when he was blind, this time, he really wants to see him for himself. A blind lighting engineer who strives for his dreams, and a dispirited university student who has no pursuit of any dreams, meet and change each other's lives.

title: My Wife is a One-Hit Wonder
description: A one-hit girl from another world, from ancient dragons to space giants, as long as she targets a weak spot, She can kill them all in one hit! Did she also say I’m a superhero with countless harems in another world, and she’s just one of my disciples?

title: Shui Shen Qi Hui Juan
description:
Legend says…  
There was a white dragon living in River Long En, preventing floods, and bringing rain. People worshiped him, and hailed him as the "Lord of the River".  
By coincidence, he finds out that Long En Town's annual "River Lord Festival" has been abandoned for years. Angered, the River Lord Huan Yi, swears that Long En town will never see another drop of rain.  
What appears in the pond of the River God's Palace, however, is something he doesn't expect…

title: Back From The Dead To Build The Strongest Guild Of All Time
alt_titles: Back From The Dead To Start a Salvation Organization From Scratch.
description: In his previous life, Su Ye stood as the last survivor amidst the world’s ultimate cataclysmic battle, a poignant witness to the downfall of humanity. However, after his demise, he inexplicably awoke to find himself reborn ten years into the past. Faced with impending and unparalleled challenges, he is resolute in his determination to lead everyone to triumph!

title: Breaking through the Calamity
alt_titles: Beginning From Passing Through the Calamity
description: In a world where the path to immortality is broken, Lu Cheng, a cursed travellers, becomes the only person who can attract the heavenly tribulation. At the moment of death, the mysterious system is activated, Lu Cheng is determined to become stronger and change his fate, and upgrade himself by crossing the tribulation! Sun, Moon, and Death ...... is the end of the world? The most important thing is that the system is not only a way of life, but also a way of life. The heavenly dao slaughter mortal dust, floating life cause and effect between the fingers. A sword blade open chaos, three lives of fate and calamity to laugh! The road to immortality, starting from the sabotage!

title: The Law of Raising a Wolf
description: You Qi is a cowardly and timid man, who is constantly chasing over Zhou Zheng, a man with a mean and violent character. Feeling annoyed at being with such a pushover, Zhou Zheng couldn’t help but to care for him. A tsundere actor and a nobody who puts his cowardice aside to take part as a stand-in actor. Can they face their true selves?

title: P.S. Waiting for You by the Lake
description: Leo and Alexis lived in the same small town when they were kids and were best buddies. The two loved to spend their summers at the Green Rock Lake summer camp near town. But during the summer when they were eleven, Alexis ended his friendship with Leo over a stupid reason. After that, the two did not see each other again because of their families' situation. But during the summer when they were eighteen, the two met once again at Green Rock Lake...

title: Rebirth of the First Urban Immortal Emperor
alt_titles: Rebirth of the City's First Immortal Venerable
Chongsheng Zhi Dushi Di Yi Xian Zun
Chóngshēng Zhī Dūshì Dì Yī Xiān Zūn
description: In his previous life, his fiancée had deceived him, his father had passed away, he was disabled, and he had committed suicide due to sorrow. In this life, he had just returned from the cultivation world, saying, "In my previous life, I was unable to protect my family and lost everything. Now, I will make the whole world crawl under my feet!"

title: How to Tame Your Beast Husbands
alt_titles: Chuān Chéng Shòurén Jiāo Qī Hòu Wǒ Huāngle
Passing Through to Be the Beastman's Pampered Wife After I Get Panicky
description:
During her nightly programming session, Yin Zhu suddenly died and was transmigrated into a world of beastmen. She found out that the original owner of her new body drugged Teng Xiao...
Her social awkwardness caused everyone to misunderstand her. She claimed to be uninterested in love and only cared about her career. From then on she used the system she created to help her tribe rise to the greatest from the wastelands. Starting from fine food, her covert changes stunned everyone.
But why are whiny men coming to Yin Zhu every day telling her to stop doing business, and do them instead??

title: I Accidentally Became Invincible While Studying With My Sister
description: Zhong Yuan watched helplessly as his sister, Zhong Lan, died in front of him, but he was powerless. After a rebirth, Zhong Yuan vowed to protect his sister. Returning to life, Zhong Yuan discovered that he had gained the ability to successfully absorb 100% of the Resonance Crystals from creatures. Inadvertently, he became invincible!

title: Welcome to Cafe Schrödinger
alt_titles: We Invite You to the Cat Café
description:
Working at a café seemed like the perfect job for Ziqi. It’s cute, pays the bills, and best of all…FREE FOOD! But there’s a problem: it’s a cat café and she’s terrified of cats! This isn’t your usual café though, here the cats help too… sometimes. Together with her kitty coworkers Boss the Persian, Luna the Siamese, Jury the tabby, Coco the munchkin, and Mimi the mixed stray, how can she pawssibly survive?! Welcome to Cafe Schrödinger!  
  
[Official Korean Translation](https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/catcafe)

title: Isekaied as "Mary Stu"
description: An ordinary 30-year-old salaryman named Yang Dong gets transported into the role of the female protagonist in a Mary Sue harem novel. Although in his own eyes he still looks like a middle-aged man, others see him as a lovely high school girl. Now he’s falling into classic shoujo tropes and getting tangled up with the four male protagonists! How will he survive with his dignity?

title: Captivated by the Moonlight
description: Did you set me free from the cage named palace or did I liberate you from the prison called eternity?

title: Noman's Soul
description:
Yu Haishan was a delinquent whom his only strength was bluffing. However, he died in a car accident trying to save a girl. Later on, in order to be resurrected and take care of his blind younger sister, he decided to take a mission from the Life and Death Officer to traverse another world, and collect demon stones. Thinking that he can now show off real OP abilities, he ended up realizing that his only ability is his cooking skill!!! He has to utilize his limited ability and unconventional combat strategy to make unimaginable counterattacks one after another!  


---

title: Under the Water and Mutated Fishes
description: After a heavy downpour, the whole city became flooded. The fish went through a mutation, its intelligence became closer and closer to human…facing off these evolved fish, will we survive?

title: Season of Roll
description: The dream is to be an Anjuan of a cartoonist, and this year I got my wish to apply for the studio of the cartoonist teacher I admire most. But no one expected that the teacher was actually a black fan who had just forged a beam with him two days ago? In front of the dream, Yuanjia has a narrow road. What kind of sparks will the lively and honest assistant and the cold cartoonist meet?

title: The CEO is an Idol Stan
description: A foolish CEO who didn't want to work, come experience an idol stan's foolish daily life.

title: School Beauty's Personal Master
alt_titles: Xiao hua de tie sheng gao shou
description: An unlikely once-in-a-lifetime master from the rural countryside, a mysterious jade pendant that can see into the future… Lin Yi is just an ordinary student, but he bears another heavy responsibility - to pursue the campus queen! And it’s on the orders of her dad! Although Lin Yi really doesn’t want to deal with this high-maintenance young lady, you can’t disobey your elders. He has no choice but to transfer to a school all the way in Songshan City…

title: The Parasitic Mage
description:
In the vast realm of a massively multiplayer online game, players fight, level up, and shape their own destinies. But while others chase glory with swords and spells, one man chooses a path no one dares to take— The path of the Parasite Mage. Unloved by the system. Mocked by players. Yet behind the scenes, this strange and overlooked class holds terrifying potential. By infesting bosses, draining enemies, and thriving off others’ strength, he plays a different kind of game—one that only a true tactician can master.

With strategy, patience, and a dash of madness, the Parasite Mage begins his ascent from ridicule to dominance, turning every enemy into fuel for his rise.

title: Wangsheng Yu
description: Su Xiao was once an impoverished god of the heavens, but because he accidentally burned down the marriage predestined by the tree of fate, he has no choice but to descend to the mortal world and reincarnate for ten lifetimes to join together 9,990 marriages. In the tenth world, he is just an common beggar. Unexpectedly the world’s number one Sect, ZiChen Zhenren took him in under his wing, causing many people to sob endlessly. And this lifetime, he once again is in a pure Yang body. In secret, a dark pair of eyes unconsciously watches over him.

title: Related to Love
description: Regarding an office romance in the city, in a druken state, Xiao Ai Ai "shared a bed" with the high school Council President, and he's also the General Manager of a company who constantly helped her in the dark. A romance story full of twists of a strong two faced president and a simple stubborn office worker.

title: Dance of Fox and Serpent
description:
A frosty top-tier celebrity stylist vs. a deceptively innocent, low-tier internet star with rustic charm. 

One unexpected act of "red carpet revenge” catapults Chu Xia back into the spotlight, reborn with a brand-new identity. But the real game is only just beginning: a deadly match between “prey” and “predator.” 

Who will emerge as the true winner?

title: Your Ghost Boy
description: Wang Zi Yan, a University student, has always had a body different from everyone else’s. When his body is touched by moonlight, he will become invisible. One night, after getting off work, he uses this ability to save a woman. That’s how an uncontrollable love story started! A soft and cute boy VS a rich, confident woman, how will this love story turn out?

title: How to Be a Demon
description: The human girl who was taken in and adopted by monsters, Yaoyao, met Zhang Naihe, a fake Taoist who stormed the cave to capture those monsters. In order to steal back the “Sky Thunder Pearl” and the other treasures Zhang Naihe snatched from them, Yaoyao decided to stick close to this Taoist…. A sweet relationship involving previous and present lives unknowingly unfolds……

title: Long Time No See
description:
By Boomer Squad:  
  
While out shopping, Mo Xiaoxia runs into her high school sweetheart, Lin Han, on the street. A series of chaotic yet heart-racing memories slowly begins to surface in Mo Xiaoxia's mind – the story of the two girls.

title: I Led the Male Lead and Villain Astray
alt_titles: Wǒ Bǎ Nán Zhǔ Hé Fǎnpài Dōu Yǎng Wāile
I Have Raised Both the Protagonist and the Antagonist Crookedly
Wo Ba Nan Zhu He Fanpai Dou Yang Waile
description: Fu Sang is a yin being that was formed from the resentment of the dead. By chance, she received the opportunity to be reborn as a human again. Bound by a trash system, the system tells her that she must raise the protagonist and the villain well so that they won't be rivals due to the female lead in the future. By doing this, she will complete the mission. But Fu Sang only has the word "resentment" in her eyes. Raising kids = nourishing pure resentment. Not bad! And so Fu Sang began her journey of raising these kids, but she finds out that things may not be so easy.

title: Catbox Reverse
description: For the sake of saving her most precious person, the fourteen-year-old girl Ai Wen enters a time machine. However, before she knows it, she has accidentally travelled to the future! There, she meets Ulysses and many other previously unimaginable characters…

title: Surviving Demon
description: Humans are distingushed between good and bad. Human souls would also be distinguished from Evil and good. In this world, there is a monster that was given birth by a type of soul. They attack humans, and try in vain to become the rule of the Earth.

title: Dance Among The Stars
description: An accident on the ski slope ruined Shen Xingchen’s dream of ballet, and also made her completely comatose, unwilling to wake up and face such a cruel world. However, with the help of all those who truly loved her, she got a chance to stand up again and chase her dreams. How will she fight the setbacks in the future this time?

title: Xu Ming Shi
description: Throughout history, there existed an organization of seven people who were the bestowed will of the god of time and space, to reverse the death of those who die in an accident, so that they could fulfil their destiny. They are known as Xu Ming Shi.

title: The Beginning of Journey
description: Mc died from too much playing video game, got reincarnated as a monster in another world with the help of a ability that absorbs opponents skill/ability to get stronger taken place in the same world as "Journey to the West" .but not in the main character team, but as a golden horn under the silver horn of the little dragonfly?! From the mountain-patrol.

title: Don't Make a Wish
alt_titles: Don't Make a Wish to my brother
description: I was an only child, but when I woke up, a younger brother appeared. Even more frightening is that this younger brother can unconditionally grant any wish… for a safe life, for the sake of world peace, as his sister, I sincerely advise you to not to make a wish to my younger brother.

title: Sunken Fish
description: The emotional entanglement between Lin ChenXiu, a video gamer captain, with a gloomy childhood, and Yu Moxiang, a dedicated and enthusiastic team player. The story begins with the two bravely fighting forward in a team that is not being favored.

title: The Magic Academy and the Transfer Student
description: In his second year of high school, the main character, Lin Yifei, suddenly received a letter inviting him to transfer to the prestigious school "Fengyu Academy", where he was exposed to the world of magic (drawn in the author's spare time, updated irregularly).

title: Segregated World
description:
Segregated World: A virtual reality game were only those who are chosen can play. In order to prevent more players from entering the Segregated World, three hackers of the Hackers Alliance G attempted to steal the Odin Core to destroy the server.  
  
While trying to protect the two goddesses, Xiao Chang Feng was heavily injured, on the verge of life and death, he was then fused with the Core, unleashing the power of the Core, Xiao Chang Feng….

title: Realms of Death
description: "Extreme wastelands, monsters raging everywhere, the wicked are dominating this land." Only the strong can survive on this wasteland. In order to find the most important relatives in his life, the mysterious youngster has decided to embark on this endless journey."

title: High Energy Core
description: An unknown force caused the planet earth to stop, because of this the planet earth had a dramatic change in the climate, After the disaster, strange creatures appeared as a new threat to humanity, this is the information I have for now.

title: The Taste of Chocolate
description:
Lu Meng: The popular girl. One of the most beautiful girls in school with boys clawing after her. The girl who gets all the chocolates on Valentines Day. Xinwen Su: One of her close childhood friends. A complete nerd who gets the chocolates that Lu doesn't want. A girl who hasn't received chocolates from a boy in years. Two girls from two completely different worlds. Translated with author permission.   
(Notice: Chapter 2 has been taken down at the author's request. Please respect her decision.)  
[Author Weibo](https://weibo.com/u/2725063771?refer_flag=1001030103_&ssl_rnd=1609780664.0592)  
[Author afdian](http://t.cn/A6qpJJUf)

title: King of the Gods
description: When Meng Fan was trying to find herbs for his sick mother, he was saved by a mysterious woman who promise to make him stronger in exchange for a few promises

title: Supreme Taoist
description: In the 21st century, Lin Fei, a Mansao young man, accidentally crossed from the earth to the Yuanwu realm. Sadly, the object of the crossing was a fool. Alas, accept your fate. But what about fools and idiots, like practicing magic, leveling up, making beautiful girls, and aspiring to the world.

title: This Game Is Too Realistic
description:
Chu Guang, who had traveled to the post-apocalyptic world, discovered that he had unlocked a shelter system and was able to summon creatures named “player” from the previous world.

From that day on, the whole post-apocalyptic world became like a game.

title: My Clone Is the Space Bug King
alt_titles: Wo De Fenshen Shi Yuzhou Chong Wang
Wǒ De Fēnshēn Shì Yǔzhòu Chóng Wáng
description:
In the future, humanity has successfully left Earth and colonized various star systems, evolving into a new breed of humans who are taller and possess incredibly long lifespans. 

Meanwhile, Earth, the once-thriving mother planet, has been reduced to a nuclear wasteland due to overdevelopment and severe pollution. The original inhabitants still living on Earth now face an average lifespan of just 40 years, leading to widespread discrimination from the new humans. 

The protagonist is one of these Earth natives, but unlike others who have succumbed to despair, he works hard to become a mechanic even more skilled than the new humans. Just when he thought he could finally live a better life, he is met with betrayal and treated as cannon fodder when the cosmic insect race attacks a human outpost. 

However, with a burning desire for revenge, the protagonist discovers that he has been reborn as one of the cosmic insects!

title: Don’t Get Me Wrong, I’m The Real Victim!
alt_titles: Bie Wuhui, Wo Cai Shi Shouhai Zhe!
Don't Misunderstand, I Am the Victim!
description: An abandoned factory in the middle of the night, an impressive haunted house in an amusement park, and a grim smiling mask above a bloody white coat roaming every dark corner of the city. It has witnessed every single heinous crime, but please don't get me wrong, I'm only a victim.

title: Life Dive
description: When I was young and reckless, my soul inadvertently crossed into another person, unintentionally altering the course of the world. Thus, I swore never to use my supernatural abilities again. However, in order to save the life of my critically ill younger sister, I had to break that vow. I used my powers on the nurse, Jinzhi, who was taking care of my sister, and crossed over to Jinzhi's childhood to play her role and experience her life. Through this, I discovered that beneath Jinzhi's gentle and elegant facade, there lay dark and mysterious secrets...

title: The Alt Saintess!
description: Obviously, I just want to go to another world and be a “Brave”, The Chosen One to pick up girls easily, but I was tricked by a damn black angel… I came to another world to create a harem man! I don’t want to be a damn loli! What the fuck is happening?!

title: Ni Suo Bu Zhidao De Wo
alt_titles: Nǐ Suǒ Bù Zhīdào De Wǒ
The Me That You Don't Know
description:
"Some thoughts can't be spoken, so we can only let them rot in our hearts and bear it alone."

Faced with a repressed life, debt that falls upon him out of nowhere, and the confused feelings between two teenagers ..... How will the youthful them face all of this? This is the other side of youth, the story you don't know.

title: Dear Mr. Qin
alt_titles: The Nation's Husband is Secretly Married
description: The nation’s husband, Qin You’an, was photographed entering a theatre class. Netizens unaware of the real truth: President Qin must have gone to see the male god Wen Tingyue. They look so good together, wahhh! Wen’s fans also shared various photoshopped photos across Weibo to spread the sweetness of the couple. Later, a paparazzi photographed Z-list cast member Shen Shuyun actively throwing himself into President Qin’s arms. The angered netizens: How dare this lowly peasant meddle with our President Qin!

title: The Fraudulent Game
description: The story of a young man on a mission to avenge the death of his father. Now grown up, he’s become a con artist and formed a team to go after the company of scammers responsible for his father's death.

title: My Disciples Are All Hot Badasses
alt_titles: My Apprentices Are All Female Devils
Tu Di Dou Shi Nv Mo Tou
description:
With the help of a powerful system, a cultivator has become the supreme demon emperor. However the system put him in a coma. As three hundred yeas have past, he is awaken by the system and is offered a chance to change his fate. His first mission is to find his 108 disciples in the last life. My hot disciples!

---
Alt. Official English: [Toomics](https://toomics.com/en/webtoon/episode/toon/6529/)

title: Dealing With the Prince of Misfortune
description: A 21st century, talented Feng Shui expert, reincarnates into a frail body in ancient times. The original good-for-nothing host is not only ugly, but her birth father favors the concubine more than the wife, birth mother was framed with adultery and stripped of her rank, twin brother was poisoned by her second mother, her fiance and concubine-sister hooked up and worked together to bring about her tragic death. After Xiao Lingyun is reincarnated, she uses secret techniques of Feng Shui to get back at those who had previously ridiculed and abused her. From the lowest of low to the highest peak of cultivation, she flies towards the immortal realm.

title: Ultra Positive Energy Demon King
description: The demonic world feeds off of negative energy, such as hate, anger, fear, from the human world. All the negative energy builds a black sun, which nourishes all the demons who live there. When the sun killed the Demon King and many of the demon lords because of too much energy, the top commander of the demonic world, Julia, decided to venture to the human world and purify it. So she took on human form and met a wimpy college student, and made a contract with him to rid the world of negative energy. Positive Energy, starting with me!

title: In The Bathroom
description: The hilarious encounter of Brownie with someone in a public restroom.

title: God and Girl
description: Ever since the God's lone star, Xiaozao, was born, she would bring disaster to all those around her. Since living close by to the Mountain God's temple, she started to have some feelings for the God?! And their wheel of fate started to roll very early…

title: Poem of Hell Confession
description:
Well-behaved girl, Lian Yin, finally summoned up the courage to confess to childhood sweetheart, Fengyao Gong, but received an ambiguous answer. Was it timing's fault? Or was she not good enough? Anyway, she, who had a crush on Fengyao Gong for many years, didn't want to give up. While not long after this failed confession, another sudden high-profile confession completely upended her peaceful life… When she was despairing about Fengyao Gong's tragic death at the hands of the monster, she found that everything had returned to calm, as if the disaster had never happened. And the man who caused the great disaster like the end of days, entered her life as an ordinary student in plain sight..  

Offical Translations:
- [Korean <Lezhin>](https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/hell_propose)
- [Japanese <Piccoma>](https://piccoma.com/web/product/1228138)

title: Demon Slayer
description: "Demon catching" means catching the demons, and it not only fights with people but also fights with evil spirits. In the first year of the Northern Song Dynasty, in the prosperous city of Beijing, the countries were lurking. A list of the city’s alleys was stolen and a list of the city’s alleys were stolen and a murder case led to a battle of conspiracy and killing.

title: The Fox's Trap
description:
Human girl Chi Yan has a nightmare of a fox everyday, and this life was no exception. One day, she meets a real fox demon.
Nine tailed fox Yin Ran only has eight tails. In order to get back the tail bounded to Chi Yan, one of her wishes needs to be fulfilled. The girl, however, has no wishes and only wants to get rid of him. The bad fox, in response, messes up her life.
A charming face appeared in front of the girl, “Would you like to make a wish now?”

title: The Golden Lion King
description: Liu Fan isekai-ed, becoming the Golden lion demon and he even received a cheat system! Eating, sleeping, reading, fighting, and even being in a daze can all be rewarded with attributes given by the system. A Golden lion with super wisdom, comprehension and talent leads female ghosts, goddesses, mutated animals, and tortures human awakeners, ancient immortal cultivators, reincarnated people, and fierce beasts, and finally becomes the strongest being in the world.

title: Cultivation Return on Campus
alt_titles: My Teacher Is A Rebirthed Immortal
description:
He was the strongest Emperor in the world of immortals. None of his contemporaries at the same level could even compare. He used a golden dragon as his ride, had a white tiger as a pet, and ate phoenixes for dinner. He even slept with the goddess of war and stripteased in Lingxiao Palace... Now, he is back in the city as an ordinary teacher.

"Ladies, put your clothes on. I'm here to teach!"

title: A Cat's World
description: Li Miaoyu used to be a delinquent, but one day he woke up as a pink cat.Now he has to live as a house cat together with his way too affectionate master.

title: Amnesia Doesn’t Make Me Your Boyfriend!
alt_titles: Amnesia Doesn't Make Me the Uke
Shī yì wǒ yě bù zuò shòu
description:
Gu Tu wakes up from a coma only to discover that he’s lost a year of his memories. So who is this man next to him, and why are they living together?  
  
(Only uploaded to MangaDex!)

title: The Moon God Doesn't Understand Love
description:
An auspicious cloud thousands of years ago—Because Huang Yue wanted to undergo punishment under Heavenly Tribulation with the dragon Xia Ying, he lost his life. Xia Ying tried his best to save Huang Yue, and so Huang Yue was reborn as the Moon God, and the fate of the two prevailed.  
  
After rebirth, Huang Yue was demoted due to his poor performance, and met with Xia Ying once again. The sparks between the two continued to flicker. Together, they must resolve the grudges and lingering hatred of mortals in this world. The truth from thousands of years ago also began to unravel…

title: Tomorrow Never Goes Out of Style
alt_titles: Tomorrow Never Goes Out of Fashion
description: A temporary florist x the owner of a boutique selling poorly. In this city, there exist two fated urban beauties who meet by chance. From their chance meeting and their special relationship, will they obtain their timeless tomorrow with a murky future before them?

title: Billionaires Are Only for You
description: "Asshole Yin Shaojie, you know you are bullying me!" She complained to him, but the devil smiled evilly, "You are my wife, I don't bully you, who is bullying?" They are childhood sweethearts. Being asked to live together, forcibly cultivate relationships. He disliked her in

title: Second to None
description:
When Tianxia No. 1 and Tianxia No. 1 fall in love, what will happen to the world? This is a story about martial arts and a troublesome girl, routine and being dealt with routinely, acting like a prick and the reverse. This is Tianxia. Do you dare to ask "Tianxia No. what?"  
  
Source: <http://www.royalacg.com/project/secondtonone/>

title: Trapped Inside the Beta Test World for 1000 Years
alt_titles: Wǒ Bèi Kùn Zàinèi Cè Fú Yī Qiānnián
Wo Bei Kun Zainei Ce Fu Yi Qiannian
I've Been Stuck in the Beta Server for a Thousand Years
description:
Trapped in the online game “Fantasy World”, after 177 cycles of deleted files and beta testing, Char has attacked all the beautiful NPCs in the game, the wives of the novice village, the priests of the church, the candidates for the dark elf queen, the Valkyrie chosen by the gods, etc.

Just after he singled out all the bosses and used hundreds of ways to clear the “Fantasy World”, the “Fantasy World” public beta was released!

The constant addition of players has changed the immutable NPCs, and Char is determined to find a way to leave the game in the public beta…

---
**Original Web Comic:** [AC.QQ](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/652295), [BiliBili Manhua](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc32027), [KuaiKan Manhua](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/15057/)

title: If, I Can See You Again...
description: With an icy voice, the Grim Reaper declared, "You will be killed by fate in a week." "In order not to regret, I will fulfill one of your wishes." The girl looked at the Grim Reaper, without a trace of surprise or fear. Surprised? Suddenly he was told this… " Ah, you really don't remember me. "Please be my lover, Mr. Grim Reaper." Past and present, I finally see you again, Nick…

title: I Am a Tycoon Heir!
description: Xiao Lin, the young master of the tycoon family, became a super negligent overnight. The twelve gold hairpins, the principal and the deputy, are all elite goddesses from all walks of life. Xiao Lin can only continue his life if he completes the contract with them. So Xiao Lin was forced to embark on the path of the hunting goddess.

title: Part-Time Yama
description: Lu Yuu demon died unfortunately, and he happened to be added to the Hades system. The rebirth was only to exorcise demons and demons, and the ghosts were sentenced to death! I, the newcomer, protect me, not for myself, just for the sake of this world!

title: Her Super Bodyguard
description:
Retiring from the army, the king of soldier kings returned to the city and lived under the same roof with his icy fiancee who is a CEO. Being a substitute, he gained his fame, attracted those beauties and was bound to reach the pinnacle of his life.  
  
[Alternate Official English](https://www.flying-lines.com/comic/beautiful-ceo-s-superb-master-hand)

title: Intoxicated Love
description:
Having a secret crush is just like drinking a bottle of hard liquor. You clearly know that it will make you light-headed, lose your cool, and suffer. Yet, just like a moth to the flames, you endure the pain knowingly. "You stop right after having a sip of it but, as for me… I'm drunk in love."   
  
However, inevitably, you finally sober up after being drunk. This is a story about doing everything possible just to continue having a secret crush and learning to love someone.

title: Pixiu's Eatery, No Way Out
alt_titles: Paixiu Restaurant, Only in but Not Out
Pixiu Restaurant, Only Entering but Not Leaving
description: When the old demon Pixiu went out to take out the trash, he ended up with a male ghost falling into his lap. This male ghost had flawless features and had an incredibly low body temperature, which made him the perfect bolster for Pixiu who struggled with a natural curse of an unbearably hot body. Pixiu swore to the heavens that he would only use this ghost as a bolster, nothing more! Yet nobody believed him. He would go on to declare, "Even though the strings of fate have been tied on me, I will remain single." Pixiu often said that as long as he sorted his trash well, a good wife shouldn't be far as well. This comic is also named: I went dumpster diving for a wife (not).

title: Tian Jiang Xian Shu Nan
description: Su Jia Ao is a normal high school girl, and she's in an unbelievable situation she's never encountered before. A fiancee descended from the sky; his attractiveness can't be stopped, together with that thing; this fiancee is exquisite, kind, gentle, and a highly moral person. Her parents and her neighbours compliment him nonstop. But… What a joke! Who would want to marry someone, who doesn't have man's qualities, as her husband? I'm afraid, even if I come to the Dong Nu Clan, who uses women are superior to men as an ethic, it won't work. For sure, I'll break the chain of these old principles and sing a song of freedom! …

title: Cultivate with a Fairy
description: Lu Wuyan had been cultivating for a thousand years and become matchless, but why couldn’t he ascend even though people worse than he had ascended to immortality! He couldn’t take that! He wanted to talk about it with a fairy. How on earth could he achieve immortality!?

title: City Prince and Amazon Princess
alt_titles: City Prince and Indigenous Girl (Google TL'd)
description: A girl who grew up in the Amazon was entrusted by her grandfather to an arrogant Young Master. Unfamiliar with the life in the city, she reacted in many silly ways and gradually captivated the Young Master?!

title: Mia - Neverland Above the Clouds
description:
In a city where adults go through the motions like robots, Mia feels claustrophobic. Meanwhile, the news is rife with stories of children getting kidnapped. One day, Mia runs into a young man named Joema. At his house, she sees fairies and children with animated faces. Are they holograms produced by his machine? But friendship with Joema comes with a price, Mia learns, as red-eyed Crows approach…  
  
История о людях, которые постепенно забывают о том, что когда-то было для них важным. Но всё меняется после случайной встречи сироты Мии и странного парня "не от мира сего", живущего в обсерватории на окраине города.  
  
Note: The tank doesn't separate the manga into chapters, but it was separated into 6 chapters in the online publication. The Russian group arbitrarily created 8 chapters out of the tank, hence the English and Russian releases have different total chapters.

title: Script Shop of Dream
description:
A wealthy lady booked the Script Kill store, which was owned by the disgraceful man who broke up with her. After certain measures, the Script Host System warned her, 

“Forcibly opening a script has caused the system to undergo a major error. Now, if you wish to leave, you must give each script a happy ending. If you fail to succeed, you can work till your death inside the scripts!”

title: Twin Flowers of the Cold Distant Sea
alt_titles: Líng hǎi zhī yáo shuāngshēng huā
description: The little princess Lian Tan, who was regarded as the “star of destruction” by the beast tribe was unhappy with her elder twin sister, holy maiden, Yao Fang's marriage. Hence, she designed a plan to make the crown prince Shao Yu call off the marriage through her talent of causing trouble. However, while doing so, she landed herself in grave danger. Meanwhile, the holy maiden, Yao Fang, accidentally ended up in the demon tribe and became the concubine of the demon tribe’s second prince. The twin flowers’ misplaced marriage led to the uncovering of an astounding secret that had been covered up for a thousand of years in the three realms and eight lands.

title: The Last Male
description: Yang Nan was left all alone in the world after the Great Disaster. Everything changed when he met a little girl on the highway. He learned from her that he is far from the only human in the world, and now they go on a journey to unite with other people. Except he doesn’t know Male isn’t a hunter anymore…

title: More Than Brothers
alt_titles: Younger Brother Next Door Is Too Difficult to Manage
description:
The younger brother living next door was as cute as a small angel when he was a child, but after reuniting many years later, he drastically changed? In order to properly discipline this “rebellious” younger brother—Bai Yun, the gentle elder brother, Lan Tian, will do his best to take up on that responsibility. What Lan Tian didn’t know was that Bai Yun wanted to tell him: “You’ve been treating me as your younger brother, but I’ve never thought of you as my older brother!” Can a crush lasting many years finally blossom?

---
As a child, a boy who looked like a cute angel lived with him next door. But then he left and came back many years later. But when he returned, he changed a lot. In order to somehow control this rebel Lan Tang, you need to try very hard.

---
[Official Japanese Translation / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/117078)

title: Collapse of the World as We Know It
alt_titles: Collapse of your world as you read it
description:
This manhua is a collection of short stories by this author. It is almost similar to the German Brothers Grimm's stories. However, these hold no morals but are more of a twisted outlook on life.  
  
Warning : This series contain fucked up stuff, gore stuff, and mind fuck stuff and a little bit of dark humor.  
  
Notice that some contents got 'harmonised' after a 'clean Internet' campaign in the linked raw.

title: Ancestor’s Foolish Disciple
description: What is it like to be pushed down by the disciple you raised with your own hands? The Chaos Master of the Immortal and Demonic Worlds has taken the King of the Qilin Clan as his disciple by mistake, and is treated with love by his disciple? But she has the important task of saving the three worlds and is too busy to fall in love!

title: Kode Turing
description: Wen Tian He had always thought that he would become an overbearing CEO. However, he turned out to be the overbearing CEO’s man.

title: I'm A Cat
description:
It's exhausting to live as a human, so I hope I become a cat instead.

Then one day, my wish was granted?

title: Oh! What a Beautiful City and Boys
alt_titles: So It's a City of Pretty Boys!
description: Their people’s era’s difficulties seem to be the same as ours today.

title: God Emperor Descends: I Have Billions of Attribute Points
alt_titles: God Emperor Descends: I Have Billions of Attribute Points
God Emperor's Advent: I Have Trillions of Attribute Points
Here Comes the Godly Emperor: I Have Billions of Attribute Points
description: Yi Qingtian was reborn into the world with trillions of attribute points and endless magical treasures, but he was punished by God when he was born. In order to save the lives of his family, he transformed his mind into shape and beat Heavenly Dao, but was instead planted with the Nine Dao Destruction Seal. If you want to crack it, you must find nine heavenly books and nine scholars. So, he embarked on the road of acting against heaven..

title: His 10,000 Romantic Traps
alt_titles: A Thousand Tricks of Hunting You
Ngàn Vạn Bẫy Tình Của Bạn Trai Báo Hệ
กับดักรักของชายเสือดาว
description:
Cheated on by her fiancé and her bestie, Luo Xiaoka loses all her faith in romantic love and decides to fully devote herself to work. However, fate sends her right into her boss’s trap of love. How is she supposed to deal with this man’s 10,000 creative ways to court her?  
Finally, a considerate and gentle male lead who respects the woman he loves and knows how to properly solve his jealousy issue!  
  
FRENCH  
Trompée par son fiancé et sa meilleure amie, Luo Xiaoka perd toute foi en l'amour et décide de se consacrer pleinement au travail.  
Cependant, le destin l’envoie dans les pièges de son patron. Comment est-elle censée gérer les 10 000 façons de cet homme pour la courtiser ?  
Enfin, un meneur masculin attentionné et doux qui respecte la femme qu'il aime et sait comment résoudre correctement son problème de jalousie!

---

[Official English 2](https://www.webcomicsapp.com/comic/5ee85f6f8c252b529c5aa6f5)

title: The Demon King in the City
My Sickly Sister Always Misses Me
alt_titles: The fragile sister always has thoughts of me
Bingruo Meimei Zong Shi Xiao Xiang Wo
description: She was the thing she had coveted since she was a little girl, the one she loved but couldn't love, the projection of all her desires. Xu Yuliu is a young woman from a rich family, intelligent, beautiful, she should have had a peaceful life as a girl, but she encountered an obstacle called "Xu Wenjiao". This girl of unknown origin is the person she hates the most.

title: Sins of the Gods
description:
As a sinner, Ying Tian and his tribe were imprisoned in the City of Sinners with collars that restricted their supernatural powers. However, Ying Tian was told that he was the descendent of a god. Just when Ying Tian was confused, an unexpected disaster destroyed the entire City of Sinners, leaving no one alive. Ying Tian himself escaped from death and came to the outside world, carrying the blood feud of his entire tribe. In order to find out the truth of the world, Ying Tian and his partners embark on a journey, while he also reveals the true power of a god…

---
**Link:**
- Alternate Official Raw - [Bilibili](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc36782)

title: Saving the World Through a Game
description:
Shugo Gento, who has just retired, finds himself in urgent need of a large sum of money due to family circumstances. To earn it, he joins Melloworld, a virtual game that promises real-world profits.

Inside the game, Shugo teams up with Ayana Himekawa, a popular streamer, and Hikaru Morioka, a wealthy player. The trio progresses smoothly at first, but gradually they begin to feel something is off about the game.

As they investigate to uncover the truth behind Melloworld, a shocking revelation comes to light: the game's post-apocalyptic world is actually a vision of the real world's future. Worse yet, a god-like entity controlling the game is guiding humanity toward that grim destiny.

Can they join forces to defeat this god and restore the world to its rightful path?

title: Good Luck, Demon King! 2
alt_titles: Good Luck, Demon King - The Millennium Chapter
description:
The Demon King Franwoids (Xiao Fu) decided to teach magic to Salamander who is the Great Mage of humans.  
This series is about 1000 years prior to the season 1 of Good luck, Demon King!

title: Mòrì Suíjī Jìnhuà
alt_titles: Random Evolution In Doomsday: The Evolution
description: Twelve Alien destroyers turned into meteorites and hit the earth, bringing an unknown zombie virus and setting off a doomsday frenzy. The evolution zone has opened, and power user has started to emerge! Wang Zhe, who died in battle ten years later, has reborn and returned back in time. Now he decided to use the advantages of his memory and strength to become the strongest evolutionary!

title: Supreme God
description: After Lu Li crossed to the Star Ocean continent, he was immediately oppressed by the Empress, the Champion, and the Second Prince, Lu Yun, and received the Supreme Red Packet System.

title: I Became a Big-Shot on the Heavenly Leaderboard
alt_titles: Cong Bu Chushou De Wo Huncheng Tian Bang Da Lao
I Never Take Action, Yet I Was Ranked as One of the Strongest On the Skyboard
I Never Take Action And Become a Big Boss in the Sky
Without Making a Move, I Became The No.1 Master
description: Pay attention, this man's name is A-wei! He thought he had transgressed into the body of the [Number One Villain] in the martial world, but he actually turned out to be a super weakling with a combat strength of [Zero]! A-wei, who fancied himself a wolf but was more like a husky, advanced by leveraging his extraordinary confidence to cut through challenges effortlessly. Concealing his identity, building his power base, reclaiming his former beautiful subordinates, and training his cute and clever apprentice... did he really become the [Number One] in the martial world?!

title: Exclusive Lover
description: I was given a second chance in life by having a new heart but I have lost my freedom. Huo Ji Kang, he wants me to become a substitute of his late girlfriend. Ziang He, he's my childhood friend who gave up everything. Wei Ru Fei, she is my heart donor's younger sister. One transplant surgery, has completely trap all 4 of them. Now, how can I face the love life of the owner of this heart.

title: On a Deserted Island with Beautiful Sisters
alt_titles: The Days When I and the Stewardess Survived on a Deserted Island
Wo He Kongjie Huangdao Qiusheng De Rizi
description: Veteran Liu Yi suffered an air crash and was exiled on a deserted island, killing wild boars and fighting savages for his livelihood. Unexpectedly, the beautiful empty sisters, the sexy mixed-race beauties, and the gentle kindergarten teachers threw themselves into their arms one after another. Liu Yi expressed that he really wanted to live a good life! Who knows what will happen in the future if she accidentally accepts the inheritance of the god king?

title: 20,000 Years of Physical Cultivation
description:
Wu Linggen, once the chubby kid who was constantly bullied, suddenly dies from a heart attack brought on by his weight, only to awaken in a completely different world. With a fierce determination to finally build a strong body, he quickly realizes that he’s in a realm of cultivation—where those without spiritual roots are deemed worthless.

At first, he believes his newfound muscles might just help him scrape by in this bizarre land of monsters and demons. But he didn’t expect that his fists could punch through the entire world of immortal cultivation!

title: Otherworldly Record of the Magic Stone - Aisha's Salvation
alt_titles: Otherworldly Record of the Magic Stones - Aixia's Salvation
description: A young lady has been cursed and parasitized by a magic stone. She became an indescribable killing machine. All of this was just the price of her witch mother seeking revenge against the gods. But the young lady didn’t surrender herself to fate. She vowed to use her own determination to find redemption and undo the cycle of the curse.

title: 100 Strange Nights
description:
A series of short stories from the Republic of China era (1912-1949). Enjoy adventurous settings, ingenious plots, mind-blowing foreshadowing, and surprising plot twists. This series will leave you calling 'encore' a thousand times over. For those of you who enjoy logic and deduction, this is one manhua you don't want to miss!  
  
Author's weibo: [AGP崇阳](https://weibo.com/u/2240612427?topnav=1&wvr=6&topsug=1&is_all=1)

title: He Is a Beast
description: A cat? A dog? No, it's obviously a beast! In a small town where a bloodshed occurred, Chana, a typical female high school student met Yumu, a popular male high school student, who was suspected of being a murderer. As the relationship between the two changed as time passed, the man who seemed to be gentle and kind in front of her gradually showed his true self, and the truth of all the incidents also surfaced.

title: Doomed to be a King
description: One day, a young man ​occupied a mountain, and crowned himself the king. Henceforward, this place was full of masters and beasts. But wait… What am I looking at? Masters are plowing farmlands, and beasts are guarding the yards? Something’s wrong…

title: Blackcat and Magician
description: “The two things I like the most… catnip and you!” A cat wants to return a favor?! A passionate and devoted kitty makes a confession! Yan Kai owns a pet supplies store. On a stormy night, he kindly takes in a black cat to save it from a typhoon. But the cat’s identity is actually a human, Yu Ran! Not only that, but he’s a magician whose powers have only ever been heard of in legends. As it happens… Yu Ran has been secretly peeping on Yan Kai while in his cat form for a long time, but he never imagined Yan Kai would bring him home himself! It’s a perfect scenario, so Yu Ran decides to take the initiative and launch an attack on Yan Kai… An attack filled with passion and love!

title: Did I Become Invincible After Confessing My Love to the Beautiful Ancestor?
alt_titles: After Confessing My Love to the Beautiful Ancestor, Am I Invincible?
biǎobái měinǚ zōngzhǔ Hòu, wǒ wúdí le?
description:
On a day marked by celestial upheavals and reversal of the cosmos, Lin Fan descended into the world. He instantly became the Prince of the Heavenly Sect and was taken in as a disciple by the founding ancestor.

Amidst an ordinary cauldron explosion, something unexpected occurred... Lin Fan regained his memories! He reincarnated? System? Favorability? Upgrades? Lin Fan suddenly woke up to reality, and with the system by his side to "help" him, he chose his first target to conquer: The ancestor of the Heavenly Sect.

title: Bound by One's Heart
description:
A traffic accident caused two unrelated souls to be bound spiritually. Many years later, the victim, Feng Yi, and the assailant, Chu Jiangye, swapped identities.
Can they forgive each other’s mistakes and create a brighter future together…?

title: Supernatural Beast Academy
description: Lin-Hao, the only male Eudemons contractor in the world, possessed the world's first attribute-less Eudemons and began his beautiful and painful academy life in the Eudemons Academy, which is full of girls. As the days passed, the truth and the forces behind it gradually surfaced to let Lin-Hao know that all this was not a coincidence but a fate.

title: Marvelous Hero of the Sword
description:
Based on the great natural law, the strong is invincible. The antediluvian method of elixir shines the mountains and rivers, the all-conquering treasured sword annihilates the universe and transmigration, and the blood vessel of Shura ruins the supremacy of every realm. Inheriting from the mandate of heaven, and practicing unrivaled skills, Nan Qin overwhelmingly started his own travel towards the strong which is immortal and matchless! "Burn the sky and boil the wine to study the rule of Shura, and then kill those beast all!"  
  
 [Alternative Raw Source](https://rawdevart.com/comic/marvelous-hero-sword)

title: Rebirth After A Thousand Years
alt_titles: I Lie Flat, My Granddaughters Are All Super Ruthless Characters
Tǎng Píng De Wǒ, Sūnnǚmen Dōu Shì Chāojí Hěn Juésè
Strongest Player Returns After A Thousand Years
Tang Ping De Wo, Sunnvmen Dou Shi Chaoji Hen Juese
description: After a thousand years, Qi Guan Xiaojian, who had previously saved the world, was reincarnated. He hoped to rely on his generations to have peaceful lives filled with cola, fried chicken, and video games. Can he actually achieve his goals?

title: Tian Jiao Lianmeng
description: Tian Jiao Lianmeng, is a mysterious yet popular game. Legends say that only five people can clear it, and by doing so, will gain riches beyond belief. In order to continue his peeping obsession on the Jiejie next door, Luo Xiao Wei was determined to clear the game and gain the rewards, and to also replace his telescope. However, more and more puzzles await him….

title: I Determine My Own Destiny
alt_titles: I Just Don't Play the Card According to the Routine
Wǒ Jiùshì Bù Àn Tàolù Chū Pái
description:
Jiang Beiran's journey to the Xuanlong Continent began in tragedy. He had finally gotten the system, but he had not anticipated it has its own rhythm. As a result, Jiang Beiran chose Gou, avoiding all opportunities to brag and living the practice in quiet.

However, reality prevents him from salting a fish; even if he merely displays his might, he has established himself as a mystery powerhouse in the eyes of all, and he has gathered a pack of licking dogs.
- - -
Jiang Beiran traveled through time and space and arrived at the Dragon Continent with a miserable beginning. And when he was lucky enough to obtain the system, it didn’t work as he expected. Therefore, he chose to stay low-key, avoid any chances of showing off, and only concentrate on cultivation.

However, reality didn’t allow him to be ordinary. He still became a mysterious powerful cultivator with a lot of flatterers even when he showed off his strength a bit.

title: The Unbridled Genius Medic
alt_titles: Miracle Doctor, Evil consort is too arrogant
The Evil Miracle Doctor Consort is Too Arrogant
The Poisonous Miracle Doctor Consort is Too Arrogant
The Poisonous Genius Consort is Too Arrogant
description: "God's doctor is too arrogant" is a web manhua collaboration between Two Cats and Winter Man. This manhua depicts a genius doctor who reincarnated as a continent's useless lady. To avenge the useless lady, she charges forward by talking back, hiring offense-based supernatural creatures, cultivating her core and levelling up to defeat monsters, and subjugate the fantasy continent's strongest man, henceforth turning the tables of her miserable life, reaching the peak of her legacy!

title: The Provincial Commander's Self-Cultivation
description:
Qihuang Kingdom was run by women, and as the head eunuch, Yan Lang’s dream was to mix in, eat, wait for death, and resign from office with honor, while disguising herself as a man. However, Yan Lang unexpectedly encountered the biggest failure of her career when the new empress ascended to the throne.   
  
Wait a minute! Why was the empress a male? Yan Lang barely managed to convince the empress to spare her life, but without even the time to celebrate, that damn empress forced a pill down her throat.  
  
“All this drug will do is keep you in check. Behave well, and I will make sure you have nothing to worry about.”  
  
“Just be a good empress! Starting from today, I’ll be your loyal subject during the day, and kick your ass in the evening!”  
  
Every day, Yan Lang wanders on the brink of danger, for someday, the empress may discover her secret: that Yan Lang, the provincial commander, is actually female!

title: Fatal Attraction
description: The cold president who doesn’t know love because he lost it once; The gentle young boy who was forced to be strong-hearted because he doesn’t want to lose love.
