Two people who shouldn’t have come across one another had an encounter because they’re a fated alpha and omega pair. Confrontation, conflict, reconciliation, and getting to know one another… Is this fatal attraction the devil’s joke, or pity from God?

title: My Children are Big Shots
description: Eastern mystical fantasy world, thousands of races, parallel in the world. Each race's own bloodline, pure, reaching the level, can ascend to the Heavenly Gate, to enter the Heavenly Lan Divine Realm. The heroine, Ling Huan Huan, practices the secret arts of the seven races in order to quickly raise her bloodline. If you return to your true nature and purify your bloodline, you will be the youngest person to ascend. Lu Yunting a traveller, the body is extremely pure, is the best furnace. The story begins with Lu Yunting, being pinned down on the ice bed……

title: A Paragon of Wuhun
description: The Dragon Pulse Continent (or “Longmai” Continent) is home to millions of clans, countless sects and martial artists. Strong people have the ability to manoeuvre the land, whilst the weak can only crawl like ants. A young man, Chen Feng, with a core like iron, was unable to cultivate and was treated by cold eyes. But then he found the divine Dragon’s Blood and a mysterious ancient cauldron, and from then on he rose against the odds and emerged into the eyes of the world! Beautiful demon foxes, cold and highly empresses, demon clan princesses and divine clan princesses will all be in my arms. I will cultivate the supreme inheritance, condense the strongest martial soul, embrace all beauties, and stand proudly high up above the clouds.

title: The Brilliant Village Doctor
description: Here enters Lin Hao, an obscure young man of firmness and bravery, who possesses unparalleled medical technology. One day he is wandering on the street when he suddenly spots Nuolan's sexy legs, then immediately decides to apply for her father clinic and becomes a doctor there. Pure gold will glitter forever. His talent shows up day by day from this demote village to cities far away, drawing lots of patients to come for help, including some famous ones. Life of this little clinic gets more and more interesting.

title: Entangled With His Cold Excellency, the Scourge
description:
On a dark and windy night, I was kissed by a handsome man, not once, but also twice! How could my esteemed self be kissing people just like that? What? Take responsibility? Get engaged? Marry me? No!  
  
I ran away from home so I wouldn't have to get married, and now a handsome man inexplicably wants to marry me, I don't want to…  
  
But, but why is this school full of handsome guys, cold ones, gentle ones , and wicked ones, and why are they all chasing after me?

title: Zhan Long 2
description:
A remake of [Zhan Long](https://mangadex.org/title/57749a58-650b-473f-abf0-057da0f40755/zhan-long). Despite the number 2, this is not a sequel.  
After defeating a rare monster it unexpectedly transformed into a girl. Due to hesitation the monster were slain by an other player, that player was then aiming for Xiao Yao Zi Zai's life.

title: Strongest NPC
description: In this era of national martial arts, Chen Ji originally thought that as long as he worked hard to practice martial arts he would be able to get rid of campus bullying, stay with school flowers and live together, and reach the pinnacle of life. However, he discovered that this world is not what he imagined. It's that simple…

title: Baozao Mengzhu Qiao Mo Tou
description: Extra extra! The Lord of the Wulin Union is working together with the Demonic Sect Leader! They have to discover the truth behind the murder case that shocked all of Wulin within a month. Otherwise, they must get married on the spot, no, it’s that the Wulin Union Leader must resign his seat and the Demonic Sect Leader must demolish his martial arts himself. Let us wait and see!

title: Don’t Call Me A Devil
description: The sacred heavenly gate looms high in the boundless sky, while the abyss of time and space wreaks havoc upon the world. As twelve spiritual springs rise from the earth and the moon slips beyond humanity’s grasp… where will our destiny lead? The realm of gods? The domain of demons? No, this is a world that belongs to humanity! I will claim the crown that no one else dares to bear and rise as the king of a new era. My name is Ren Jie, and to live is to be extraordinary!

title: The Young Master Who Ran Away from His Marriage
description: The narcissistic young master Xi Men Yun’s sister, ran away from home, in result, his mother arranged for him to take his sister’s place and marry Bei Tang Xiao, her fiancé. The foolish Xi Men Yun decides to run away as well from the marriage, but fate is an intriguing thing, he ran away only to end up in the same General Bei Tang Xiao’s residence. And because of a small accident where he fell into water, and the general tried to save him, they exchanged bodies! This is how their wonderful fate unfolds.

title: The Pay to Win Big Shot
alt_titles: Leveling up to the strongest through in app purchases
description: In this universe, there are hundreds of thousands of system, i only ask one question – “Do you have any money?” The yuan Qi returned to this world, the martial arts outbreaks in this modern world, the system invaded to this world, countless enemies existing, the Demon King system, the trading system with the heavens, the hero system…etc… are rushing to this world But Shen Qian did not choose among of those systems, he just wanted a system with MONEY. “You are trash without money” this is the rightful thing to life, with money you are everything, without it you are nothing

title: It All Starts With Being Reborn 1 Thousand Times
description:
Three years ago, the supreme bone got seized and Jiang Yu has since become a handyman disciple. Three years later… “Congratulations to the host’s supreme bone rebirth, awakening the strongest physique in the heavens and the earth!” Hearing this, Jiang Yu smashed the pole! Finally, The system has activated!


---

**Links:**
- [Alternative raw (AC QQ)](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/651469)
- [Alternative raw (KuaiKan)](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/12997)

title: I Learn To Cultivate In The World of Superpower
alt_titles: I Learn to Cultivate to Be Immortal in the World of Superpowers
Chosen to Be Immortal in the World of Superpower
No More Pretending, I'm Stronger Than Superheroes
Do I Have a Screw Lose in My Head for Cultivating in a World of Superpowers?
Who Am I? I Am the Strongest Hero
Wo Zai Chao, Nengli Shijie Xue Xiuxian
description: In this world where ordinary people have superpowers, becoming a superhero is no longer an unattainable thing. But without superpowers, he wants to be a hero, but he can only embark on the road of cultivating immortals. What are superpowers? In front of Xianfa, saving the world only needs to move your fingers!

title: Dead Bug Parasitism
description: Jump Wong—an infamous, poor little live streamer with zero gold coins—accepts his grandfather's request to transport a body to the Kunlun mountains! Unexpected and thrilling adventures happen along the way! The secret of the "bug" appearance and its extraordinary superpower will slowly be revealed. Just like before, it will be an amusing battle with superpowers! amid the excitement and nerve-racking times, there will be mystery and fun!

title: Pestered by the Yandere Once Again
alt_titles: Once Again Being Tangled With the Yandere
description: While escaping from pursuers, Shen Nian Que accidentally entered the house of a handsome young man. Not only was he not afraid of her threats, he even personally treated her gunshot wound. At first, she thought that it was just a coincidence. However, she would've never thought that this young man, who has a delicate character and is a year younger than her, would end up pestering her. She couldn't bear to beat him or scold him. Slowly, his gaze towards her became increasingly morbid...

title: 48 Hours a Day
description:
The God of Time – Khronos – gave Zhang Heng an incredible gift. Time freezes at the end of the day for everyone except Zhang Heng, who gains an additional 24 hours.
In exchange, Zhang Heng must act as the agent for the God of Time and participate in a dangerous game each month: Deserted Island Survival [Mission Objective: Survive for 40 days], Tokyo Drift [Mission Objective: Win the modified street car race], and so on… As Zhang Heng stacks victory upon victory, he gets closer to the truth of the world.

title: Highly Talented Doctor
description: Ye Qiu was betrayed by his girlfriend, oppressed by his colleagues and misunderstood by his superior, but due to fate, he received a miraculous encounter, which enabled him to save lives, join a mysterious organization, uphold justice, and ultimately becomes a legendary doctor in the city, fulfilling an urban hot-blooded adventure story.

title: Absolute Vision
description: A nobody accidentally gets x-ray vision? It’s the ability to see through everything in the world except people's minds...

title: Angel Sweetheart Attack
description: What kind of sparks will fly between an angel and a devil? What is the feud passed down through generations of vampires and werewolves? How does a mermaid and a fairy date? On a continent where many races coexist peacefully, any kind of gay romance is possible!

title: Liànshàng Huànzhuāng Wáwa 107.5
description: A Collection of fanmade manga content/drawings drawn and authored by 沈蛇皮/Shen She Pi/Shipi.

title: My 4 Backup Dancers and I
alt_titles: Wo He Wo De Si Ge Ban Wu
description: His alternate account on Weibo got hacked. Overnight, the public persona of Yan Shuo, the 'gentle and good leader' of the popular boy group M.E.N crumbled. A certain sinister forum post: 《Congratulations to Brother Yan Shuo for becoming M.E.N's new center position! How honored to even get 4 crappy backup dancers!》

title: This Human Immortal Is Too Serious
alt_titles: This Human Immortal Is Too Serious
description: In order to get rid the curse of not being able to get close to women,  Wu Wang jumped headfirst into the marvelous ancient era, danced with the 3 sovereigns and 5 emperors, and had fun with demons and ghosts, and finally embarked on the road of the demigods and immortals.

title: My Crown Prince Consort Is a Firecracker
description:
A genius talisman practitioner is reborn as a seven-year-old girl! However, her innocent appearance belies her vicious personality. In the remote countryside, the Crown Prince runs into her, beating up her enemy. She is indifferent, but it’s love at first sight for the Crown Prince!  
  
“Not good, Your Highness the Crown Prince, Her Highness the Crown Prince Consort used an immobilization talisman on His Majesty the Emperor, and His Majesty is currently eating dirt in the main hall.”  
  
“Isn’t that normal? Who told that dog emperor to provoke my wife? I say it’s a job well done! Pour a bucket of ice water on him to cool him down!”

title: The Book of Abyss
description: One day, after finishing a novel with an apocalyptic theme, Chang Ting found that the world was quietly transforming, as if the events from the novel were unfolding in reality. From the mysterious disappearance of skyscrapers to the appearance of monsters at fixed times and locations, everything was developing according to the script of the novel. Chang Ting realized that in order to survive, he needed to acquire the special abilities mentioned in the novel. Using his advance knowledge of the plot, he waited patiently at the location where the first Abyssal Seeds were supposed to appear. When the time came, he successfully gained the exclusive talents described in the novel, becoming one of the first individuals with the ability to confront the challenges of the world. The apocalypse was inevitable, but Chang Ting, armed with the knowledge from the novels he had read, was ready to face the impending conclusion. As the plot he had encountered in novels approached its climax, the origin of the Abyssal Seeds was about to be revealed, unraveling all the secrets surrounding the impending apocalypse!

title: Between the Years
description: That was the boy I loved, accompanying me through verdant days and brilliant, fleeting years.

title: Celestial Destroyer
description: Zhang Xiao Fan is a normal boy from the Temple Village, he usually fills up his pastime by playing with other kids from the village. One day, Zhang Xiao Fan and his friend Lin Jing Yu are accidentally dragged into a fight between Skytone temple divine monk Pu Zhi and an unknown assassin in black. At that same day, Temple Village was massacred, all the villagers except Zhang Xiao Fan and Lin Jing Yu are dead. After surviving the horrible massacre of their village, Zhang Xiao Fan and Lin Jing Yu are saved by Qing Yun Sect. The prodigy and level-headed Lin Jing Yu becomes a disciple that many of the leaders fight over, while the no talent dim-witted Zhang Xiaofan is looked down on.

title: It's All Black Stocking's Fault
description:
Liu Mang, now 30 years old, was a good student in the past. But his life wasn't good anymore. One day, when he was massaging his boss' legs, he fainted and went back to the time he was 17 years old.  
  
Knowing that studying hard would be useless, he decided to change his fate, and do things he'd never dare to try in the past.  
  
Credits to：圣诞文学网

title: The Strongest Crystal Beast Master
description: Young Chen Xing formed a bond with Lily, the “Fated Queen” of the Crystal Beast Realm, becoming the first awakener to contract with a humanoid crystal beast. He gained a special ability to turn crystal beasts into beautiful girls and set out on a journey of battle and power to become the “Strongest Crystal Beast Master.” Jealous? I’ve got countless humanoid crystal beast girls like her!

title: Nuan Nuan Wu
description: Fenced within a small courtyard is a large tree, and many plants and flowers sing joyfully every day. Sitting on the second story, she drinks tea while painting, bathing in the brilliant sunlight that passes through the trees. The only problem is, the cute delivery guy keeps her waiting. And also– “Did you drink all of my tea again, Yi Nuan?”

title: 12 Months with the General and his Second-in-Command
Never Dead
description: Oren went to Japan to participate in a go tournament, however, his return train suffered a huge nuclear explosion. Oren's train was buried in a tunnel, and no one on board survived except Oren. After a serious accident, Oren realizes that his body has the power of "immortality"! Ability to fly in the air, control objects, psychic powers...

title: Call Me Master
description: Zhou Ming is reborn as the head of a small school who is full of girls. In order to survive, for dignity, and for the sake of his sister, he used his golden fingers to overcome all difficulties and lead the long-declined sect on the road to rise.

title: War Machine
description: Bruce is the elite commando of the SARS. In a battle with terrorists, he was seriously wounded and the entire regiment was destroyed. When he woke up again, he found himself lying in the secret laboratory of the enemy. It turned out that he and several former comrades, as the first batch of experimental products, were transformed into terrorist war machines. In all the machines, Bruce found that only he still retains the original consciousness… but his body is not under his control, and he is sent to the front line again and again to kill his former comrades, even to love himself. The task of the family… After watching his beloved daughter fall under his gun, Bruce is determined to get rid of the machine program settings, wake up all the experimental war machines, and give the terrorists a "great counterattack."

title: Gu Fang Bu Zi Shang
description:
Bai Pingting has always been unable to believe the saying "a woman's virtue is ignorance". She is a maid of Jing Anwang, but she lives even better than some wealthly women. She is also wiser than most men and she hopes for a higher intellect.  
  
Even if that man is an enemy, both are full of lies and conspiracies. She is not fond of that man. But between a choice the love and loyalty, she will begin to think that she isn't as meaningful as she once thought she was…  
  
Note: the manhua went on a hiatus after 2 vols. And is completely scanlated

title: Terror Hunter
description: One day, countless sinister and distorted monsters suddenly appeared in the city. These monsters would attack or distort the minds of ordinary people at night, turning them into demons. The government called these monsters "The Terror". To deal with the terror attacks, and the higher-ups of the government officials and businessmen created a floating city to remotely control the whole world. However, the majority of people still live on the ground, reproducing and working.

title: The Specific Heat Capacity Of Love
description: A girl goes to the seaside on her class field trip and accidentally meets a mysterious handsome boy, after talking, she hears a dramatic story about a bird and fish, finally the kind girl decides to help the bird fulfill its last wish.

title: Comeback of the Distressed Lady
alt_titles: Revenge of the Heiress in Distress
description:
She fell into the nasty plot of her sister and was humiliated. After many twists and turns, the misunderstandings passed by, one by one… When all the truth was revealed, when the plot was punctured, what would be their destiny?

**Alternate Official English Links**
[Mangatoon](https://mangatoon.mobi/en/revenge-a-maid?content_id=1733), [Pocket Comics](https://www.pocketcomics.com/comic/7946?languageCode=en)

title: A God's Ascension
description:
I was transmigrated into the body of a villain? Who the hell wrote this script?! And I even stole someone else's girl? And have a powerful older sister? This script keeps getting worse and worse! And there's even a divine space and ten thousand worlds? I'm definitely dreaming!   
After steadying himself, Wu Ming faced these new developments and continued on his journey…

title: Sky City: The Formation of Phoenix
description: La tribu humaine a fait la paix avec la tribu aile pour le moment. Une fille à l'esprit vif ressemble tellement à la princesse de la tribu humaine. L’empereur lui a donc demandé d’aller dans une aile tribale afin d’avoir un mariage royal en remplacement de la princesse. Pourtant, elle cache également certains secrets. Rancunière envers sa tribu et sa famille, peut-elle faire une énorme différence?

title: I Live With a Demon King
description:
The entanglement and love between demons and humans! Little Luo Li lives with the indifferent "little brother" at home, but he is actually the big demon king.  
His goal is to take over Luo Li's body and mind, and then offer her as a sacrifice?! Is there no true love between humans and demons?

title: Dragon Ball GT
description:
Unofficial Dragon Ball GT adaptation by the chinese “Xinjiang Youth Publishing House”.  
  
Age 789: Five years have passed since the 28th Tenkaichi Budokai, and all is peaceful around the world as Goku and Oob finish their training in Kami-sama’s palace. However, this peace soon ends as Pilaf makes a terrifying wish, transforming Goku into a child. The rush is on to retrieve all seven Ultimate Dragon Balls from around the Universe before the Earth and its inhabitants are destroyed…

title: Eternal First Son-In-Law
alt_titles: The First Son-In-Law Vanguard of All Time
Take a Good Look at Me Now
description: Xu Wuzhou travelled through time, and was shocked to find out that he was, apparently, married. Not only did he recognize a pesky vermin there, but also ended up sleeping with his bride's best friend on the night of his wedding. He then mistakenly entered a brothel looking for a meal, which again disappointed his bride. His father-in-law hence sent him to their family's training hall to fend for himself. But because he had travelled through time, he gained a tattered reincarnation bowl that requires him to swallow objects of all kinds...

title: Naming Technique of the Night
description: In the blue and purple neon, under the dense steel sky, the front end of the data torrent is the world after the technological revolution, and it is also the boundary between reality and illusion. Steel and body, past and future. Here, the outer world and the inner world coexist, and everything in front of you is like a wall of time. Darkness gradually shrouded. But you have to understand, my friend, that we cannot deal with darkness with tenderness, but with fire.

title: Bring It On, Your Royal Highnesses
alt_titles: The End of the Royal Family
description: A surgeon who tries to save a man before throwing himself from the hospital surface, but falls with him to die in her world and is born and lived another time in the body of a miserable woman committed suicide on her wedding day before marrying the worst princes and the most cruel and evil and before mingling with the palace that is ruthless and turns into a scapegoat … but the situation worsens completely when the heroine stabbed a princes in front of her husband to protect themselves but find themselves in a greater calamity … What kind of crazy adventures are waiting for ???

title: Shen Sheng
description:
Shen Sheng has always been obedient and never once deviated from the course set for him by his family and society. Everything changes when Cheng Mu–a literature professor–comes into his life. By accident, Shen Sheng discovers the young professor's secret. At the same time, the teacher also finds out about Shen Sheng's unique talent. Their lives will never be the same again…

---

 Official English translation on Comico's [Pocket Comics app](https://www.comico.io/pocket-comics)

title: Chaos Heavenly Emperor
alt_titles: The Secret of the Chaotic Heavenly Emperor
description: Chu Jianqiu, by chance, obtains the Chaos Heavenly Emperor Technique and rises from weakness to embark on a journey across the myriad worlds. With a single thought, he can shatter star seas and rend the heavens. With a single thought, he can slay demons and ghosts, and bury gods and devils! He overlooks the myriad gods and heavens.

title: The Not-So-Privileged Superhumans
alt_titles: A World Where Only Superhumans Are Harmed
Zhiyou Chao Nengli Zhe Shou Shanghai De Shijie
description: Superhumans are springing up all over the world. Instead of making human life easier, they unleash hell on Earth. To maintain order, the Department of Superhuman Defense is born. Superhumans are being exploited, tyrannized, and hunted down. It's a world in which superhumans don't belong.

title: Military Phoenix
description: As a military commander, I crossed over to the Sky Spirit Continent due to an accident. After opening my eyes, I encountered an inexplicable assassination. To that, I just wanted to say, "You messed with the wrong person!" I signed the system on the front foot, awakened the top spiritual power on the back foot, carrying a bazooka to do in the real culprit, stirring him up! The only thing that hurts is that there are too many people who are interested in me, so can I get to that actual perpetrator, huh?

title: Buried Injustice
description: Xue Zhao came looking for a missing woman in Chenjia Village. However, he learns that the village answers to a cult devoted to a forgotten Gu deity. Xue Zhao then tries to escape with his companions, but he soon realizes that there are even more terrifying, hidden secrets within the village. These unknown horrors go far beyond anything he could have imagined...

title: Shadow Hack
description:
By coincidence, Li Yunmu found a super machine from humanity’s age of darkness. From that point onwards, his ordinary life would never be the same! Aptitude? Innate talent? What are these? Could they be eaten?  
I have neither aptitude nor innate skill, but my shadow can level up using hacks. Experience, Ability points, battle prowess…….all of them could be hacked. Even while he is asleep or tired, he could still increase his skills.  
[Ding, your shadow has killed an ant, you have gained experience points and ability points.]

title: Even With Cheats, Am I Still the Weakest in the Sect?!
description: All my senior and junior disciples are reincarnated powerhouses, while I’m just an ordinary guy from a small third-tier city who somehow got tricked by my master into being a sect's babysitter. Luckily, this sect is overflowing with buffs, and I managed to awaken the Favorability Index System—collecting profiles of powerhouses, earning favorability points, and using their abilities. Life just got way more fun!

title: Monster Hunter - Rex's Dieting Plan (Doujinshi)
description: A Monster Hunter doujinshi about Rex, a Tigrex, putting on some weight and her dieting plans to combat this.

title: The Evil Young Master's Rules of Survival
alt_titles: Villainous Elder Young Master's Survival Laws
Survival Rules of the Villainous Great Young Master
Fanpai Da Shsoye De Qiusheng Faze
description: When I was playing games in the cyber cafe, my soul was suddenly transported into the body of the duke's third son with the same name as me. Is God giving me a great responsibility or is this redemption of my fate?Neither! He’s just another typical little brat of a fodder with the title of a rich playboy… My instincts tell me that I should be doing something! If not, I’ll never survive past episode three!Even though I say that he’s a typical fodder, why does this little brat have such good luck with women? Maids, rich daughters, lolis, mature ladies, even… Cross-dressers. Gosh, why wasn’t my past life this fulfilling? The world is a big place, but I’ve only been nesting inside a cyber cafe my entire past life… In this life, I’ll go around this prosperous world (with the ladies)! I’ll survive even if I’m just some typical fodder!

title: Houkai Gakuen - Side Stories
alt_titles: High School of Dead (HSoD) - Side Stories
description: A collection of Houkai Gakuen lost comics (deleted before HI3 released)

title: Two Way Trial - Youth
description: A collection of stories between two boys when they were still students.

title: Solitary Girl
description:
The personal safety measures of a woman traveling alone.  
  
After she is betrayed in a deal gone awry, Weiyi hits the road in order to find a place where she can live peacefully.  
  
[Author's Weibo.](https://www.weibo.com/dechuanjiakang?is_hot=1)

title: I'm Not An Evil Antagonist Actress
alt_titles: I'm Not an Evil Antagonist Actress
description: A b*tch-looking supporting actress made a pact with a handsome star actor with a creepy addiction for her career. Let's see how this strong girl will fight and reach her career success!

title: Fallen
description: From an out of control operation comes an underground partner. Despite knowing the dangers, they continue deeper…if love and hate are both doomed, would they turn a blind eye? or sink in the abyss

title: Muscle Mage
description:
In an era when magic is prevalent, the magician is the most powerful profession in society. Atilian, who is completely unable to practice magic, has a reason why he must become a great magician!

He relies on perseverance, passion and courage to conquer everyone around him!

title: Did the Nerd Manage to Flirt With the Cutie Today?
description: The moment omega, Wan Xing Shu transferred into the class, he became the target of the cunning Alpha, Chu He Zhou. After a series of services from the Alpha, who managed to flirt the omega to the point that his heart beats fast, his weak legs shaking and he wishes to be pushed down by the Alpha. Until a second year Alpha bully called Wan Xing Shu “Brother”, Chu He Zhou was confused. What is his soft and cute omega hiding?

title: The Strongest God of Elixir
description:
【Translation provided by the copyright owner.】 When an ancient God imprinted a divine mark on Gu Yun and weakened his spiritual power, he was demoted to the rank of a handyman and fell from his pedestal as a genius. Because of him, his father was deposed as patriarch and imprisoned by their rival family, the Feilu clan. However, Gu Yun quickly discovered the secret in his body and began working with the ancient God within him.

---
Gu Yun, a young gifted genius, is reduced to doing odd jobs at the Qing Shan sect because his spiritual energy was weakened from an ancient god’s seal. His father was also implicated, and had his role as head of the Qing Shan sect stripped, and was imprisoned by the opposing Feilu family. At this time, Gu Yun discovers the secret hidden within his body, and forms a pact with the ancient god…

title: Super Income Treasure
description:
When your mobile phone has a software that can generate countless money every day, what will you do?  
See how Song Ping relies on a money system to reach the peak of life!  
Beauty? Luxury cars? These are all things should be, there are things that can't be bought? Nonexistent!

title: The Hunter King
description: The story of a one-handed chef who became a champion at such a young age, but then suddenly transported to another world. Here we go again.

title: Looking for Clotho
description: What if one's death, especially by suicide, can be used to prolong another's life?

title: My Little Secret With the Demon Lord
alt_titles: I Can't Talk About Writing With the Devil
description: "Aunt, when I grow up… will you marry me?" No… No way! The kid was already thinking about making her his wife, but she is a minor immortal from the Immortal Yin World. She could not get together with a young human boy, no matter how ordinary she was. Yet, 500 years later, she was sent to congratulate the Yang Demon World’s young lord, Li Ye on his wedding. Wait a minute, the young lord looks familiar. Also, that woman he’s marrying is the physical body she left behind in the human world. To make things worse, he did not recognize her, and was trying to get her killed… Should she tell him the truth and clobber the brat’s handsome and immaculate face?

title: Jun and Wang Xin
description: Lu Wang Xin is the young miss of Yun Jian Mountain Villa. She fell in love with Xia Hou You. However, after Xia Hou You ascended the throne, he put Lu Wang Xin into the Cold Palace. Heartbroken, Lu Wang Xin died. Reborn at age 16, Lu Wang Xin embarked on the road of revenge…

title: Once Again
description: Yuan Ge, a director at an advertising firm, is interrupted in the midst of a meeting with the news that his long-estranged wife has passed away. He barely finds time to grieve for her, a woman he had long since ceased to love. Several days later, he is struck by the vision of a young girl on a subway bus, but she disappears the minute he looks away. This is a story of lost love, and of one man's personal journey.

title: As A Fated Villain, It’s Not Too Much To Destroy The Protagonist, Right?
alt_titles: Shen Wei Fanpai, Diao Da Zhujiao Buguo Fen Ba?
Shēn Wèi Fǎnpài, Diào Dǎ Zhǔjiǎo Bùguò Fèn Ba?
As a Villain, It Isn't Too Much to Hang the Protagonist Up and Beat Him, Right?
description: When Su Wuya transmigrated into a fantasy world, he became the heir of the prominent Su family. He was accompanied by a Narrator, whom he thought would be a powerful helper, but it just made fun of him all the time. During his training, he found out that he was actually the villain of the story! That was when he activated the Narrator Hint system. By beating up on the good guys, he can gain villain experience points that will unlock cheating hints from the Narrator!

title: Flower Protector King in the City
description: Xiao Yi, who came back from military service, accidentally opened the yin and yang to the gods. From then on, the power of the gods, the city, the face of the powerful bully… probably…

title: Shan Yue
description: Legend has it that when the three princes of the Feng Country returned to fight for the throne, they brought back a stunning juvenile named Shan Yue. Shan Yue soon became a prey among the princes. And the conspiracy hidden in him, has also lifted off the tip of the iceberg. Vengeance, schemes, imperial power, heart-tormenting, what kind of future will Shan Yue be heading towards?

title: Monster in the Lake Village
description: The story is set in the Nanling Mountains during the turn of the century (roughly late 1990s to early 2000s). It focuses on local folklore, urban legends, and supernatural strange tales from that specific region.

title: A Record of a Mortal's Journey to Immortality—Immortal World Arc
alt_titles: Mortal's Cultivation: To the Realm of Immortals
description: 10,000 years after the beginning of the story, in the Spirit realm, the fox girl Liu Le'er's clan was wiped out by the blood saber sect, and she herself was also hunted down. Traumatized and injured Liu Le'er hides under a big rock, just when the three immortal cultivators who were hunting her were about to kill her, the rock suddenly burst open, and a plain-looking man emerges from inside..

title: Please Take Care
description: Help! Why is my blind date my 'ex'-boyfriend?!

title: Beast World Crazy Concubine
alt_titles: Shou Shi Kuang Fei: Bu Dang Yijie Nühaiwang
Wild Consort in the Beast World
description: Ji Mo travelled to the Orc Continent, and there are handsome male beasts who can fly in animal skins and long legs. She has become the most admired female in the entire Orc Continent. Every male wants Ji Mo to give birth to cubs. . “No! Let go of me! My ideal is not to lie down and give birth every day!” Ji Mo struggled in the arms of the handsome male beast.

title: Beyond the Mountains and the Sea
description: A princess of the fallen Spirit Clan plans to take her kingdom back and get revenge for her family. Along the way, she meets several trustworthy friends, but just as they are about to succeed, the conspiracy from a century ago reveals itself. Facing the choice of completing her revenge or saving the world, which will she choose?

title: Qitan Huawuyu
alt_titles: A Beautiful Tale of Flower Stories
description:
Because of you, I can have hope for the future. I'm willing to pay any price for these true feelings.

Because of an unfulfilled desire, Yongen appears before Yingzi as a ghost. With Yongen having lost her memories, will Yingzi help her recall her incomplete wish?

For a wish, Mari breaks off a sambar deer's antler, which causes her body to change in strange ways. How will Hezhou help her best friend return the antler and make everything right?

Lanying is immediately drawn to Yansheng, who is fated to bear her family's curse. How will Lanying give it her all to help the person she loves escape her fate?

Mirong and ah-Mao were just online friends at first. After a trip to see different tiger gods, they come to learn more about each other. What will happen between them as they grow ever closer?

Four stories, four relationships. They might only have been a brief part of each other's lives, or they might have left a deep imprint in each other's hearts. But it's doubtless that their heartfelt emotions are worth treasuring.

title: Red Envelope Fairy Group
alt_titles: Red Envelope of the Three Realms
description: The unlucky male protagonist accidentally joins the fairy chat group, and an extraordinary student life starts like this

title: Fugou Keiji Balance: Unlimited - DaiHaru Doujins
description: Short daiharu comics

title: Immortal World’s First Undercover Agent
alt_titles: The First Undercover Agent in the Immortal World
description: After transmigrating, the male protagonist who obtained a divine physique was entrusted with important tasks by various forces and became an undercover agent?! Jumping between righteous cultivation, demonic cultivation, demons, dragons, and collecting harem members, he will become the king of the world!

title: My Perfect Enemy is Finally Broke
alt_titles: My Nemesis Has Finally Gone Bankrupt
description:
When he woke up, Ji Ran, the son of a rich second generation, found himself lying beside his arch-nemesis from his school days. Qin Man! 

Despite reluctantly agreeing to a sponsorship agreement with the green tea black belly enemy, Ji Ran finds his lonely and stubborn heart gradually melting by the occasional tenderness displayed by Qin Man. 

[Scheming and gentle green tea x Sharp tongue but soft-hearted and charming person]

Behing the facade of a sponsorship agreement lies a decade-long unrequited love.

title: I Will Wait for You in the Next Life
description: The love and hatred that began three hundred years ago caused Jiang Muxia and Ren Juntian to brush past one another. When these star-crossed lovers meet again after three hundred years, will she fall in love with the young, passionate tyrannical chairman, or the chivalrous "Robin Hood" him?

title: The Supreme Almighty Master Remake
description: The young man, Xia Tian, suddenly obtained x-ray vision and from then on began series of infinite blessings. He was apprenticed to martial arts masters, made friends with treasure experts, and won the favor of countless women... He continued to grow and became the Supreme Almighty Master one step at a time.

title: Evolution
description: A series of suspenseful, creepy stories that'll make you think about human nature. A hair raising series by Zhu Gengfu, entitled "Evolution". Shhh… Don't be scared~

title: Doctor Du Ming
description: Du Ming, young anesthesiologist in a large Chinese hospital, is haunted by the memory of Zhang Qian: a young lady from his alma mater, who bewitched him with her sulfurous beauty and the peculiar aura she emits. After graduating, Du Ming stayed in touch with her, but a terrible piece of news arose: the young lady has committed suicide.

title: Isle of Farewell and Reunion
description:
Giving up her top job to live alone on the island, the writer Elly meets her younger schoolmate Rhea, thus their story starts...
Check out how the scheming junior courts her reserved dream lover!

title: When The System Opens After The Age Of 100, All Grandchildren Kneel Upon The Mountains!
alt_titles: Bai Sui Kai Xitong, Xiaozi Xiansun Gui Man Shan!
Opening the System at a Hundred Years Old, Filial Children and Virtuous Grandchildren Kneeling All Over the Mountain!
description: Xiao Chen, a time-traveler nearing the age of one hundred, was peacefully preparing to spend the rest of his life. Suddenly, a system activated, rewarding him for his family’s childbirth. Not only would he become stronger, but his lifespan would also reverse! “Procreate, quickly procreate!” he exclaimed. “Everyone in the family, regardless of age or gender, give birth, give birth, give birth!”

title: The Overachiever's Black Tech System
alt_titles: Xueba De Hei Keji Xitong Qianyue
Xuébà De Hēi Kējì Xìtǒng Qiānyuē
description: Using the Black Technology System, the protagonist enters a world of knowledge, where he improves his learning efficiency by a factor of one billion! He becomes the smartest human in existence, gets rich using his super brain… and experiences the loneliness of being a leader.

title: The Last Dynasty
description:
The story is about a university student named Gao Ying, who happened to be staying at a hotel in an old town with many mysteries and suddenly got caught up in a conflict, a disaster from hundred of years ago. Here, for the first time ever, the truth of the world will be revealed to his eyes. A mysterious story filled with spiritual elements and humor.  


---

[Artist's Weibo](https://www.weibo.com/crowfei14)  


---

title: The Jobless Guy Who Has Come to Slay
alt_titles: Quán Mín Zhuǎn Zhí: Wú Zhí De Wǒ Zhōngjiéle Shénmíng!
Job Changing for the Entire Population: The Jobless Me Will Terminate the Gods
description:
That year, the world changed, the game came to reality, and the magic disaster began to wreak havoc.

In order to resist all this, everyone must plan their career options, level up wildly, and strive to become stronger.

Some people chose the noble mages, and the second turn decides the element mages. Some people chose summoners, and their summons emerge in an endless stream, beating the enemy to death.

But what is shocking among them is that Yun Chen, a college student who had high expectations, chose not to change his profession and stays as classless!

title: Daxia Swordsman
description: He is Lu Wu Wei. Seven years ago, he was a nobody. In the midst of family infighting and power struggles, he was framed by traitors, expelled from his family, and stripped of his abilities, earning the nickname “Shame of the Capital.” Seven years passed, and Lu Wu Wei became the most accomplished man alive, invincible in the world. His personal guard, all legendary War Gods, are honored in history as the Da Xue Dragon Cavalry.

title: True Story
description:
From creator's pixiv:  
True story happening around.  
Just wanna draw them for memorizing

title: Shi Cao Lao Long Bei Guanyi E Long Zhi Ming - Chushan Rushi Pian
alt_titles: The Herbivorous Old Dragon is Named the Evil Dragon - Coming Out of the Mountains and Entering the World
description: A 5000-year old vegan dragon was living peacefully when one day a young girl showed up in his cave. She offered herself as a sacrifice in order to gain favor for her village. He played along as the great "Evil Dragon, the Demon Lord's Army Leader" in order to get rid of her. However, his little white lie awoken her hidden powers and his peaceful life suddenly ended.

title: Dragon and the Phoenix
description: A Phoenix egg falls from the sky into the sea dragon realm, there the egg hatched into a beautiful and innocent little girl and when she wakes up there is a handsome (but dumbfounded) Dragon beside her…

title: Checkmate! Capture My Heart
description: Lin Bo and Zheng Xiaotao have always been secretly attracted to each other, but because they don't know of each other's feelings, they're too embarrassed to confess. Helpless, they each turn to their own sisters. Lin Bo's little sister is a great god-like BL writer, while Zheng Xiaotao's elder sister is a great god-like BL novel reader. The two girls, priding themselves on their perfect qualifications, supply the two with a wealth of ideas. A light-hearted romantic comedy thus begins...

title: Reborn in a Cyber Cultivation World, I Fight My Way to the Top
description:
In the era of the "new Divine Land," the old sects stand on the brink of annihilation, crushed under the heel of the cyber-enhanced New Sects. Ling Chen, a disciple of the fading Fortune Sect, witnesses his brethren and father humiliated and slaughtered in the New Sects' ruthless purge. Swearing vengeance, he clings to life... until the latent power of his sect's forbidden skills, the "veiled skills," awakens within him.

At death's door, Ling Chen becomes the perfect vessel for the primordial True God of Time. Reborn with the wrath of the ancients and the might of a god, he returns to the continent drenched in blood.

His path is clear: Carve a new epoch from the corpses of the New Sects.

title: Life Exchange Club
description:
Zhao Yan has offended the gorgeous counselor Chen Yurou because he was pranked by his three roommates in the same dormitory and faced the predicament of being punished by Chen Yurou. At this time, the Life Exchange Club system is activated, and Zhao Yan enters the main hall of the system and embarks on the path of life exchange with members of different levels in the same club. By solving problems for those who are exchanged and fulfilling dreams, he exchanges items, strengthens physical strength, and finally step by step rises to become a CEO, conquers the beauties with riches, and has a wonderful life with luxury cars and mansions.


---

- [Japanese](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0003524)

title: Survivor of the 100 Days
description: Winner winner, chicken dinner! The girls are isolated on a deserted island for the Reality Television show of Murder Game. Who will be the sole survivor after a hundred days？

title: Legend of Dragon Mates
description: The dragon girl met her dragon hunter when her hometown was consumed by flames. The hunter protected her by forming the Partner Alliance-a sacred contract bonding the destined two together-and dragged her out of the sea of fire. Together, they set out seeking revenge. Little did they know that…by taming her, he was also tamed by her.

title: ChronoGo
description:
Wilted leaves beside the board, empty seats between the towering trees, a passerby who chose to put down a stone in the middle of the board, unbeknownst to him eons have passed… Waking up from his slumber, Ji Yuan found himself as a half-blind beggar. Armed with only a sword and his wits, he will venture forth into this danger-filled world.

(Source: MangaUpdates)

title: The Story About Time
description: A young girl named Fu, travels into the past to make sure that her parents don't get together...

title: Your Memes Are Better Looking Than You
alt_titles: Nǐ De Biǎoqíng Bāo Bǐ Běnrén Hǎokàn
description:
Gu Wei: the infamous lead dancer in boy band T.ATW who has more anti-fans than fans.  
  
Jiang Xun: the captain of Team TMW, an esports team that tops the ranks in FPS game 'Shou Ze'.  
  
Through their meddling parents… the two suddenly become engaged! But Jiang Xun, who thinks Gu Wei is his fan, never expected to hear Gu Wei say, "Your reaction memes are better-looking than you."

title: Shoujo Kageki Revue Starlight - Maya and Claudine in Hogwarts School Of Witchcraft and Wizardry (Doujinshi)
description:
Claudine wonders how Maya is able to so perfectly call forth a patronus when Claudine herself is struggling to achieve the same. (Doujinshi - 2 Volumes Total)  
  
Source Anime: Shoujo Kageki Revue Starlight ☆

title: I'll Let You Touch My Tail
alt_titles: I'll Touch the Fox's Tail for You
description:
In order to repay the kindness of saving his life, the little fox wants to make the Unsmiling Wolf smile once! Even if the little fox has to step into the realm of half animal, half humanity, becoming a strange creature with ears and a tail (＞ ＜) 

"But as long as I am here, you will never be alone⭐️🌟"
❤️The tale of the little fox and the Unsmiling Wolf commences!

title: Antidote
description:
A good-for-nothing young master without a single redeeming feature is driven out of his house by his family with nothing but the clothes he has on. A street thug with a dark childhood who is plagued with a mental illness. A fight at the dumpster started a no discord, no concord* destiny between Cheng Ke, the young master who has an extreme disability in living and taking care of himself, and Jiang Yudou, the guy who loves using brute force without reason. Ever since then, they became the only redemption in each other’s dark life.  
  
You’re my antidote, and I’ll take you when I’m sick.  
  
(*Note: No discord, no concord is a chinese proverb that means if there is no fighting, there can be no friendship made.)

title: Daddy President Is Awesome
description:
Four years ago, she left in despain heart-broken. Four years later, she came back, with a kid by her side. Before she could settle down, the first thing (or man) she has to deal with is this unreasonable CEO, who cannot be greener when it comes to hitting on a girl… 

The moment he sees her, his whole linguistic system is reduced to four words 一"I. WANT. YOUR. SON!" Who the heck will use this type of pickup line?


* [Official Indonesian Translation](https://mangatoon.mobi/id/detail/5861)

title: The Broken Girl and the Devil's Bride
description: Yue Yan was supposed to be married to God. However, the wedding was disrupted by Lan Wu Yue, and the seal of the devil was broken in the process. God split the universe in two in a fit of anger. The devil was banished and took Xue Yan with him. In the confrontation between the humans and the devil, Xue Yan got to know…

title: Face Amnesia Girl
description: Lu Chi is a girl who gets along easily with other girls, but her interaction with males are limited to superficial greetings. With face amnesia specific to only males, all male faces look the same to her, she cannot remember any male face even if she tries her hardest to do so, or tries to do so from their clothes. But today, someone different has appeared.

title: Rules of Lips and Tongue
description: In order to find his mysteriously missing sister, racer Han Zai Yu goes to a famous nightclub called J Club. But rather, he found out the dark industry hidden in the normal business of the nightclub, is a "banquet of ladies" serving the upper class, and he bumps into a mysterious man, Liu Yuan, who disguises himself as a woman and seems to be both good and evil. Can the two find out the hidden secrets of the nightclub? Who controls all this behind the scenes?

title: Endless Cage
description: What do I do if I’m getting along too well with a child I’ve practically raised?! Wait! Hold on! I’ve thought of you as a brother, and yet you want to-

In the game, he plays as a strong character nearing the level cap. However, in real life, Lu Siqi is a highschooler with nothing left to live for. Only thinking about what is the meaning of being alive and death.
Operating as a meek female character in the game, in reality, Shi Liu is a self proclaimed sentient beast who is finding his next interesting prey behind the monitor screen......
The new update in《Fantasy ONLINE》added many new high level equips in the medium difficulty instance "Deville Labyrinth", which attracted many players to form groups.
Just like that, 647 who is planning to challege the instance, and Sixteen_16 who is looking for a new prey, met each other at the entrance of the instance—

title: Martial brother, please don't run away~
description:
When Wang Xiaomie awoke, he discovered that he had been reborn and buried underground for over a thousand years, even living in a double room! 
This handsome guy, who was wearing the same red wedding dress, kissed him! ! 
What can this weak, helpless, and ugly man do! ?

In order to revive his senior brother, he collected countless fortunes, built an underground tomb, found the legendary Acacia tree, and finally waited with him in the coffin for thousands of years without hesitation. 

But this person involved had no memory of this!!

title: God’s Identity Card
description:
Forensic medicine student Lu Lanqiao became the biggest suspect in "killing" his brother overnight. The words his brother said before his death set him on the road of escape. In order to find out who killed his brother, Lu Lanqiao and the detective who was chasing him, Fucheng, met and the relationship between the two fugitives and their pursuers gradually changed...

**Links:**
- Defunct Official English - [Bilibili Comics](https://www.bilibilicomics.com/detail/mc3397)

title: The Strongest Scholar System
alt_titles: Super God Starts From Falling In Love With The Schoolgirl
Legendary! It Started With a Date
Super God and School Beauty Initially Love
Chao Shen Cong He Xiaohua Lian'ai Kaishi
description: Adapted from the novel 'The Most Powerful Learning System', Su Mo discovers that the secret to academic excellence is... love. Who says dating gets in the way of your studies? With the Learning System installed, anyone can become a star student instantly!

title: Transmigrating as the Younger Sister of a Bigshot with Multiple Identities
description: Dear Villainesses, you lost your fiancé and I lost my one billion! Just when I had received news that I inherited my family’s assets, I immediately transmigrated into a cookie cutter villainess story, as the hated villainess right after “I” made enemies of everyone in the story! Now witness me slither my way into everyone’s heart and reach the ending of the story in one piece!

title: Mirror Prepayment
description:
Shen Jin Feng was eating when he was suddenly pulled into another dimension. In this world, survival depends on defeating monsters and leveling up, with everyone having a basic status panel for guidance. However, Shen Jin Feng quickly discovered that his panel was different. At first, he could only summon mirror images of enemies, but soon he realized he could even preclaim battle rewards — obtaining enemy mirror images, equipment, and experience before winning the fight.

Although the number of mirror images he could summon was limited, each one represented the pinnacle of its class. Moreover, Shen Jin Feng could directly log into these mirror images and personally control them in battle.

In this world, some humans who arrived earlier had formed powerful hegemonies. They monopolized territories, bullied new arrivals, and hoarded resources — even requiring their permission just to fight monsters. To overthrow these tyrants, Shen Jin Feng, alongside his summoned mirror images, engaged in fierce battles against them.

title: Charging War Girl
description: A generation of soldiers is hidden in the city. However, he got clues about his missing girlfriend by accident and eventually returned to the army. Participate in the military's most mysterious "Inverse Scale Project". Here, he and a group of female demon from hell met unexpectedly. Fight together in a bloody battle, cross the battlefield, and interpret a legend of war that turned upside down.

title: The Researcher and her Undead Husband
description: A oneshot about a researcher and her husband who cannot die.

title: I Only Want to Be With You
description: "I only want to listen to music with you, only play games with you, I want to do everything with you. But, you reject me twice in one day. Are you even human? *angry face* I thought we would be gay together?!" "Stupid"

title: Losing Money to Be a Tycoon
alt_titles: Kuī Chéng Shǒufù Cóng Yóuxì Kāishǐ
Losing Money to Become the Richest Person Starts From the Game
description:
Finding himself back in time 10 years ago, though technically an almost parallel world in 2009, Pei Qian got a system where he gets money to run his business. 

The funds for business and personal use are separated. 

After a set period, he can earn his personal funds according to how much his business funds he has left. 

The catch? Pei Qian earns more when he makes a loss in his business funds.

Happily thinking how easy it would be, with many failed start-ups proving a point, Pei Qian founded his company Tengda and achieved financial freedom through the losses. 

Unfortunately, fate has other plans for him.

- - -
Best boss ever, prodigy of the business world, genius creator, visionary of the century. These are the descriptions used for Pei Qian, President of Tengda Corporation. Ever since his rebirth, Pei Qian finds himself in possession of a system that rewards him if he manages to lose money. Instantly, a brilliant idea comes to mind — making crappy games!

title: The Bride who Raises the Villainous Dragon
description:
"It seems a magnificent dragon has fallen head over heels for me?"

Pearl, the cursed daughter of a noble, was on her way to being sold off to a neighboring lord when she was suddenly kidnapped. But the one who kidnapped her is none other than Erik— a descendant of the Great Dragons. This enchanting yet fierce dragon confronted Pearl with a single demand, to say the words "I like you."...

title: Transient Life Stories
alt_titles: Back in Ancient Times to Become a Goddess
description:
A thousand years ago, she was a small tree spirit that fell in love with the Water God. After enduring a tragic love story where the water god was decimated, she lived alone into the modern times, becoming the owner of a dessert shop named "Non Stop". 

Her specialty is a type of tea called Blissful Life, which attracts all sorts of weird customers. Every customer that drinks her tea, they all end up telling her their life story, and these stories are often the love stories of demons and beasts, filled with passion and vengeance.

title: Shoujo Kageki Revue Starlight - FuD Revue Starlight Works Compilation (Doujinshi)
description: A compilation of <https://twitter.com/fudfudddd> Revue Starlight works from twitter.

title: Without Parallel
description: The smartest man, Luo Xiao, and the affluent prince, Yan An Cheng, wander from place to place to find clues about the legendary “Heavenly Stairway”. They encounter many bizarre cases along the way, and gradually, they uncover a hidden conspiracy…

title: Shengshi Li Hua Dian
alt_titles: The Prosperity of Li Hua Palace
description: Na Ning was mistreated in her previous life, and in her next life, she vowed to make those who harmed her pay double for what they did to her. On her next journey, she was constantly faced with danger. She only trusted herself, only to find that things were not as simple as she thought. Love and regret entangled together, chaos and war rising, the political power is changing. And her memory came back to her as if she just woke up from a dream. It turns out that everything was part of a conspiracy that has nothing to do with him! She meets him again, but as a stranger. Can they let go of the past and continue to move on?

title: Get Off! Dr. Ghost
description:
Should a doctor save lives or ... spirits? No doctor in this world would ever ponder this question except for Chu Han, a muddleheaded medical student who has a life-changing encounter with Shen Xingzhi – the egotistic spirit of a self-claimed medical expert.

---

**Official English Translation**:
- [Webnovel](https://www.webnovel.com/comic/get-off!-dr.-ghost_21288715006080801) (Dropped at ch.81)
- [Wecomics](https://wecomics.com/comic/index/id/747?id=747) (Defunct)

title: Abnormal Hunting
description: The disaster that happened twenty years ago didn't just leave behind painful memories in Wuge City. It also brought upon unusual changes that were occurring quietly… These mutations didn't happen in just the body, but more in the human heart…

title: Princess's Happily-ever-after Marriage
alt_titles: The Princess Consort's Marriage Study Guide
description:
She is the top killer in the modern world. However, she one day travels to the past and is reincarnated as a loser, which is the unfavored daughter of the former Zhenbeihou. 
What? Her husband is a man that even the emperor is frightened of—the number one fighter in the country that all men are afraid of and all women are crazy over—Prince Ming?

They have been married for two years but have never met before? Who said that she has to stick to the rules after getting married? Check out how she uses the program to cheat, defeats the other bitches, and captures the hearts of handsome men from all walks of life.

title: The Devil’s Body Temperature
description:
Bei Yao, a cheerful four-year-old, was reborn into 1996 and found herself living next door to a boy destined to become a formidable villain in the future. This boy, Pei Chuan, was only five at the time, confined to a wheelchair and deeply insecure.

Years later, when they were teenagers, Bei Yao had blossomed into the school's most admired beauty. Despite her popularity, Pei Chuan remained guarded and distant. When Bei Yao confessed her feelings for him, he reacted with a mixture of fear and longing.

Having known each other for two lifetimes, Bei Yao was determined to understand the complexities of Pei Chuan's character. As their bond deepened, she discovered a sensitive and vulnerable soul beneath his tough exterior. Their story is one of a healing love that blossoms between childhood sweethearts, as Bei Yao's warmth gradually melts away Pei Chuan's emotional barriers.

title: Start Invincible
description: Ye Wu took just two days to build his foundation, a peerless genius. Excited to leave seclusion, he was shocked to discover that two thousand years had passed, and his sect had long ceased to exist. Helplessly stepping out of the mountains, he found a world that was terrifyingly unfamiliar. Mighty figures could ‘fly’ through the air from afar, and powerful cultivators were in control from behind the scenes through ‘mobile phones.’ Ye Wu trembled with astonishment, utterly shaken. Little did he know that he might be the last cultivator on Earth, already unmatched in the mortal realm!

title: The Strongest Guardian Who Devours Gods and Demons
alt_titles: After Swallowing the Devil God, I Started to Evolve
I Evolved After Devouring the Demon God
Tūn Xià Móshén Hòu Wǒ Kāishǐ Jìnhuà
description: He accidentally entered the forbidden area and gained the ability to “devour the wasteland”! How will he who would become a “monster” fulfill his childhood sweetheart’s last wish? With the “curse” of the devil, the bloody adventure of the mysterious continent begins…

title: Arknights: Prelude Suite: Cadenza Virtuosa
alt_titles: Arknights | Prelude Suite: Unrestrained Cello Notes
description: Arknights | Prelude Suite : Unrestrained Cello Notes is a one-shot that acts as the epilogue of Hortus de Escapismo, elaborating on the the past relationship of Arturia and Federico.

title: Carp With Thousand Eyes
description: The Thousand Eyed Carp, a monster that lives forever has a desire to leave this world.  However in her attempts to do so, she kept getting saved again and again by humans. Because of the acts of kindness displayed by humans, she gradually dispelled this idea , fully integrating into the human society.

title: In the Beginning, the Ancient Demon Saint Used Me as a Cauldron
description: The first step of cultivation is to make a contract with a demonic familiar. He was untalented and unwanted, until he runs into an ancient demon lord, who happens to take the form of a sexy girl with a tail! She tells him that his foundations are strong and his bloodline is powerful. But this demon is just too alluring, and everyone wants take her away from him. It’s up to him to protect his own demon!

title: No Words
description: This is a two-person comic without any dialogue. A blossoming romance between a boy and a girl.

title: Dungeon Breaker
alt_titles: I Grind Dungeons Around the World
description:
"Game over and you're over. But I will be the only winner."

Su Mu wakes up to find himself in a parallel world where everyone reaches the age of 18 is mandated to participate in a game called Space which consists of a series of deadly survival games. How will Su Mu, a former private detective, survive the very first death-dealing hide & seek game?

title: Global Power: I Can Control All The Elements
alt_titles: Quanqiu Yineng: Wo Zhangkong Suoyou Yuansu
Quánqiú Yìnéng: Wǒ Zhǎngkòng Suǒyǒu Yuánsù
Global Power: I Can Control All the Elements
description: Qin Feng travels to a parallel universe and finds that the Earth has changed and elementalists have become the masters of humanity. Relying on the awakened system, Qin Feng embarks on the path of escalating from the bottom to becoming a god!

title: Xie Yan Chuan Shuo
description: Legends tell there exist a single being whom embraced death to kill the Gods. Before death, he managed to create three eyes to hold his immense power and was then thrown down to the world of humans.

title: Forbidden City · Impurrial Cat Room
alt_titles: The Forbidden City: Cat Imperial Study
description: There are special creatures that live in the modern Forbidden City. By day, they're the idols of the Forbidden City, and a simple yawn can earn the squeals of the crowd! By night, they're the protectors of the Forbidden City who watch over the restoration of cultural relics! While they could've lived day to day on their cute appearances alone, they've chosen to bear the burden of preserving culture and safeguarding relics. They're the Forbidden City's Impurrial Cats!

title: Renzu Zhenshou Shi
description: Reincarnate into an demon-infested world, bring forth golden light unto humble creatures—demons and monsters. Shine light upon mysteries. Life or Death—at mere arm's length.

title: My Majesty Your Grace
description: The entanglement between the young handsome general and the black-bellied emperor! Just because the general looked exactly like the emperor's most hated love rival, he was forced to endure the threats and torture that he shouldn't have. Between them, love and hate are entwined and carved into the blood, indistinguishable from each other…

title: Go Away, Let Me Be Cute First!
description: This is a series of short serialized manhua stories that focuses on cats' daily lives. It centers on interesting everyday life stories of a sweet naive cat called "Fu Gui" and an arrogant cat called "Fa Cai", as well as their sentimental owner Niu Hong Hong.

title: This Sweet Online Date Is a Disaster
alt_titles: Sweet Online Dating Has Been Overturned?!
description: I was helping my sister win the heart of the game's top-ranked player, but it turned out to be a total disaster! I was even ridiculed by that gaming master!!! I guess no one can defy Murphy's Law! Just as the game was loading... Ding! Notice: Your husband is now online!

title: Love and Sweet Drugs
description:
One day, I couldn't eat sweets and became weaker to the point of making my heart nearly stopped beating; until I met someone who could make my strength stronger and longer for a period of time - a patissier!
But, after his girlfriend's death, he wouldn't make any sweets anymore and opened a café instead, selling the bitterest coffee ever.
So, to save my life, I'll definitely make sure you return to making sweets again!
Please, please~

title: My Mythical Beast Can Evolve Infinitely
alt_titles: Infinite Level Up With the Mythical Beast

title: Peach Branch Bubbles
description:
Tao Zhi, an infamous figure in Laboratory School 1, dominated the bottom rankings all year round. One day, according to rumour, Miss Tao somehow fell for the legendary academic big boss—the school’s only hope to defeat neighbouring schools, the top scorer in the college entrance exam: Jiang Qihuai. Some research revealed that the boss’s type was someone who was 1) good-natured and 2) good at studying. Those who scored less than 700 points weren’t even worth mentioning. Tao Zhi wasn’t good-natured either, so she started practicing 5 exams/3 years*, turning herself into a ruthless test-answering machine that woke up early and stayed up late to study for 2 weeks, and scored 350 points.

Tao Zhi: Look, I like you so much, how about you let this one go and let me take the test again?

How to conquer a Bking**--from 300 to 700 points--in what world does a lady as beautiful as a flower who comes from a rich family like me get looked down on, isn’t it because you’re a coward king?

*referring to a workbook that simulates 5 college exams and 3 years of school
**internet slang for someone who acts cool/like a king

title: ShaZi
description: A pair of innocent childhood friends–because of an unfortunate event in the family, the two begin to live separate lives. Around 10 years later, the two reunite after experiencing devastating changes, but the only thing that won’t change is that they will never be apart again.

title: Blood-drinking Always Works
description: In order to find out how her brother went missing, Ye chu applied into a prestigious Academy of fine arts. When she started to investigate there, she found her brothers old work in a art galley, and at the silence of the night she was sucked into the art work. Get ready to see the unsolved mysteries of this investigation.

title: The Emperor is a Pervert!
alt_titles: Nèishì Měitiān Dū Xiǎng Lí Huángshàng Yuǎn Diǎn
His Majesty Only Likes to Sleep with Men
description:
I became a eunuch as soon as I transmigrated? Fine, a eunuch it is, I'll climb my way up to the top and find a way to wear modern clothes and become a normal man again. My mind is a tangled mess, and I'm going crazy....suddenly, someone interrupts my hopes and dreams: "Mister Xie, tonight the Emperor will sleep with you."

 "......Nani?!"

title: The Flower of Heaven
description: The female botanist An Lan tripped on a snowy mountain and accidentally fell into the legendary and mysterious country – Floscaeli. What’s more, she was hailed as the prophesied “goddess” and the future queen… Between romance and politics, a story of dreamlike love slowly unfolds…

title: Journey to the World Sword
description:
During the war in the Heng Dynasty, princess Ji Yunyang summoned the so-called "nation's saviour" at the cost of her life. As a result, the soul of Zhang Fang, an ordinary female college student from the 21st century ended up in the princess' body. The only way for her to return back to her original world is to fulfil the original princess' will– finding the world sword and restoring her country Hengguo. Thus begins the forced journey of 21st century Ji Yunyang, maid Xiaoqin, and guard Wu Fei to locate the "sword of the world".  
  
~ Chie

title: Hunt Twelve Saints
description: How much do you understand about our world? have you been to hell before?can you see the future? all of these are not important ! the bell of apocalypse has sounded! li da sen , a policeman who came back from hell seeking revenge , will he stop the apocalypse or destroy the earth even more ? how will his life turn out? how will the world change?

title: From Me To You
description: A woman has called her son's lover to give her something. Is it money? Or maybe something else?

title: Gentlefolk Queen
description:
During the day, she is a beautiful eye-catching idol celebrity, yet she just ran into the lecherous CEO. At the first sign of disagreement. he begins to harass her. "Baby, don't run away."  
  
At night, she discards the celebrity halo, and reverts to an ordinary girl. She thought no one would be able to figure out her double life, yet the lecherous CEO turns out to be her fiance's uncle? OMG! What kind of situation is this? "Uncle, you can't do this…."

title: Dead or Deadline
description: A man named Chen Ji was obsessed with a manhua called "Assassin A" when he was a child, causing him wanting to become a manhua artist. After years of hard work, he finally succeeded in becoming an assassin. Today's assassination target is a special person...

title: Hunter and Snow
description:
The third son of the Dong Hai dragon palace who was born with a useless dragon soul? And he wants to become the hero of the dragons? That's ridiculous!   
  
Ao Xue grew up despised by everyone and never thought he’d have a chance to get close to the person that he longed for. Luckily, a dazzling beam of light began shining on his life……

title: Hunting Game
description: Ye Feng Wu, a capable male actor who debuted after filming in an X-rated movie, is known as the pinnacle of the age of beauty in the entertainment industry. During a vacation in Europe, he met the mysterious rich man, Augustine, and an intimate and dangerous relationship began. Emotions, gambling, wealth, dark past and a hidden truth…

title: The Strongest Commoner in the Academy of Immortal Cultivators
description: In the era of immortal cultivators, spiritual energy and martial arts became daily necessities for all people.“It’ll be fine is long as I’m around.”This is the story of a prince with great potential within him and his journey to become a king.On his path to the throne, the prince would save the world many times with the tricks up his sleeves.

title: Night of Chaos
description: When he was young, Yin was abandoned and became a hostage. The two emperors met, and in the end, who will conquer who? Who will be tamed?"

title: God of War
description: Within the Nine Prefectures, there are many kingdoms. Rumor has it that deep in the desolate lands, masters are as common as the clouds. They have the ability to go against their fates! Outside the Savage Beast Mountain Range, in a small city called Stone City, there is only one person who goes against the will of the heavens and changes his fate.

title: Player
description: During a late-night, there was a bizarre murdering case in an alley of a small town. A few youngsters met a psycho murderer on their way home after a night-shift. After fighting, they found out that the psycho murderer was invulnerable. At that decisive moment, an ‘angel’ appeared and killed the evil. However, who was the ordinary-looking ‘angel’ that gambled with the devils? The kindness and evilness of humans will not only determine the success or failure of the gamble; it will also determine the fate of all humans.

title: I Am the Rising Villain
alt_titles: I Am the King of the Game
description: How does a handicapped closed beta player survive in a game after crossing over? Fortunately, I am the original author of this game. What devils and angels, let me show you what a father’s love is like!

title: Demon's Ear
description:
Suffering from auditory hallucinations, he, known as a cold president, could always hear the thoughts of the people around him. There was one time when he accidentally heard female lead singing, it seems as though the noisy voices in his head were gone. When he heard her sing, he instantly turned into a sweet boy...

A hilarious and warming story now starts!

title: I Said I’d Do Science Popularization, But All My Fans Are Witches?
alt_titles: I Said I'd Make Science Content... So Why Are All My Fans Witches?!
I Wanted to Do Science Outreach but All My Fans Turned Out to Be Witches?
You Promised to Popularize Science But All Your Fans Are Witches?
description: Shep, who wanted to be a popular science UP host, traveled to another world – this is a world where only women have magic power, and magic power is productivity, magic power is power! Shep, who started out with a broken heart, hooked up with the weak and poor lord “Witch of Disaster” Reina. Unexpectedly, he turned his life around and started popular science and production construction in another world? A double harvest of career and love? !

title: Memory-Erasing Bell
description:
“Give your life to me, and I’ll help you forget a person.” As a result, countless people go for it and use part of their life to exchange for a peaceful life. Heartbroken past is hidden in the hairpin of the imperial noble consort and the spiritual sword of the stylite.

“Don’t you even have someone that you want to forget?”

“Yeah, but I’ve already forgotten him.”

---
**Alternate Raws:** [iQiyi Manhua](https://www.iqiyi.com/manhua/detail_18yzm972cl.html), [U17](https://www.u17.com/comic/182884.html), [Yizhikan](https://www.yizhikan.com/comic/13030), [Zymk](https://www.zymk.cn/3669/)
**Official Translations:** [English (Webcomics)](https://www.webcomicsapp.com/comic/5dc271148c252b053a3b6896), [English (Flying Lines)](https://www.flying-lines.com/comic/memory-erasing-bell)
Official Animated Version: [Ake Animation on YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLokmx9AcsdTfyWucgbtnaHVp1sdvfoQsJ)  
Official Subtitled Version: [S1](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLo11RdjLkdJCnxPC3o10Syk53nsqBhJk_)

title: Getting Married Is Not Easy
description: A manly girl met a girly man when they found out the affair between her fiance and his fiancee. After one night together, they were forced to play a couple and started learning from each other to become more "marriageable". But when they finally found someone "ideal" to marry to, they began to realize who's their true love…

title: Lovecraftian Plague Doctor
description:
In the old days, the streets in the downtown area are now dead silent. Hoarse and frantic weird whispers entangled in the sky, and the indescribable ancient giant shadow of a cosmic being floated in the sea.   
  
Unknown disease outbreaks, terrible disasters raging, panic among humans. It's the end of times when humans sought in vain refuge day and night. The rain is blood-drenched, and the lightning illuminated the sky gathering the crows to feast on corpses, never again, never again, they replied.  
  
"We can see that this weird creature has twelve pairs of ribs just like humans, but it also has a transverse bone piece that humans don't have…" In medical school, he continued to wield the scalpel to save the people.   
  
These medical students showed the thoracic structure of the weird creature on the experimental platform. The mysterious and treacherous age has come, the truth has collapsed, the order has collapsed, and mankind can only move forward unyieldingly through intellectual power while insanity creeps in closer ever so slightly.  
  
"What will you do?"  
  
Let the madness guides you.

title: To Have You Once Again
description: Mu Qingyi died to save the world... After resurrecting 10 years later, he finds the good and obedient disciple of his from that year has actually become the number one demon lord! "Yinli, be more respectful, I am your master!" "It's precisely because you're my master, I wish to discuss techniques with you like this..."

title: Love Letters in Early Summer
alt_titles: Letters of Love in Early Summer
description:
In early summer, an innocent girl was born as brightly as a summer day. The sun in her heart had long since forgotten. And a cold heart has been waiting for years to melt only for her.  
  
Can fate forge between them now?  
  
Can two hearts that are no longer familiar to each other be together again?  
  
The early summer scenery from today begins, to sweeten you and me.

title: Botanic Romance
description:
In a world where humans gain plant characteristics (botanomorphism), our cactus-infected protagonist, Zhu WuLiang, is faced with a dilemma. He'll lose hair whenever he gets shy! Now, enter Hao Xiaofeng, WuLiang's tumbleweed-infected crush, whose carefree lifestyle involves getting blown away by the wind on a daily basis… Surely, it's more than enough to wreck WuLiang's mundane life!   
  
Shy cactus x Happy-go-lucky tumbleweed!  
Our main couple's shenanigans are packed with tons of sweetness, sure to give you a severe case of toothache! Stay tuned!

title: The Fox Concubine
description: Stone-faced prince x quick-witted fox? Nonono, just a kiss, little fox will become the beauty. Secret agent Sylph is transported into another world due to a typhoon and becomes a fox. Confronting demons’ sudden pursuit and eager to leave here, she seeks help from a cruel expressionless prince passing by and agrees to be taken back home. When they get home, it turns out to be that he is the real cruel demon! Then the prince the little fox has a great power too as him. How would he treat her? As a pet? An enemy? Or a wife?

title: Eat Chicken and Save the World
description:
Could one get away by using cheats? This is a ‘prison’ world filled with cheaters.  
Come and witness the battle between the Gods! Lu Xiaowei, a professional cheat developer, eventually got trapped into this world.  
Upon meeting a lot of beautiful girls who are insane killers, will he drown at sea, or will he reveal the great power of cheating to conquer the world?

title: Billion World Invasion
description: The Dao of Heaven has collapsed, and the age of domination has come. Cultivator Chen Qiuran accidentally tied the badly damaged Heavenly Dao system and also signed a contract to refine the Heavenly Dao spiritual energy. It is a tale in which an idle social animal becomes an evil demon under the temptation of eight insurers and three golds, and attacks (crosses) billions of worlds.

title: The Little Princess
description: There are many hidden families in the world, and all major families have practiced mysterious yellow magic. As the richest country on this continent, the country of Nu zun is not only rich in resources, but the people in the palace are all talented individuals. The most important thing is that the first queen Bailuo, that is, Luo Jiujiu's father, is the leading god of war in the Nu zun country. Not only is he talented, he is also the strongest fortune-teller.
