Many invading countries have been defeated by him, and many small countries in the hermit family want to marry their sons and princes to the country of Nu zun princess, to make the country of Nu Zun their ally.

title: Picking Light
description:
Growing up happens inadvertently, Li Chuan and A-Cheng both people are like playful demons, in the shadow of the schoolyard and on the basketball court, they pass it quietly.  
*Free up to episode 23 on Wecomics*

title: My Blanket Turned into a Person!
alt_titles: Bie Zhan Ren! Wo de Bei Zi
description: My blanket turned into a guy overnight?! And only I can see that? What do I do?! This is the hilarious story of a hot-tempered girl and her mysterious blanket boy!

title: Martial God Chat Group
alt_titles: The Great Tang: Chatroom of the Martial Gods
description: He stepped into Li Jing’s mansion as a poor man and became the son-in-law of Li’s mansion. After 15 years, I finally got to the day when the system was activated, and the Wu shen chat group was launched~

title: ICEPOP
description: Two girls accidentally meet on the first day of school and get to know each other. Due to this meet, they start to form ambiguity (they fall in love but are not affectionate.) They start to form a secret relationship, slowly their "secret" comes out.

title: Fiery Consort
alt_titles: Lie Huo Kuang Fei: Shou Xing Wang Ye Ying Yao Chong
烈火狂妃：兽性王爷硬要宠
description: After dying a tragic death, she finds herself reborn, reborn into a body with cultivation ability that defies the natural order. An arrogant queen, the favored consort of the King: This world is cruel and dangerous, so I will make the world my enemy. Fate is hard to defy, so I will start by defying the here and now!

title: Pick Up A Goldfish As Girlfriend
alt_titles: Picking a Goldfish to Be My Girlfriend
description: The goldfish was saved by the MC when he was young, so the fish morphed into a human to return the favor. Ever since, they have started living together, he has been able to eat and dress well, also work started going smoothly.

title: Mirage
description:
I'm afraid that your smile is merely a boring lie, just like a mirage on a fine summer's day.  
  
[Artist's Weibo](https://weibo.cn/profile/6283761448)

title: 7:30 Mobile Time
description: The cool loli Baiyuan of the Antivirus Society is "accidentally" involved in a mysterious ceremony called "praying to meet one's true love at the time of birth". At 7:30, the time of when she was born, she meets a mysterious boy. However, this is not a fairytale of love. A battle for the president's position is about to begin…

title: Fate/Grand Order  - Morgan Misadventures in Camelot (Doujinshi)
description:
Pairing: Lion King x Morgan Le Fay  
  
Artist's Pixiv:  
<https://www.pixiv.net/member.php?id=11792864>

title: Immortal Path Of The Beast
alt_titles: Immortal Path in the Beast Area
description: Talented Chief disciple of the Royal Beast Sect, Xiao Ren, was forming his heavenly beast dan to enter the golden dan realm when he was attacked by the sect master. His Heavenly beast dan stolen, cultivation crippled and yet he was set up and banished to the Thousand Beasts Valley. At wit’s end, he had a chance encounter with an ancient calamity beast. The two bonded over the common goal of revenge, desperate to survive against the odds and kill their way into the Immortal Alliance!

title: Smoke & Rain
description: One is a demon-eye beauty who hides the secrets of the Dragon clan and the other is an orphan who has been in officialdom and was betrayed by his master. In the whirlpool of power conspiracy, the two men unfold a period of love and hatred that is unreasonable and chaotic.

title: Sleeping in My Book
description: Xu Su, a novelist suffering from a mental disorder, somehow managed to summon Zhong Ye, an evil spirit from his novel. Despite Xu Su’s best efforts to eliminate Zhong Ye, he was pushed to the edge of insanity again and again. To free himself from this torment, Xu Su finally fulfilled Zhong Ye’s wish and unlocked the seal. But his life did not return to the peaceful days that Xu Su had hoped for. “Surely you know, that if you make a deal with the devil, sooner or later you’ll lose yourself to him…”

title: I Am Not a Son of Doom
alt_titles: I'm really not the son of doom
description: What is the experience of being jealous of God? Eyebrows give birth to three eyes, doom-ridden, dead wife at the beginning…In order to resurrect his beloved, the cursed earth boy Gu Que used his "doom physique" to find artifacts, cut princes, fight all over the land of gods and demons, and collect countless beauties… and finally became a generation of robbery. the Lord!

title: General I Love You
description: In the middle of a historical fight, there was a time warp? The Emperor opened a film company and forced the General to debut?! The Prince that the General liked ended up being a Princess who crossdressed?! Come and watch the hilarious antics by the most dramatic General in history!

title: The Godslayer Who Cheats
alt_titles: I Rely on Cheat to Hunt Gods
description: Main character Zhang Yi was betrayed by his best friend and lover, he was then reborn back to the day [Apocalypse] arrived. With his memories from his past life, Zhang Yi will challenge God at the opening. In order to gain the strength to defeat the people that betrayed him, Zhang Yi will use his knowledge to obtain a God-weapon, and begin to grow stronger and stronger, at the same time exploring the unknown secrets of the apocalyptic world…

title: The Black Dragon Emperor’s Redo Adventure
alt_titles: The Dragon Emperor Became A Junior Adventurer
description: The time and space dragon, the leader of the demons, after being sealed by the great sage of mankind in the ancient war, Heath used his time and space talent to continuously learn the culture of the different-dimensional earth and become a generation of gods. But on a certain day, the great sage unlocked part of the seal and became a junior adventurer to start the adventure story again in this familiar and unfamiliar continent…

title: Crimson Skies
description: Li Ming Yang is an unassuming, and perfectly normal, office worker who was rushing at the end of the day to meet with his girlfriend for a date. Perfectly normally, he scans a QR code that he thinks is a promotional thing, but it turns out to be a far too mysterious, dangerous, and not at all promotional, thing.

title: My Ex, the King
description: As punishment for disrespecting God, He Muyan was thrown into a world overseen by a system. Here, He Muyan was reborn infinitely and forced to clear scenarios. On his seventh rebirth, he was reincarnated as an elf and finally came to know the truth. Just as he was about to give up on everything, he met the one man that he would never forget: his ex, Jin Yuanchen. Why was his ex here? And in the form of a mountain bandit to boot? He even kidnapped him in order to make him a trophy wife (husband?)! Dramatic shou who's given up on everything x carefree, conniving gong (*shou=bottom, gong=top)

title: Darn It!
description: A story about a pretty, ditzy ghost and a cold guy. But wait, how is their first meeting in a bathtub?!

title: Cutie's Here: Mommy, Where's My Daddy?
alt_titles: Meng Bao Laixi: Mommy Wo Daddy Ne?
description:
The female lead, Ye Xiange, used to be a trainee within Linshan Entertainment. Before she could officially debut however, she was plagued by scandals and her nudes were all over the media. The company terminated the contract with her and she was also cheated by her boyfriend. What she didn’t expect most was that she suddenly had a five year old son after waking up. What the hell? Child, who’s your mommy? And who’s your daddy?

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [WebComics](https://webcomicsapp.com/comic/Mommy-where-s-my-daddy-/5fc48c108c252b53063303eb)

title: Deep Space Hijack
description: A spaceship is hijacked by bandits in deep space.

title: The Villain Has Something to Say (Rebirth)
alt_titles: The Villain Has the Discussion About (Rebirth)
description:
As the head disciple of the number one sect in the world, Luo Jianqing had a brilliant reputation. He was the most respected senior brother of his junior brothers and sisters: the last disciple of the cultivation world’s number one cultivator, Luo Jianqing greatly respected his master’s teachings, not crossing his limits by even half a step.

Afterward, he was stabbed to death just like that by the main character with his sword. His master’s sword.

Luo Jianqing: “……”

The Heavens want me dead, yet I refuse to die! See if the will of the heavens is more fearsome, or if the will of my sword is more stubborn!

Wu Yin: “Jianqing, I have something to say to you.”

Luo Jianqing: “Master, I also have something to say to you.”

Wu Yin: “… you speak first?”

Luo Jianqing: “You speak first.”

Wu Yin: “I like you.”

Luo Jianqing: “I want to top you.”

Wu Yin: “……”

title: Parasitic Girl
description: Xiao Yiyan, a bad boy, always fought with others. One day when he faced a lot of gangsters, he failed and tried to escape, but met a female ghost by chance…

title: Omnipotent Warrior
description: In the future world, rifts in different dimensions suddenly appeared everywhere, and the world was divided into seven regions. All kinds of monsters in various legends all appeared in reality. The changes in the world have also brought new power to human beings, and towering star gates have appeared. Human beings entered it, awakened various extraordinary professions, embarking on a path of confrontation against the monsters.

title: Deadly Game
description: Tseng Chyi, the most popular escort with a deep understanding of how to please his clients, has got his chance to succeed by approaching a young wealthy man with a bad temper. Thanks to him, friends become enemies, brothers turn against each other, and companies are falling apart... When this game of revenge is about to end with his absolute triumph, the truth suddenly revealed turns his whole world upside down...

title: Under the Paws of Cats
description: Follow the daily hilarious shenanigans of the adorable cats: Huang, Hua, Blanche and Klein

title: Tree of the Sun
description: Gao Leng is the future of human beings in 3362 and an amusing third-rate streamer in 2019. Lin Shu, the mother of SOLO has encountered a huge crisis in life. A pervert who claims to be from the future sneaks into his house, and claims to be his blood bag? My dream of starting a family is about to be ruined, and this is indeed an unbearable day!

title: Return of the Top Hunter
description: Noah, who was once an S-rank hunter, sealed his extraordinary powers after he accidentally killed his best friend. Since then, he has been serving as an obscure doctor in a small town. A chance encounter with another hunter, Xia Zuo, leads him to discover that his best friend may not necessarily be dead. Together, Noah and Xia Zuo embark on a journey to unveil the mysteries of the past.

title: Zero Hunting
description: A submissive, quick-tempered hunter and a sly, dominant vampire! The genius hunter, Bai Mu, a little-known celebrity, accidentally got captured. He soon realized the one who captured him was a young vampire, who also turned out to be his childhood best friend. Since then, he was unable to escape, nor hide away, since all the possessive vampire wanted was to make Bai Mu his. “Mu, I’ll give everything I have, just to make you mine again.”

title: Nightwatch Guardian
description:
"Tell me, the pain and suffering I've went through… is there an easier way to endure it?"  
The tiger, Li Yexun, didn't know how to comfort A'Song.  
"There isn't… but you still have me."

title: Rebirth Super Goddess
alt_titles: Chong Sheng Chao Ji Nü Shen
description: Passionate competition and conspiracy coexist, what is the truth behind the death of the goddess? Giant grievances or emotional entanglements? The oppressed girl fought back and grew into a new goddess. Layers up layers of doubts and suspicions uncovered one step at a time.

title: Past Life Family
description: Often tricked by others, the impoverished young man time-traveled into the *Demon Realm* and was assumed to be the former Queen's reincarnation and was brought into the Palace. In his past-life's family, not only does the wife-loving "husband" think of him as a replacement, but the "kids" think of him as their evil step-mother. That is, until he awakened a **100 year-old infant...**

title: The Strongest Virus
description:
**The World Is Just an RPG, and Everyone's an NPC!**

When Qí Bó discovers the truth that the world is nothing but an RPG and everyone around him are NPCs, he realizes he's a total loser on divine levels.
Can he rewrite his fate and become a high-status playboy: rich, powerful, and surrounded by beauties?

(Source: QQ, edited)

title: 81 Fatal Questions
description: In the year 2030, the end of the world happened with many people dying mysteriously, while the lone survivors were controlled by an app named “81 Fatal Questions”. After answering various questions and clearing the instance dungeons, survivors will be rewarded through the app. By competing against Death, only the ultimate winners will have a chance to survive. The genius heroine who has had a “bad luck debuff” since birth, takes her comrades with her on her journey. Can she clear the game and survive until the end?

title: Flowers Not in Full Bloom
description: Weiheng confesses to the same girl 99 times and she finally accepts on his 99th confession.

title: Starry Night Club
description:
The curse of twelve stars, a girl who plays piano with a dream of becoming a chef, because of an odd job that she pretends to be a boy. What's waiting for Yue Hui is a mysterious mansion and 12 boys who have the curse of 12 stars which fall upon each of them. What's awaiting her? Where are her and the boys' destiny leading to?   
A love song for 1000 years, the legend of 12 beautiful stars, everything is in《Starry Night Club》

title: I Am the Dengle
description:
Fang Wanjie risks everything to raise money for his girlfriend's medical expenses by entering a place called "the Gate". However, he discovers that the high pay was actually a trap. He is then manipulated, humiliated and beaten by his companions, but he persists despite everything. He is then chased and attacked by thousands of monsters. On the verge of death, he awakens an innate talent that allows him to survive in the most perilous situations. As he contemplates leaving "the Gate" to seek revenge, he realizes that the key to opening the gate has been destroyed, leaving him trapped inside, surrounded by monsters. He is determined to survive, fight and become stronger, even if he has to become an undead creature, in order to make those who betrayed him pay.

Translated by Google Translate.

title: My Jelly Friend
description: In a strange twist of fate, Jing Qiu, a teenager living on an alternate Earth full of magical creatures, picked up a sticky slime. To his surprise, the little slime could transform into an adorable little boy, and also possessed an unbelievable identity!

title: The Winning Actor Wants Divorce
description:
I thought that losing your memory was bad enough. Didn’t think that after 7 years of marriage, my husband wants to divorce me. 
Gu Qingyang states " If you want to, then do it." I forgot everything anyway, I can always find another one if you leave. He’s just a wild horse on an open field, loose with endless freedom.
Jiang Zhong was invited by the media to attend a meeting. The reporter asked, " if you don’t want to start a company, what is it that you want to do?"  
Jiang Yizhen replied, "A horse tamer."

title: Rise of the Supreme Villain
description:
Vicent Wayland, a super-rich and incredibly handsome man, meets a tragic end at the hands of the Dragon King’s son-in-law.
But fate has other plans—he unexpectedly triggers the Supreme Villain System and gets a second chance at life.
Determined to become the ultimate villain, Yin Wudao vows to bring hell to all who stand in his way.

From dragon heirs and divine doctors to war gods, Asuras, ancient martial arts masters, and reborn immortals—no one is safe from his wrath. Witness the rise of a legendary villain in “**Rise of the Supreme Villain**”!

title: Zhuzhiqu
description: The irresistibly beautiful Crown Prince wandered within the streets, among the people, ended up as a wife to a villager. Being in a place where everyone fights for power, even so, he doesn’t want you to be disturbed by these customs; I can only wish to put aside the thoughts of dominating the world, in order to live a simple life with you, and spend the rest of our lives together.

title: Heaven's Devourer
alt_titles: I Devour The Heaven And Earth
Wo Duzi Tun Tian Shi De
Wǒ Dúzì Tūn Tiān Shì De
description:
The Yanhuang Ancient Domain, vast without end, gave birth to many Celestials and Demons of antiquity tore Heaven and Earth apart and surpassed the control of the 3 Realms and 5 Elements over the endless years it has existed. Numerous Gods, more than ten thousand races, and humans born with a God class body have also come out from the Domain, traveling through the nether, warping Yin and Yang, omnipotent.

In this current age, Celestial Daoism is in prosperity, tens of thousands of Divine techniques shake the Heavens, numerous mortals strive to become Celestials, and millions of sinners walk the Earth. The Prince Heir of the kingdom East Yue Wu Wu Yu, obtains the legacy of the Battle Celestial of the East in the direst of situations to sweep across the Earth and rebel against the Heavens!

In the eyes of the hundreds of millions of Mortals, he is the Sovereign Emperor Celestial, overcoming a plethora of tribulations to reach his current height.

In the eyes of the Celestials and Buddhas of Heaven, he is a peerless Heaven devouring Demon!

---

**Note:** Addendum on the "Manji" visible in chapter 2, for those uninformed:
"In East Asia the manji (卍) is an ancient religious symbol of power and good fortune for many different countries and religions around the world, including Buddhism, Hinduism, Jainism, and a number of Indo-European and Native American religions as well."
"The specific meaning of the symbol varies by nation and religion, and also by the position of the "arms" of the cross--whether they face left or right, or whether the cross is tilted or straight."
"In the 1930s, the swastika symbol--a clockwise, tilted cross--was adopted by the Nazi Political Party in Germany, and gained a negative reputation as a symbol of hatred in the modern world."

title: Tales of Two Souls
description:
The Ancient God Of War Dong Yu was pitted in the mortal realm and "share" the same body with a dumb high school girl. In order to separate their souls, the two must work together to find a powerful weapon and defeat a formidable enemy! The adventure starts here!  
  
Filipino: Ipinadala si Dong Yu, ang Diyos ng Giyera sa lugar ng mga mortal at nakibahagi sa iisang katawan ng isang tangang High School na babae, Para mapaghiwalay nila ang kanilang katawan at magkaroon ang isa sa bawat sarili, kailangan nilang makakuha ng malakas na sandata para talunin ang di pangkaraniwang kalaban! Dito nagsisimula ang kanilang paglalakbay!

title: Curse Cultivation
alt_titles: Kao Zuzhou Xiuxian De Wo Youdian Buduijin
Kào Zǔzhòu Xiūxiān De Wǒ Yǒudiǎn Bùduìjìn
description:
You don’t belong to this world, and yet you wish to step onto the path of cultivation. Targeted by the Heavens, they cast a curse on you, one unbreakable even by immortals. All changes in your body will be reversed, and you will no longer be able to cultivate again.

Jiang Chen tries to cultivate, but realises that his spiritual energy flows backwards, and scatters in all directions.

When he was in despair, he was struck by lightning.

[You’ve been struck by lightning, your flesh and blood is eroded and your dantian is shattered. The curse takes effect, and regenerates your body, granting you the power of vitality.]

[Your dantian regenerates, and become invincible.]

[The lost spiritual energy gathers in the body automatically, and flows through the meridians. You’ve stepped into the Qi Refinement stage first layer… second layer… third layer!]

Jiang Chen fell into silence, “???”

I have to cultivate like this?

title: All-Attribute Martial Arts
description:
In his previous life, Wang Teng had offended dignitaries and caused his own family to be ruined.

Even if he had no desire to resist, he was driven to extinction.

After his death, Wang Teng was reborn into the world of martial arts with resentment and gained a golden finger that could pick up attributes.

In my last life, I was a loser all my life, in this life, I will change my fate against the heavens!

title: World of Super Sand Box
alt_titles: chou yuu sekai: being the reality
description: Hot Blooded high school teen, a mysterious female swordsman, and an unpredictable dark emo girl. Its impossible to distinguish between reality and the game world ! What kind of conspiracy is awaiting them in super journey of the world!

title: Sorry, I'm Actually Very Strong
alt_titles: The Princess From Mars: The Young Lady's Journey to Counterattack
Huǒxīng gōngzhǔ: dàxiǎojie de nìxí zhī lù
description: In a world where the strong prey on the weak, you can only get trampled on without strength. Emerging nobles have bullied and oppressed the young girl Olga Perez since she was a child due to the decline of her family. She continuously forced herself to grow up, and after becoming a soldier possessing both civil and military skills, she used her strength to overthrow the nobles who bullied and oppressed her. However, once the interest chain of the hostile nobles has been broken, more powerful opponents follow. She must continue to climb up and reach the peak of power.

title: The System Forces Me to be the Heroine
description:
In order to retrieve her memories from the past, Cheng An'an was unintentionally selected as leader of the Reincarnation League; subjected to fight against the mortals who had altered the original story’s path for reincarnation points.   
  
Yet the “scumbag” who secretly accompanies her side, is determined to make her fall in love with him again.

title: Eye of Providence
alt_titles: Zài quánzhī yóuxì lǐ de wǒ jìng chéngle fǎnpài
I Became the Villain in the Omniscience Game
description: Third-rate web novelist Jia Yi unexpectedly picked up a handsome, powerful, and unfortunate young man in the game?! To find her younger brother, she took the risk of teaming up with him and entering S-class plot missions one by one, and teaching love along the way? Is such a good thing possible?! All the players think we're just pretty faces, but all the instance records are broken by us! Are you getting angry now?

title: I Can Have Infinite Epiphanies
description:
What should you do if transmigrated to a fantasy world and has become a son called the 'Human Race's Great Traitor'!

Don't worry, looking at his infinite epiphany system, all Bai Mo needs to do is to make others jealous of him!

No matter what kind of moves and cheats, as long as someone is jealous of him, Bai Mo can start an epiphany and let himself practice those to perfection in an instant!

So Bai Mo raised a lot of big villains around him, and occasionally molested them.

He liked to watch his enemies jealous and resentful of him, but they couldn't do that themselves!

title: A Boys' Love Author and Her Special Assistant
alt_titles: A BL Author and Her Special Assistant
A Pure Love Author and a Special Male Assistant
Chún ài zuòzhě yǔ nán tè zhù
Chun ai zuozhe yu nan te zhu
description: When the female BL author, Lu Xiaoying, meets the shy newbie editor, Lian Ye, who is uninitiated in the way of the BL what else can she do but try and educate him?He may run away, but he know that he must do the impossible to become a good editor.The story between a BL author and an innocent special assistant is about to start!

title: The Devil Teaches You How to Be a Human
description: Originally, a salaryman named Gu Qianwang, who faced repeated setbacks in his career, was chosen by the Demon King to be the vessel for a human body. He gained magical powers, and while feeling fear of the Demon King’s power, he also opened the door to a new world. As he became the object of admiration for many girls, who all fell for him, he began to realize that his company might not be as simple as it seemed. With the help of the Demon King’s powers and the girls, Gu Qianwang embarked on uncovering the mystery hidden deep within the company.

title: Fatal Code
description: Fiendfire’s rank 1 player Tu Lan received an SOS message from his brother Tu Mu while spending his time in the game… When he logged off to investigate, his “brother” was already replaced by someone else. So Tu Lan logged onto the game to rescue the real Tu Mu. But not only was he demoted to Lv1 and couldn’t log off, but he also needed to escape from the threat that is his max level avatar…

title: Becoming a God by Myself
description: Three years ago, he harvested a spiritual fruit, but was snatched by a Shoushan disciple. Three years later, the Moriyama disciple became the most dazzling genius in the sect, but he discovered that the spirit fruit that was taken away was only one ten thousandth of the chance he had obtained. Since then, he has risen like a comet, opening a fabulous road against the sky!

title: Netherworld Exchange Group
description: One day, Zhang Fan, a diaosi programmer, was confused by the Yellow River Chenghuang and was drawn into the netherworld exchange group. Since joining this group, Zhang Fan has "continuous crises". He has encountered the lady who jumped off the building, the doctor who was almost hacked to death, and was often beaten… Is this the rhythm of death? Zhang Fan "risked his death" to cultivate immortals and staged a dumbfounding pretend drama. See how the ordinary and inexperienced young Zhang Fan step by step from the face-slapped dick to the face-slapped king!

title: Deep Sea’s Song
description:
Crackhead rom-com, a modern re-tail of The Little Mermaid. Featuring a delusional mermaid, and a whimsy "prince".  
  
Dans le conte de la petite sirène il est dit : « Elle sauta dans la mer et quand le soleil se leva, elle se transforma en écume. ». STOP! Ici on va vous raconter une autre histoire, la petite sirène a de la ressource et le prince charmant ne l'est pas tant que ça…

title: The Unparalleled Eternal Arts
description: Un esclave assoiffé de pouvoir de la grande famille Ye a reçu un mystérieux pouvoir divin qui a ouvert un chemin pour lui vers l'immortalité. Un monde où les dieux immortels, les démons immortels et beaucoup d'autres races existent. De terrifiants pouvoirs pouvant faire tomber le monde en ruines d'un claquement de doigt… C'est un immense monde fantastique, pleins de choses bizarres et de nombreux mystères. Le fort peu parcourir le monde et dominer tous les autres !

title: Empress of the Last Days
description: Jian Yue time travelled back to ancient China but that’s not all. She has a system and missions that she must complete or else–Failure: Instant death!

title: Rebirth: The Turnabout of a Mistreated Concubine
description:
After traveling through time, she finds herself in Prince Xuan’s bed, and has inexplicably become his maid whom he could sleep with at will. While filling her world with whispers of love, the romantic, dissolute prince turned a blind eye to the misdeeds of several other concubines, which includes framing her for adultery, disfiguring her, as well as imposing an extreme penalty against her. When she opens her eyes again, instead of travelling through time, she is reborn as a drop-dead gorgeous lady. In possession of vast wealth and surrounded by all sorts of good-looking men, she decides that she will no longer keep her nose clean. As for that liar, Prince Xuan, should still put on a show of love and affection in front of her?

---
When she woke up, she realized that she had transmigrated into the bed of Prince Xuan and mysteriously become his bedside maid. The prince, who's an unloyal playboy, tells her that he loves her everyday, but at the same time he allows her to be mistreated. He even watches as she is accused of cheating on him and is disfigured before being drowned to death. When she awakes once more, she is back in the present with a pretty face. Having been reborn, she no longer cares for being mediocre. With delicious food and drinks in one hand, and dozens of dollar bills on her other hand, she is surrounded by beautiful men as she lives a lavish and excessive life. That is until the lying man shows up one day claiming to still be in love with her. Is he lying, or is he being honest for once?

---
  **Original Web Comic:** [BiliBili](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc24426?utm_source=mgd&utm_medium=uploader)
**Official English Translations:** [WebComicsApp](https://www.webcomicsapp.com/comic/5db6daba8c252b6ddd13a602), [Flying Lines](https://www.flying-lines.com/comic/rebirth-the-turnabout-of-a-mistreated-concubine)

title: Secret Love: Night Affair
description:
What? Join a matchmaking program with my fiancé and pretend to be strangers? Piece of cake!

Secret couple Linwei & Yiyu have been hiding their relationship for more than four years. In order to get married and buy their dream home, they’re in dire need of money after problems arise and they decide to join a matchmaking program in hopes of winning the $5M prize.
With four years of love and trust between them, nothing can break them apart, right? But with other hands in play, can true love withstand the twists of reality?

But why is he here? The man with whom I’ve shared so many beautiful memories together.
“I still miss you after all these years…”

title: Awa's Life
description:
The round millet doggo is coming, and he will make you instantly fall in love!  
  
What kind of an adorable and lively everyday life will he have with his doggo friends?

title: Great Hero's Girlfriend Is Super Fierce
description:
When an ordinary teenager meets a super-girl in an accident they start dating. By chance, the world thinks he's the strongest. The heroic story of a passive fox who wanted to pass himself off as a tiger.  
  
  
Quand un adolescent ordinaire rencontre une super-fille lors d'un accident. ils commencent à sortir ensemble et par hasard, le monde pense que c'est lui le plus fort. c'est l'histoire héroïque d'un renard passif qui voulait se faire passer pour un tigre.

title: Master Drifting Away Again
description: Shen Ying, a foodaholic girl with no sense of direction from the modern world, came to another world through time travel. She had no money and couldn't get out of the spirit world. Incredibly talented as a martial arts master but also easily neglected, Shen Ying is like a bug in a video game. Shen Ying took Yi Qing, an upstanding swordsman, as her disciple although, at first, she only wanted him to cook for her. Yi Qing, a man of integrity and conscience, was defeated in a fight with a demon and fell into the yard of Shen Ying who later became his master through serendipity. However, Shen Ying and Yi Qing always talked past each other. Later they entered Xuantian Clan and with Shen Ying's simple explanations and his own imagination, Yi Qing gradually became an unbeatable swordsman in the world. This is a funny story about cultivation featuring two characters with strikingly different dispositions: an upright, gentle disciple and a hilarious but powerful master.

title: Vicious Luck
description: Chen Yang was just an ordinary person. One day, he was given an opportunity: he was offered the ability to control his luck! Love, status, and fortune were suddenly all within his grasp. When a person can control his luck at will, how will his life change? Will he run into beauties as soon as he steps outside his door? Will he trade as much stock as he possibly can? Damn… it's too good to be true… Those who are my friends will all live wonderful lives. Those who are my enemies have already paid the price!!

title: Doubt
description: "I have my eyes on him, only him." Ming ZiQi's attention was drawn to Xiao Luo on his first day as a supervisor in practice. But as a simple murder case becomes something much more, it is time to seek out the truth?

title: Ah Lü and Ah Mo
description:
During junior high, Zhang Kaimo, a strange and quiet boy, meets a gentle classmate named Lin Zhonglü and develops a crush on him. On their graduation trip for their third year of junior high, the first moments of an ambiguous relationship between the two of them begin to spark. How will their relationship grow in the future...?
(Description taken from CCC Creative Comic and translated using DeepL)

title: The Dices Can't Decide My Destiny!
description: Ou Huang, who has always been known for his good fortune and cognition in time-traveling novels, traveled to the otherworld. Initially, he thought he could show off his skills and become invincible in the otherworld. However, the system was too absurd to his expectation — his every action has to be decided by the dice. The time to test his luck has come!

title: What, You Dare Pretend in Front of Me, the Strongest in the Immortal World?
alt_titles: Ni Shenme Dangci Gan Zai Wo Xianjie Zui Qiang Mianqian Zhuang
What Quality Do You Dare to Pretend in Front of Me the Strongest in the Immortal World
description: The world beyond the ancient mirror and the immortal realm within were originally one entity. The true power of this world lies in the hands of the divine beast with the title “Light,” who battles against a formidable enemy, the divine beast with the title “Dark.” In order to prevent the extinction of humanity, the ancestors of Cheng Song sealed off the immortal realm from the human realm using the ancient mirror, with the assistance of the divine beast of Light. Only those with the bloodline of the Yu family can activate the bronze mirror and enter the immortal realm.

title: The Strongest Male Lead in History
alt_titles: The Strongest Actor of all time
The Strongest Protagonist of All - Time!
description: Zhao Xiaotian suffered all kinds of hardships because of his supernatural powers. After an explosion, he caught up with the trend of traversing different worlds, but unfortunately, the claws of the dark forces still did not let him go, assassinated, kidnapped, and ripped off tickets, Zhao Xiaotian could not bear to be sent to the famous door of Xiuxian——Xiaoyaomen, and from then on opened his efforts. (Er) Xiu (match) the road of practice.

title: Heroes Are No More
description:
Going alone does not save the world, there is no hero in the end! (This is a manga of an orthodox superhero. Mutants, domineering presidents, or ancient princesses will all become superheroes)   
  
"This era…has the hero gone?"   
  
"No, the hero is here!"  
  
Just copy pasted Chinese summary

title: Super WECHAT
description: After graduation, Chu Tianlin became out of work, but accidentally, there was a variation in his mobile We-chat. After that, tremendous changes were found in his life. He could buy any celestial tools as he pleased and choose any way to upgrade! Let’s see how he’ll change his destiny!

title: The Ducal Family's Poisonous Flower
alt_titles: Gong Jue Jia De Du Zhi Hua
Gōng Jué Jiā De Dú Zhī Huā
The Poisonous Flower of the Duke's House
description:
Lily Roland, the daughter of Duke Roland, stumbled upon her fiancé and her illegitimate sister having an affair! She was poisoned by the two people whom she grew up with, and thrown into the wilderness.

When her life was hanging by a thread, she was saved by a monstrous creature that had a body of a human, but a head of a beast, who turned out to be the Crown Prince, Isaac Stewart.

Isaac was cursed by a mysterious witch to turn into a bloodthirsty monster on the night when the moon is full, and Lily’s blood is his only antidote!

Isaac decides to help Lily in her revenge, but in exchange, she must marry him and assist him in lifting the curse.

title: He Hasn't Faded
description:
Luyi, an actor known for his acting prowess, and Gu Jiangyuan, a rising star, are well-known for their rivalry in the entertainment industry. After dying in an accident, Luyi is resurrected into a different body, only to find out that his old archenemy, Gu Jiangyuan, has had a crush on him for many years... 
While having his enemy become his lover is one thing, what's with the baffling ghost exorcism missions, as well as Gu Jiangyuan wanting and trying to get rid of the present-him just to bring back the original "Luyi"?!

title: I Rely on Killing Monsters to Extend My Longevity
alt_titles: I Rely on Killing Monsters to Extend My Longevity
Began With a Bang, I Relied on Killing Monsters to Lengthen My Life
description: Only the chosen dead person can reach this place, where killing monsters can exchange for longevity, thus extending life! Qianye, after surviving a near-death battle, finally returns to the mortal realm, only to discover that the ‘longevity’ reward comes with a time limit! Once the time limit expires, Qianye once again descends into that desolate and terrifying place! What exactly are these monsters? Is the sudden outbreak of eternal slumber in the mortal world related to this place? Besides myself, who else has been chosen? There’s no time to think, death would come quietly!

title: Stuck in a Girl’s Body
description: Ju Danding was an unlucky guy but is lucky enough to have a pretty girlfriend who is also his boss. After a car accident, his soul transferred to his girlfriend's body, promising to take care of it. But he soon discovers that his girlfriend has some dangerous secrets that he never knew

title: Kiss Me and Hug Me!
description: Fu Ruan had to work very hard to pay off her huge debt. But thanks to her outstanding strength and perfect massage skills she was hired to work as a maid. Her new job was to take care of the prince who suffered injures at the war and help with his rehabilitation. She though that her new employer would be a collected and mature man, but he turned out to be a sharp-tongued tsundere?! How will they cope with each other? And how soon will their employer-employee relationship become a blissfull love story?

title: Yandere Senior VS Tsundere Girlfriend! But I'm Just Here to Game!
alt_titles: Obviously It's Just Gaming, Please Don't Involve Me in the Relationship Between Yandere Senpai and Tsundere Girlfriend
description: First, I picked up a white-haired yandere who's the No. 1 Player in the world. Then, a blonde girlfriend who's the ace of a professional team fell into my lap. I'm just helping my sister with the game, so why am I being dragged onto this battlefield of love?!

title: Terror Infinity
description: Do you want to understand the meaning of life? Do you really want to live?

title: Evenly Matched Love
alt_titles: Bu Nuli Jiuyao Dang Huang Fu
description:
“If the Aslan family knew other genes had “invaded” their bloodline, they might hurt your twins!”

Magic, mecha, mana, demon foxes, and space travel. There’s a lot that’s unique about Mu Yunshen’s world. Most interestingly... for a select few men, pregnancy is also a possibility. Of course, Mu Yunshen doesn’t know about this last little detail—yet. After he saves the life of young master Aslan and spends the night with him, Mu Yunshen ends up with the shock of his life: twins.

title: Chronicles of Ling Yan
description: The far-off, icebound land of Bei Di Continent is ruled by thirteen clans; these thirteen clans are led by a single head, known by the title of the Demon Guardian. However, their once-steady governance has begun to waver since the last Demon Guardian's disappearance. Ling Yan, the second young master of the Shen Mu clan and the boy who will change the fate of this continent, secretly begins his journey…

title: I Defeated Thousands of Gods by the Title System
alt_titles: Wo Kao Chenghao Xitong Dabai Wan Qian Shen Hao
I Beat Thousands of Gods by the Title System
description: The down-and-out boy suffered injustice, and changed his fate after obtaining the invincible title system. From then on, he hugged left and right and walked to the pinnacle of life.

title: Above the Cloud Sea
description: What our protagonist Neil enjoys doing everyday is loudly preaching what his father had seen above the Cloud Sea. Nobody believed that it was true, and all say that his father was a liar who deceives the public to gain fame. In order to prove that his father wasn’t lying, Neil resolved to break through the obstruction of the Cloud Sea and find out the truth! On his journey, he discovered that the Cloud Sea’s existence was actually huge conspiracy devised by Genians, and his companion seemed to be a friend, but also an enemy… (Moon Bunny Cafe)

title: Incredible June
description: The popular and beautiful BL manhua artist’s new neighbor is a handsome male idol?! The idol starts attacking her with hidden hints, but the beautiful manhua artist still can’t figure out that he was the guy that she was in love with during high school! …As these two people go about their jobs and remember their past, a hilarious, sweet, and pure story will unfold!

title: I Tied Myself Up
description: Qin Yuefang was reborn after a car accident, but was reborn in a body named "Fang Yeyin". By chance, Yeyin met his younger self! He was tied by Qin Yuefang (his younger self) and became his possession… As Fang Yeyin attempts to discover the truth of the his reincarnation, he also has to escape the clutches of this perverted Qin Yuefang. But will things go smoothly…?

title: Till The Next Time
description: This is a story of 18 years of a relationship that started from the span through other's time, throughout their youth, going through lies and hatred, and eventually becomes alright by the end of the day.

title: Wolf Lover
description: This is a gorgeous, popular adventure-fantasy shoujo! She's an ascended vampire bride and he's a good for nothing werewolf, together they make an unmarried, unreliable couple. How will these two save the world from imminent danger?

title: Spare Me Fairy Sisters
description: A good-for-nothing, Ye Xuan, picks up nine fairy concubines and sweeps across the fairy world like a mudslide. From then on, he drags cocks to the sky, beats immortals and old monsters, and goes against the will of heaven.

title: The Fake Beauty
description:
Internet has changed the lives of many people, including the life of a closed and vulnerable girl, Liu Meihuan. Under pressure from his classmates, Liu Meihuan finds an exit on the net and creates the internet goddess "Xue Mi", that becomes a real sensation in the virtual world.  
  
When her life seemed to be improving, Meihuan meets a beautiful girl similar to "Xue Mi" as two drops of water.

title: Prince Charming Daddy Descended From Heaven
description:
Mu Ning Xi says that the farthest way she’s ever walked is the President Mo’s routine. Five years ago, she was the antidote to a man with great physical strength. Five years later, her son took her to the Big President and said, “Mummy, I found my daddy! He will raise me and will pamper you!" 

Mo Qi Ao embraced Mu Ning Xi’s waist and said affectionately: “My wife, we should have our second child early, so the siblings’ relationship will be better!" 

Mu Ning Xi: " … ”

title: Campus Belle's Special Bodyguard
alt_titles: The Most Powerful Special Forces Soldier of the School Beauty
Special Bodyguard for the School's Maidens
description: Liu Mang, a top class sharpshooter from the God Eagle Special forces, tried to use his military skills to peep on the beautiful girls at his school. Unfortunately, in the process of doing that, he accidentally uncovered one of the school's most well-kept secrets, which brings a lot of unforeseen problems upon himself. By defeating everybody that stands in his way and surrounding himself with many beautiful maidens, he manages to cement himself as an immortal legend in history. Based on a popular online webnovel.

title: Bowling King
description:
Bowling King is a manga written by taiwanese comic artist Tong Ai about a kid named Shautieh Ley and the humiliation he puts himself and his opponents through in bowling alleys. This is NOT Prince of Bowling. Instead, think of this as Simpsons + Kingpin, or Great Bowler Shautieh.  
  
Shautieh is infatuated with Tz'zuhn whose family owns a bowling alley. When he finds out that Tz'zuhn's family has a $3M debt and that Tz'zuhn has an American pro bowler boyfriend, Shautieh tries to resolve everything, with bowling of course. However, although Shautieh has an incredibly strong left arm, he doesn't know anything about bowling. What now, Shautieh?

title: Wújìn Yóuxì
description:
A slacker high-school student gets pulled into a world where he is named the "Dungeon Master" and can control everything that happens. He can even make it rain money! It's in this world that he meets a young, traumatized girl whose memories have been erased. With her help, he creates a new game world to escape his boring school life. Everything seems to be going fine until they encounter a lethal bug in the game's programming…  
  
Also contains a 30-page text novel at the end of each volume.

title: Magician of Memories
description: After their death, people's memories fade. The wish to retrieve the fading memories of his deceased girlfriend leads Wu Nian to become the Magician of Memories.

title: Travels of the White Flame
description: To investigate the truth behind his sister's sudden disappearance, a rookie Enforcer arrives at the special zone city of Laia, where unlawfulness runs amok. But when he bumps into a mysterious amnesiac with an unknown identity, he is forced to cohabitate with him. Numerous strange signs hint that his identity might be more than what he had imagined, and he soon discovers that the monsters depicted in myths may not be myths after all...

title: Ten Thousand Kinds of Love
description: What is love? After their father passed away in an accident, the only ray of light to the Zheng family’s three sisters is their brother Zhinian. The family’s ongoing misfortunes quietly bury the seeds of growth in the three sisters - Yihua, Erye and Sanguo, and their future takes an unexpected turn. This story is all about love and the the bonds between family, friends and lovers.

title: Twist of Destiny
description: Abby was reincarnated. This time, she swore to reform the villain of her previous life, changing the fate of the world ending... No, why should I be so hung up on this? Nice, gentle older brothers, a mysterious mage- Who is this decisive killer of a handsome man with so many accomplishments in war? It turns out to be the Crown Prince who had died young in his past life! Well, one way is to put him on the throne, but he's destined to die in three years due to a curse! (Synopsis: Gourmet Scans)

title: Mythical Invasion: I Slay Gods on Earth
alt_titles: Shenhua Ruqin: Wo Zai Diqiu Zhan Shenming
Myth Invasion: I Kill Gods on Earth
description: The descent of the deities had ushered the invasion of Earth, eventually leading to the collapse of human civilisation! Guardian Deity Lin Fang has returned back to three months before the descent of the deities. In this life, he must lead humanity, charged with the might of the nation, to wage war against the deities!

title: Restraining Order of Ant
description: Three ant girls were forced to leave Red Rose art institute under the mayor's restraining order, No. 66. Since then, the ants have faced persecution under the ruthless, and strong domineering mayor. The opportunity for these girls to win back their freedom is slowing presenting itself…

title: The System Is at My Disposal
alt_titles: Xì Tǒng Zài Shǒu Rèn Wǒ Làng
Xi Tong Zai Shou Ren Wo Lang
description:
Abandoned young Su Hao from a wealthy family fell into the sewers. He got a blessing in disguise and was ordered to install the X system. With the moonlight treasure box given by the system, he traveled to ten years ago and started a new life.

In my last life, I lived like a dog, those who hated me celebrated, and those who loved me had tears in their eyes. In this life, the Moonlight Treasure Box sent me back, the people who love me, sing and dance, and those who hate me, are in tears.

title: I Was XXX By My Idol
alt_titles: Wǒ bèi ài dòu bùkě miáoshùle
description: Breaking up with boyfriend just because she's chasing after her idol! How ridiculous... More ridiculous thing is that she finds herself in the bed with her dream idol when she wake up the second day! The most ridiculous thing is that for the sake of her idol's reputation, they become a fake couple...

title: Upon the White Tiger
description: An irreparable painting and a young auxilium whisk an archeology major into the fantastical world of deities who protect culture. "If everything about you disappears, then let me be the last one to remember you."

title: Pastoral Battle Hymn: Pioneer in the Fantasy Realm
description: I finally bought a house, but found that the door of the house connects to another world? In the not-too-distant future, Alien Development is developing as an emerging industry. The resourceful but cautious and timid Hong Yinzhi, and Li Bingya, a sports genius who has been repeatedly targeted by corrupt referees, began to open up their own gardens in other worlds for the stability, prosperity and glory they pursued. Warsong QQ group: 718597187

title: I’m a Tycoon in the Other World
alt_titles: I'm a Big Shot in Another World
description: The modern world’s Xu Fei is a contemporary “average college student” with normal appearances, little money and barely any future. In the other world, where martial artists, cultivators, spell practitioners and personal forces wield all the power needed to take over the modern world. It cannot block more than a thousand of people nor shake the ground of ancient times, when medical care, food productions and political form, ect. were scarce. Let’s see how Xu Fei swept across the worlds and eventually became a tycoon of the two worlds!

title: Strongest System
description: A catastrophe known as "Data Crash" struck the earth in 2020. Survivors rule the game, and losers are erased. Jacob Wei, a senior player, happened to fail despite surviving many rounds. Surprisingly, he was taken back to the beginning of the crash and was reborn with the incredible Self-Destruction System. Now he earns points from his stupid acts, triggering self-destruction in order to be reborn. Each revival makes him stronger. Thus unfolds the story about how he starts over and makes his way to the top.

title: The Ghost That Lives in The Doll
Yìrén
description:
Nearly a decade ago, the mysterious race known as "The Entities" arrived in this world.

Initially, people were fearful towards the unknown lifeforms. However, upon discovering that their "moulting" could bring tremendous progress and benefits, people gradually began to accept them, bridging up the gap between different species. 

Yet, just as celebrations of peace and prosperity were underway, seeds of destruction began sow silently, threatening to dismantle the entire system…

title: I’m Done Being This Yandere Boy’s Stepmother
alt_titles: Bing Jiao Shaonian De Jimu Wo Budangle
description: A medical student, Linzhen, has traversed into one of the greatest four noble families, Norlan Family. She has also become the stepmother of the beautiful youngster, Sean. How will she continue to live in this foreign world and also together with this youngster who's full of hatred towards her...

title: Who Killed the Rabbit?
description: Seven girls were kidnapped and taken to an abandoned school all because of a strange question. It turns out to be a game of death, where there's a murderer with a rabbit mask who will try to kill them. In this game of death, only the true "rabbit" can be saved from death. But who is the real rabbit? Suspicion and hate, where the lies are intertwined behind the game and what kind of truth is hidden…

title: My Girlfriend Is a Wicked Lady!
alt_titles: My Girlfriend Is a Wicked Lady!
description: 【Ding… Ding.. System activated, game starts】【 If the Player taking over the capture target, points will be rewarded】… If it’s for the sake of conquering beauties, I’ll wear the golden crown; if it’s for reward points, I’ll move forward by any means…

title: Female Knight Captured by Orc
description: Female knight is captured by orc, but something unexpected happens...

title: Dragon King’s Son-In-Law
description: By accidentally swallowing the "mint candy", he became the son-in-law of the Dragon King. The Dragon King is the big boss of the group, and his fiancee is a small pepper. The long tigers are watching, uh, this world is really dangerous…

title: Everyone In The Sect Is A Spy Besides Me
description: I am Chen Ning, who transmigrated his way into a top sect in ancient China. Before the old matriarch passed away, they handed their position over along with some good tidings: “Grand elder Cang Yue is a planted agent sent by the dynasty to monitor the sect.” “The second elder is the saintess of the celestial sea holy land. She’s been lying low inside the sect as a planted agent since she was young, and is ready to act on the celestial sea holy land’s behalf at any time.” “The magnificent master enforcer is a demon spy who’s already spilled innumerable sect secrets.” “The sect number one is a beast-eared lass: a saboteur stationed in the sect by the beastkin. She’s watched the patriarch position menacingly, preparing to seize it to promote the beast agenda.” “Even my bodyguard is granddaughter to the bandit god. She follows the bandit god’s orders by pilfering sect treasures. How sly!” In short… everyone in the sect besides me is a planted agent.

title: Sweet First Love
description:
English:  
Do you remember the taste of your first love? You might have already forgotten the taste of your first love, or you have buried it in your heart, or you are currently experiencing your first love, but ignoring all that, the first love is sweet, shy, and happy. What kind of sparks will be created when you meet the person that used to be your first love?  
  
Spanish:  
¿Recuerdas el sabor del primer amor? Es posible que haya olvidado el sabor del primer amor, tal vez lo haya enterrado en su corazón, o tal vez este experimentado el primer amor en este momento, sin importar qué, el primer amor es dulce, tímido, feliz. ¿qué tipo de chispas sería la persona que solía ser el primer amor cuando se volvieran a encontrar?

title: Ni Ming Shi
description:
A blind person known as Ni Ming Shi was ambushed by Imperial Guards while traveling through the Bamboo Forest. While they almost managed to fool the Imperial Guards their identity was unfortunately exposed by the commander. Now with their life on the line, what kind of fate awaits Ni Ming Shi?  
  
(Credit: [OSTNT](https://mangadex.org/group/1217/ostnt))

title: Give Me a Pat!
description:
Amidst the chaos of a shattered life, Yu Zhou faces a crisis: discouragement that threatens her career as a writer. Everything seems to be falling apart — until an unexpected encounter changes her course. Xiang Wan, a mysterious and resilient woman who claims to have traveled back in time from Imperial China, appears in her life as a breath of hope.

With her ancestral courage and peculiar vision of the modern world, she helps Yu Zhou find the strength to move forward. However, fate has another surprise in store: Yu Zhou's literary work is adapted into an audio drama, and the protagonist chosen to give voice to the story is none other than Su Chang, her ex-girlfriend. The reunion of the two rekindles dormant memories and feelings, creating a delicate emotional triangle.

title: The Heirloom Recipe
alt_titles: Ying You Chang Feng Yi Bi Yuan
description: The chef Nibi, who was stalling on the snack street, was famous in the capital with a recipe for a bowl of exclusive "Acacia soup". The recipe was swept into the palace by the food-loving Wang Zhaofeng. Wang Ye insisted on asking for the secret recipe, and the chef certainly didn't agree … So she was detained in Wang Ye Mansion … The two gradually saw the other side of each other while they saw the secret recipe while the tension between them started to warm up…

title: Falling in Love Is Not as Good as the Boy Band, Crown
description: Yun Shang was reborn— before her debut with the little brothers, who are idols part of the popular band Crown, she found out she was reborn in the body of the “Vicious Female supporting actress” all the guys in Crown hated; Lu YoYo. The little cuties who believed they were helpless, pitiful, and weak, were big bosses who stabbed people's hearts. To change this tragic fate of herself and the idols, Lu YoYo, clutching into her deteriorating heart, raised her flag and decided to change the fate of these idols.

title: One Foot on the Accelerator to Create the End of the World
description: No backstabbing by an ex-girlfriend, no betrayal by teammates, no dying in the mouth of a monster to restart another life. ✌ Right from the start, you already have traps activated

title: The Little Junior Sister Doesn't Want to Ascend
description:
Sealed inside a secret realm for three hundred years, the notorious archvillain has finally been released by a massive fool. Jin Xun bursts into a wild laughter. He prepares to make his triumphant return and settle an old grudge— huh? What happened to his maxed-out cultivation level? What happened to all of his divine-grade artifacts? Why is no one obeying his commands anymore?! 

As long as Su Yuan stays by Jin Xu's side, her constantly depleting cultivation returns to normal. In order to survive, Su Yuan decides to tightly cling onto Jin Xun by offering him every treasure in the world— as long as he stays by her side, of course. However, just being near her makes Jin Xun lose all of his powers and causes him to become as weak as an ordinary person. In order to seek his revenge, he has to leave her... Until Su Yuan tightly binds him with her Immortal-binding rope.

Su Yuan: Quit struggling. In this lifetime, you and I are never going to be apart!
Jin Xun: I'll never give up my quest for revenge just for the sake of love!   
(A few days later…)  
Jin Xun: Fine, I accept you.
Su Yuan: ？？？？？？

title: Your Turn to Chase After Me
alt_titles: Pampered Wife of a Warm Marriage
description:
Mo Shiyi's dreamed to marry a tall, rich, and handsome man and strived to reach the top in life. However, before her rebirth, she unexpectedly loved a man so much to the extent of losing her herself and was bullied and lost her son. Hence after rebirth, Mo Shiyi was occupied with taking revenge! In her past life she had vowed to burn him and scatter his ashes, but in this life she helped that scum and even offered to warm his bed? 

Mo Shiyi sneered coldly. “Sorry, I just wanted to divorce you.”

title: Beginning of the Human Age
description: At the beginning of all, the world was a ruthless place full of monsters and the young human race had their home in a small southern territory, but in a world where cultivation exists, they have to fight to survive daily; Only the sword of a hero can end this cruel destiny by shaking the gods and establishing … the Human Age!

title: Haruru's Short Stories
description: Memories of youth, dreams and inexperience.

title: Yi zhi chong hun
description: She was calculated by her family to be with a stranger. The next day, a group of black people "shelved" her to the Civil Affairs Bureau and she was forced to marry her "one-night stand" object. Her husband was tender and considerate but she had never been able to meet him. At the same time, the overbearing president suddenly broke into her life…

title: Lovely Allergen
description: Yue Zhishi and Song Yu are not blood related brothers, Yue Zhishi, who was fostered by the Song family since childhood, loves to cling to his older brother, Song Yu, who is three years older than him. However, Song Yu always deliberately maintains a distance. Song Yu, the brother who pretends to be indifferent, and Yue Zhishi, the brother who is a clingy little puppy. But what others don't know is that he understands his own heart, he choose to exercise self-control and maintain a distance because… Yue Zhishi is Song-Yu’s only allergen.

title: The Unexpected
description: Xiao Teng woke up after getting drunk, right next to him is a man with unparalleled beauty. What’s more, this beautiful man keeps sticking to him 24/7. Just who is he and what does he want from Xiao Teng?

title: Will the Sea King Tip the Boat Today?
description:
I thought I could swim into this beautiful jiejie's heart, but I didn't realize she was a sea king! Encountering love and turmoil from the very first page, Li Haijue decided to let go of herself—to embrace the role of Sea King—and experience a different kind of love story! At the same time, this hidden, mysterious world begins to unravel itself. What does the “Sea King” title on top of her head truly mean..?

TL/N: “Sea King” is Chinese slang for someone who keeps many lovers at the same time! Much like how a King of the Sea rules over all the fish, so does Haijue over the people in her world.

title: I Became a Dragon in the Sorceress's Hand
description: For a dignified veteran player like me, if I crossed over into my favorite game, I'd be the most powerful character, I'd be able to rewrite the ending of all my favorite characters to make them look good. However, I did cross over, but why am I just a little pet at the mercy of the sorceress? Can I still change the fate of the characters I'm trying to save?

title: Land of Snow
description: He used to be the noble and ominous prince of Chiyou Palace. He was a cold and peaceful young man in the Snow Plains. He was a brother with a very different life and background, but was still loyal. He was an obedient, gentle, and never willful lover. He kills people like flies, he is a schemer and an executioner. He is also a blade, a chess piece, an offering to the shrine of power. Everything ends in the Snow Plains, and yet everything also begins there.

title: Gao Neng Strikes
description: A hundred years after the Cataclysm, a completely new profession was born. They controlled iron, copper, phosphorus, gold, silicon, carbon……At the start he immolated the female lead to the heavens, Gao Neng saw his own hidden gifts, and was frozen in shock: iron 100%, copper 100%, tin 100%, silver 100%, gold 100%, phosphorus 100%, sulphur 100%, silicon 100%……

title: The Legendary Villainess
description:
I dedicated eight years to helping him rule his empire, only for him to send me to my death by burning! My last wish before death was to be reborn so I can change my fate, and not make the same stupid mistake again! 

However… I was reborn into the body of my sworn enemy?! My revenge plan is proceeding smoothly, but a prince suddenly appeared and proposed marriage? Does he not know I already have four prince consorts?

title: AFK Arena: Short Comics
description:
Fanart for AFK Arena made by various artists.  
  
"Let me tell you a story about a swordsman and a knight. The first words: Thane and Baden." - Oneshot by Old Xian  
  
“There are many stories that I want to draw about Rosaline and Cecilia.” - Oneshot by Tan Jiu

title: Island School
description: Uma misteriosa escola onde é dito criar novos seres humanos que irão conduzir a evolução da humanidade… Mas certo dia, a escola localizada em uma isolada ilha se transforma em um parque de massacre. Com Inteligências Artificiais eróticas espalhadas por todo o lugar exterminando a vida humana, a maneira de se fugir desta ilha foi…

title: Yu Cai Immortal Sect
description: Xiang Qi, who was previously a problematic student in Yu Cai High School, surprisingly transmigrated into a cultivation world called "Hong Meng" when he was attending a Year 3 Class 2 classmate's meeting. He thought he was the male protagonist, yet his life sucked. To survive, he had no choice but to take the path of cultivation, and then noticed a weird sect called "Yu Cai Immortal Sect". Someone called Xi Hongjun, who has the same name as his enemy, and is also the smartest student in high school, became his master. Not only are their names are the same, but they also look very alike and have the same b*tchy personality! And that Sect Leader who looks just like his monitor...Everything just seems more and more strange!

title: Digimon 04: Infinite Zone
description: The spirits of ten legendary warriors, who in ancient times had saved the Digiworld, now present a new power to the Digidestined! To save the Digiworld from evil, Takuya, Koji, Tommy, J.P and Zoe must band together as a team to find their chosen spirits! The journey into the new frontier - the Digimon Frontier - is about to begin!

title: Unexpected Luck
description:
"Young Master Chi, you're not going to help me unconditionally, are you?"

"You'll find out soon enough what this deal entails. Now, all you need to do is give me an answer. Do you want this opportunity or not?"

"Yes, I do."

Chi Mingyao made a deal with an actor who was brave enough to block him because of a car accident. He only wanted to tease the little actor at first, but eventually, he genuinely wanted to befriend Li Yangxiao and pass on his good luck to him—all so that Yangxiao could chase his dreams without a care in the world.

title: Urban Castaway
description: Fang Xiaotang, an orphan, lost everything in a fire, but gained a unique system for asking God, and since then set off on the path of tracking his enemies. All the cultivating sects in the world will prevent him from obtaining the truth, but can they stop the gods who are helping him?

title: Your Tears are Sweet
description: In order to become a normal person who can cry, Zuo Xiaoxia began to collect other people's tears. But who would've thought that she'd become entangled with the school hunk in the process?

title: Nine Songs
description: "Once you enter the nine songs, you're no longer human."

title: Bloody Sweet Scandal
description:
A hot-tempered Taoist priest finds himself entangled with an arrogant vampire, drawn into a whirlwind of love and hatred fueled by karmic ties from their past lives.

In the present day, he’s barely scraping by, working odd jobs on a film set. But one day, he senses a powerful, ominous energy. When he looks up, he’s shocked to find that the source is none other than the nation’s biggest movie star, Shen Que?! The charming and sophisticated actor the world admires—is actually a thousand-year-old vampire?

“You’re not getting away from me this time!”

title: The Strongest War God
description: The strongest soldier and a band of ferocious heroes – fighting for their country, fighting for their people! Only death can stop them, and they will press on until their dying breaths!

title: The Telepathic Consort
alt_titles: Du Xin Kuang Fei Ging Tian Xia
description:
Used, betrayed, and tortured by her husband and sister, she died in despair wondering why she couldn’t have seen through them earlier?

As if God had heard her question, she awakens back at the morning of her wedding day. To add to this strange occurrence, she discovers she can read people’s minds, at least, most people's minds.

There seems to be a certain Prince who is immune to her ability. What is he thinking? Will he undermine her revenge plan?

title: The Wind and the Four-Leaf Clover
alt_titles: The Wind and the Four-Leaf Clover

title: The Strongest Involution System
alt_titles: Zui Qiang Nei Juan Xi Tong
description: Chu Xingchen crossed over to the immortal cultivation world, thought he could lie down peaceful to his old age, but he was forcibly bound by the strongest martial god system, was forced involution, and started the road of strongest male character.

title: Super Son-in-Law in Another World
description: Qin Shi, an ordinary undergraduate, accidentally goes through the time-space journey and becomes the leader of an evil sect. But this sect is so unreliable that the fund is raised by the leader through marital fraud. Qin Shi wants to resign as this position. This story is about a leader who sticks to core socialist values.

title: We Are Not Familiar
description:
Even if you're a social elite, you can never escape the nightmare of going on blind dates! This is a story of a workaholic man and woman who meet each other while trying to escape their respective blind dates.   
  
In order to fulfill the "Couple Contract", the fake couple must perform perfectly in various emergency situations. The contract clearly states that they are merely just "business partners", but why is there always this uncontrollable throbbing sensation inside?!   
  
Stay tuned to "We Are Not Familiar" and watch how awkward adults fall in love.

title: Treasure House Of God
description: Vivian is a kind and beautiful girl. She comes to Dirtopia and opens a weapon store named "The Treasure House of God" in Yuqiang city. At the same time, she collects information and goes on adventures with her best friend Xiao Me. With that, a story of legends begin…

title: Help, My Boyfriend Is a Ghost!
alt_titles: Help! My Boyfriend Is a Monster
Jiuming, wo de nan piao shi yaoguai!
Save me! My boyfriend is a devil!
description:
A traffic accident turned Fang Linlin into a cat. Not only does she now have a full-time job as a wet nurse to three kittens, she even has to deal with the chairman’s 24/7 assault on her fur! 

Chairman: “From now on, you’re my cat. Remember that.” 
Chairman: “It sure is distressing, being this outstanding. It must be tiring being my cat, right?” 
Fang Linlin: “Haha.”

title: Thank You, Doctor
description: Being a doctor is like becoming the closest wall to heaven. Day after day, the lonely cold-faced beauty Xiao Yan and the cold-hearted Bai Shu, with a group of cute buddies in the emergency ICU, do their best to strengthen the wall closest to heaven and strive to bring those dying lives back to the path of life.

title: Lurking in the City
description: The Snow Wolves, a secret top-tier combat unit in the Z country, have maintained the only 100% win rate in the history of the group, and have exceptionally given the title of "Snow Wolves". After retiring from military service, Xu Wang is forced to become the fiance of the perfect CEO, Bai Feifei, who doesn't like him. Let's see how Xu Wang pushes through the world and the four seas, relying on the strongest single-armed force in history to start an extraordinary life!

title: Reading to be A Saint
description: One day, Fang Xiaowu accidentally got a super reading system. From then on, he can learn skills as long as he reads! By reading "West Chamber Futon" he learnt kung fu, read "Sun Tzu's Art of War" to grow his knowledge, he learnt how to tease girls by reading "Legend of Harem Zhen Huan Biography" ….. With system in my hand, I can have the world! ! ! I

title: The First Sword of Earth
description: Wang Sheng was unexpectedly reborn to the night before the sudden increase in spiritual energy on earth. "I am not going to be mediocre and looked down on by others like in my previous life." And so, he decided to go to Wudang to pay homage to his master from his previous life. And thus the daily life of the path to immortality begins...

title: The Wicked Girl Is Arriving Tonight
description: If Lixing unexpectedly received the abuse residue and becomes stronger, she can absorb the decomposition value and strengthen her attributes, and clean up the messes and women who ruined her family in the past life! The evil woman, who had been fighting everywhere with her golden arm, only to find herself in a strange situation: A hundred million dollars worth of medical professionals were scrambling to carry her school bag. The Face of the World: The Three Golden Film Awards? Top gangster turns a wolf into a dog and asks to pat his head? Imperial business tycoon Dieying tried to tear up her clothes, but she still had ten to one.

title: Nian Yue
description: When Mingyue and Huanian met, Mingyue was preparing to learn how to live a "normal girl's life", and things seemed to be going smoothly. When everyone thought that Mingyue's life was getting on the "right track", only Huanian was worried about her...

title: Nameless Ancient Style ABO
description: Funny ABO manhua, such a name as Nameless ABO. What to do when encountered with a strong O? The only way is to to marry him.
